31 /**
32  * Define a module along with a payload
33  * @param module a name for the payload
34  * @param payload a function to call with (require, exports, module) params
35  */
36 
37 (function() {
38 
39 var ACE_NAMESPACE = "";
40 
41 var global = (function() {
42  return this;
43 })();
44 
45 
46 if (!ACE_NAMESPACE && typeof requirejs !== "undefined")
47  return;
48 
49 
50 var _define = function(module, deps, payload) {
51  if (typeof module !== 'string') {
52  if (_define.original)
53  _define.original.apply(window, arguments);
54  else {
55  console.error('dropping module because define wasn\'t a string.');
56  console.trace();
57  }
58  return;
59  }
60 
61  if (arguments.length == 2)
62  payload = deps;
63 
64  if (!_define.modules) {
65  _define.modules = {};
66  _define.payloads = {};
67  }
68 
69  _define.payloads[module] = payload;
70  _define.modules[module] = null;
71 };
72 
73 /**
74  * Get at functionality define()ed using the function above
75  */
76 var _require = function(parentId, module, callback) {
77  if (Object.prototype.toString.call(module) === "[object Array]") {
78  var params = [];
79  for (var i = 0, l = module.length; i < l; ++i) {
80  var dep = lookup(parentId, module[i]);
81  if (!dep && _require.original)
82  return _require.original.apply(window, arguments);
83  params.push(dep);
84  }
85  if (callback) {
86  callback.apply(null, params);
87  }
88  }
89  else if (typeof module === 'string') {
90  var payload = lookup(parentId, module);
91  if (!payload && _require.original)
92  return _require.original.apply(window, arguments);
93 
94  if (callback) {
95  callback();
96  }
97 
98  return payload;
99  }
100  else {
101  if (_require.original)
102  return _require.original.apply(window, arguments);
103  }
104 };
105 
106 var normalizeModule = function(parentId, moduleName) {
107  // normalize plugin requires
108  if (moduleName.indexOf("!") !== -1) {
109  var chunks = moduleName.split("!");
110  return normalizeModule(parentId, chunks[0]) + "!" + normalizeModule(parentId, chunks[1]);
111  }
112  // normalize relative requires
113  if (moduleName.charAt(0) == ".") {
114  var base = parentId.split("/").slice(0, -1).join("/");
115  moduleName = base + "/" + moduleName;
116 
117  while(moduleName.indexOf(".") !== -1 && previous != moduleName) {
118  var previous = moduleName;
119  moduleName = moduleName.replace(/\/\.\//, "/").replace(/[^\/]+\/\.\.\//, "");
120  }
121  }
122 
123  return moduleName;
124 };
125 
126 /**
127  * Internal function to lookup moduleNames and resolve them by calling the
128  * definition function if needed.
129  */
130 var lookup = function(parentId, moduleName) {
131 
132  moduleName = normalizeModule(parentId, moduleName);
133 
134  var module = _define.modules[moduleName];
135  if (!module) {
136  module = _define.payloads[moduleName];
137  if (typeof module === 'function') {
138  var exports = {};
139  var mod = {
140  id: moduleName,
141  uri: '',
142  exports: exports,
143  packaged: true
144  };
145 
146  var req = function(module, callback) {
147  return _require(moduleName, module, callback);
148  };
149 
150  var returnValue = module(req, exports, mod);
151  exports = returnValue || mod.exports;
152  _define.modules[moduleName] = exports;
153  delete _define.payloads[moduleName];
154  }
155  module = _define.modules[moduleName] = exports || module;
156  }
157  return module;
158 };
159 
160 function exportAce(ns) {
161  var require = function(module, callback) {
162  return _require("", module, callback);
163  };
164 
165  var root = global;
166  if (ns) {
167  if (!global[ns])
168  global[ns] = {};
169  root = global[ns];
170  }
171 
172  if (!root.define || !root.define.packaged) {
173  _define.original = root.define;
174  root.define = _define;
175  root.define.packaged = true;
176  }
177 
178  if (!root.require || !root.require.packaged) {
179  _require.original = root.require;
180  root.require = require;
181  root.require.packaged = true;
182  }
183 }
184 
185 exportAce(ACE_NAMESPACE);
186 
187 })();
188 
189 define("ace/lib/regexp",["require","exports","module"], function(require, exports, module) {
190 "use strict";
191 
192  var real = {
193  exec: RegExp.prototype.exec,
194  test: RegExp.prototype.test,
195  match: String.prototype.match,
196  replace: String.prototype.replace,
197  split: String.prototype.split
198  },
199  compliantExecNpcg = real.exec.call(/()??/, "")[1] === undefined, // check `exec` handling of nonparticipating capturing groups
200  compliantLastIndexIncrement = function () {
201  var x = /^/g;
202  real.test.call(x, "");
203  return !x.lastIndex;
204  }();
205 
206  if (compliantLastIndexIncrement && compliantExecNpcg)
207  return;
208  RegExp.prototype.exec = function (str) {
209  var match = real.exec.apply(this, arguments),
210  name, r2;
211  if ( typeof(str) == 'string' && match) {
212  if (!compliantExecNpcg && match.length > 1 && indexOf(match, "") > -1) {
213  r2 = RegExp(this.source, real.replace.call(getNativeFlags(this), "g", ""));
214  real.replace.call(str.slice(match.index), r2, function () {
215  for (var i = 1; i < arguments.length - 2; i++) {
216  if (arguments[i] === undefined)
217  match[i] = undefined;
218  }
219  });
220  }
221  if (this._xregexp && this._xregexp.captureNames) {
222  for (var i = 1; i < match.length; i++) {
223  name = this._xregexp.captureNames[i - 1];
224  if (name)
225  match[name] = match[i];
226  }
227  }
228  if (!compliantLastIndexIncrement && this.global && !match[0].length && (this.lastIndex > match.index))
229  this.lastIndex--;
230  }
231  return match;
232  };
233  if (!compliantLastIndexIncrement) {
234  RegExp.prototype.test = function (str) {
235  var match = real.exec.call(this, str);
236  if (match && this.global && !match[0].length && (this.lastIndex > match.index))
237  this.lastIndex--;
238  return !!match;
239  };
240  }
241 
242  function getNativeFlags (regex) {
243  return (regex.global ? "g" : "") +
244  (regex.ignoreCase ? "i" : "") +
245  (regex.multiline ? "m" : "") +
246  (regex.extended ? "x" : "") + // Proposed for ES4; included in AS3
247  (regex.sticky ? "y" : "");
248  }
249 
250  function indexOf (array, item, from) {
251  if (Array.prototype.indexOf) // Use the native array method if available
252  return array.indexOf(item, from);
253  for (var i = from || 0; i < array.length; i++) {
254  if (array[i] === item)
255  return i;
256  }
257  return -1;
258  }
259 
260 });
261 
262 define("ace/lib/es5-shim",["require","exports","module"], function(require, exports, module) {
263 
264 function Empty() {}
265 
266 if (!Function.prototype.bind) {
267  Function.prototype.bind = function bind(that) { // .length is 1
268  var target = this;
269  if (typeof target != "function") {
270  throw new TypeError("Function.prototype.bind called on incompatible " + target);
271  }
272  var args = slice.call(arguments, 1); // for normal call
273  var bound = function () {
274 
275  if (this instanceof bound) {
276 
277  var result = target.apply(
278  this,
279  args.concat(slice.call(arguments))
280  );
281  if (Object(result) === result) {
282  return result;
283  }
284  return this;
285 
286  } else {
287  return target.apply(
288  that,
289  args.concat(slice.call(arguments))
290  );
291 
292  }
293 
294  };
295  if(target.prototype) {
296  Empty.prototype = target.prototype;
297  bound.prototype = new Empty();
298  Empty.prototype = null;
299  }
300  return bound;
301  };
302 }
303 var call = Function.prototype.call;
304 var prototypeOfArray = Array.prototype;
305 var prototypeOfObject = Object.prototype;
306 var slice = prototypeOfArray.slice;
307 var _toString = call.bind(prototypeOfObject.toString);
308 var owns = call.bind(prototypeOfObject.hasOwnProperty);
309 var defineGetter;
310 var defineSetter;
311 var lookupGetter;
312 var lookupSetter;
313 var supportsAccessors;
314 if ((supportsAccessors = owns(prototypeOfObject, "__defineGetter__"))) {
315  defineGetter = call.bind(prototypeOfObject.__defineGetter__);
316  defineSetter = call.bind(prototypeOfObject.__defineSetter__);
317  lookupGetter = call.bind(prototypeOfObject.__lookupGetter__);
318  lookupSetter = call.bind(prototypeOfObject.__lookupSetter__);
319 }
320 if ([1,2].splice(0).length != 2) {
321  if(function() { // test IE < 9 to splice bug - see issue #138
322  function makeArray(l) {
323  var a = new Array(l+2);
324  a[0] = a[1] = 0;
325  return a;
326  }
327  var array = [], lengthBefore;
328 
329  array.splice.apply(array, makeArray(20));
330  array.splice.apply(array, makeArray(26));
331 
332  lengthBefore = array.length; //46
333  array.splice(5, 0, "XXX"); // add one element
334 
335  lengthBefore + 1 == array.length
336 
337  if (lengthBefore + 1 == array.length) {
338  return true;// has right splice implementation without bugs
339  }
340  }()) {//IE 6/7
341  var array_splice = Array.prototype.splice;
342  Array.prototype.splice = function(start, deleteCount) {
343  if (!arguments.length) {
344  return [];
345  } else {
346  return array_splice.apply(this, [
347  start === void 0 ? 0 : start,
348  deleteCount === void 0 ? (this.length - start) : deleteCount
349  ].concat(slice.call(arguments, 2)))
350  }
351  };
352  } else {//IE8
353  Array.prototype.splice = function(pos, removeCount){
354  var length = this.length;
355  if (pos > 0) {
356  if (pos > length)
357  pos = length;
358  } else if (pos == void 0) {
359  pos = 0;
360  } else if (pos < 0) {
361  pos = Math.max(length + pos, 0);
362  }
363 
364  if (!(pos+removeCount < length))
365  removeCount = length - pos;
366 
367  var removed = this.slice(pos, pos+removeCount);
368  var insert = slice.call(arguments, 2);
369  var add = insert.length;
370  if (pos === length) {
371  if (add) {
372  this.push.apply(this, insert);
373  }
374  } else {
375  var remove = Math.min(removeCount, length - pos);
376  var tailOldPos = pos + remove;
377  var tailNewPos = tailOldPos + add - remove;
378  var tailCount = length - tailOldPos;
379  var lengthAfterRemove = length - remove;
380 
381  if (tailNewPos < tailOldPos) { // case A
382  for (var i = 0; i < tailCount; ++i) {
383  this[tailNewPos+i] = this[tailOldPos+i];
384  }
385  } else if (tailNewPos > tailOldPos) { // case B
386  for (i = tailCount; i--; ) {
387  this[tailNewPos+i] = this[tailOldPos+i];
388  }
389  } // else, add == remove (nothing to do)
390 
391  if (add && pos === lengthAfterRemove) {
392  this.length = lengthAfterRemove; // truncate array
393  this.push.apply(this, insert);
394  } else {
395  this.length = lengthAfterRemove + add; // reserves space
396  for (i = 0; i < add; ++i) {
397  this[pos+i] = insert[i];
398  }
399  }
400  }
401  return removed;
402  };
403  }
404 }
405 if (!Array.isArray) {
406  Array.isArray = function isArray(obj) {
407  return _toString(obj) == "[object Array]";
408  };
409 }
410 var boxedString = Object("a"),
411  splitString = boxedString[0] != "a" || !(0 in boxedString);
412 
413 if (!Array.prototype.forEach) {
414  Array.prototype.forEach = function forEach(fun /*, thisp*/) {
415  var object = toObject(this),
416  self = splitString && _toString(this) == "[object String]" ?
417  this.split("") :
418  object,
419  thisp = arguments[1],
420  i = -1,
421  length = self.length >>> 0;
422  if (_toString(fun) != "[object Function]") {
423  throw new TypeError(); // TODO message
424  }
425 
426  while (++i < length) {
427  if (i in self) {
428  fun.call(thisp, self[i], i, object);
429  }
430  }
431  };
432 }
433 if (!Array.prototype.map) {
434  Array.prototype.map = function map(fun /*, thisp*/) {
435  var object = toObject(this),
436  self = splitString && _toString(this) == "[object String]" ?
437  this.split("") :
438  object,
439  length = self.length >>> 0,
440  result = Array(length),
441  thisp = arguments[1];
442  if (_toString(fun) != "[object Function]") {
443  throw new TypeError(fun + " is not a function");
444  }
445 
446  for (var i = 0; i < length; i++) {
447  if (i in self)
448  result[i] = fun.call(thisp, self[i], i, object);
449  }
450  return result;
451  };
452 }
453 if (!Array.prototype.filter) {
454  Array.prototype.filter = function filter(fun /*, thisp */) {
455  var object = toObject(this),
456  self = splitString && _toString(this) == "[object String]" ?
457  this.split("") :
458  object,
459  length = self.length >>> 0,
460  result = [],
461  value,
462  thisp = arguments[1];
463  if (_toString(fun) != "[object Function]") {
464  throw new TypeError(fun + " is not a function");
465  }
466 
467  for (var i = 0; i < length; i++) {
468  if (i in self) {
469  value = self[i];
470  if (fun.call(thisp, value, i, object)) {
471  result.push(value);
472  }
473  }
474  }
475  return result;
476  };
477 }
478 if (!Array.prototype.every) {
479  Array.prototype.every = function every(fun /*, thisp */) {
480  var object = toObject(this),
481  self = splitString && _toString(this) == "[object String]" ?
482  this.split("") :
483  object,
484  length = self.length >>> 0,
485  thisp = arguments[1];
486  if (_toString(fun) != "[object Function]") {
487  throw new TypeError(fun + " is not a function");
488  }
489 
490  for (var i = 0; i < length; i++) {
491  if (i in self && !fun.call(thisp, self[i], i, object)) {
492  return false;
493  }
494  }
495  return true;
496  };
497 }
498 if (!Array.prototype.some) {
499  Array.prototype.some = function some(fun /*, thisp */) {
500  var object = toObject(this),
501  self = splitString && _toString(this) == "[object String]" ?
502  this.split("") :
503  object,
504  length = self.length >>> 0,
505  thisp = arguments[1];
506  if (_toString(fun) != "[object Function]") {
507  throw new TypeError(fun + " is not a function");
508  }
509 
510  for (var i = 0; i < length; i++) {
511  if (i in self && fun.call(thisp, self[i], i, object)) {
512  return true;
513  }
514  }
515  return false;
516  };
517 }
518 if (!Array.prototype.reduce) {
519  Array.prototype.reduce = function reduce(fun /*, initial*/) {
520  var object = toObject(this),
521  self = splitString && _toString(this) == "[object String]" ?
522  this.split("") :
523  object,
524  length = self.length >>> 0;
525  if (_toString(fun) != "[object Function]") {
526  throw new TypeError(fun + " is not a function");
527  }
528  if (!length && arguments.length == 1) {
529  throw new TypeError("reduce of empty array with no initial value");
530  }
531 
532  var i = 0;
533  var result;
534  if (arguments.length >= 2) {
535  result = arguments[1];
536  } else {
537  do {
538  if (i in self) {
539  result = self[i++];
540  break;
541  }
542  if (++i >= length) {
543  throw new TypeError("reduce of empty array with no initial value");
544  }
545  } while (true);
546  }
547 
548  for (; i < length; i++) {
549  if (i in self) {
550  result = fun.call(void 0, result, self[i], i, object);
551  }
552  }
553 
554  return result;
555  };
556 }
557 if (!Array.prototype.reduceRight) {
558  Array.prototype.reduceRight = function reduceRight(fun /*, initial*/) {
559  var object = toObject(this),
560  self = splitString && _toString(this) == "[object String]" ?
561  this.split("") :
562  object,
563  length = self.length >>> 0;
564  if (_toString(fun) != "[object Function]") {
565  throw new TypeError(fun + " is not a function");
566  }
567  if (!length && arguments.length == 1) {
568  throw new TypeError("reduceRight of empty array with no initial value");
569  }
570 
571  var result, i = length - 1;
572  if (arguments.length >= 2) {
573  result = arguments[1];
574  } else {
575  do {
576  if (i in self) {
577  result = self[i--];
578  break;
579  }
580  if (--i < 0) {
581  throw new TypeError("reduceRight of empty array with no initial value");
582  }
583  } while (true);
584  }
585 
586  do {
587  if (i in this) {
588  result = fun.call(void 0, result, self[i], i, object);
589  }
590  } while (i--);
591 
592  return result;
593  };
594 }
595 if (!Array.prototype.indexOf || ([0, 1].indexOf(1, 2) != -1)) {
596  Array.prototype.indexOf = function indexOf(sought /*, fromIndex */ ) {
597  var self = splitString && _toString(this) == "[object String]" ?
598  this.split("") :
599  toObject(this),
600  length = self.length >>> 0;
601 
602  if (!length) {
603  return -1;
604  }
605 
606  var i = 0;
607  if (arguments.length > 1) {
608  i = toInteger(arguments[1]);
609  }
610  i = i >= 0 ? i : Math.max(0, length + i);
611  for (; i < length; i++) {
612  if (i in self && self[i] === sought) {
613  return i;
614  }
615  }
616  return -1;
617  };
618 }
619 if (!Array.prototype.lastIndexOf || ([0, 1].lastIndexOf(0, -3) != -1)) {
620  Array.prototype.lastIndexOf = function lastIndexOf(sought /*, fromIndex */) {
621  var self = splitString && _toString(this) == "[object String]" ?
622  this.split("") :
623  toObject(this),
624  length = self.length >>> 0;
625 
626  if (!length) {
627  return -1;
628  }
629  var i = length - 1;
630  if (arguments.length > 1) {
631  i = Math.min(i, toInteger(arguments[1]));
632  }
633  i = i >= 0 ? i : length - Math.abs(i);
634  for (; i >= 0; i--) {
635  if (i in self && sought === self[i]) {
636  return i;
637  }
638  }
639  return -1;
640  };
641 }
642 if (!Object.getPrototypeOf) {
643  Object.getPrototypeOf = function getPrototypeOf(object) {
644  return object.__proto__ || (
645  object.constructor ?
646  object.constructor.prototype :
647  prototypeOfObject
648  );
649  };
650 }
651 if (!Object.getOwnPropertyDescriptor) {
652  var ERR_NON_OBJECT = "Object.getOwnPropertyDescriptor called on a " +
653  "non-object: ";
654  Object.getOwnPropertyDescriptor = function getOwnPropertyDescriptor(object, property) {
655  if ((typeof object != "object" && typeof object != "function") || object === null)
656  throw new TypeError(ERR_NON_OBJECT + object);
657  if (!owns(object, property))
658  return;
659 
660  var descriptor, getter, setter;
661  descriptor = { enumerable: true, configurable: true };
662  if (supportsAccessors) {
663  var prototype = object.__proto__;
664  object.__proto__ = prototypeOfObject;
665 
666  var getter = lookupGetter(object, property);
667  var setter = lookupSetter(object, property);
668  object.__proto__ = prototype;
669 
670  if (getter || setter) {
671  if (getter) descriptor.get = getter;
672  if (setter) descriptor.set = setter;
673  return descriptor;
674  }
675  }
676  descriptor.value = object[property];
677  return descriptor;
678  };
679 }
680 if (!Object.getOwnPropertyNames) {
681  Object.getOwnPropertyNames = function getOwnPropertyNames(object) {
682  return Object.keys(object);
683  };
684 }
685 if (!Object.create) {
686  var createEmpty;
687  if (Object.prototype.__proto__ === null) {
688  createEmpty = function () {
689  return { "__proto__": null };
690  };
691  } else {
692  createEmpty = function () {
693  var empty = {};
694  for (var i in empty)
695  empty[i] = null;
696  empty.constructor =
697  empty.hasOwnProperty =
698  empty.propertyIsEnumerable =
699  empty.isPrototypeOf =
700  empty.toLocaleString =
701  empty.toString =
702  empty.valueOf =
703  empty.__proto__ = null;
704  return empty;
705  }
706  }
707 
708  Object.create = function create(prototype, properties) {
709  var object;
710  if (prototype === null) {
711  object = createEmpty();
712  } else {
713  if (typeof prototype != "object")
714  throw new TypeError("typeof prototype["+(typeof prototype)+"] != 'object'");
715  var Type = function () {};
716  Type.prototype = prototype;
717  object = new Type();
718  object.__proto__ = prototype;
719  }
720  if (properties !== void 0)
721  Object.defineProperties(object, properties);
722  return object;
723  };
724 }
725 
726 function doesDefinePropertyWork(object) {
727  try {
728  Object.defineProperty(object, "sentinel", {});
729  return "sentinel" in object;
730  } catch (exception) {
731  }
732 }
733 if (Object.defineProperty) {
734  var definePropertyWorksOnObject = doesDefinePropertyWork({});
735  var definePropertyWorksOnDom = typeof document == "undefined" ||
736  doesDefinePropertyWork(document.createElement("div"));
737  if (!definePropertyWorksOnObject || !definePropertyWorksOnDom) {
738  var definePropertyFallback = Object.defineProperty;
739  }
740 }
741 
742 if (!Object.defineProperty || definePropertyFallback) {
743  var ERR_NON_OBJECT_DESCRIPTOR = "Property description must be an object: ";
744  var ERR_NON_OBJECT_TARGET = "Object.defineProperty called on non-object: "
745  var ERR_ACCESSORS_NOT_SUPPORTED = "getters & setters can not be defined " +
746  "on this javascript engine";
747 
748  Object.defineProperty = function defineProperty(object, property, descriptor) {
749  if ((typeof object != "object" && typeof object != "function") || object === null)
750  throw new TypeError(ERR_NON_OBJECT_TARGET + object);
751  if ((typeof descriptor != "object" && typeof descriptor != "function") || descriptor === null)
752  throw new TypeError(ERR_NON_OBJECT_DESCRIPTOR + descriptor);
753  if (definePropertyFallback) {
754  try {
755  return definePropertyFallback.call(Object, object, property, descriptor);
756  } catch (exception) {
757  }
758  }
759  if (owns(descriptor, "value")) {
760 
761  if (supportsAccessors && (lookupGetter(object, property) ||
762  lookupSetter(object, property)))
763  {
764  var prototype = object.__proto__;
765  object.__proto__ = prototypeOfObject;
766  delete object[property];
767  object[property] = descriptor.value;
768  object.__proto__ = prototype;
769  } else {
770  object[property] = descriptor.value;
771  }
772  } else {
773  if (!supportsAccessors)
774  throw new TypeError(ERR_ACCESSORS_NOT_SUPPORTED);
775  if (owns(descriptor, "get"))
776  defineGetter(object, property, descriptor.get);
777  if (owns(descriptor, "set"))
778  defineSetter(object, property, descriptor.set);
779  }
780 
781  return object;
782  };
783 }
784 if (!Object.defineProperties) {
785  Object.defineProperties = function defineProperties(object, properties) {
786  for (var property in properties) {
787  if (owns(properties, property))
788  Object.defineProperty(object, property, properties[property]);
789  }
790  return object;
791  };
792 }
793 if (!Object.seal) {
794  Object.seal = function seal(object) {
795  return object;
796  };
797 }
798 if (!Object.freeze) {
799  Object.freeze = function freeze(object) {
800  return object;
801  };
802 }
803 try {
804  Object.freeze(function () {});
805 } catch (exception) {
806  Object.freeze = (function freeze(freezeObject) {
807  return function freeze(object) {
808  if (typeof object == "function") {
809  return object;
810  } else {
811  return freezeObject(object);
812  }
813  };
814  })(Object.freeze);
815 }
816 if (!Object.preventExtensions) {
817  Object.preventExtensions = function preventExtensions(object) {
818  return object;
819  };
820 }
821 if (!Object.isSealed) {
822  Object.isSealed = function isSealed(object) {
823  return false;
824  };
825 }
826 if (!Object.isFrozen) {
827  Object.isFrozen = function isFrozen(object) {
828  return false;
829  };
830 }
831 if (!Object.isExtensible) {
832  Object.isExtensible = function isExtensible(object) {
833  if (Object(object) === object) {
834  throw new TypeError(); // TODO message
835  }
836  var name = '';
837  while (owns(object, name)) {
838  name += '?';
839  }
840  object[name] = true;
841  var returnValue = owns(object, name);
842  delete object[name];
843  return returnValue;
844  };
845 }
846 if (!Object.keys) {
847  var hasDontEnumBug = true,
848  dontEnums = [
849  "toString",
850  "toLocaleString",
851  "valueOf",
852  "hasOwnProperty",
853  "isPrototypeOf",
854  "propertyIsEnumerable",
855  "constructor"
856  ],
857  dontEnumsLength = dontEnums.length;
858 
859  for (var key in {"toString": null}) {
860  hasDontEnumBug = false;
861  }
862 
863  Object.keys = function keys(object) {
864 
865  if (
866  (typeof object != "object" && typeof object != "function") ||
867  object === null
868  ) {
869  throw new TypeError("Object.keys called on a non-object");
870  }
871 
872  var keys = [];
873  for (var name in object) {
874  if (owns(object, name)) {
875  keys.push(name);
876  }
877  }
878 
879  if (hasDontEnumBug) {
880  for (var i = 0, ii = dontEnumsLength; i < ii; i++) {
881  var dontEnum = dontEnums[i];
882  if (owns(object, dontEnum)) {
883  keys.push(dontEnum);
884  }
885  }
886  }
887  return keys;
888  };
889 
890 }
891 if (!Date.now) {
892  Date.now = function now() {
893  return new Date().getTime();
894  };
895 }
896 var ws = "\x09\x0A\x0B\x0C\x0D\x20\xA0\u1680\u180E\u2000\u2001\u2002\u2003" +
897  "\u2004\u2005\u2006\u2007\u2008\u2009\u200A\u202F\u205F\u3000\u2028" +
898  "\u2029\uFEFF";
899 if (!String.prototype.trim || ws.trim()) {
900  ws = "[" + ws + "]";
901  var trimBeginRegexp = new RegExp("^" + ws + ws + "*"),
902  trimEndRegexp = new RegExp(ws + ws + "*$");
903  String.prototype.trim = function trim() {
904  return String(this).replace(trimBeginRegexp, "").replace(trimEndRegexp, "");
905  };
906 }
907 
908 function toInteger(n) {
909  n = +n;
910  if (n !== n) { // isNaN
911  n = 0;
912  } else if (n !== 0 && n !== (1/0) && n !== -(1/0)) {
913  n = (n > 0 || -1) * Math.floor(Math.abs(n));
914  }
915  return n;
916 }
917 
918 function isPrimitive(input) {
919  var type = typeof input;
920  return (
921  input === null ||
922  type === "undefined" ||
923  type === "boolean" ||
924  type === "number" ||
925  type === "string"
926  );
927 }
928 
929 function toPrimitive(input) {
930  var val, valueOf, toString;
931  if (isPrimitive(input)) {
932  return input;
933  }
934  valueOf = input.valueOf;
935  if (typeof valueOf === "function") {
936  val = valueOf.call(input);
937  if (isPrimitive(val)) {
938  return val;
939  }
940  }
941  toString = input.toString;
942  if (typeof toString === "function") {
943  val = toString.call(input);
944  if (isPrimitive(val)) {
945  return val;
946  }
947  }
948  throw new TypeError();
949 }
950 var toObject = function (o) {
951  if (o == null) { // this matches both null and undefined
952  throw new TypeError("can't convert "+o+" to object");
953  }
954  return Object(o);
955 };
956 
957 });
958 
959 define("ace/lib/fixoldbrowsers",["require","exports","module","ace/lib/regexp","ace/lib/es5-shim"], function(require, exports, module) {
960 "use strict";
961 
962 require("./regexp");
963 require("./es5-shim");
964 
965 });
966 
967 define("ace/lib/dom",["require","exports","module"], function(require, exports, module) {
968 "use strict";
969 
970 var XHTML_NS = "http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml";
971 
972 exports.getDocumentHead = function(doc) {
973  if (!doc)
974  doc = document;
975  return doc.head || doc.getElementsByTagName("head")[0] || doc.documentElement;
976 }
977 
978 exports.createElement = function(tag, ns) {
979  return document.createElementNS ?
980  document.createElementNS(ns || XHTML_NS, tag) :
981  document.createElement(tag);
982 };
983 
984 exports.hasCssClass = function(el, name) {
985  var classes = (el.className || "").split(/\s+/g);
986  return classes.indexOf(name) !== -1;
987 };
988 exports.addCssClass = function(el, name) {
989  if (!exports.hasCssClass(el, name)) {
990  el.className += " " + name;
991  }
992 };
993 exports.removeCssClass = function(el, name) {
994  var classes = el.className.split(/\s+/g);
995  while (true) {
996  var index = classes.indexOf(name);
997  if (index == -1) {
998  break;
999  }
1000  classes.splice(index, 1);
1001  }
1002  el.className = classes.join(" ");
1003 };
1004 
1005 exports.toggleCssClass = function(el, name) {
1006  var classes = el.className.split(/\s+/g), add = true;
1007  while (true) {
1008  var index = classes.indexOf(name);
1009  if (index == -1) {
1010  break;
1011  }
1012  add = false;
1013  classes.splice(index, 1);
1014  }
1015  if(add)
1016  classes.push(name);
1017 
1018  el.className = classes.join(" ");
1019  return add;
1020 };
1021 exports.setCssClass = function(node, className, include) {
1022  if (include) {
1023  exports.addCssClass(node, className);
1024  } else {
1025  exports.removeCssClass(node, className);
1026  }
1027 };
1028 
1029 exports.hasCssString = function(id, doc) {
1030  var index = 0, sheets;
1031  doc = doc || document;
1032 
1033  if (doc.createStyleSheet && (sheets = doc.styleSheets)) {
1034  while (index < sheets.length)
1035  if (sheets[index++].owningElement.id === id) return true;
1036  } else if ((sheets = doc.getElementsByTagName("style"))) {
1037  while (index < sheets.length)
1038  if (sheets[index++].id === id) return true;
1039  }
1040 
1041  return false;
1042 };
1043 
1044 exports.importCssString = function importCssString(cssText, id, doc) {
1045  doc = doc || document;
1046  if (id && exports.hasCssString(id, doc))
1047  return null;
1048 
1049  var style;
1050 
1051  if (doc.createStyleSheet) {
1052  style = doc.createStyleSheet();
1053  style.cssText = cssText;
1054  if (id)
1055  style.owningElement.id = id;
1056  } else {
1057  style = doc.createElementNS
1058  ? doc.createElementNS(XHTML_NS, "style")
1059  : doc.createElement("style");
1060 
1061  style.appendChild(doc.createTextNode(cssText));
1062  if (id)
1063  style.id = id;
1064 
1065  exports.getDocumentHead(doc).appendChild(style);
1066  }
1067 };
1068 
1069 exports.importCssStylsheet = function(uri, doc) {
1070  if (doc.createStyleSheet) {
1071  doc.createStyleSheet(uri);
1072  } else {
1073  var link = exports.createElement('link');
1074  link.rel = 'stylesheet';
1075  link.href = uri;
1076 
1077  exports.getDocumentHead(doc).appendChild(link);
1078  }
1079 };
1080 
1081 exports.getInnerWidth = function(element) {
1082  return (
1083  parseInt(exports.computedStyle(element, "paddingLeft"), 10) +
1084  parseInt(exports.computedStyle(element, "paddingRight"), 10) +
1085  element.clientWidth
1086  );
1087 };
1088 
1089 exports.getInnerHeight = function(element) {
1090  return (
1091  parseInt(exports.computedStyle(element, "paddingTop"), 10) +
1092  parseInt(exports.computedStyle(element, "paddingBottom"), 10) +
1093  element.clientHeight
1094  );
1095 };
1096 
1097 
1098 if (typeof document == "undefined")
1099  return;
1100 
1101 if (window.pageYOffset !== undefined) {
1102  exports.getPageScrollTop = function() {
1103  return window.pageYOffset;
1104  };
1105 
1106  exports.getPageScrollLeft = function() {
1107  return window.pageXOffset;
1108  };
1109 }
1110 else {
1111  exports.getPageScrollTop = function() {
1112  return document.body.scrollTop;
1113  };
1114 
1115  exports.getPageScrollLeft = function() {
1116  return document.body.scrollLeft;
1117  };
1118 }
1119 
1120 if (window.getComputedStyle)
1121  exports.computedStyle = function(element, style) {
1122  if (style)
1123  return (window.getComputedStyle(element, "") || {})[style] || "";
1124  return window.getComputedStyle(element, "") || {};
1125  };
1126 else
1127  exports.computedStyle = function(element, style) {
1128  if (style)
1129  return element.currentStyle[style];
1130  return element.currentStyle;
1131  };
1132 
1133 exports.scrollbarWidth = function(document) {
1134  var inner = exports.createElement("ace_inner");
1135  inner.style.width = "100%";
1136  inner.style.minWidth = "0px";
1137  inner.style.height = "200px";
1138  inner.style.display = "block";
1139 
1140  var outer = exports.createElement("ace_outer");
1141  var style = outer.style;
1142 
1143  style.position = "absolute";
1144  style.left = "-10000px";
1145  style.overflow = "hidden";
1146  style.width = "200px";
1147  style.minWidth = "0px";
1148  style.height = "150px";
1149  style.display = "block";
1150 
1151  outer.appendChild(inner);
1152 
1153  var body = document.documentElement;
1154  body.appendChild(outer);
1155 
1156  var noScrollbar = inner.offsetWidth;
1157 
1158  style.overflow = "scroll";
1159  var withScrollbar = inner.offsetWidth;
1160 
1161  if (noScrollbar == withScrollbar) {
1162  withScrollbar = outer.clientWidth;
1163  }
1164 
1165  body.removeChild(outer);
1166 
1167  return noScrollbar-withScrollbar;
1168 };
1169 exports.setInnerHtml = function(el, innerHtml) {
1170  var element = el.cloneNode(false);//document.createElement("div");
1171  element.innerHTML = innerHtml;
1172  el.parentNode.replaceChild(element, el);
1173  return element;
1174 };
1175 
1176 if ("textContent" in document.documentElement) {
1177  exports.setInnerText = function(el, innerText) {
1178  el.textContent = innerText;
1179  };
1180 
1181  exports.getInnerText = function(el) {
1182  return el.textContent;
1183  };
1184 }
1185 else {
1186  exports.setInnerText = function(el, innerText) {
1187  el.innerText = innerText;
1188  };
1189 
1190  exports.getInnerText = function(el) {
1191  return el.innerText;
1192  };
1193 }
1194 
1195 exports.getParentWindow = function(document) {
1196  return document.defaultView || document.parentWindow;
1197 };
1198 
1199 });
1200 
1201 define("ace/lib/oop",["require","exports","module"], function(require, exports, module) {
1202 "use strict";
1203 
1204 exports.inherits = function(ctor, superCtor) {
1205  ctor.super_ = superCtor;
1206  ctor.prototype = Object.create(superCtor.prototype, {
1207  constructor: {
1208  value: ctor,
1209  enumerable: false,
1210  writable: true,
1211  configurable: true
1212  }
1213  });
1214 };
1215 
1216 exports.mixin = function(obj, mixin) {
1217  for (var key in mixin) {
1218  obj[key] = mixin[key];
1219  }
1220  return obj;
1221 };
1222 
1223 exports.implement = function(proto, mixin) {
1224  exports.mixin(proto, mixin);
1225 };
1226 
1227 });
1228 
1229 define("ace/lib/keys",["require","exports","module","ace/lib/fixoldbrowsers","ace/lib/oop"], function(require, exports, module) {
1230 "use strict";
1231 
1232 require("./fixoldbrowsers");
1233 
1234 var oop = require("./oop");
1235 var Keys = (function() {
1236  var ret = {
1237  MODIFIER_KEYS: {
1238  16: 'Shift', 17: 'Ctrl', 18: 'Alt', 224: 'Meta'
1239  },
1240 
1241  KEY_MODS: {
1242  "ctrl": 1, "alt": 2, "option" : 2, "shift": 4,
1243  "super": 8, "meta": 8, "command": 8, "cmd": 8
1244  },
1245 
1246  FUNCTION_KEYS : {
1247  8 : "Backspace",
1248  9 : "Tab",
1249  13 : "Return",
1250  19 : "Pause",
1251  27 : "Esc",
1252  32 : "Space",
1253  33 : "PageUp",
1254  34 : "PageDown",
1255  35 : "End",
1256  36 : "Home",
1257  37 : "Left",
1258  38 : "Up",
1259  39 : "Right",
1260  40 : "Down",
1261  44 : "Print",
1262  45 : "Insert",
1263  46 : "Delete",
1264  96 : "Numpad0",
1265  97 : "Numpad1",
1266  98 : "Numpad2",
1267  99 : "Numpad3",
1268  100: "Numpad4",
1269  101: "Numpad5",
1270  102: "Numpad6",
1271  103: "Numpad7",
1272  104: "Numpad8",
1273  105: "Numpad9",
1274  '-13': "NumpadEnter",
1275  112: "F1",
1276  113: "F2",
1277  114: "F3",
1278  115: "F4",
1279  116: "F5",
1280  117: "F6",
1281  118: "F7",
1282  119: "F8",
1283  120: "F9",
1284  121: "F10",
1285  122: "F11",
1286  123: "F12",
1287  144: "Numlock",
1288  145: "Scrolllock"
1289  },
1290 
1291  PRINTABLE_KEYS: {
1292  32: ' ', 48: '0', 49: '1', 50: '2', 51: '3', 52: '4', 53: '5',
1293  54: '6', 55: '7', 56: '8', 57: '9', 59: ';', 61: '=', 65: 'a',
1294  66: 'b', 67: 'c', 68: 'd', 69: 'e', 70: 'f', 71: 'g', 72: 'h',
1295  73: 'i', 74: 'j', 75: 'k', 76: 'l', 77: 'm', 78: 'n', 79: 'o',
1296  80: 'p', 81: 'q', 82: 'r', 83: 's', 84: 't', 85: 'u', 86: 'v',
1297  87: 'w', 88: 'x', 89: 'y', 90: 'z', 107: '+', 109: '-', 110: '.',
1298  187: '=', 188: ',', 189: '-', 190: '.', 191: '/', 192: '`', 219: '[',
1299  220: '\\',221: ']', 222: '\''
1300  }
1301  };
1302  var name, i;
1303  for (i in ret.FUNCTION_KEYS) {
1304  name = ret.FUNCTION_KEYS[i].toLowerCase();
1305  ret[name] = parseInt(i, 10);
1306  }
1307  for (i in ret.PRINTABLE_KEYS) {
1308  name = ret.PRINTABLE_KEYS[i].toLowerCase();
1309  ret[name] = parseInt(i, 10);
1310  }
1311  oop.mixin(ret, ret.MODIFIER_KEYS);
1312  oop.mixin(ret, ret.PRINTABLE_KEYS);
1313  oop.mixin(ret, ret.FUNCTION_KEYS);
1314  ret.enter = ret["return"];
1315  ret.escape = ret.esc;
1316  ret.del = ret["delete"];
1317  ret[173] = '-';
1318 
1319  (function() {
1320  var mods = ["cmd", "ctrl", "alt", "shift"];
1321  for (var i = Math.pow(2, mods.length); i--;) {
1322  ret.KEY_MODS[i] = mods.filter(function(x) {
1323  return i & ret.KEY_MODS[x];
1324  }).join("-") + "-";
1325  }
1326  })();
1327 
1328  ret.KEY_MODS[0] = "";
1329  ret.KEY_MODS[-1] = "input";
1330 
1331  return ret;
1332 })();
1333 oop.mixin(exports, Keys);
1334 
1335 exports.keyCodeToString = function(keyCode) {
1336  var keyString = Keys[keyCode];
1337  if (typeof keyString != "string")
1338  keyString = String.fromCharCode(keyCode);
1339  return keyString.toLowerCase();
1340 };
1341 
1342 });
1343 
1344 define("ace/lib/useragent",["require","exports","module"], function(require, exports, module) {
1345 "use strict";
1346 exports.OS = {
1347  LINUX: "LINUX",
1348  MAC: "MAC",
1349  WINDOWS: "WINDOWS"
1350 };
1351 exports.getOS = function() {
1352  if (exports.isMac) {
1353  return exports.OS.MAC;
1354  } else if (exports.isLinux) {
1355  return exports.OS.LINUX;
1356  } else {
1357  return exports.OS.WINDOWS;
1358  }
1359 };
1360 if (typeof navigator != "object")
1361  return;
1362 
1363 var os = (navigator.platform.match(/mac|win|linux/i) || ["other"])[0].toLowerCase();
1364 var ua = navigator.userAgent;
1365 exports.isWin = (os == "win");
1366 exports.isMac = (os == "mac");
1367 exports.isLinux = (os == "linux");
1368 exports.isIE =
1369  (navigator.appName == "Microsoft Internet Explorer" || navigator.appName.indexOf("MSAppHost") >= 0)
1370  ? parseFloat((ua.match(/(?:MSIE |Trident\/[0-9]+[\.0-9]+;.*rv:)([0-9]+[\.0-9]+)/)||[])[1])
1371  : parseFloat((ua.match(/(?:Trident\/[0-9]+[\.0-9]+;.*rv:)([0-9]+[\.0-9]+)/)||[])[1]); // for ie
1372 
1373 exports.isOldIE = exports.isIE && exports.isIE < 9;
1374 exports.isGecko = exports.isMozilla = (window.Controllers || window.controllers) && window.navigator.product === "Gecko";
1375 exports.isOldGecko = exports.isGecko && parseInt((ua.match(/rv\:(\d+)/)||[])[1], 10) < 4;
1376 exports.isOpera = window.opera && Object.prototype.toString.call(window.opera) == "[object Opera]";
1377 exports.isWebKit = parseFloat(ua.split("WebKit/")[1]) || undefined;
1378 
1379 exports.isChrome = parseFloat(ua.split(" Chrome/")[1]) || undefined;
1380 
1381 exports.isAIR = ua.indexOf("AdobeAIR") >= 0;
1382 
1383 exports.isIPad = ua.indexOf("iPad") >= 0;
1384 
1385 exports.isTouchPad = ua.indexOf("TouchPad") >= 0;
1386 
1387 exports.isChromeOS = ua.indexOf(" CrOS ") >= 0;
1388 
1389 });
1390 
1391 define("ace/lib/event",["require","exports","module","ace/lib/keys","ace/lib/useragent"], function(require, exports, module) {
1392 "use strict";
1393 
1394 var keys = require("./keys");
1395 var useragent = require("./useragent");
1396 
1397 exports.addListener = function(elem, type, callback) {
1398  if (elem.addEventListener) {
1399  return elem.addEventListener(type, callback, false);
1400  }
1401  if (elem.attachEvent) {
1402  var wrapper = function() {
1403  callback.call(elem, window.event);
1404  };
1405  callback._wrapper = wrapper;
1406  elem.attachEvent("on" + type, wrapper);
1407  }
1408 };
1409 
1410 exports.removeListener = function(elem, type, callback) {
1411  if (elem.removeEventListener) {
1412  return elem.removeEventListener(type, callback, false);
1413  }
1414  if (elem.detachEvent) {
1415  elem.detachEvent("on" + type, callback._wrapper || callback);
1416  }
1417 };
1418 exports.stopEvent = function(e) {
1419  exports.stopPropagation(e);
1420  exports.preventDefault(e);
1421  return false;
1422 };
1423 
1424 exports.stopPropagation = function(e) {
1425  if (e.stopPropagation)
1426  e.stopPropagation();
1427  else
1428  e.cancelBubble = true;
1429 };
1430 
1431 exports.preventDefault = function(e) {
1432  if (e.preventDefault)
1433  e.preventDefault();
1434  else
1435  e.returnValue = false;
1436 };
1437 exports.getButton = function(e) {
1438  if (e.type == "dblclick")
1439  return 0;
1440  if (e.type == "contextmenu" || (useragent.isMac && (e.ctrlKey && !e.altKey && !e.shiftKey)))
1441  return 2;
1442  if (e.preventDefault) {
1443  return e.button;
1444  }
1445  else {
1446  return {1:0, 2:2, 4:1}[e.button];
1447  }
1448 };
1449 
1450 exports.capture = function(el, eventHandler, releaseCaptureHandler) {
1451  function onMouseUp(e) {
1452  eventHandler && eventHandler(e);
1453  releaseCaptureHandler && releaseCaptureHandler(e);
1454 
1455  exports.removeListener(document, "mousemove", eventHandler, true);
1456  exports.removeListener(document, "mouseup", onMouseUp, true);
1457  exports.removeListener(document, "dragstart", onMouseUp, true);
1458  }
1459 
1460  exports.addListener(document, "mousemove", eventHandler, true);
1461  exports.addListener(document, "mouseup", onMouseUp, true);
1462  exports.addListener(document, "dragstart", onMouseUp, true);
1463 
1464  return onMouseUp;
1465 };
1466 
1467 exports.addMouseWheelListener = function(el, callback) {
1468  if ("onmousewheel" in el) {
1469  exports.addListener(el, "mousewheel", function(e) {
1470  var factor = 8;
1471  if (e.wheelDeltaX !== undefined) {
1472  e.wheelX = -e.wheelDeltaX / factor;
1473  e.wheelY = -e.wheelDeltaY / factor;
1474  } else {
1475  e.wheelX = 0;
1476  e.wheelY = -e.wheelDelta / factor;
1477  }
1478  callback(e);
1479  });
1480  } else if ("onwheel" in el) {
1481  exports.addListener(el, "wheel", function(e) {
1482  var factor = 0.35;
1483  switch (e.deltaMode) {
1484  case e.DOM_DELTA_PIXEL:
1485  e.wheelX = e.deltaX * factor || 0;
1486  e.wheelY = e.deltaY * factor || 0;
1487  break;
1488  case e.DOM_DELTA_LINE:
1489  case e.DOM_DELTA_PAGE:
1490  e.wheelX = (e.deltaX || 0) * 5;
1491  e.wheelY = (e.deltaY || 0) * 5;
1492  break;
1493  }
1494 
1495  callback(e);
1496  });
1497  } else {
1498  exports.addListener(el, "DOMMouseScroll", function(e) {
1499  if (e.axis && e.axis == e.HORIZONTAL_AXIS) {
1500  e.wheelX = (e.detail || 0) * 5;
1501  e.wheelY = 0;
1502  } else {
1503  e.wheelX = 0;
1504  e.wheelY = (e.detail || 0) * 5;
1505  }
1506  callback(e);
1507  });
1508  }
1509 };
1510 
1511 exports.addMultiMouseDownListener = function(el, timeouts, eventHandler, callbackName) {
1512  var clicks = 0;
1513  var startX, startY, timer;
1514  var eventNames = {
1515  2: "dblclick",
1516  3: "tripleclick",
1517  4: "quadclick"
1518  };
1519 
1520  exports.addListener(el, "mousedown", function(e) {
1521  if (exports.getButton(e) !== 0) {
1522  clicks = 0;
1523  } else if (e.detail > 1) {
1524  clicks++;
1525  if (clicks > 4)
1526  clicks = 1;
1527  } else {
1528  clicks = 1;
1529  }
1530  if (useragent.isIE) {
1531  var isNewClick = Math.abs(e.clientX - startX) > 5 || Math.abs(e.clientY - startY) > 5;
1532  if (!timer || isNewClick)
1533  clicks = 1;
1534  if (timer)
1535  clearTimeout(timer);
1536  timer = setTimeout(function() {timer = null}, timeouts[clicks - 1] || 600);
1537 
1538  if (clicks == 1) {
1539  startX = e.clientX;
1540  startY = e.clientY;
1541  }
1542  }
1543 
1544  e._clicks = clicks;
1545 
1546  eventHandler[callbackName]("mousedown", e);
1547 
1548  if (clicks > 4)
1549  clicks = 0;
1550  else if (clicks > 1)
1551  return eventHandler[callbackName](eventNames[clicks], e);
1552  });
1553 
1554  if (useragent.isOldIE) {
1555  exports.addListener(el, "dblclick", function(e) {
1556  clicks = 2;
1557  if (timer)
1558  clearTimeout(timer);
1559  timer = setTimeout(function() {timer = null}, timeouts[clicks - 1] || 600);
1560  eventHandler[callbackName]("mousedown", e);
1561  eventHandler[callbackName](eventNames[clicks], e);
1562  });
1563  }
1564 };
1565 
1566 var getModifierHash = useragent.isMac && useragent.isOpera && !("KeyboardEvent" in window)
1567  ? function(e) {
1568  return 0 | (e.metaKey ? 1 : 0) | (e.altKey ? 2 : 0) | (e.shiftKey ? 4 : 0) | (e.ctrlKey ? 8 : 0);
1569  }
1570  : function(e) {
1571  return 0 | (e.ctrlKey ? 1 : 0) | (e.altKey ? 2 : 0) | (e.shiftKey ? 4 : 0) | (e.metaKey ? 8 : 0);
1572  };
1573 
1574 exports.getModifierString = function(e) {
1575  return keys.KEY_MODS[getModifierHash(e)];
1576 };
1577 
1578 function normalizeCommandKeys(callback, e, keyCode) {
1579  var hashId = getModifierHash(e);
1580 
1581  if (!useragent.isMac && pressedKeys) {
1582  if (pressedKeys[91] || pressedKeys[92])
1583  hashId |= 8;
1584  if (pressedKeys.altGr) {
1585  if ((3 & hashId) != 3)
1586  pressedKeys.altGr = 0;
1587  else
1588  return;
1589  }
1590  if (keyCode === 18 || keyCode === 17) {
1591  var location = "location" in e ? e.location : e.keyLocation;
1592  if (keyCode === 17 && location === 1) {
1593  ts = e.timeStamp;
1594  } else if (keyCode === 18 && hashId === 3 && location === 2) {
1595  var dt = -ts;
1596  ts = e.timeStamp;
1597  dt += ts;
1598  if (dt < 3)
1599  pressedKeys.altGr = true;
1600  }
1601  }
1602  }
1603 
1604  if (keyCode in keys.MODIFIER_KEYS) {
1605  switch (keys.MODIFIER_KEYS[keyCode]) {
1606  case "Alt":
1607  hashId = 2;
1608  break;
1609  case "Shift":
1610  hashId = 4;
1611  break;
1612  case "Ctrl":
1613  hashId = 1;
1614  break;
1615  default:
1616  hashId = 8;
1617  break;
1618  }
1619  keyCode = -1;
1620  }
1621 
1622  if (hashId & 8 && (keyCode === 91 || keyCode === 93)) {
1623  keyCode = -1;
1624  }
1625 
1626  if (!hashId && keyCode === 13) {
1627  var location = "location" in e ? e.location : e.keyLocation;
1628  if (location === 3) {
1629  callback(e, hashId, -keyCode);
1630  if (e.defaultPrevented)
1631  return;
1632  }
1633  }
1634 
1635  if (useragent.isChromeOS && hashId & 8) {
1636  callback(e, hashId, keyCode);
1637  if (e.defaultPrevented)
1638  return;
1639  else
1640  hashId &= ~8;
1641  }
1642  if (!hashId && !(keyCode in keys.FUNCTION_KEYS) && !(keyCode in keys.PRINTABLE_KEYS)) {
1643  return false;
1644  }
1645 
1646  return callback(e, hashId, keyCode);
1647 }
1648 
1649 var pressedKeys = null;
1650 var ts = 0;
1651 exports.addCommandKeyListener = function(el, callback) {
1652  var addListener = exports.addListener;
1653  if (useragent.isOldGecko || (useragent.isOpera && !("KeyboardEvent" in window))) {
1654  var lastKeyDownKeyCode = null;
1655  addListener(el, "keydown", function(e) {
1656  lastKeyDownKeyCode = e.keyCode;
1657  });
1658  addListener(el, "keypress", function(e) {
1659  return normalizeCommandKeys(callback, e, lastKeyDownKeyCode);
1660  });
1661  } else {
1662  var lastDefaultPrevented = null;
1663 
1664  addListener(el, "keydown", function(e) {
1665  pressedKeys[e.keyCode] = true;
1666  var result = normalizeCommandKeys(callback, e, e.keyCode);
1667  lastDefaultPrevented = e.defaultPrevented;
1668  return result;
1669  });
1670 
1671  addListener(el, "keypress", function(e) {
1672  if (lastDefaultPrevented && (e.ctrlKey || e.altKey || e.shiftKey || e.metaKey)) {
1673  exports.stopEvent(e);
1674  lastDefaultPrevented = null;
1675  }
1676  });
1677 
1678  addListener(el, "keyup", function(e) {
1679  pressedKeys[e.keyCode] = null;
1680  });
1681 
1682  if (!pressedKeys) {
1683  pressedKeys = Object.create(null);
1684  addListener(window, "focus", function(e) {
1685  pressedKeys = Object.create(null);
1686  });
1687  }
1688  }
1689 };
1690 
1691 if (window.postMessage && !useragent.isOldIE) {
1692  var postMessageId = 1;
1693  exports.nextTick = function(callback, win) {
1694  win = win || window;
1695  var messageName = "zero-timeout-message-" + postMessageId;
1696  exports.addListener(win, "message", function listener(e) {
1697  if (e.data == messageName) {
1698  exports.stopPropagation(e);
1699  exports.removeListener(win, "message", listener);
1700  callback();
1701  }
1702  });
1703  win.postMessage(messageName, "*");
1704  };
1705 }
1706 
1707 
1708 exports.nextFrame = window.requestAnimationFrame ||
1709  window.mozRequestAnimationFrame ||
1710  window.webkitRequestAnimationFrame ||
1711  window.msRequestAnimationFrame ||
1712  window.oRequestAnimationFrame;
1713 
1714 if (exports.nextFrame)
1715  exports.nextFrame = exports.nextFrame.bind(window);
1716 else
1717  exports.nextFrame = function(callback) {
1718  setTimeout(callback, 17);
1719  };
1720 });
1721 
1722 define("ace/lib/lang",["require","exports","module"], function(require, exports, module) {
1723 "use strict";
1724 
1725 exports.last = function(a) {
1726  return a[a.length - 1];
1727 };
1728 
1729 exports.stringReverse = function(string) {
1730  return string.split("").reverse().join("");
1731 };
1732 
1733 exports.stringRepeat = function (string, count) {
1734  var result = '';
1735  while (count > 0) {
1736  if (count & 1)
1737  result += string;
1738 
1739  if (count >>= 1)
1740  string += string;
1741  }
1742  return result;
1743 };
1744 
1745 var trimBeginRegexp = /^\s\s*/;
1746 var trimEndRegexp = /\s\s*$/;
1747 
1748 exports.stringTrimLeft = function (string) {
1749  return string.replace(trimBeginRegexp, '');
1750 };
1751 
1752 exports.stringTrimRight = function (string) {
1753  return string.replace(trimEndRegexp, '');
1754 };
1755 
1756 exports.copyObject = function(obj) {
1757  var copy = {};
1758  for (var key in obj) {
1759  copy[key] = obj[key];
1760  }
1761  return copy;
1762 };
1763 
1764 exports.copyArray = function(array){
1765  var copy = [];
1766  for (var i=0, l=array.length; i<l; i++) {
1767  if (array[i] && typeof array[i] == "object")
1768  copy[i] = this.copyObject( array[i] );
1769  else
1770  copy[i] = array[i];
1771  }
1772  return copy;
1773 };
1774 
1775 exports.deepCopy = function (obj) {
1776  if (typeof obj !== "object" || !obj)
1777  return obj;
1778  var cons = obj.constructor;
1779  if (cons === RegExp)
1780  return obj;
1781 
1782  var copy = cons();
1783  for (var key in obj) {
1784  if (typeof obj[key] === "object") {
1785  copy[key] = exports.deepCopy(obj[key]);
1786  } else {
1787  copy[key] = obj[key];
1788  }
1789  }
1790  return copy;
1791 };
1792 
1793 exports.arrayToMap = function(arr) {
1794  var map = {};
1795  for (var i=0; i<arr.length; i++) {
1796  map[arr[i]] = 1;
1797  }
1798  return map;
1799 
1800 };
1801 
1802 exports.createMap = function(props) {
1803  var map = Object.create(null);
1804  for (var i in props) {
1805  map[i] = props[i];
1806  }
1807  return map;
1808 };
1809 exports.arrayRemove = function(array, value) {
1810  for (var i = 0; i <= array.length; i++) {
1811  if (value === array[i]) {
1812  array.splice(i, 1);
1813  }
1814  }
1815 };
1816 
1817 exports.escapeRegExp = function(str) {
1818  return str.replace(/([.*+?^${}()|[\]\/\\])/g, '\\$1');
1819 };
1820 
1821 exports.escapeHTML = function(str) {
1822  return str.replace(/&/g, "&#38;").replace(/"/g, "&#34;").replace(/'/g, "&#39;").replace(/</g, "&#60;");
1823 };
1824 
1825 exports.getMatchOffsets = function(string, regExp) {
1826  var matches = [];
1827 
1828  string.replace(regExp, function(str) {
1829  matches.push({
1830  offset: arguments[arguments.length-2],
1831  length: str.length
1832  });
1833  });
1834 
1835  return matches;
1836 };
1837 exports.deferredCall = function(fcn) {
1838  var timer = null;
1839  var callback = function() {
1840  timer = null;
1841  fcn();
1842  };
1843 
1844  var deferred = function(timeout) {
1845  deferred.cancel();
1846  timer = setTimeout(callback, timeout || 0);
1847  return deferred;
1848  };
1849 
1850  deferred.schedule = deferred;
1851 
1852  deferred.call = function() {
1853  this.cancel();
1854  fcn();
1855  return deferred;
1856  };
1857 
1858  deferred.cancel = function() {
1859  clearTimeout(timer);
1860  timer = null;
1861  return deferred;
1862  };
1863 
1864  deferred.isPending = function() {
1865  return timer;
1866  };
1867 
1868  return deferred;
1869 };
1870 
1871 
1872 exports.delayedCall = function(fcn, defaultTimeout) {
1873  var timer = null;
1874  var callback = function() {
1875  timer = null;
1876  fcn();
1877  };
1878 
1879  var _self = function(timeout) {
1880  if (timer == null)
1881  timer = setTimeout(callback, timeout || defaultTimeout);
1882  };
1883 
1884  _self.delay = function(timeout) {
1885  timer && clearTimeout(timer);
1886  timer = setTimeout(callback, timeout || defaultTimeout);
1887  };
1888  _self.schedule = _self;
1889 
1890  _self.call = function() {
1891  this.cancel();
1892  fcn();
1893  };
1894 
1895  _self.cancel = function() {
1896  timer && clearTimeout(timer);
1897  timer = null;
1898  };
1899 
1900  _self.isPending = function() {
1901  return timer;
1902  };
1903 
1904  return _self;
1905 };
1906 });
1907 
1908 define("ace/keyboard/textinput",["require","exports","module","ace/lib/event","ace/lib/useragent","ace/lib/dom","ace/lib/lang"], function(require, exports, module) {
1909 "use strict";
1910 
1911 var event = require("../lib/event");
1912 var useragent = require("../lib/useragent");
1913 var dom = require("../lib/dom");
1914 var lang = require("../lib/lang");
1915 var BROKEN_SETDATA = useragent.isChrome < 18;
1916 var USE_IE_MIME_TYPE = useragent.isIE;
1917 
1918 var TextInput = function(parentNode, host) {
1919  var text = dom.createElement("textarea");
1920  text.className = "ace_text-input";
1921 
1922  if (useragent.isTouchPad)
1923  text.setAttribute("x-palm-disable-auto-cap", true);
1924 
1925  text.setAttribute("wrap", "off");
1926  text.setAttribute("autocorrect", "off");
1927  text.setAttribute("autocapitalize", "off");
1928  text.setAttribute("spellcheck", false);
1929 
1930  text.style.opacity = "0";
1931  if (useragent.isOldIE) text.style.top = "-100px";
1932  parentNode.insertBefore(text, parentNode.firstChild);
1933 
1934  var PLACEHOLDER = "\x01\x01";
1935 
1936  var copied = false;
1937  var pasted = false;
1938  var inComposition = false;
1939  var tempStyle = '';
1940  var isSelectionEmpty = true;
1941  try { var isFocused = document.activeElement === text; } catch(e) {}
1942 
1943  event.addListener(text, "blur", function(e) {
1944  host.onBlur(e);
1945  isFocused = false;
1946  });
1947  event.addListener(text, "focus", function(e) {
1948  isFocused = true;
1949  host.onFocus(e);
1950  resetSelection();
1951  });
1952  this.focus = function() {
1953  text.style.position = "fixed";
1954  text.style.top = "-10000000px";
1955  text.focus();
1956  setTimeout(function() {
1957  text.style.position = "";
1958  }, 0);
1959  };
1960  this.blur = function() { text.blur(); };
1961  this.isFocused = function() {
1962  return isFocused;
1963  };
1964  var syncSelection = lang.delayedCall(function() {
1965  isFocused && resetSelection(isSelectionEmpty);
1966  });
1967  var syncValue = lang.delayedCall(function() {
1968  if (!inComposition) {
1969  text.value = PLACEHOLDER;
1970  isFocused && resetSelection();
1971  }
1972  });
1973 
1974  function resetSelection(isEmpty) {
1975  if (inComposition)
1976  return;
1977  if (inputHandler) {
1978  selectionStart = 0;
1979  selectionEnd = isEmpty ? 0 : text.value.length - 1;
1980  } else {
1981  var selectionStart = isEmpty ? 2 : 1;
1982  var selectionEnd = 2;
1983  }
1984  try {
1985  text.setSelectionRange(selectionStart, selectionEnd);
1986  } catch(e){}
1987  }
1988 
1989  function resetValue() {
1990  if (inComposition)
1991  return;
1992  text.value = PLACEHOLDER;
1993  if (useragent.isWebKit)
1994  syncValue.schedule();
1995  }
1996 
1997  useragent.isWebKit || host.addEventListener('changeSelection', function() {
1998  if (host.selection.isEmpty() != isSelectionEmpty) {
1999  isSelectionEmpty = !isSelectionEmpty;
2000  syncSelection.schedule();
2001  }
2002  });
2003 
2004  resetValue();
2005  if (isFocused)
2006  host.onFocus();
2007 
2008 
2009  var isAllSelected = function(text) {
2010  return text.selectionStart === 0 && text.selectionEnd === text.value.length;
2011  };
2012  if (!text.setSelectionRange && text.createTextRange) {
2013  text.setSelectionRange = function(selectionStart, selectionEnd) {
2014  var range = this.createTextRange();
2015  range.collapse(true);
2016  range.moveStart('character', selectionStart);
2017  range.moveEnd('character', selectionEnd);
2018  range.select();
2019  };
2020  isAllSelected = function(text) {
2021  try {
2022  var range = text.ownerDocument.selection.createRange();
2023  }catch(e) {}
2024  if (!range || range.parentElement() != text) return false;
2025  return range.text == text.value;
2026  }
2027  }
2028  if (useragent.isOldIE) {
2029  var inPropertyChange = false;
2030  var onPropertyChange = function(e){
2031  if (inPropertyChange)
2032  return;
2033  var data = text.value;
2034  if (inComposition || !data || data == PLACEHOLDER)
2035  return;
2036  if (e && data == PLACEHOLDER[0])
2037  return syncProperty.schedule();
2038 
2039  sendText(data);
2040  inPropertyChange = true;
2041  resetValue();
2042  inPropertyChange = false;
2043  };
2044  var syncProperty = lang.delayedCall(onPropertyChange);
2045  event.addListener(text, "propertychange", onPropertyChange);
2046 
2047  var keytable = { 13:1, 27:1 };
2048  event.addListener(text, "keyup", function (e) {
2049  if (inComposition && (!text.value || keytable[e.keyCode]))
2050  setTimeout(onCompositionEnd, 0);
2051  if ((text.value.charCodeAt(0)||0) < 129) {
2052  return syncProperty.call();
2053  }
2054  inComposition ? onCompositionUpdate() : onCompositionStart();
2055  });
2056  event.addListener(text, "keydown", function (e) {
2057  syncProperty.schedule(50);
2058  });
2059  }
2060 
2061  var onSelect = function(e) {
2062  if (copied) {
2063  copied = false;
2064  } else if (isAllSelected(text)) {
2065  host.selectAll();
2066  resetSelection();
2067  } else if (inputHandler) {
2068  resetSelection(host.selection.isEmpty());
2069  }
2070  };
2071 
2072  var inputHandler = null;
2073  this.setInputHandler = function(cb) {inputHandler = cb};
2074  this.getInputHandler = function() {return inputHandler};
2075  var afterContextMenu = false;
2076 
2077  var sendText = function(data) {
2078  if (inputHandler) {
2079  data = inputHandler(data);
2080  inputHandler = null;
2081  }
2082  if (pasted) {
2083  resetSelection();
2084  if (data)
2085  host.onPaste(data);
2086  pasted = false;
2087  } else if (data == PLACEHOLDER.charAt(0)) {
2088  if (afterContextMenu)
2089  host.execCommand("del", {source: "ace"});
2090  else // some versions of android do not fire keydown when pressing backspace
2091  host.execCommand("backspace", {source: "ace"});
2092  } else {
2093  if (data.substring(0, 2) == PLACEHOLDER)
2094  data = data.substr(2);
2095  else if (data.charAt(0) == PLACEHOLDER.charAt(0))
2096  data = data.substr(1);
2097  else if (data.charAt(data.length - 1) == PLACEHOLDER.charAt(0))
2098  data = data.slice(0, -1);
2099  if (data.charAt(data.length - 1) == PLACEHOLDER.charAt(0))
2100  data = data.slice(0, -1);
2101 
2102  if (data)
2103  host.onTextInput(data);
2104  }
2105  if (afterContextMenu)
2106  afterContextMenu = false;
2107  };
2108  var onInput = function(e) {
2109  if (inComposition)
2110  return;
2111  var data = text.value;
2112  sendText(data);
2113  resetValue();
2114  };
2115 
2116  var handleClipboardData = function(e, data) {
2117  var clipboardData = e.clipboardData || window.clipboardData;
2118  if (!clipboardData || BROKEN_SETDATA)
2119  return;
2120  var mime = USE_IE_MIME_TYPE ? "Text" : "text/plain";
2121  if (data) {
2122  return clipboardData.setData(mime, data) !== false;
2123  } else {
2124  return clipboardData.getData(mime);
2125  }
2126  };
2127 
2128  var doCopy = function(e, isCut) {
2129  var data = host.getCopyText();
2130  if (!data)
2131  return event.preventDefault(e);
2132 
2133  if (handleClipboardData(e, data)) {
2134  isCut ? host.onCut() : host.onCopy();
2135  event.preventDefault(e);
2136  } else {
2137  copied = true;
2138  text.value = data;
2139  text.select();
2140  setTimeout(function(){
2141  copied = false;
2142  resetValue();
2143  resetSelection();
2144  isCut ? host.onCut() : host.onCopy();
2145  });
2146  }
2147  };
2148 
2149  var onCut = function(e) {
2150  doCopy(e, true);
2151  };
2152 
2153  var onCopy = function(e) {
2154  doCopy(e, false);
2155  };
2156 
2157  var onPaste = function(e) {
2158  var data = handleClipboardData(e);
2159  if (typeof data == "string") {
2160  if (data)
2161  host.onPaste(data);
2162  if (useragent.isIE)
2163  setTimeout(resetSelection);
2164  event.preventDefault(e);
2165  }
2166  else {
2167  text.value = "";
2168  pasted = true;
2169  }
2170  };
2171 
2172  event.addCommandKeyListener(text, host.onCommandKey.bind(host));
2173 
2174  event.addListener(text, "select", onSelect);
2175 
2176  event.addListener(text, "input", onInput);
2177 
2178  event.addListener(text, "cut", onCut);
2179  event.addListener(text, "copy", onCopy);
2180  event.addListener(text, "paste", onPaste);
2181  if (!('oncut' in text) || !('oncopy' in text) || !('onpaste' in text)){
2182  event.addListener(parentNode, "keydown", function(e) {
2183  if ((useragent.isMac && !e.metaKey) || !e.ctrlKey)
2184  return;
2185 
2186  switch (e.keyCode) {
2187  case 67:
2188  onCopy(e);
2189  break;
2190  case 86:
2191  onPaste(e);
2192  break;
2193  case 88:
2194  onCut(e);
2195  break;
2196  }
2197  });
2198  }
2199  var onCompositionStart = function(e) {
2200  if (inComposition || !host.onCompositionStart || host.$readOnly)
2201  return;
2202  inComposition = {};
2203  host.onCompositionStart();
2204  setTimeout(onCompositionUpdate, 0);
2205  host.on("mousedown", onCompositionEnd);
2206  if (!host.selection.isEmpty()) {
2207  host.insert("");
2208  host.session.markUndoGroup();
2209  host.selection.clearSelection();
2210  }
2211  host.session.markUndoGroup();
2212  };
2213 
2214  var onCompositionUpdate = function() {
2215  if (!inComposition || !host.onCompositionUpdate || host.$readOnly)
2216  return;
2217  var val = text.value.replace(/\x01/g, "");
2218  if (inComposition.lastValue === val) return;
2219 
2220  host.onCompositionUpdate(val);
2221  if (inComposition.lastValue)
2222  host.undo();
2223  inComposition.lastValue = val;
2224  if (inComposition.lastValue) {
2225  var r = host.selection.getRange();
2226  host.insert(inComposition.lastValue);
2227  host.session.markUndoGroup();
2228  inComposition.range = host.selection.getRange();
2229  host.selection.setRange(r);
2230  host.selection.clearSelection();
2231  }
2232  };
2233 
2234  var onCompositionEnd = function(e) {
2235  if (!host.onCompositionEnd || host.$readOnly) return;
2236  var c = inComposition;
2237  inComposition = false;
2238  var timer = setTimeout(function() {
2239  timer = null;
2240  var str = text.value.replace(/\x01/g, "");
2241  if (inComposition)
2242  return;
2243  else if (str == c.lastValue)
2244  resetValue();
2245  else if (!c.lastValue && str) {
2246  resetValue();
2247  sendText(str);
2248  }
2249  });
2250  inputHandler = function compositionInputHandler(str) {
2251  if (timer)
2252  clearTimeout(timer);
2253  str = str.replace(/\x01/g, "");
2254  if (str == c.lastValue)
2255  return "";
2256  if (c.lastValue && timer)
2257  host.undo();
2258  return str;
2259  };
2260  host.onCompositionEnd();
2261  host.removeListener("mousedown", onCompositionEnd);
2262  if (e.type == "compositionend" && c.range) {
2263  host.selection.setRange(c.range);
2264  }
2265  };
2266 
2267 
2268 
2269  var syncComposition = lang.delayedCall(onCompositionUpdate, 50);
2270 
2271  event.addListener(text, "compositionstart", onCompositionStart);
2272  if (useragent.isGecko) {
2273  event.addListener(text, "text", function(){syncComposition.schedule()});
2274  } else {
2275  event.addListener(text, "keyup", function(){syncComposition.schedule()});
2276  event.addListener(text, "keydown", function(){syncComposition.schedule()});
2277  }
2278  event.addListener(text, "compositionend", onCompositionEnd);
2279 
2280  this.getElement = function() {
2281  return text;
2282  };
2283 
2284  this.setReadOnly = function(readOnly) {
2285  text.readOnly = readOnly;
2286  };
2287 
2288  this.onContextMenu = function(e) {
2289  afterContextMenu = true;
2290  resetSelection(host.selection.isEmpty());
2291  host._emit("nativecontextmenu", {target: host, domEvent: e});
2292  this.moveToMouse(e, true);
2293  };
2294 
2295  this.moveToMouse = function(e, bringToFront) {
2296  if (!bringToFront && useragent.isOldIE)
2297  return;
2298  if (!tempStyle)
2299  tempStyle = text.style.cssText;
2300  text.style.cssText = (bringToFront ? "z-index:100000;" : "")
2301  + "height:" + text.style.height + ";"
2302  + (useragent.isIE ? "opacity:0.1;" : "");
2303 
2304  var rect = host.container.getBoundingClientRect();
2305  var style = dom.computedStyle(host.container);
2306  var top = rect.top + (parseInt(style.borderTopWidth) || 0);
2307  var left = rect.left + (parseInt(rect.borderLeftWidth) || 0);
2308  var maxTop = rect.bottom - top - text.clientHeight -2;
2309  var move = function(e) {
2310  text.style.left = e.clientX - left - 2 + "px";
2311  text.style.top = Math.min(e.clientY - top - 2, maxTop) + "px";
2312  };
2313  move(e);
2314 
2315  if (e.type != "mousedown")
2316  return;
2317 
2318  if (host.renderer.$keepTextAreaAtCursor)
2319  host.renderer.$keepTextAreaAtCursor = null;
2320  if (useragent.isWin && !useragent.isOldIE)
2321  event.capture(host.container, move, onContextMenuClose);
2322  };
2323 
2324  this.onContextMenuClose = onContextMenuClose;
2325  var closeTimeout;
2326  function onContextMenuClose() {
2327  clearTimeout(closeTimeout)
2328  closeTimeout = setTimeout(function () {
2329  if (tempStyle) {
2330  text.style.cssText = tempStyle;
2331  tempStyle = '';
2332  }
2333  if (host.renderer.$keepTextAreaAtCursor == null) {
2334  host.renderer.$keepTextAreaAtCursor = true;
2335  host.renderer.$moveTextAreaToCursor();
2336  }
2337  }, useragent.isOldIE ? 200 : 0);
2338  }
2339 
2340  var onContextMenu = function(e) {
2341  host.textInput.onContextMenu(e);
2342  onContextMenuClose();
2343  };
2344  event.addListener(host.renderer.scroller, "contextmenu", onContextMenu);
2345  event.addListener(text, "contextmenu", onContextMenu);
2346 };
2347 
2348 exports.TextInput = TextInput;
2349 });
2350 
2351 define("ace/mouse/default_handlers",["require","exports","module","ace/lib/dom","ace/lib/event","ace/lib/useragent"], function(require, exports, module) {
2352 "use strict";
2353 
2354 var dom = require("../lib/dom");
2355 var event = require("../lib/event");
2356 var useragent = require("../lib/useragent");
2357 
2358 var DRAG_OFFSET = 0; // pixels
2359 
2360 function DefaultHandlers(mouseHandler) {
2361  mouseHandler.$clickSelection = null;
2362 
2363  var editor = mouseHandler.editor;
2364  editor.setDefaultHandler("mousedown", this.onMouseDown.bind(mouseHandler));
2365  editor.setDefaultHandler("dblclick", this.onDoubleClick.bind(mouseHandler));
2366  editor.setDefaultHandler("tripleclick", this.onTripleClick.bind(mouseHandler));
2367  editor.setDefaultHandler("quadclick", this.onQuadClick.bind(mouseHandler));
2368  editor.setDefaultHandler("mousewheel", this.onMouseWheel.bind(mouseHandler));
2369 
2370  var exports = ["select", "startSelect", "selectEnd", "selectAllEnd", "selectByWordsEnd",
2371  "selectByLinesEnd", "dragWait", "dragWaitEnd", "focusWait"];
2372 
2373  exports.forEach(function(x) {
2374  mouseHandler[x] = this[x];
2375  }, this);
2376 
2377  mouseHandler.selectByLines = this.extendSelectionBy.bind(mouseHandler, "getLineRange");
2378  mouseHandler.selectByWords = this.extendSelectionBy.bind(mouseHandler, "getWordRange");
2379 }
2380 
2381 (function() {
2382 
2383  this.onMouseDown = function(ev) {
2384  var inSelection = ev.inSelection();
2385  var pos = ev.getDocumentPosition();
2386  this.mousedownEvent = ev;
2387  var editor = this.editor;
2388 
2389  var button = ev.getButton();
2390  if (button !== 0) {
2391  var selectionRange = editor.getSelectionRange();
2392  var selectionEmpty = selectionRange.isEmpty();
2393  editor.$blockScrolling++;
2394  if (selectionEmpty)
2395  editor.selection.moveToPosition(pos);
2396  editor.$blockScrolling--;
2397  editor.textInput.onContextMenu(ev.domEvent);
2398  return; // stopping event here breaks contextmenu on ff mac
2399  }
2400 
2401  this.mousedownEvent.time = Date.now();
2402  if (inSelection && !editor.isFocused()) {
2403  editor.focus();
2404  if (this.$focusTimout && !this.$clickSelection && !editor.inMultiSelectMode) {
2405  this.setState("focusWait");
2406  this.captureMouse(ev);
2407  return;
2408  }
2409  }
2410 
2411  this.captureMouse(ev);
2412  this.startSelect(pos, ev.domEvent._clicks > 1);
2413  return ev.preventDefault();
2414  };
2415 
2416  this.startSelect = function(pos, waitForClickSelection) {
2417  pos = pos || this.editor.renderer.screenToTextCoordinates(this.x, this.y);
2418  var editor = this.editor;
2419  editor.$blockScrolling++;
2420  if (this.mousedownEvent.getShiftKey())
2421  editor.selection.selectToPosition(pos);
2422  else if (!waitForClickSelection)
2423  editor.selection.moveToPosition(pos);
2424  if (!waitForClickSelection)
2425  this.select();
2426  if (editor.renderer.scroller.setCapture) {
2427  editor.renderer.scroller.setCapture();
2428  }
2429  editor.setStyle("ace_selecting");
2430  this.setState("select");
2431  editor.$blockScrolling--;
2432  };
2433 
2434  this.select = function() {
2435  var anchor, editor = this.editor;
2436  var cursor = editor.renderer.screenToTextCoordinates(this.x, this.y);
2437  editor.$blockScrolling++;
2438  if (this.$clickSelection) {
2439  var cmp = this.$clickSelection.comparePoint(cursor);
2440 
2441  if (cmp == -1) {
2442  anchor = this.$clickSelection.end;
2443  } else if (cmp == 1) {
2444  anchor = this.$clickSelection.start;
2445  } else {
2446  var orientedRange = calcRangeOrientation(this.$clickSelection, cursor);
2447  cursor = orientedRange.cursor;
2448  anchor = orientedRange.anchor;
2449  }
2450  editor.selection.setSelectionAnchor(anchor.row, anchor.column);
2451  }
2452  editor.selection.selectToPosition(cursor);
2453  editor.$blockScrolling--;
2454  editor.renderer.scrollCursorIntoView();
2455  };
2456 
2457  this.extendSelectionBy = function(unitName) {
2458  var anchor, editor = this.editor;
2459  var cursor = editor.renderer.screenToTextCoordinates(this.x, this.y);
2460  var range = editor.selection[unitName](cursor.row, cursor.column);
2461  editor.$blockScrolling++;
2462  if (this.$clickSelection) {
2463  var cmpStart = this.$clickSelection.comparePoint(range.start);
2464  var cmpEnd = this.$clickSelection.comparePoint(range.end);
2465 
2466  if (cmpStart == -1 && cmpEnd <= 0) {
2467  anchor = this.$clickSelection.end;
2468  if (range.end.row != cursor.row || range.end.column != cursor.column)
2469  cursor = range.start;
2470  } else if (cmpEnd == 1 && cmpStart >= 0) {
2471  anchor = this.$clickSelection.start;
2472  if (range.start.row != cursor.row || range.start.column != cursor.column)
2473  cursor = range.end;
2474  } else if (cmpStart == -1 && cmpEnd == 1) {
2475  cursor = range.end;
2476  anchor = range.start;
2477  } else {
2478  var orientedRange = calcRangeOrientation(this.$clickSelection, cursor);
2479  cursor = orientedRange.cursor;
2480  anchor = orientedRange.anchor;
2481  }
2482  editor.selection.setSelectionAnchor(anchor.row, anchor.column);
2483  }
2484  editor.selection.selectToPosition(cursor);
2485  editor.$blockScrolling--;
2486  editor.renderer.scrollCursorIntoView();
2487  };
2488 
2489  this.selectEnd =
2490  this.selectAllEnd =
2491  this.selectByWordsEnd =
2492  this.selectByLinesEnd = function() {
2493  this.$clickSelection = null;
2494  this.editor.unsetStyle("ace_selecting");
2495  if (this.editor.renderer.scroller.releaseCapture) {
2496  this.editor.renderer.scroller.releaseCapture();
2497  }
2498  };
2499 
2500  this.focusWait = function() {
2501  var distance = calcDistance(this.mousedownEvent.x, this.mousedownEvent.y, this.x, this.y);
2502  var time = Date.now();
2503 
2504  if (distance > DRAG_OFFSET || time - this.mousedownEvent.time > this.$focusTimout)
2505  this.startSelect(this.mousedownEvent.getDocumentPosition());
2506  };
2507 
2508  this.onDoubleClick = function(ev) {
2509  var pos = ev.getDocumentPosition();
2510  var editor = this.editor;
2511  var session = editor.session;
2512 
2513  var range = session.getBracketRange(pos);
2514  if (range) {
2515  if (range.isEmpty()) {
2516  range.start.column--;
2517  range.end.column++;
2518  }
2519  this.setState("select");
2520  } else {
2521  range = editor.selection.getWordRange(pos.row, pos.column);
2522  this.setState("selectByWords");
2523  }
2524  this.$clickSelection = range;
2525  this.select();
2526  };
2527 
2528  this.onTripleClick = function(ev) {
2529  var pos = ev.getDocumentPosition();
2530  var editor = this.editor;
2531 
2532  this.setState("selectByLines");
2533  var range = editor.getSelectionRange();
2534  if (range.isMultiLine() && range.contains(pos.row, pos.column)) {
2535  this.$clickSelection = editor.selection.getLineRange(range.start.row);
2536  this.$clickSelection.end = editor.selection.getLineRange(range.end.row).end;
2537  } else {
2538  this.$clickSelection = editor.selection.getLineRange(pos.row);
2539  }
2540  this.select();
2541  };
2542 
2543  this.onQuadClick = function(ev) {
2544  var editor = this.editor;
2545 
2546  editor.selectAll();
2547  this.$clickSelection = editor.getSelectionRange();
2548  this.setState("selectAll");
2549  };
2550 
2551  this.onMouseWheel = function(ev) {
2552  if (ev.getAccelKey())
2553  return;
2554  if (ev.getShiftKey() && ev.wheelY && !ev.wheelX) {
2555  ev.wheelX = ev.wheelY;
2556  ev.wheelY = 0;
2557  }
2558 
2559  var t = ev.domEvent.timeStamp;
2560  var dt = t - (this.$lastScrollTime||0);
2561 
2562  var editor = this.editor;
2563  var isScrolable = editor.renderer.isScrollableBy(ev.wheelX * ev.speed, ev.wheelY * ev.speed);
2564  if (isScrolable || dt < 200) {
2565  this.$lastScrollTime = t;
2566  editor.renderer.scrollBy(ev.wheelX * ev.speed, ev.wheelY * ev.speed);
2567  return ev.stop();
2568  }
2569  };
2570 
2571 }).call(DefaultHandlers.prototype);
2572 
2573 exports.DefaultHandlers = DefaultHandlers;
2574 
2575 function calcDistance(ax, ay, bx, by) {
2576  return Math.sqrt(Math.pow(bx - ax, 2) + Math.pow(by - ay, 2));
2577 }
2578 
2579 function calcRangeOrientation(range, cursor) {
2580  if (range.start.row == range.end.row)
2581  var cmp = 2 * cursor.column - range.start.column - range.end.column;
2582  else if (range.start.row == range.end.row - 1 && !range.start.column && !range.end.column)
2583  var cmp = cursor.column - 4;
2584  else
2585  var cmp = 2 * cursor.row - range.start.row - range.end.row;
2586 
2587  if (cmp < 0)
2588  return {cursor: range.start, anchor: range.end};
2589  else
2590  return {cursor: range.end, anchor: range.start};
2591 }
2592 
2593 });
2594 
2595 define("ace/tooltip",["require","exports","module","ace/lib/oop","ace/lib/dom"], function(require, exports, module) {
2596 "use strict";
2597 
2598 var oop = require("./lib/oop");
2599 var dom = require("./lib/dom");
2600 function Tooltip (parentNode) {
2601  this.isOpen = false;
2602  this.$element = null;
2603  this.$parentNode = parentNode;
2604 }
2605 
2606 (function() {
2607  this.$init = function() {
2608  this.$element = dom.createElement("div");
2609  this.$element.className = "ace_tooltip";
2610  this.$element.style.display = "none";
2611  this.$parentNode.appendChild(this.$element);
2612  return this.$element;
2613  };
2614  this.getElement = function() {
2615  return this.$element || this.$init();
2616  };
2617  this.setText = function(text) {
2618  dom.setInnerText(this.getElement(), text);
2619  };
2620  this.setHtml = function(html) {
2621  this.getElement().innerHTML = html;
2622  };
2623  this.setPosition = function(x, y) {
2624  this.getElement().style.left = x + "px";
2625  this.getElement().style.top = y + "px";
2626  };
2627  this.setClassName = function(className) {
2628  dom.addCssClass(this.getElement(), className);
2629  };
2630  this.show = function(text, x, y) {
2631  if (text != null)
2632  this.setText(text);
2633  if (x != null && y != null)
2634  this.setPosition(x, y);
2635  if (!this.isOpen) {
2636  this.getElement().style.display = "block";
2637  this.isOpen = true;
2638  }
2639  };
2640 
2641  this.hide = function() {
2642  if (this.isOpen) {
2643  this.getElement().style.display = "none";
2644  this.isOpen = false;
2645  }
2646  };
2647  this.getHeight = function() {
2648  return this.getElement().offsetHeight;
2649  };
2650  this.getWidth = function() {
2651  return this.getElement().offsetWidth;
2652  };
2653 
2654 }).call(Tooltip.prototype);
2655 
2656 exports.Tooltip = Tooltip;
2657 });
2658 
2659 define("ace/mouse/default_gutter_handler",["require","exports","module","ace/lib/dom","ace/lib/oop","ace/lib/event","ace/tooltip"], function(require, exports, module) {
2660 "use strict";
2661 var dom = require("../lib/dom");
2662 var oop = require("../lib/oop");
2663 var event = require("../lib/event");
2664 var Tooltip = require("../tooltip").Tooltip;
2665 
2666 function GutterHandler(mouseHandler) {
2667  var editor = mouseHandler.editor;
2668  var gutter = editor.renderer.$gutterLayer;
2669  var tooltip = new GutterTooltip(editor.container);
2670 
2671  mouseHandler.editor.setDefaultHandler("guttermousedown", function(e) {
2672  if (!editor.isFocused() || e.getButton() != 0)
2673  return;
2674  var gutterRegion = gutter.getRegion(e);
2675 
2676  if (gutterRegion == "foldWidgets")
2677  return;
2678 
2679  var row = e.getDocumentPosition().row;
2680  var selection = editor.session.selection;
2681 
2682  if (e.getShiftKey())
2683  selection.selectTo(row, 0);
2684  else {
2685  if (e.domEvent.detail == 2) {
2686  editor.selectAll();
2687  return e.preventDefault();
2688  }
2689  mouseHandler.$clickSelection = editor.selection.getLineRange(row);
2690  }
2691  mouseHandler.setState("selectByLines");
2692  mouseHandler.captureMouse(e);
2693  return e.preventDefault();
2694  });
2695 
2696 
2697  var tooltipTimeout, mouseEvent, tooltipAnnotation;
2698 
2699  function showTooltip() {
2700  var row = mouseEvent.getDocumentPosition().row;
2701  var annotation = gutter.$annotations[row];
2702  if (!annotation)
2703  return hideTooltip();
2704 
2705  var maxRow = editor.session.getLength();
2706  if (row == maxRow) {
2707  var screenRow = editor.renderer.pixelToScreenCoordinates(0, mouseEvent.y).row;
2708  var pos = mouseEvent.$pos;
2709  if (screenRow > editor.session.documentToScreenRow(pos.row, pos.column))
2710  return hideTooltip();
2711  }
2712 
2713  if (tooltipAnnotation == annotation)
2714  return;
2715  tooltipAnnotation = annotation.text.join("<br/>");
2716 
2717  tooltip.setHtml(tooltipAnnotation);
2718  tooltip.show();
2719  editor.on("mousewheel", hideTooltip);
2720 
2721  if (mouseHandler.$tooltipFollowsMouse) {
2722  moveTooltip(mouseEvent);
2723  } else {
2724  var gutterElement = gutter.$cells[editor.session.documentToScreenRow(row, 0)].element;
2725  var rect = gutterElement.getBoundingClientRect();
2726  var style = tooltip.getElement().style;
2727  style.left = rect.right + "px";
2728  style.top = rect.bottom + "px";
2729  }
2730  }
2731 
2732  function hideTooltip() {
2733  if (tooltipTimeout)
2734  tooltipTimeout = clearTimeout(tooltipTimeout);
2735  if (tooltipAnnotation) {
2736  tooltip.hide();
2737  tooltipAnnotation = null;
2738  editor.removeEventListener("mousewheel", hideTooltip);
2739  }
2740  }
2741 
2742  function moveTooltip(e) {
2743  tooltip.setPosition(e.x, e.y);
2744  }
2745 
2746  mouseHandler.editor.setDefaultHandler("guttermousemove", function(e) {
2747  var target = e.domEvent.target || e.domEvent.srcElement;
2748  if (dom.hasCssClass(target, "ace_fold-widget"))
2749  return hideTooltip();
2750 
2751  if (tooltipAnnotation && mouseHandler.$tooltipFollowsMouse)
2752  moveTooltip(e);
2753 
2754  mouseEvent = e;
2755  if (tooltipTimeout)
2756  return;
2757  tooltipTimeout = setTimeout(function() {
2758  tooltipTimeout = null;
2759  if (mouseEvent && !mouseHandler.isMousePressed)
2760  showTooltip();
2761  else
2762  hideTooltip();
2763  }, 50);
2764  });
2765 
2766  event.addListener(editor.renderer.$gutter, "mouseout", function(e) {
2767  mouseEvent = null;
2768  if (!tooltipAnnotation || tooltipTimeout)
2769  return;
2770 
2771  tooltipTimeout = setTimeout(function() {
