2772  tooltipTimeout = null;
2773  hideTooltip();
2774  }, 50);
2775  });
2776 
2777  editor.on("changeSession", hideTooltip);
2778 }
2779 
2780 function GutterTooltip(parentNode) {
2781  Tooltip.call(this, parentNode);
2782 }
2783 
2784 oop.inherits(GutterTooltip, Tooltip);
2785 
2786 (function(){
2787  this.setPosition = function(x, y) {
2788  var windowWidth = window.innerWidth || document.documentElement.clientWidth;
2789  var windowHeight = window.innerHeight || document.documentElement.clientHeight;
2790  var width = this.getWidth();
2791  var height = this.getHeight();
2792  x += 15;
2793  y += 15;
2794  if (x + width > windowWidth) {
2795  x -= (x + width) - windowWidth;
2796  }
2797  if (y + height > windowHeight) {
2798  y -= 20 + height;
2799  }
2800  Tooltip.prototype.setPosition.call(this, x, y);
2801  };
2802 
2803 }).call(GutterTooltip.prototype);
2804 
2805 
2806 
2807 exports.GutterHandler = GutterHandler;
2808 
2809 });
2810 
2811 define("ace/mouse/mouse_event",["require","exports","module","ace/lib/event","ace/lib/useragent"], function(require, exports, module) {
2812 "use strict";
2813 
2814 var event = require("../lib/event");
2815 var useragent = require("../lib/useragent");
2816 var MouseEvent = exports.MouseEvent = function(domEvent, editor) {
2817  this.domEvent = domEvent;
2818  this.editor = editor;
2819 
2820  this.x = this.clientX = domEvent.clientX;
2821  this.y = this.clientY = domEvent.clientY;
2822 
2823  this.$pos = null;
2824  this.$inSelection = null;
2825 
2826  this.propagationStopped = false;
2827  this.defaultPrevented = false;
2828 };
2829 
2830 (function() {
2831 
2832  this.stopPropagation = function() {
2833  event.stopPropagation(this.domEvent);
2834  this.propagationStopped = true;
2835  };
2836 
2837  this.preventDefault = function() {
2838  event.preventDefault(this.domEvent);
2839  this.defaultPrevented = true;
2840  };
2841 
2842  this.stop = function() {
2843  this.stopPropagation();
2844  this.preventDefault();
2845  };
2846  this.getDocumentPosition = function() {
2847  if (this.$pos)
2848  return this.$pos;
2849 
2850  this.$pos = this.editor.renderer.screenToTextCoordinates(this.clientX, this.clientY);
2851  return this.$pos;
2852  };
2853  this.inSelection = function() {
2854  if (this.$inSelection !== null)
2855  return this.$inSelection;
2856 
2857  var editor = this.editor;
2858 
2859 
2860  var selectionRange = editor.getSelectionRange();
2861  if (selectionRange.isEmpty())
2862  this.$inSelection = false;
2863  else {
2864  var pos = this.getDocumentPosition();
2865  this.$inSelection = selectionRange.contains(pos.row, pos.column);
2866  }
2867 
2868  return this.$inSelection;
2869  };
2870  this.getButton = function() {
2871  return event.getButton(this.domEvent);
2872  };
2873  this.getShiftKey = function() {
2874  return this.domEvent.shiftKey;
2875  };
2876 
2877  this.getAccelKey = useragent.isMac
2878  ? function() { return this.domEvent.metaKey; }
2879  : function() { return this.domEvent.ctrlKey; };
2880 
2881 }).call(MouseEvent.prototype);
2882 
2883 });
2884 
2885 define("ace/mouse/dragdrop_handler",["require","exports","module","ace/lib/dom","ace/lib/event","ace/lib/useragent"], function(require, exports, module) {
2886 "use strict";
2887 
2888 var dom = require("../lib/dom");
2889 var event = require("../lib/event");
2890 var useragent = require("../lib/useragent");
2891 
2892 var AUTOSCROLL_DELAY = 200;
2893 var SCROLL_CURSOR_DELAY = 200;
2894 var SCROLL_CURSOR_HYSTERESIS = 5;
2895 
2896 function DragdropHandler(mouseHandler) {
2897 
2898  var editor = mouseHandler.editor;
2899 
2900  var blankImage = dom.createElement("img");
2901  blankImage.src = "data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAAAACH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw==";
2902  if (useragent.isOpera)
2903  blankImage.style.cssText = "width:1px;height:1px;position:fixed;top:0;left:0;z-index:2147483647;opacity:0;";
2904 
2905  var exports = ["dragWait", "dragWaitEnd", "startDrag", "dragReadyEnd", "onMouseDrag"];
2906 
2907  exports.forEach(function(x) {
2908  mouseHandler[x] = this[x];
2909  }, this);
2910  editor.addEventListener("mousedown", this.onMouseDown.bind(mouseHandler));
2911 
2912 
2913  var mouseTarget = editor.container;
2914  var dragSelectionMarker, x, y;
2915  var timerId, range;
2916  var dragCursor, counter = 0;
2917  var dragOperation;
2918  var isInternal;
2919  var autoScrollStartTime;
2920  var cursorMovedTime;
2921  var cursorPointOnCaretMoved;
2922 
2923  this.onDragStart = function(e) {
2924  if (this.cancelDrag || !mouseTarget.draggable) {
2925  var self = this;
2926  setTimeout(function(){
2927  self.startSelect();
2928  self.captureMouse(e);
2929  }, 0);
2930  return e.preventDefault();
2931  }
2932  range = editor.getSelectionRange();
2933 
2934  var dataTransfer = e.dataTransfer;
2935  dataTransfer.effectAllowed = editor.getReadOnly() ? "copy" : "copyMove";
2936  if (useragent.isOpera) {
2937  editor.container.appendChild(blankImage);
2938  blankImage.scrollTop = 0;
2939  }
2940  dataTransfer.setDragImage && dataTransfer.setDragImage(blankImage, 0, 0);
2941  if (useragent.isOpera) {
2942  editor.container.removeChild(blankImage);
2943  }
2944  dataTransfer.clearData();
2945  dataTransfer.setData("Text", editor.session.getTextRange());
2946 
2947  isInternal = true;
2948  this.setState("drag");
2949  };
2950 
2951  this.onDragEnd = function(e) {
2952  mouseTarget.draggable = false;
2953  isInternal = false;
2954  this.setState(null);
2955  if (!editor.getReadOnly()) {
2956  var dropEffect = e.dataTransfer.dropEffect;
2957  if (!dragOperation && dropEffect == "move")
2958  editor.session.remove(editor.getSelectionRange());
2959  editor.renderer.$cursorLayer.setBlinking(true);
2960  }
2961  this.editor.unsetStyle("ace_dragging");
2962  this.editor.renderer.setCursorStyle("");
2963  };
2964 
2965  this.onDragEnter = function(e) {
2966  if (editor.getReadOnly() || !canAccept(e.dataTransfer))
2967  return;
2968  x = e.clientX;
2969  y = e.clientY;
2970  if (!dragSelectionMarker)
2971  addDragMarker();
2972  counter++;
2973  e.dataTransfer.dropEffect = dragOperation = getDropEffect(e);
2974  return event.preventDefault(e);
2975  };
2976 
2977  this.onDragOver = function(e) {
2978  if (editor.getReadOnly() || !canAccept(e.dataTransfer))
2979  return;
2980  x = e.clientX;
2981  y = e.clientY;
2982  if (!dragSelectionMarker) {
2983  addDragMarker();
2984  counter++;
2985  }
2986  if (onMouseMoveTimer !== null)
2987  onMouseMoveTimer = null;
2988 
2989  e.dataTransfer.dropEffect = dragOperation = getDropEffect(e);
2990  return event.preventDefault(e);
2991  };
2992 
2993  this.onDragLeave = function(e) {
2994  counter--;
2995  if (counter <= 0 && dragSelectionMarker) {
2996  clearDragMarker();
2997  dragOperation = null;
2998  return event.preventDefault(e);
2999  }
3000  };
3001 
3002  this.onDrop = function(e) {
3003  if (!dragCursor)
3004  return;
3005  var dataTransfer = e.dataTransfer;
3006  if (isInternal) {
3007  switch (dragOperation) {
3008  case "move":
3009  if (range.contains(dragCursor.row, dragCursor.column)) {
3010  range = {
3011  start: dragCursor,
3012  end: dragCursor
3013  };
3014  } else {
3015  range = editor.moveText(range, dragCursor);
3016  }
3017  break;
3018  case "copy":
3019  range = editor.moveText(range, dragCursor, true);
3020  break;
3021  }
3022  } else {
3023  var dropData = dataTransfer.getData('Text');
3024  range = {
3025  start: dragCursor,
3026  end: editor.session.insert(dragCursor, dropData)
3027  };
3028  editor.focus();
3029  dragOperation = null;
3030  }
3031  clearDragMarker();
3032  return event.preventDefault(e);
3033  };
3034 
3035  event.addListener(mouseTarget, "dragstart", this.onDragStart.bind(mouseHandler));
3036  event.addListener(mouseTarget, "dragend", this.onDragEnd.bind(mouseHandler));
3037  event.addListener(mouseTarget, "dragenter", this.onDragEnter.bind(mouseHandler));
3038  event.addListener(mouseTarget, "dragover", this.onDragOver.bind(mouseHandler));
3039  event.addListener(mouseTarget, "dragleave", this.onDragLeave.bind(mouseHandler));
3040  event.addListener(mouseTarget, "drop", this.onDrop.bind(mouseHandler));
3041 
3042  function scrollCursorIntoView(cursor, prevCursor) {
3043  var now = Date.now();
3044  var vMovement = !prevCursor || cursor.row != prevCursor.row;
3045  var hMovement = !prevCursor || cursor.column != prevCursor.column;
3046  if (!cursorMovedTime || vMovement || hMovement) {
3047  editor.$blockScrolling += 1;
3048  editor.moveCursorToPosition(cursor);
3049  editor.$blockScrolling -= 1;
3050  cursorMovedTime = now;
3051  cursorPointOnCaretMoved = {x: x, y: y};
3052  } else {
3053  var distance = calcDistance(cursorPointOnCaretMoved.x, cursorPointOnCaretMoved.y, x, y);
3054  if (distance > SCROLL_CURSOR_HYSTERESIS) {
3055  cursorMovedTime = null;
3056  } else if (now - cursorMovedTime >= SCROLL_CURSOR_DELAY) {
3057  editor.renderer.scrollCursorIntoView();
3058  cursorMovedTime = null;
3059  }
3060  }
3061  }
3062 
3063  function autoScroll(cursor, prevCursor) {
3064  var now = Date.now();
3065  var lineHeight = editor.renderer.layerConfig.lineHeight;
3066  var characterWidth = editor.renderer.layerConfig.characterWidth;
3067  var editorRect = editor.renderer.scroller.getBoundingClientRect();
3068  var offsets = {
3069  x: {
3070  left: x - editorRect.left,
3071  right: editorRect.right - x
3072  },
3073  y: {
3074  top: y - editorRect.top,
3075  bottom: editorRect.bottom - y
3076  }
3077  };
3078  var nearestXOffset = Math.min(offsets.x.left, offsets.x.right);
3079  var nearestYOffset = Math.min(offsets.y.top, offsets.y.bottom);
3080  var scrollCursor = {row: cursor.row, column: cursor.column};
3081  if (nearestXOffset / characterWidth <= 2) {
3082  scrollCursor.column += (offsets.x.left < offsets.x.right ? -3 : +2);
3083  }
3084  if (nearestYOffset / lineHeight <= 1) {
3085  scrollCursor.row += (offsets.y.top < offsets.y.bottom ? -1 : +1);
3086  }
3087  var vScroll = cursor.row != scrollCursor.row;
3088  var hScroll = cursor.column != scrollCursor.column;
3089  var vMovement = !prevCursor || cursor.row != prevCursor.row;
3090  if (vScroll || (hScroll && !vMovement)) {
3091  if (!autoScrollStartTime)
3092  autoScrollStartTime = now;
3093  else if (now - autoScrollStartTime >= AUTOSCROLL_DELAY)
3094  editor.renderer.scrollCursorIntoView(scrollCursor);
3095  } else {
3096  autoScrollStartTime = null;
3097  }
3098  }
3099 
3100  function onDragInterval() {
3101  var prevCursor = dragCursor;
3102  dragCursor = editor.renderer.screenToTextCoordinates(x, y);
3103  scrollCursorIntoView(dragCursor, prevCursor);
3104  autoScroll(dragCursor, prevCursor);
3105  }
3106 
3107  function addDragMarker() {
3108  range = editor.selection.toOrientedRange();
3109  dragSelectionMarker = editor.session.addMarker(range, "ace_selection", editor.getSelectionStyle());
3110  editor.clearSelection();
3111  if (editor.isFocused())
3112  editor.renderer.$cursorLayer.setBlinking(false);
3113  clearInterval(timerId);
3114  onDragInterval();
3115  timerId = setInterval(onDragInterval, 20);
3116  counter = 0;
3117  event.addListener(document, "mousemove", onMouseMove);
3118  }
3119 
3120  function clearDragMarker() {
3121  clearInterval(timerId);
3122  editor.session.removeMarker(dragSelectionMarker);
3123  dragSelectionMarker = null;
3124  editor.$blockScrolling += 1;
3125  editor.selection.fromOrientedRange(range);
3126  editor.$blockScrolling -= 1;
3127  if (editor.isFocused() && !isInternal)
3128  editor.renderer.$cursorLayer.setBlinking(!editor.getReadOnly());
3129  range = null;
3130  dragCursor = null;
3131  counter = 0;
3132  autoScrollStartTime = null;
3133  cursorMovedTime = null;
3134  event.removeListener(document, "mousemove", onMouseMove);
3135  }
3136  var onMouseMoveTimer = null;
3137  function onMouseMove() {
3138  if (onMouseMoveTimer == null) {
3139  onMouseMoveTimer = setTimeout(function() {
3140  if (onMouseMoveTimer != null && dragSelectionMarker)
3141  clearDragMarker();
3142  }, 20);
3143  }
3144  }
3145 
3146  function canAccept(dataTransfer) {
3147  var types = dataTransfer.types;
3148  return !types || Array.prototype.some.call(types, function(type) {
3149  return type == 'text/plain' || type == 'Text';
3150  });
3151  }
3152 
3153  function getDropEffect(e) {
3154  var copyAllowed = ['copy', 'copymove', 'all', 'uninitialized'];
3155  var moveAllowed = ['move', 'copymove', 'linkmove', 'all', 'uninitialized'];
3156 
3157  var copyModifierState = useragent.isMac ? e.altKey : e.ctrlKey;
3158  var effectAllowed = "uninitialized";
3159  try {
3160  effectAllowed = e.dataTransfer.effectAllowed.toLowerCase();
3161  } catch (e) {}
3162  var dropEffect = "none";
3163 
3164  if (copyModifierState && copyAllowed.indexOf(effectAllowed) >= 0)
3165  dropEffect = "copy";
3166  else if (moveAllowed.indexOf(effectAllowed) >= 0)
3167  dropEffect = "move";
3168  else if (copyAllowed.indexOf(effectAllowed) >= 0)
3169  dropEffect = "copy";
3170 
3171  return dropEffect;
3172  }
3173 }
3174 
3175 (function() {
3176 
3177  this.dragWait = function() {
3178  var interval = Date.now() - this.mousedownEvent.time;
3179  if (interval > this.editor.getDragDelay())
3180  this.startDrag();
3181  };
3182 
3183  this.dragWaitEnd = function() {
3184  var target = this.editor.container;
3185  target.draggable = false;
3186  this.startSelect(this.mousedownEvent.getDocumentPosition());
3187  this.selectEnd();
3188  };
3189 
3190  this.dragReadyEnd = function(e) {
3191  this.editor.renderer.$cursorLayer.setBlinking(!this.editor.getReadOnly());
3192  this.editor.unsetStyle("ace_dragging");
3193  this.editor.renderer.setCursorStyle("");
3194  this.dragWaitEnd();
3195  };
3196 
3197  this.startDrag = function(){
3198  this.cancelDrag = false;
3199  var editor = this.editor;
3200  var target = editor.container;
3201  target.draggable = true;
3202  editor.renderer.$cursorLayer.setBlinking(false);
3203  editor.setStyle("ace_dragging");
3204  var cursorStyle = useragent.isWin ? "default" : "move";
3205  editor.renderer.setCursorStyle(cursorStyle);
3206  this.setState("dragReady");
3207  };
3208 
3209  this.onMouseDrag = function(e) {
3210  var target = this.editor.container;
3211  if (useragent.isIE && this.state == "dragReady") {
3212  var distance = calcDistance(this.mousedownEvent.x, this.mousedownEvent.y, this.x, this.y);
3213  if (distance > 3)
3214  target.dragDrop();
3215  }
3216  if (this.state === "dragWait") {
3217  var distance = calcDistance(this.mousedownEvent.x, this.mousedownEvent.y, this.x, this.y);
3218  if (distance > 0) {
3219  target.draggable = false;
3220  this.startSelect(this.mousedownEvent.getDocumentPosition());
3221  }
3222  }
3223  };
3224 
3225  this.onMouseDown = function(e) {
3226  if (!this.$dragEnabled)
3227  return;
3228  this.mousedownEvent = e;
3229  var editor = this.editor;
3230 
3231  var inSelection = e.inSelection();
3232  var button = e.getButton();
3233  var clickCount = e.domEvent.detail || 1;
3234  if (clickCount === 1 && button === 0 && inSelection) {
3235  if (e.editor.inMultiSelectMode && (e.getAccelKey() || e.getShiftKey()))
3236  return;
3237  this.mousedownEvent.time = Date.now();
3238  var eventTarget = e.domEvent.target || e.domEvent.srcElement;
3239  if ("unselectable" in eventTarget)
3240  eventTarget.unselectable = "on";
3241  if (editor.getDragDelay()) {
3242  if (useragent.isWebKit) {
3243  this.cancelDrag = true;
3244  var mouseTarget = editor.container;
3245  mouseTarget.draggable = true;
3246  }
3247  this.setState("dragWait");
3248  } else {
3249  this.startDrag();
3250  }
3251  this.captureMouse(e, this.onMouseDrag.bind(this));
3252  e.defaultPrevented = true;
3253  }
3254  };
3255 
3256 }).call(DragdropHandler.prototype);
3257 
3258 
3259 function calcDistance(ax, ay, bx, by) {
3260  return Math.sqrt(Math.pow(bx - ax, 2) + Math.pow(by - ay, 2));
3261 }
3262 
3263 exports.DragdropHandler = DragdropHandler;
3264 
3265 });
3266 
3267 define("ace/lib/net",["require","exports","module","ace/lib/dom"], function(require, exports, module) {
3268 "use strict";
3269 var dom = require("./dom");
3270 
3271 exports.get = function (url, callback) {
3272  var xhr = new XMLHttpRequest();
3273  xhr.open('GET', url, true);
3274  xhr.onreadystatechange = function () {
3275  if (xhr.readyState === 4) {
3276  callback(xhr.responseText);
3277  }
3278  };
3279  xhr.send(null);
3280 };
3281 
3282 exports.loadScript = function(path, callback) {
3283  var head = dom.getDocumentHead();
3284  var s = document.createElement('script');
3285 
3286  s.src = path;
3287  head.appendChild(s);
3288 
3289  s.onload = s.onreadystatechange = function(_, isAbort) {
3290  if (isAbort || !s.readyState || s.readyState == "loaded" || s.readyState == "complete") {
3291  s = s.onload = s.onreadystatechange = null;
3292  if (!isAbort)
3293  callback();
3294  }
3295  };
3296 };
3297 exports.qualifyURL = function(url) {
3298  var a = document.createElement('a');
3299  a.href = url;
3300  return a.href;
3301 }
3302 
3303 });
3304 
3305 define("ace/lib/event_emitter",["require","exports","module"], function(require, exports, module) {
3306 "use strict";
3307 
3308 var EventEmitter = {};
3309 var stopPropagation = function() { this.propagationStopped = true; };
3310 var preventDefault = function() { this.defaultPrevented = true; };
3311 
3312 EventEmitter._emit =
3313 EventEmitter._dispatchEvent = function(eventName, e) {
3314  this._eventRegistry || (this._eventRegistry = {});
3315  this._defaultHandlers || (this._defaultHandlers = {});
3316 
3317  var listeners = this._eventRegistry[eventName] || [];
3318  var defaultHandler = this._defaultHandlers[eventName];
3319  if (!listeners.length && !defaultHandler)
3320  return;
3321 
3322  if (typeof e != "object" || !e)
3323  e = {};
3324 
3325  if (!e.type)
3326  e.type = eventName;
3327  if (!e.stopPropagation)
3328  e.stopPropagation = stopPropagation;
3329  if (!e.preventDefault)
3330  e.preventDefault = preventDefault;
3331 
3332  listeners = listeners.slice();
3333  for (var i=0; i<listeners.length; i++) {
3334  listeners[i](e, this);
3335  if (e.propagationStopped)
3336  break;
3337  }
3338 
3339  if (defaultHandler && !e.defaultPrevented)
3340  return defaultHandler(e, this);
3341 };
3342 
3343 
3344 EventEmitter._signal = function(eventName, e) {
3345  var listeners = (this._eventRegistry || {})[eventName];
3346  if (!listeners)
3347  return;
3348  listeners = listeners.slice();
3349  for (var i=0; i<listeners.length; i++)
3350  listeners[i](e, this);
3351 };
3352 
3353 EventEmitter.once = function(eventName, callback) {
3354  var _self = this;
3355  callback && this.addEventListener(eventName, function newCallback() {
3356  _self.removeEventListener(eventName, newCallback);
3357  callback.apply(null, arguments);
3358  });
3359 };
3360 
3361 
3362 EventEmitter.setDefaultHandler = function(eventName, callback) {
3363  var handlers = this._defaultHandlers
3364  if (!handlers)
3365  handlers = this._defaultHandlers = {_disabled_: {}};
3366 
3367  if (handlers[eventName]) {
3368  var old = handlers[eventName];
3369  var disabled = handlers._disabled_[eventName];
3370  if (!disabled)
3371  handlers._disabled_[eventName] = disabled = [];
3372  disabled.push(old);
3373  var i = disabled.indexOf(callback);
3374  if (i != -1)
3375  disabled.splice(i, 1);
3376  }
3377  handlers[eventName] = callback;
3378 };
3379 EventEmitter.removeDefaultHandler = function(eventName, callback) {
3380  var handlers = this._defaultHandlers
3381  if (!handlers)
3382  return;
3383  var disabled = handlers._disabled_[eventName];
3384 
3385  if (handlers[eventName] == callback) {
3386  var old = handlers[eventName];
3387  if (disabled)
3388  this.setDefaultHandler(eventName, disabled.pop());
3389  } else if (disabled) {
3390  var i = disabled.indexOf(callback);
3391  if (i != -1)
3392  disabled.splice(i, 1);
3393  }
3394 };
3395 
3396 EventEmitter.on =
3397 EventEmitter.addEventListener = function(eventName, callback, capturing) {
3398  this._eventRegistry = this._eventRegistry || {};
3399 
3400  var listeners = this._eventRegistry[eventName];
3401  if (!listeners)
3402  listeners = this._eventRegistry[eventName] = [];
3403 
3404  if (listeners.indexOf(callback) == -1)
3405  listeners[capturing ? "unshift" : "push"](callback);
3406  return callback;
3407 };
3408 
3409 EventEmitter.off =
3410 EventEmitter.removeListener =
3411 EventEmitter.removeEventListener = function(eventName, callback) {
3412  this._eventRegistry = this._eventRegistry || {};
3413 
3414  var listeners = this._eventRegistry[eventName];
3415  if (!listeners)
3416  return;
3417 
3418  var index = listeners.indexOf(callback);
3419  if (index !== -1)
3420  listeners.splice(index, 1);
3421 };
3422 
3423 EventEmitter.removeAllListeners = function(eventName) {
3424  if (this._eventRegistry) this._eventRegistry[eventName] = [];
3425 };
3426 
3427 exports.EventEmitter = EventEmitter;
3428 
3429 });
3430 
3431 define("ace/lib/app_config",["require","exports","module","ace/lib/oop","ace/lib/event_emitter"], function(require, exports, module) {
3432 "no use strict";
3433 
3434 var oop = require("./oop");
3435 var EventEmitter = require("./event_emitter").EventEmitter;
3436 
3437 var optionsProvider = {
3438  setOptions: function(optList) {
3439  Object.keys(optList).forEach(function(key) {
3440  this.setOption(key, optList[key]);
3441  }, this);
3442  },
3443  getOptions: function(optionNames) {
3444  var result = {};
3445  if (!optionNames) {
3446  optionNames = Object.keys(this.$options);
3447  } else if (!Array.isArray(optionNames)) {
3448  result = optionNames;
3449  optionNames = Object.keys(result);
3450  }
3451  optionNames.forEach(function(key) {
3452  result[key] = this.getOption(key);
3453  }, this);
3454  return result;
3455  },
3456  setOption: function(name, value) {
3457  if (this["$" + name] === value)
3458  return;
3459  var opt = this.$options[name];
3460  if (!opt) {
3461  return warn('misspelled option "' + name + '"');
3462  }
3463  if (opt.forwardTo)
3464  return this[opt.forwardTo] && this[opt.forwardTo].setOption(name, value);
3465 
3466  if (!opt.handlesSet)
3467  this["$" + name] = value;
3468  if (opt && opt.set)
3469  opt.set.call(this, value);
3470  },
3471  getOption: function(name) {
3472  var opt = this.$options[name];
3473  if (!opt) {
3474  return warn('misspelled option "' + name + '"');
3475  }
3476  if (opt.forwardTo)
3477  return this[opt.forwardTo] && this[opt.forwardTo].getOption(name);
3478  return opt && opt.get ? opt.get.call(this) : this["$" + name];
3479  }
3480 };
3481 
3482 function warn(message) {
3483  if (typeof console != "undefined" && console.warn)
3484  console.warn.apply(console, arguments);
3485 }
3486 
3487 function reportError(msg, data) {
3488  var e = new Error(msg);
3489  e.data = data;
3490  if (typeof console == "object" && console.error)
3491  console.error(e);
3492  setTimeout(function() { throw e; });
3493 }
3494 
3495 var AppConfig = function() {
3496  this.$defaultOptions = {};
3497 };
3498 
3499 (function() {
3500  oop.implement(this, EventEmitter);
3501  this.defineOptions = function(obj, path, options) {
3502  if (!obj.$options)
3503  this.$defaultOptions[path] = obj.$options = {};
3504 
3505  Object.keys(options).forEach(function(key) {
3506  var opt = options[key];
3507  if (typeof opt == "string")
3508  opt = {forwardTo: opt};
3509 
3510  opt.name || (opt.name = key);
3511  obj.$options[opt.name] = opt;
3512  if ("initialValue" in opt)
3513  obj["$" + opt.name] = opt.initialValue;
3514  });
3515  oop.implement(obj, optionsProvider);
3516 
3517  return this;
3518  };
3519 
3520  this.resetOptions = function(obj) {
3521  Object.keys(obj.$options).forEach(function(key) {
3522  var opt = obj.$options[key];
3523  if ("value" in opt)
3524  obj.setOption(key, opt.value);
3525  });
3526  };
3527 
3528  this.setDefaultValue = function(path, name, value) {
3529  var opts = this.$defaultOptions[path] || (this.$defaultOptions[path] = {});
3530  if (opts[name]) {
3531  if (opts.forwardTo)
3532  this.setDefaultValue(opts.forwardTo, name, value);
3533  else
3534  opts[name].value = value;
3535  }
3536  };
3537 
3538  this.setDefaultValues = function(path, optionHash) {
3539  Object.keys(optionHash).forEach(function(key) {
3540  this.setDefaultValue(path, key, optionHash[key]);
3541  }, this);
3542  };
3543 
3544  this.warn = warn;
3545  this.reportError = reportError;
3546 
3547 }).call(AppConfig.prototype);
3548 
3549 exports.AppConfig = AppConfig;
3550 
3551 });
3552 
3553 define("ace/config",["require","exports","module","ace/lib/lang","ace/lib/oop","ace/lib/net","ace/lib/app_config"], function(require, exports, module) {
3554 "no use strict";
3555 
3556 var lang = require("./lib/lang");
3557 var oop = require("./lib/oop");
3558 var net = require("./lib/net");
3559 var AppConfig = require("./lib/app_config").AppConfig;
3560 
3561 module.exports = exports = new AppConfig();
3562 
3563 var global = (function() {
3564  return this;
3565 })();
3566 
3567 var options = {
3568  packaged: false,
3569  workerPath: null,
3570  modePath: null,
3571  themePath: null,
3572  basePath: "",
3573  suffix: ".js",
3574  $moduleUrls: {}
3575 };
3576 
3577 exports.get = function(key) {
3578  if (!options.hasOwnProperty(key))
3579  throw new Error("Unknown config key: " + key);
3580 
3581  return options[key];
3582 };
3583 
3584 exports.set = function(key, value) {
3585  if (!options.hasOwnProperty(key))
3586  throw new Error("Unknown config key: " + key);
3587 
3588  options[key] = value;
3589 };
3590 
3591 exports.all = function() {
3592  return lang.copyObject(options);
3593 };
3594 exports.moduleUrl = function(name, component) {
3595  if (options.$moduleUrls[name])
3596  return options.$moduleUrls[name];
3597 
3598  var parts = name.split("/");
3599  component = component || parts[parts.length - 2] || "";
3600  var sep = component == "snippets" ? "/" : "-";
3601  var base = parts[parts.length - 1];
3602  if (component == "worker" && sep == "-") {
3603  var re = new RegExp("^" + component + "[\\-_]|[\\-_]" + component + "$", "g");
3604  base = base.replace(re, "");
3605  }
3606 
3607  if ((!base || base == component) && parts.length > 1)
3608  base = parts[parts.length - 2];
3609  var path = options[component + "Path"];
3610  if (path == null) {
3611  path = options.basePath;
3612  } else if (sep == "/") {
3613  component = sep = "";
3614  }
3615  if (path && path.slice(-1) != "/")
3616  path += "/";
3617  return path + component + sep + base + this.get("suffix");
3618 };
3619 
3620 exports.setModuleUrl = function(name, subst) {
3621  return options.$moduleUrls[name] = subst;
3622 };
3623 
3624 exports.$loading = {};
3625 exports.loadModule = function(moduleName, onLoad) {
3626  var module, moduleType;
3627  if (Array.isArray(moduleName)) {
3628  moduleType = moduleName[0];
3629  moduleName = moduleName[1];
3630  }
3631 
3632  try {
3633  module = require(moduleName);
3634  } catch (e) {}
3635  if (module && !exports.$loading[moduleName])
3636  return onLoad && onLoad(module);
3637 
3638  if (!exports.$loading[moduleName])
3639  exports.$loading[moduleName] = [];
3640 
3641  exports.$loading[moduleName].push(onLoad);
3642 
3643  if (exports.$loading[moduleName].length > 1)
3644  return;
3645 
3646  var afterLoad = function() {
3647  require([moduleName], function(module) {
3648  exports._emit("load.module", {name: moduleName, module: module});
3649  var listeners = exports.$loading[moduleName];
3650  exports.$loading[moduleName] = null;
3651  listeners.forEach(function(onLoad) {
3652  onLoad && onLoad(module);
3653  });
3654  });
3655  };
3656 
3657  if (!exports.get("packaged"))
3658  return afterLoad();
3659  net.loadScript(exports.moduleUrl(moduleName, moduleType), afterLoad);
3660 };
3661 init(true);function init(packaged) {
3662 
3663  options.packaged = packaged || require.packaged || module.packaged || (global.define && define.packaged);
3664 
3665  if (!global.document)
3666  return "";
3667 
3668  var scriptOptions = {};
3669  var scriptUrl = "";
3670  var currentScript = (document.currentScript || document._currentScript ); // native or polyfill
3671  var currentDocument = currentScript && currentScript.ownerDocument || document;
3672 
3673  var scripts = currentDocument.getElementsByTagName("script");
3674  for (var i=0; i<scripts.length; i++) {
3675  var script = scripts[i];
3676 
3677  var src = script.src || script.getAttribute("src");
3678  if (!src)
3679  continue;
3680 
3681  var attributes = script.attributes;
3682  for (var j=0, l=attributes.length; j < l; j++) {
3683  var attr = attributes[j];
3684  if (attr.name.indexOf("data-ace-") === 0) {
3685  scriptOptions[deHyphenate(attr.name.replace(/^data-ace-/, ""))] = attr.value;
3686  }
3687  }
3688 
3689  var m = src.match(/^(.*)\/ace(\-\w+)?\.js(\?|$)/);
3690  if (m)
3691  scriptUrl = m[1];
3692  }
3693 
3694  if (scriptUrl) {
3695  scriptOptions.base = scriptOptions.base || scriptUrl;
3696  scriptOptions.packaged = true;
3697  }
3698 
3699  scriptOptions.basePath = scriptOptions.base;
3700  scriptOptions.workerPath = scriptOptions.workerPath || scriptOptions.base;
3701  scriptOptions.modePath = scriptOptions.modePath || scriptOptions.base;
3702  scriptOptions.themePath = scriptOptions.themePath || scriptOptions.base;
3703  delete scriptOptions.base;
3704 
3705  for (var key in scriptOptions)
3706  if (typeof scriptOptions[key] !== "undefined")
3707  exports.set(key, scriptOptions[key]);
3708 };
3709 
3710 exports.init = init;
3711 
3712 function deHyphenate(str) {
3713  return str.replace(/-(.)/g, function(m, m1) { return m1.toUpperCase(); });
3714 }
3715 
3716 });
3717 
3718 define("ace/mouse/mouse_handler",["require","exports","module","ace/lib/event","ace/lib/useragent","ace/mouse/default_handlers","ace/mouse/default_gutter_handler","ace/mouse/mouse_event","ace/mouse/dragdrop_handler","ace/config"], function(require, exports, module) {
3719 "use strict";
3720 
3721 var event = require("../lib/event");
3722 var useragent = require("../lib/useragent");
3723 var DefaultHandlers = require("./default_handlers").DefaultHandlers;
3724 var DefaultGutterHandler = require("./default_gutter_handler").GutterHandler;
3725 var MouseEvent = require("./mouse_event").MouseEvent;
3726 var DragdropHandler = require("./dragdrop_handler").DragdropHandler;
3727 var config = require("../config");
3728 
3729 var MouseHandler = function(editor) {
3730  var _self = this;
3731  this.editor = editor;
3732 
3733  new DefaultHandlers(this);
3734  new DefaultGutterHandler(this);
3735  new DragdropHandler(this);
3736 
3737  var focusEditor = function(e) {
3738  if (!document.hasFocus || !document.hasFocus())
3739  window.focus();
3740  editor.focus();
3741  };
3742 
3743  var mouseTarget = editor.renderer.getMouseEventTarget();
3744  event.addListener(mouseTarget, "click", this.onMouseEvent.bind(this, "click"));
3745  event.addListener(mouseTarget, "mousemove", this.onMouseMove.bind(this, "mousemove"));
3746  event.addMultiMouseDownListener(mouseTarget, [400, 300, 250], this, "onMouseEvent");
3747  if (editor.renderer.scrollBarV) {
3748  event.addMultiMouseDownListener(editor.renderer.scrollBarV.inner, [400, 300, 250], this, "onMouseEvent");
3749  event.addMultiMouseDownListener(editor.renderer.scrollBarH.inner, [400, 300, 250], this, "onMouseEvent");
3750  if (useragent.isIE) {
3751  event.addListener(editor.renderer.scrollBarV.element, "mousedown", focusEditor);
3752  event.addListener(editor.renderer.scrollBarH.element, "mousedown", focusEditor);
3753  }
3754  }
3755  event.addMouseWheelListener(editor.container, this.onMouseWheel.bind(this, "mousewheel"));
3756 
3757  var gutterEl = editor.renderer.$gutter;
3758  event.addListener(gutterEl, "mousedown", this.onMouseEvent.bind(this, "guttermousedown"));
3759  event.addListener(gutterEl, "click", this.onMouseEvent.bind(this, "gutterclick"));
3760  event.addListener(gutterEl, "dblclick", this.onMouseEvent.bind(this, "gutterdblclick"));
3761  event.addListener(gutterEl, "mousemove", this.onMouseEvent.bind(this, "guttermousemove"));
3762 
3763  event.addListener(mouseTarget, "mousedown", focusEditor);
3764 
3765  event.addListener(gutterEl, "mousedown", function(e) {
3766  editor.focus();
3767  return event.preventDefault(e);
3768  });
3769 
3770  editor.on("mousemove", function(e){
3771  if (_self.state || _self.$dragDelay || !_self.$dragEnabled)
3772  return;
3773 
3774  var character = editor.renderer.screenToTextCoordinates(e.x, e.y);
3775  var range = editor.session.selection.getRange();
3776  var renderer = editor.renderer;
3777 
3778  if (!range.isEmpty() && range.insideStart(character.row, character.column)) {
3779  renderer.setCursorStyle("default");
3780  } else {
3781  renderer.setCursorStyle("");
3782  }
3783  });
3784 };
3785 
3786 (function() {
3787  this.onMouseEvent = function(name, e) {
3788  this.editor._emit(name, new MouseEvent(e, this.editor));
3789  };
3790 
3791  this.onMouseMove = function(name, e) {
3792  var listeners = this.editor._eventRegistry && this.editor._eventRegistry.mousemove;
3793  if (!listeners || !listeners.length)
3794  return;
3795 
3796  this.editor._emit(name, new MouseEvent(e, this.editor));
3797  };
3798 
3799  this.onMouseWheel = function(name, e) {
3800  var mouseEvent = new MouseEvent(e, this.editor);
3801  mouseEvent.speed = this.$scrollSpeed * 2;
3802  mouseEvent.wheelX = e.wheelX;
3803  mouseEvent.wheelY = e.wheelY;
3804 
3805  this.editor._emit(name, mouseEvent);
3806  };
3807 
3808  this.setState = function(state) {
3809  this.state = state;
3810  };
3811 
3812  this.captureMouse = function(ev, mouseMoveHandler) {
3813  this.x = ev.x;
3814  this.y = ev.y;
3815 
3816  this.isMousePressed = true;
3817  var renderer = this.editor.renderer;
3818  if (renderer.$keepTextAreaAtCursor)
3819  renderer.$keepTextAreaAtCursor = null;
3820 
3821  var self = this;
3822  var onMouseMove = function(e) {
3823  if (!e) return;
3824  if (useragent.isWebKit && !e.which && self.releaseMouse)
3825  return self.releaseMouse();
3826 
3827  self.x = e.clientX;
3828  self.y = e.clientY;
3829  mouseMoveHandler && mouseMoveHandler(e);
3830  self.mouseEvent = new MouseEvent(e, self.editor);
3831  self.$mouseMoved = true;
3832  };
3833 
3834  var onCaptureEnd = function(e) {
3835  clearInterval(timerId);
3836  onCaptureInterval();
3837  self[self.state + "End"] && self[self.state + "End"](e);
3838  self.state = "";
3839  if (renderer.$keepTextAreaAtCursor == null) {
3840  renderer.$keepTextAreaAtCursor = true;
3841  renderer.$moveTextAreaToCursor();
3842  }
3843  self.isMousePressed = false;
3844  self.$onCaptureMouseMove = self.releaseMouse = null;
3845  e && self.onMouseEvent("mouseup", e);
3846  };
3847 
3848  var onCaptureInterval = function() {
3849  self[self.state] && self[self.state]();
3850  self.$mouseMoved = false;
3851  };
3852 
3853  if (useragent.isOldIE && ev.domEvent.type == "dblclick") {
3854  return setTimeout(function() {onCaptureEnd(ev);});
3855  }
3856 
3857  self.$onCaptureMouseMove = onMouseMove;
3858  self.releaseMouse = event.capture(this.editor.container, onMouseMove, onCaptureEnd);
3859  var timerId = setInterval(onCaptureInterval, 20);
3860  };
3861  this.releaseMouse = null;
3862  this.cancelContextMenu = function() {
3863  var stop = function(e) {
3864  if (e && e.domEvent && e.domEvent.type != "contextmenu")
3865  return;
3866  this.editor.off("nativecontextmenu", stop);
3867  if (e && e.domEvent)
3868  event.stopEvent(e.domEvent);
3869  }.bind(this);
3870  setTimeout(stop, 10);
3871  this.editor.on("nativecontextmenu", stop);
3872  };
3873 }).call(MouseHandler.prototype);
3874 
3875 config.defineOptions(MouseHandler.prototype, "mouseHandler", {
3876  scrollSpeed: {initialValue: 2},
3877  dragDelay: {initialValue: (useragent.isMac ? 150 : 0)},
3878  dragEnabled: {initialValue: true},
3879  focusTimout: {initialValue: 0},
3880  tooltipFollowsMouse: {initialValue: true}
3881 });
3882 
3883 
3884 exports.MouseHandler = MouseHandler;
3885 });
3886 
3887 define("ace/mouse/fold_handler",["require","exports","module"], function(require, exports, module) {
3888 "use strict";
3889 
3890 function FoldHandler(editor) {
3891 
3892  editor.on("click", function(e) {
3893  var position = e.getDocumentPosition();
3894  var session = editor.session;
3895  var fold = session.getFoldAt(position.row, position.column, 1);
3896  if (fold) {
3897  if (e.getAccelKey())
3898  session.removeFold(fold);
3899  else
3900  session.expandFold(fold);
3901 
3902  e.stop();
3903  }
3904  });
3905 
3906  editor.on("gutterclick", function(e) {
3907  var gutterRegion = editor.renderer.$gutterLayer.getRegion(e);
3908 
3909  if (gutterRegion == "foldWidgets") {
3910  var row = e.getDocumentPosition().row;
3911  var session = editor.session;
3912  if (session.foldWidgets && session.foldWidgets[row])
3913  editor.session.onFoldWidgetClick(row, e);
3914  if (!editor.isFocused())
3915  editor.focus();
3916  e.stop();
3917  }
3918  });
3919 
3920  editor.on("gutterdblclick", function(e) {
3921  var gutterRegion = editor.renderer.$gutterLayer.getRegion(e);
3922 
3923  if (gutterRegion == "foldWidgets") {
3924  var row = e.getDocumentPosition().row;
3925  var session = editor.session;
3926  var data = session.getParentFoldRangeData(row, true);
3927  var range = data.range || data.firstRange;
3928 
3929  if (range) {
3930  row = range.start.row;
3931  var fold = session.getFoldAt(row, session.getLine(row).length, 1);
3932 
3933  if (fold) {
3934  session.removeFold(fold);
3935  } else {
3936  session.addFold("...", range);
3937  editor.renderer.scrollCursorIntoView({row: range.start.row, column: 0});
3938  }
3939  }
3940  e.stop();
3941  }
3942  });
3943 }
3944 
3945 exports.FoldHandler = FoldHandler;
3946 
3947 });
3948 
3949 define("ace/keyboard/keybinding",["require","exports","module","ace/lib/keys","ace/lib/event"], function(require, exports, module) {
3950 "use strict";
3951 
3952 var keyUtil = require("../lib/keys");
3953 var event = require("../lib/event");
3954 
3955 var KeyBinding = function(editor) {
3956  this.$editor = editor;
3957  this.$data = {editor: editor};
3958  this.$handlers = [];
3959  this.setDefaultHandler(editor.commands);
3960 };
3961 
3962 (function() {
3963  this.setDefaultHandler = function(kb) {
3964  this.removeKeyboardHandler(this.$defaultHandler);
3965  this.$defaultHandler = kb;
3966  this.addKeyboardHandler(kb, 0);
3967  };
3968 
3969  this.setKeyboardHandler = function(kb) {
3970  var h = this.$handlers;
3971  if (h[h.length - 1] == kb)
3972  return;
3973 
3974  while (h[h.length - 1] && h[h.length - 1] != this.$defaultHandler)
3975  this.removeKeyboardHandler(h[h.length - 1]);
3976 
3977  this.addKeyboardHandler(kb, 1);
3978  };
3979 
3980  this.addKeyboardHandler = function(kb, pos) {
3981  if (!kb)
3982  return;
3983  if (typeof kb == "function" && !kb.handleKeyboard)
3984  kb.handleKeyboard = kb;
3985  var i = this.$handlers.indexOf(kb);
3986  if (i != -1)
3987  this.$handlers.splice(i, 1);
3988 
3989  if (pos == undefined)
3990  this.$handlers.push(kb);
3991  else
3992  this.$handlers.splice(pos, 0, kb);
3993 
3994  if (i == -1 && kb.attach)
3995  kb.attach(this.$editor);
3996  };
3997 
3998  this.removeKeyboardHandler = function(kb) {
3999  var i = this.$handlers.indexOf(kb);
4000  if (i == -1)
4001  return false;
4002  this.$handlers.splice(i, 1);
4003  kb.detach && kb.detach(this.$editor);
4004  return true;
4005  };
4006 
4007  this.getKeyboardHandler = function() {
4008  return this.$handlers[this.$handlers.length - 1];
4009  };
4010 
4011  this.getStatusText = function() {
4012  var data = this.$data;
4013  var editor = data.editor;
4014  return this.$handlers.map(function(h) {
4015  return h.getStatusText && h.getStatusText(editor, data) || "";
4016  }).filter(Boolean).join(" ");
4017  };
4018 
4019  this.$callKeyboardHandlers = function(hashId, keyString, keyCode, e) {
4020  var toExecute;
4021  var success = false;
4022  var commands = this.$editor.commands;
4023 
4024  for (var i = this.$handlers.length; i--;) {
4025  toExecute = this.$handlers[i].handleKeyboard(
4026  this.$data, hashId, keyString, keyCode, e
4027  );
4028  if (!toExecute || !toExecute.command)
4029  continue;
4030  if (toExecute.command == "null") {
4031  success = true;
4032  } else {
4033  success = commands.exec(toExecute.command, this.$editor, toExecute.args, e);
4034  }
4035  if (success && e && hashId != -1 &&
4036  toExecute.passEvent != true && toExecute.command.passEvent != true
4037  ) {
4038  event.stopEvent(e);
4039  }
4040  if (success)
4041  break;
4042  }
4043  return success;
4044  };
4045 
4046  this.onCommandKey = function(e, hashId, keyCode) {
4047  var keyString = keyUtil.keyCodeToString(keyCode);
4048  this.$callKeyboardHandlers(hashId, keyString, keyCode, e);
4049  };
4050 
4051  this.onTextInput = function(text) {
4052  var success = this.$callKeyboardHandlers(-1, text);
4053  if (!success)
4054  this.$editor.commands.exec("insertstring", this.$editor, text);
4055  };
4056 
4057 }).call(KeyBinding.prototype);
4058 
4059 exports.KeyBinding = KeyBinding;
4060 });
4061 
4062 define("ace/range",["require","exports","module"], function(require, exports, module) {
4063 "use strict";
4064 var comparePoints = function(p1, p2) {
4065  return p1.row - p2.row || p1.column - p2.column;
4066 };
4067 var Range = function(startRow, startColumn, endRow, endColumn) {
4068  this.start = {
4069  row: startRow,
4070  column: startColumn
4071  };
4072 
4073  this.end = {
4074  row: endRow,
4075  column: endColumn
4076  };
4077 };
4078 
4079 (function() {
4080  this.isEqual = function(range) {
4081  return this.start.row === range.start.row &&
4082  this.end.row === range.end.row &&
4083  this.start.column === range.start.column &&
4084  this.end.column === range.end.column;
4085  };
4086  this.toString = function() {
4087  return ("Range: [" + this.start.row + "/" + this.start.column +
4088  "] -> [" + this.end.row + "/" + this.end.column + "]");
4089  };
4090 
4091  this.contains = function(row, column) {
4092  return this.compare(row, column) == 0;
4093  };
4094  this.compareRange = function(range) {
4095  var cmp,
4096  end = range.end,
4097  start = range.start;
4098 
4099  cmp = this.compare(end.row, end.column);
4100  if (cmp == 1) {
4101  cmp = this.compare(start.row, start.column);
4102  if (cmp == 1) {
4103  return 2;
4104  } else if (cmp == 0) {
4105  return 1;
4106  } else {
4107  return 0;
4108  }
4109  } else if (cmp == -1) {
4110  return -2;
4111  } else {
4112  cmp = this.compare(start.row, start.column);
4113  if (cmp == -1) {
4114  return -1;
4115  } else if (cmp == 1) {
4116  return 42;
4117  } else {
4118  return 0;
4119  }
4120  }
4121  };
4122  this.comparePoint = function(p) {
4123  return this.compare(p.row, p.column);
4124  };
4125  this.containsRange = function(range) {
4126  return this.comparePoint(range.start) == 0 && this.comparePoint(range.end) == 0;
4127  };
4128  this.intersects = function(range) {
4129  var cmp = this.compareRange(range);
4130  return (cmp == -1 || cmp == 0 || cmp == 1);
4131  };
4132  this.isEnd = function(row, column) {
4133  return this.end.row == row && this.end.column == column;
4134  };
4135  this.isStart = function(row, column) {
4136  return this.start.row == row && this.start.column == column;
4137  };
4138  this.setStart = function(row, column) {
4139  if (typeof row == "object") {
4140  this.start.column = row.column;
4141  this.start.row = row.row;
4142  } else {
4143  this.start.row = row;
4144  this.start.column = column;
4145  }
4146  };
4147  this.setEnd = function(row, column) {
4148  if (typeof row == "object") {
4149  this.end.column = row.column;
4150  this.end.row = row.row;
4151  } else {
4152  this.end.row = row;
4153  this.end.column = column;
4154  }
4155  };
4156  this.inside = function(row, column) {
4157  if (this.compare(row, column) == 0) {
4158  if (this.isEnd(row, column) || this.isStart(row, column)) {
4159  return false;
4160  } else {
4161  return true;
4162  }
4163  }
4164  return false;
4165  };
4166  this.insideStart = function(row, column) {
4167  if (this.compare(row, column) == 0) {
4168  if (this.isEnd(row, column)) {
4169  return false;
4170  } else {
4171  return true;
4172  }
4173  }
4174  return false;
4175  };
4176  this.insideEnd = function(row, column) {
4177  if (this.compare(row, column) == 0) {
4178  if (this.isStart(row, column)) {
4179  return false;
4180  } else {
4181  return true;
4182  }
4183  }
4184  return false;
4185  };
4186  this.compare = function(row, column) {
4187  if (!this.isMultiLine()) {
4188  if (row === this.start.row) {
4189  return column < this.start.column ? -1 : (column > this.end.column ? 1 : 0);
4190  };
4191  }
4192 
4193  if (row < this.start.row)
4194  return -1;
4195 
4196  if (row > this.end.row)
4197  return 1;
4198 
4199  if (this.start.row === row)
4200  return column >= this.start.column ? 0 : -1;
4201 
4202  if (this.end.row === row)
4203  return column <= this.end.column ? 0 : 1;
4204 
4205  return 0;
4206  };
4207  this.compareStart = function(row, column) {
4208  if (this.start.row == row && this.start.column == column) {
4209  return -1;
4210  } else {
4211  return this.compare(row, column);
4212  }
4213  };
4214  this.compareEnd = function(row, column) {
4215  if (this.end.row == row && this.end.column == column) {
4216  return 1;
4217  } else {
4218  return this.compare(row, column);
4219  }
4220  };
4221  this.compareInside = function(row, column) {
4222  if (this.end.row == row && this.end.column == column) {
4223  return 1;
4224  } else if (this.start.row == row && this.start.column == column) {
4225  return -1;
4226  } else {
4227  return this.compare(row, column);
4228  }
4229  };
4230  this.clipRows = function(firstRow, lastRow) {
4231  if (this.end.row > lastRow)
4232  var end = {row: lastRow + 1, column: 0};
4233  else if (this.end.row < firstRow)
4234  var end = {row: firstRow, column: 0};
4235 
4236  if (this.start.row > lastRow)
4237  var start = {row: lastRow + 1, column: 0};
4238  else if (this.start.row < firstRow)
4239  var start = {row: firstRow, column: 0};
4240 
4241  return Range.fromPoints(start || this.start, end || this.end);
4242  };
4243  this.extend = function(row, column) {
4244  var cmp = this.compare(row, column);
4245 
4246  if (cmp == 0)
4247  return this;
4248  else if (cmp == -1)
4249  var start = {row: row, column: column};
4250  else
4251  var end = {row: row, column: column};
4252 
4253  return Range.fromPoints(start || this.start, end || this.end);
4254  };
4255 
4256  this.isEmpty = function() {
4257  return (this.start.row === this.end.row && this.start.column === this.end.column);
4258  };
4259  this.isMultiLine = function() {
4260  return (this.start.row !== this.end.row);
4261  };
4262  this.clone = function() {
4263  return Range.fromPoints(this.start, this.end);
4264  };
4265  this.collapseRows = function() {
4266  if (this.end.column == 0)
4267  return new Range(this.start.row, 0, Math.max(this.start.row, this.end.row-1), 0)
4268  else
4269  return new Range(this.start.row, 0, this.end.row, 0)
4270  };
4271  this.toScreenRange = function(session) {
4272  var screenPosStart = session.documentToScreenPosition(this.start);
4273  var screenPosEnd = session.documentToScreenPosition(this.end);
4274 
4275  return new Range(
4276  screenPosStart.row, screenPosStart.column,
4277  screenPosEnd.row, screenPosEnd.column
4278  );
4279  };
4280  this.moveBy = function(row, column) {
4281  this.start.row += row;
4282  this.start.column += column;
4283  this.end.row += row;
4284  this.end.column += column;
4285  };
4286 
4287 }).call(Range.prototype);
4288 Range.fromPoints = function(start, end) {
4289  return new Range(start.row, start.column, end.row, end.column);
4290 };
4291 Range.comparePoints = comparePoints;
4292 
4293 Range.comparePoints = function(p1, p2) {
4294  return p1.row - p2.row || p1.column - p2.column;
4295 };
4296 
4297 
4298 exports.Range = Range;
4299 });
4300 
4301 define("ace/selection",["require","exports","module","ace/lib/oop","ace/lib/lang","ace/lib/event_emitter","ace/range"], function(require, exports, module) {
4302 "use strict";
4303 
4304 var oop = require("./lib/oop");
4305 var lang = require("./lib/lang");
4306 var EventEmitter = require("./lib/event_emitter").EventEmitter;
4307 var Range = require("./range").Range;
4308 var Selection = function(session) {
4309  this.session = session;
4310  this.doc = session.getDocument();
4311 
4312  this.clearSelection();
4313  this.lead = this.selectionLead = this.doc.createAnchor(0, 0);
4314  this.anchor = this.selectionAnchor = this.doc.createAnchor(0, 0);
4315 
4316  var self = this;
4317  this.lead.on("change", function(e) {
4318  self._emit("changeCursor");
4319  if (!self.$isEmpty)
4320  self._emit("changeSelection");
4321  if (!self.$keepDesiredColumnOnChange && e.old.column != e.value.column)
4322  self.$desiredColumn = null;
4323  });
4324 
4325  this.selectionAnchor.on("change", function() {
4326  if (!self.$isEmpty)
4327  self._emit("changeSelection");
4328  });
4329 };
4330 
4331 (function() {
4332 
4333  oop.implement(this, EventEmitter);
4334  this.isEmpty = function() {
4335  return (this.$isEmpty || (
4336  this.anchor.row == this.lead.row &&
4337  this.anchor.column == this.lead.column
4338  ));
4339  };
4340  this.isMultiLine = function() {
4341  if (this.isEmpty()) {
4342  return false;
4343  }
4344 
4345  return this.getRange().isMultiLine();
4346  };
4347  this.getCursor = function() {
4348  return this.lead.getPosition();
4349  };
4350  this.setSelectionAnchor = function(row, column) {
4351  this.anchor.setPosition(row, column);
4352 
4353  if (this.$isEmpty) {
4354  this.$isEmpty = false;
4355  this._emit("changeSelection");
4356  }
4357  };
4358  this.getSelectionAnchor = function() {
4359  if (this.$isEmpty)
4360  return this.getSelectionLead();
4361  else
4362  return this.anchor.getPosition();
4363  };
4364  this.getSelectionLead = function() {
4365  return this.lead.getPosition();
4366  };
4367  this.shiftSelection = function(columns) {
4368  if (this.$isEmpty) {
4369  this.moveCursorTo(this.lead.row, this.lead.column + columns);
4370  return;
4371  }
4372 
4373  var anchor = this.getSelectionAnchor();
4374  var lead = this.getSelectionLead();
4375 
4376  var isBackwards = this.isBackwards();
4377 
4378  if (!isBackwards || anchor.column !== 0)
4379  this.setSelectionAnchor(anchor.row, anchor.column + columns);
4380 
4381  if (isBackwards || lead.column !== 0) {
4382  this.$moveSelection(function() {
4383  this.moveCursorTo(lead.row, lead.column + columns);
4384  });
4385  }
4386  };
4387  this.isBackwards = function() {
4388  var anchor = this.anchor;
4389  var lead = this.lead;
4390  return (anchor.row > lead.row || (anchor.row == lead.row && anchor.column > lead.column));
4391  };
4392  this.getRange = function() {
4393  var anchor = this.anchor;
4394  var lead = this.lead;
4395 
4396  if (this.isEmpty())
4397  return Range.fromPoints(lead, lead);
4398 
4399  if (this.isBackwards()) {
4400  return Range.fromPoints(lead, anchor);
4401  }
4402  else {
4403  return Range.fromPoints(anchor, lead);
4404  }
4405  };
4406  this.clearSelection = function() {
4407  if (!this.$isEmpty) {
4408  this.$isEmpty = true;
4409  this._emit("changeSelection");
4410  }
4411  };
4412  this.selectAll = function() {
4413  var lastRow = this.doc.getLength() - 1;
4414  this.setSelectionAnchor(0, 0);
4415  this.moveCursorTo(lastRow, this.doc.getLine(lastRow).length);
4416  };
4417  this.setRange =
4418  this.setSelectionRange = function(range, reverse) {
4419  if (reverse) {
4420  this.setSelectionAnchor(range.end.row, range.end.column);
4421  this.selectTo(range.start.row, range.start.column);
4422  } else {
4423  this.setSelectionAnchor(range.start.row, range.start.column);
4424  this.selectTo(range.end.row, range.end.column);
4425  }
4426  if (this.getRange().isEmpty())
4427  this.$isEmpty = true;
4428  this.$desiredColumn = null;
4429  };
4430 
4431  this.$moveSelection = function(mover) {
4432  var lead = this.lead;
4433  if (this.$isEmpty)
4434  this.setSelectionAnchor(lead.row, lead.column);
4435 
4436  mover.call(this);
4437  };
4438  this.selectTo = function(row, column) {
4439  this.$moveSelection(function() {
4440  this.moveCursorTo(row, column);
4441  });
4442  };
4443  this.selectToPosition = function(pos) {
4444  this.$moveSelection(function() {
4445  this.moveCursorToPosition(pos);
4446  });
4447  };
4448  this.moveTo = function(row, column) {
4449  this.clearSelection();
4450  this.moveCursorTo(row, column);
4451  };
4452  this.moveToPosition = function(pos) {
4453  this.clearSelection();
4454  this.moveCursorToPosition(pos);
4455  };
4456  this.selectUp = function() {
4457  this.$moveSelection(this.moveCursorUp);
4458  };
4459  this.selectDown = function() {
4460  this.$moveSelection(this.moveCursorDown);
4461  };
4462  this.selectRight = function() {
4463  this.$moveSelection(this.moveCursorRight);
4464  };
4465  this.selectLeft = function() {
4466  this.$moveSelection(this.moveCursorLeft);
4467  };
4468  this.selectLineStart = function() {
4469  this.$moveSelection(this.moveCursorLineStart);
4470  };
4471  this.selectLineEnd = function() {
4472  this.$moveSelection(this.moveCursorLineEnd);
4473  };
4474  this.selectFileEnd = function() {
4475  this.$moveSelection(this.moveCursorFileEnd);
4476  };
4477  this.selectFileStart = function() {
4478  this.$moveSelection(this.moveCursorFileStart);
4479  };
4480  this.selectWordRight = function() {
4481  this.$moveSelection(this.moveCursorWordRight);
4482  };
4483  this.selectWordLeft = function() {
4484  this.$moveSelection(this.moveCursorWordLeft);
4485  };
4486  this.getWordRange = function(row, column) {
4487  if (typeof column == "undefined") {
4488  var cursor = row || this.lead;
4489  row = cursor.row;
4490  column = cursor.column;
4491  }
4492  return this.session.getWordRange(row, column);
4493  };
4494  this.selectWord = function() {
4495  this.setSelectionRange(this.getWordRange());
4496  };
4497  this.selectAWord = function() {
4498  var cursor = this.getCursor();
4499  var range = this.session.getAWordRange(cursor.row, cursor.column);
4500  this.setSelectionRange(range);
4501  };
4502 
4503  this.getLineRange = function(row, excludeLastChar) {
4504  var rowStart = typeof row == "number" ? row : this.lead.row;
4505  var rowEnd;
4506 
4507  var foldLine = this.session.getFoldLine(rowStart);
4508  if (foldLine) {
4509  rowStart = foldLine.start.row;
4510  rowEnd = foldLine.end.row;
4511  } else {
4512  rowEnd = rowStart;
4513  }
4514  if (excludeLastChar === true)
4515  return new Range(rowStart, 0, rowEnd, this.session.getLine(rowEnd).length);
4516  else
4517  return new Range(rowStart, 0, rowEnd + 1, 0);
4518  };
4519  this.selectLine = function() {
4520  this.setSelectionRange(this.getLineRange());
4521  };
4522  this.moveCursorUp = function() {
4523  this.moveCursorBy(-1, 0);
4524  };
4525  this.moveCursorDown = function() {
4526  this.moveCursorBy(1, 0);
4527  };
4528  this.moveCursorLeft = function() {
4529  var cursor = this.lead.getPosition(),
4530  fold;
4531 
4532  if (fold = this.session.getFoldAt(cursor.row, cursor.column, -1)) {
4533  this.moveCursorTo(fold.start.row, fold.start.column);
4534  } else if (cursor.column === 0) {
4535  if (cursor.row > 0) {
4536  this.moveCursorTo(cursor.row - 1, this.doc.getLine(cursor.row - 1).length);
4537  }
4538  }
4539  else {
4540  var tabSize = this.session.getTabSize();
4541  if (this.session.isTabStop(cursor) && this.doc.getLine(cursor.row).slice(cursor.column-tabSize, cursor.column).split(" ").length-1 == tabSize)
4542  this.moveCursorBy(0, -tabSize);
4543  else
4544  this.moveCursorBy(0, -1);
4545  }
4546  };
4547  this.moveCursorRight = function() {
4548  var cursor = this.lead.getPosition(),
4549  fold;
4550  if (fold = this.session.getFoldAt(cursor.row, cursor.column, 1)) {
4551  this.moveCursorTo(fold.end.row, fold.end.column);
4552  }
4553  else if (this.lead.column == this.doc.getLine(this.lead.row).length) {
4554  if (this.lead.row < this.doc.getLength() - 1) {
4555  this.moveCursorTo(this.lead.row + 1, 0);
4556  }
4557  }
4558  else {
4559  var tabSize = this.session.getTabSize();
4560  var cursor = this.lead;
4561  if (this.session.isTabStop(cursor) && this.doc.getLine(cursor.row).slice(cursor.column, cursor.column+tabSize).split(" ").length-1 == tabSize)
4562  this.moveCursorBy(0, tabSize);
4563  else
4564  this.moveCursorBy(0, 1);
4565  }
4566  };
4567  this.moveCursorLineStart = function() {
4568  var row = this.lead.row;
4569  var column = this.lead.column;
4570  var screenRow = this.session.documentToScreenRow(row, column);
4571  var firstColumnPosition = this.session.screenToDocumentPosition(screenRow, 0);
4572  var beforeCursor = this.session.getDisplayLine(
4573  row, null, firstColumnPosition.row,
4574  firstColumnPosition.column
4575  );
4576 
4577  var leadingSpace = beforeCursor.match(/^\s*/);
4578  if (leadingSpace[0].length != column && !this.session.$useEmacsStyleLineStart)
4579  firstColumnPosition.column += leadingSpace[0].length;
4580  this.moveCursorToPosition(firstColumnPosition);
4581  };
4582  this.moveCursorLineEnd = function() {
4583  var lead = this.lead;
4584  var lineEnd = this.session.getDocumentLastRowColumnPosition(lead.row, lead.column);
4585  if (this.lead.column == lineEnd.column) {
4586  var line = this.session.getLine(lineEnd.row);
4587  if (lineEnd.column == line.length) {
4588  var textEnd = line.search(/\s+$/);
4589  if (textEnd > 0)
4590  lineEnd.column = textEnd;
4591  }
4592  }
4593 
4594  this.moveCursorTo(lineEnd.row, lineEnd.column);
4595  };
4596  this.moveCursorFileEnd = function() {
4597  var row = this.doc.getLength() - 1;
4598  var column = this.doc.getLine(row).length;
4599  this.moveCursorTo(row, column);
4600  };
4601  this.moveCursorFileStart = function() {
4602  this.moveCursorTo(0, 0);
4603  };
4604  this.moveCursorLongWordRight = function() {
4605  var row = this.lead.row;
4606  var column = this.lead.column;
4607  var line = this.doc.getLine(row);
4608  var rightOfCursor = line.substring(column);
4609 
4610  var match;
4611  this.session.nonTokenRe.lastIndex = 0;
4612  this.session.tokenRe.lastIndex = 0;
4613  var fold = this.session.getFoldAt(row, column, 1);
4614  if (fold) {
4615  this.moveCursorTo(fold.end.row, fold.end.column);
4616  return;
4617  }
4618  if (match = this.session.nonTokenRe.exec(rightOfCursor)) {
4619  column += this.session.nonTokenRe.lastIndex;
4620  this.session.nonTokenRe.lastIndex = 0;
4621  rightOfCursor = line.substring(column);
4622  }
4623  if (column >= line.length) {
4624  this.moveCursorTo(row, line.length);
4625  this.moveCursorRight();
4626  if (row < this.doc.getLength() - 1)
4627  this.moveCursorWordRight();
4628  return;
4629  }
4630  if (match = this.session.tokenRe.exec(rightOfCursor)) {
4631  column += this.session.tokenRe.lastIndex;
4632  this.session.tokenRe.lastIndex = 0;
4633  }
4634 
4635  this.moveCursorTo(row, column);
4636  };
4637  this.moveCursorLongWordLeft = function() {
4638  var row = this.lead.row;
4639  var column = this.lead.column;
4640  var fold;
4641  if (fold = this.session.getFoldAt(row, column, -1)) {
4642  this.moveCursorTo(fold.start.row, fold.start.column);
4643  return;
4644  }
4645 
4646  var str = this.session.getFoldStringAt(row, column, -1);
4647  if (str == null) {
4648  str = this.doc.getLine(row).substring(0, column);
4649  }
4650 
4651  var leftOfCursor = lang.stringReverse(str);
4652  var match;
4653  this.session.nonTokenRe.lastIndex = 0;
4654  this.session.tokenRe.lastIndex = 0;
4655  if (match = this.session.nonTokenRe.exec(leftOfCursor)) {
4656  column -= this.session.nonTokenRe.lastIndex;
4657  leftOfCursor = leftOfCursor.slice(this.session.nonTokenRe.lastIndex);
4658  this.session.nonTokenRe.lastIndex = 0;
4659  }
4660  if (column <= 0) {
4661  this.moveCursorTo(row, 0);
4662  this.moveCursorLeft();
4663  if (row > 0)
4664  this.moveCursorWordLeft();
4665  return;
4666  }
4667  if (match = this.session.tokenRe.exec(leftOfCursor)) {
4668  column -= this.session.tokenRe.lastIndex;
4669  this.session.tokenRe.lastIndex = 0;
4670  }
4671 
4672  this.moveCursorTo(row, column);
4673  };
4674 
4675  this.$shortWordEndIndex = function(rightOfCursor) {
4676  var match, index = 0, ch;
4677  var whitespaceRe = /\s/;
4678  var tokenRe = this.session.tokenRe;
4679 
4680  tokenRe.lastIndex = 0;
4681  if (match = this.session.tokenRe.exec(rightOfCursor)) {
4682  index = this.session.tokenRe.lastIndex;
4683  } else {
4684  while ((ch = rightOfCursor[index]) && whitespaceRe.test(ch))
4685  index ++;
4686 
4687  if (index < 1) {
4688  tokenRe.lastIndex = 0;
4689  while ((ch = rightOfCursor[index]) && !tokenRe.test(ch)) {
4690  tokenRe.lastIndex = 0;
4691  index ++;
4692  if (whitespaceRe.test(ch)) {
4693  if (index > 2) {
4694  index--;
4695  break;
4696  } else {
4697  while ((ch = rightOfCursor[index]) && whitespaceRe.test(ch))
4698  index ++;
4699  if (index > 2)
4700  break;
4701  }
4702  }
4703  }
4704  }
4705  }
4706  tokenRe.lastIndex = 0;
4707 
4708  return index;
4709  };
4710 
4711  this.moveCursorShortWordRight = function() {
4712  var row = this.lead.row;
4713  var column = this.lead.column;
4714  var line = this.doc.getLine(row);
4715  var rightOfCursor = line.substring(column);
4716 
4717  var fold = this.session.getFoldAt(row, column, 1);
4718  if (fold)
4719  return this.moveCursorTo(fold.end.row, fold.end.column);
4720 
4721  if (column == line.length) {
4722  var l = this.doc.getLength();
4723  do {
4724  row++;
4725  rightOfCursor = this.doc.getLine(row);
4726  } while (row < l && /^\s*$/.test(rightOfCursor));
4727 
4728  if (!/^\s+/.test(rightOfCursor))
4729  rightOfCursor = "";
4730  column = 0;
4731  }
4732 
4733  var index = this.$shortWordEndIndex(rightOfCursor);
4734 
4735  this.moveCursorTo(row, column + index);
4736  };
4737 
4738  this.moveCursorShortWordLeft = function() {
4739  var row = this.lead.row;
4740  var column = this.lead.column;
4741 
4742  var fold;
4743  if (fold = this.session.getFoldAt(row, column, -1))
4744  return this.moveCursorTo(fold.start.row, fold.start.column);
4745 
4746  var line = this.session.getLine(row).substring(0, column);
4747  if (column === 0) {
4748  do {
4749  row--;
4750  line = this.doc.getLine(row);
4751  } while (row > 0 && /^\s*$/.test(line));
4752 
4753  column = line.length;
4754  if (!/\s+$/.test(line))
4755  line = "";
4756  }
4757 
4758  var leftOfCursor = lang.stringReverse(line);
4759  var index = this.$shortWordEndIndex(leftOfCursor);
4760 
4761  return this.moveCursorTo(row, column - index);
4762  };
4763 
4764  this.moveCursorWordRight = function() {
4765  if (this.session.$selectLongWords)
4766  this.moveCursorLongWordRight();
4767  else
4768  this.moveCursorShortWordRight();
4769  };
4770 
4771  this.moveCursorWordLeft = function() {
4772  if (this.session.$selectLongWords)
4773  this.moveCursorLongWordLeft();
4774  else
4775  this.moveCursorShortWordLeft();
4776  };
4777  this.moveCursorBy = function(rows, chars) {
4778  var screenPos = this.session.documentToScreenPosition(
4779  this.lead.row,
4780  this.lead.column
4781  );
4782 
4783  if (chars === 0) {
4784  if (this.$desiredColumn)
4785  screenPos.column = this.$desiredColumn;
4786  else
4787  this.$desiredColumn = screenPos.column;
4788  }
4789 
4790  var docPos = this.session.screenToDocumentPosition(screenPos.row + rows, screenPos.column);
4791 
4792  if (rows !== 0 && chars === 0 && docPos.row === this.lead.row && docPos.column === this.lead.column) {
4793  if (this.session.lineWidgets && this.session.lineWidgets[docPos.row])
4794  docPos.row++;
4795  }
4796  this.moveCursorTo(docPos.row, docPos.column + chars, chars === 0);
4797  };
4798  this.moveCursorToPosition = function(position) {
4799  this.moveCursorTo(position.row, position.column);
4800  };
4801  this.moveCursorTo = function(row, column, keepDesiredColumn) {
4802  var fold = this.session.getFoldAt(row, column, 1);
4803  if (fold) {
4804  row = fold.start.row;
4805  column = fold.start.column;
4806  }
4807 
4808  this.$keepDesiredColumnOnChange = true;
4809  this.lead.setPosition(row, column);
4810  this.$keepDesiredColumnOnChange = false;
4811 
4812  if (!keepDesiredColumn)
4813  this.$desiredColumn = null;
4814  };
4815  this.moveCursorToScreen = function(row, column, keepDesiredColumn) {
4816  var pos = this.session.screenToDocumentPosition(row, column);
4817  this.moveCursorTo(pos.row, pos.column, keepDesiredColumn);
4818  };
4819  this.detach = function() {
4820  this.lead.detach();
4821  this.anchor.detach();
4822  this.session = this.doc = null;
4823  };
4824 
4825  this.fromOrientedRange = function(range) {
4826  this.setSelectionRange(range, range.cursor == range.start);
4827  this.$desiredColumn = range.desiredColumn || this.$desiredColumn;
4828  };
4829 
4830  this.toOrientedRange = function(range) {
4831  var r = this.getRange();
4832  if (range) {
4833  range.start.column = r.start.column;
4834  range.start.row = r.start.row;
4835  range.end.column = r.end.column;
4836  range.end.row = r.end.row;
4837  } else {
4838  range = r;
4839  }
4840 
4841  range.cursor = this.isBackwards() ? range.start : range.end;
4842  range.desiredColumn = this.$desiredColumn;
4843  return range;
4844  };
4845  this.getRangeOfMovements = function(func) {
4846  var start = this.getCursor();
4847  try {
4848  func.call(null, this);
4849  var end = this.getCursor();
4850  return Range.fromPoints(start,end);
4851  } catch(e) {
4852  return Range.fromPoints(start,start);
4853  } finally {
4854  this.moveCursorToPosition(start);
4855  }
4856  };
4857 
4858  this.toJSON = function() {
4859  if (this.rangeCount) {
4860  var data = this.ranges.map(function(r) {
4861  var r1 = r.clone();
4862  r1.isBackwards = r.cursor == r.start;
4863  return r1;
4864  });
4865  } else {
4866  var data = this.getRange();
4867  data.isBackwards = this.isBackwards();
4868  }
4869  return data;
4870  };
4871 
4872  this.fromJSON = function(data) {
4873  if (data.start == undefined) {
4874  if (this.rangeList) {
4875  this.toSingleRange(data[0]);
4876  for (var i = data.length; i--; ) {
4877  var r = Range.fromPoints(data[i].start, data[i].end);
4878  if (data.isBackwards)
4879  r.cursor = r.start;
4880  this.addRange(r, true);
4881  }
4882  return;
4883  } else
4884  data = data[0];
4885  }
4886  if (this.rangeList)
4887  this.toSingleRange(data);
4888  this.setSelectionRange(data, data.isBackwards);
4889  };
4890 
4891  this.isEqual = function(data) {
4892  if ((data.length || this.rangeCount) && data.length != this.rangeCount)
4893  return false;
4894  if (!data.length || !this.ranges)
4895  return this.getRange().isEqual(data);
4896 
4897  for (var i = this.ranges.length; i--; ) {
4898  if (!this.ranges[i].isEqual(data[i]))
4899  return false;
4900  }
4901  return true;
4902  };
4903 
4904 }).call(Selection.prototype);
4905 
4906 exports.Selection = Selection;
4907 });
4908 
4909 define("ace/tokenizer",["require","exports","module","ace/config"], function(require, exports, module) {
4910 "use strict";
4911 
4912 var config = require("./config");
4913 var MAX_TOKEN_COUNT = 2000;
4914 var Tokenizer = function(rules) {
4915  this.states = rules;
4916 
4917  this.regExps = {};
4918  this.matchMappings = {};
4919  for (var key in this.states) {
4920  var state = this.states[key];
4921  var ruleRegExps = [];
4922  var matchTotal = 0;
4923  var mapping = this.matchMappings[key] = {defaultToken: "text"};
4924  var flag = "g";
4925 
4926  var splitterRurles = [];
4927  for (var i = 0; i < state.length; i++) {
4928  var rule = state[i];
4929  if (rule.defaultToken)
4930  mapping.defaultToken = rule.defaultToken;
4931  if (rule.caseInsensitive)
4932  flag = "gi";
4933  if (rule.regex == null)
4934  continue;
4935 
4936  if (rule.regex instanceof RegExp)
4937  rule.regex = rule.regex.toString().slice(1, -1);
4938  var adjustedregex = rule.regex;
4939  var matchcount = new RegExp("(?:(" + adjustedregex + ")|(.))").exec("a").length - 2;
4940  if (Array.isArray(rule.token)) {
4941  if (rule.token.length == 1 || matchcount == 1) {
4942  rule.token = rule.token[0];
4943  } else if (matchcount - 1 != rule.token.length) {
4944  this.reportError("number of classes and regexp groups doesn't match", {
4945  rule: rule,
4946  groupCount: matchcount - 1
4947  });
4948  rule.token = rule.token[0];
4949  } else {
4950  rule.tokenArray = rule.token;
4951  rule.token = null;
4952  rule.onMatch = this.$arrayTokens;
4953  }
4954  } else if (typeof rule.token == "function" && !rule.onMatch) {
4955  if (matchcount > 1)
4956  rule.onMatch = this.$applyToken;
4957  else
4958  rule.onMatch = rule.token;
4959  }
4960 
4961  if (matchcount > 1) {
4962  if (/\\\d/.test(rule.regex)) {
4963  adjustedregex = rule.regex.replace(/\\([0-9]+)/g, function(match, digit) {
4964  return "\\" + (parseInt(digit, 10) + matchTotal + 1);
4965  });
4966  } else {
4967  matchcount = 1;
4968  adjustedregex = this.removeCapturingGroups(rule.regex);
4969  }
4970  if (!rule.splitRegex && typeof rule.token != "string")
4971  splitterRurles.push(rule); // flag will be known only at the very end
4972  }
4973 
4974  mapping[matchTotal] = i;
4975  matchTotal += matchcount;
4976 
4977  ruleRegExps.push(adjustedregex);
4978  if (!rule.onMatch)
4979  rule.onMatch = null;
4980  }
4981 
4982  if (!ruleRegExps.length) {
4983  mapping[0] = 0;
4984  ruleRegExps.push("$");
4985  }
4986 
4987  splitterRurles.forEach(function(rule) {
4988  rule.splitRegex = this.createSplitterRegexp(rule.regex, flag);
4989  }, this);
4990 
4991  this.regExps[key] = new RegExp("(" + ruleRegExps.join(")|(") + ")|($)", flag);
4992  }
4993 };
4994 
4995 (function() {
4996  this.$setMaxTokenCount = function(m) {
4997  MAX_TOKEN_COUNT = m | 0;
4998  };
4999 
5000  this.$applyToken = function(str) {
5001  var values = this.splitRegex.exec(str).slice(1);
5002  var types = this.token.apply(this, values);
5003  if (typeof types === "string")
5004  return [{type: types, value: str}];
5005 
5006  var tokens = [];
5007  for (var i = 0, l = types.length; i < l; i++) {
5008  if (values[i])
5009  tokens[tokens.length] = {
5010  type: types[i],
5011  value: values[i]
5012  };
5013  }
5014  return tokens;
5015  },
5016 
5017  this.$arrayTokens = function(str) {
5018  if (!str)
5019  return [];
5020  var values = this.splitRegex.exec(str);
5021  if (!values)
5022  return "text";
5023  var tokens = [];
5024  var types = this.tokenArray;
5025  for (var i = 0, l = types.length; i < l; i++) {
5026  if (values[i + 1])
5027  tokens[tokens.length] = {
5028  type: types[i],
5029  value: values[i + 1]
5030  };
5031  }
5032  return tokens;
5033  };
5034 
5035  this.removeCapturingGroups = function(src) {
5036  var r = src.replace(
5037  /\[(?:\\.|[^\]])*?\]|\\.|\(\?[:=!]|(\()/g,
5038  function(x, y) {return y ? "(?:" : x;}
5039  );
5040  return r;
5041  };
5042 
5043  this.createSplitterRegexp = function(src, flag) {
5044  if (src.indexOf("(?=") != -1) {
5045  var stack = 0;
5046  var inChClass = false;
5047  var lastCapture = {};
5048  src.replace(/(\\.)|(\((?:\?[=!])?)|(\))|([\[\]])/g, function(
5049  m, esc, parenOpen, parenClose, square, index
5050  ) {
5051  if (inChClass) {
5052  inChClass = square != "]";
5053  } else if (square) {
5054  inChClass = true;
5055  } else if (parenClose) {
5056  if (stack == lastCapture.stack) {
5057  lastCapture.end = index+1;
5058  lastCapture.stack = -1;
5059  }
5060  stack--;
5061  } else if (parenOpen) {
5062  stack++;
5063  if (parenOpen.length != 1) {
5064  lastCapture.stack = stack
5065  lastCapture.start = index;
5066  }
5067  }
5068  return m;
5069  });
5070 
5071  if (lastCapture.end != null && /^\)*$/.test(src.substr(lastCapture.end)))
5072  src = src.substring(0, lastCapture.start) + src.substr(lastCapture.end);
5073  }
5074  return new RegExp(src, (flag||"").replace("g", ""));
5075  };
5076  this.getLineTokens = function(line, startState) {
5077  if (startState && typeof startState != "string") {
5078  var stack = startState.slice(0);
5079  startState = stack[0];
5080  if (startState === "#tmp") {
5081  stack.shift()
5082  startState = stack.shift()
5083  }
5084  } else
5085  var stack = [];
5086 
5087  var currentState = startState || "start";
5088  var state = this.states[currentState];
5089  if (!state) {
5090  currentState = "start";
5091  state = this.states[currentState];
5092  }
5093  var mapping = this.matchMappings[currentState];
5094  var re = this.regExps[currentState];
5095  re.lastIndex = 0;
5096 
5097  var match, tokens = [];
5098  var lastIndex = 0;
5099  var matchAttempts = 0;
5100 
5101  var token = {type: null, value: ""};
5102 
5103  while (match = re.exec(line)) {
5104  var type = mapping.defaultToken;
5105  var rule = null;
5106  var value = match[0];
5107  var index = re.lastIndex;
5108 
5109  if (index - value.length > lastIndex) {
5110  var skipped = line.substring(lastIndex, index - value.length);
5111  if (token.type == type) {
5112  token.value += skipped;
5113  } else {
5114  if (token.type)
5115  tokens.push(token);
5116  token = {type: type, value: skipped};
5117  }
5118  }
5119 
5120  for (var i = 0; i < match.length-2; i++) {
5121  if (match[i + 1] === undefined)
5122  continue;
5123 
5124  rule = state[mapping[i]];
5125 
5126  if (rule.onMatch)
5127  type = rule.onMatch(value, currentState, stack);
5128  else
5129  type = rule.token;
5130 
5131  if (rule.next) {
5132  if (typeof rule.next == "string") {
5133  currentState = rule.next;
5134  } else {
5135  currentState = rule.next(currentState, stack);
5136  }
5137 
5138  state = this.states[currentState];
5139  if (!state) {
5140  this.reportError("state doesn't exist", currentState);
5141  currentState = "start";
5142  state = this.states[currentState];
5143  }
5144  mapping = this.matchMappings[currentState];
5145  lastIndex = index;
5146  re = this.regExps[currentState];
5147  re.lastIndex = index;
5148  }
5149  break;
5150  }
5151 
5152  if (value) {
5153  if (typeof type === "string") {
5154  if ((!rule || rule.merge !== false) && token.type === type) {
5155  token.value += value;
5156  } else {
5157  if (token.type)
5158  tokens.push(token);
5159  token = {type: type, value: value};
5160  }
5161  } else if (type) {
5162  if (token.type)
5163  tokens.push(token);
5164  token = {type: null, value: ""};
5165  for (var i = 0; i < type.length; i++)
5166  tokens.push(type[i]);
5167  }
5168  }
5169 
5170  if (lastIndex == line.length)
5171  break;
5172 
5173  lastIndex = index;
5174 
5175  if (matchAttempts++ > MAX_TOKEN_COUNT) {
5176  if (matchAttempts > 2 * line.length) {
5177  this.reportError("infinite loop with in ace tokenizer", {
5178  startState: startState,
5179  line: line
5180  });
5181  }
5182  while (lastIndex < line.length) {
5183  if (token.type)
5184  tokens.push(token);
5185  token = {
5186  value: line.substring(lastIndex, lastIndex += 2000),
5187  type: "overflow"
5188  };
5189  }
5190  currentState = "start";
5191  stack = [];
5192  break;
5193  }
5194  }
5195 
5196  if (token.type)
5197  tokens.push(token);
5198 
5199  if (stack.length > 1) {
5200  if (stack[0] !== currentState)
5201  stack.unshift("#tmp", currentState);
5202  }
5203  return {
5204  tokens : tokens,
5205  state : stack.length ? stack : currentState
5206  };
5207  };
5208 
5209  this.reportError = config.reportError;
5210 
5211 }).call(Tokenizer.prototype);
5212 
5213 exports.Tokenizer = Tokenizer;
5214 });
5215 
5216 define("ace/mode/text_highlight_rules",["require","exports","module","ace/lib/lang"], function(require, exports, module) {
5217 "use strict";
5218 
5219 var lang = require("../lib/lang");
5220 
5221 var TextHighlightRules = function() {
5222 
5223  this.$rules = {
5224  "start" : [{
5225  token : "empty_line",
5226  regex : '^$'
5227  }, {
5228  defaultToken : "text"
5229  }]
5230  };
5231 };
5232 
5233 (function() {
5234 
5235  this.addRules = function(rules, prefix) {
5236  if (!prefix) {
5237  for (var key in rules)
5238  this.$rules[key] = rules[key];
5239  return;
5240  }
5241  for (var key in rules) {
5242  var state = rules[key];
5243  for (var i = 0; i < state.length; i++) {
5244  var rule = state[i];
5245  if (rule.next || rule.onMatch) {
5246  if (typeof rule.next != "string") {
5247  if (rule.nextState && rule.nextState.indexOf(prefix) !== 0)
5248  rule.nextState = prefix + rule.nextState;
5249  } else {
5250  if (rule.next.indexOf(prefix) !== 0)
5251  rule.next = prefix + rule.next;
5252  }
5253  }
5254  }
5255  this.$rules[prefix + key] = state;
5256  }
5257  };
5258 
5259  this.getRules = function() {
5260  return this.$rules;
5261  };
5262 
5263  this.embedRules = function (HighlightRules, prefix, escapeRules, states, append) {
5264  var embedRules = typeof HighlightRules == "function"
5265  ? new HighlightRules().getRules()
5266  : HighlightRules;
5267  if (states) {
5268  for (var i = 0; i < states.length; i++)
5269  states[i] = prefix + states[i];
5270  } else {
5271  states = [];
5272  for (var key in embedRules)
5273  states.push(prefix + key);
5274  }
5275 
5276  this.addRules(embedRules, prefix);
5277 
5278  if (escapeRules) {
5279  var addRules = Array.prototype[append ? "push" : "unshift"];
5280  for (var i = 0; i < states.length; i++)
5281  addRules.apply(this.$rules[states[i]], lang.deepCopy(escapeRules));
5282  }
5283 
5284  if (!this.$embeds)
5285  this.$embeds = [];
5286  this.$embeds.push(prefix);
5287  };
5288 
5289  this.getEmbeds = function() {
5290  return this.$embeds;
5291  };
5292 
5293  var pushState = function(currentState, stack) {
5294  if (currentState != "start" || stack.length)
5295  stack.unshift(this.nextState, currentState);
5296  return this.nextState;
5297  };
5298  var popState = function(currentState, stack) {
5299  stack.shift();
5300  return stack.shift() || "start";
5301  };
5302 
5303  this.normalizeRules = function() {
5304  var id = 0;
5305  var rules = this.$rules;
5306  function processState(key) {
5307  var state = rules[key];
5308  state.processed = true;
5309  for (var i = 0; i < state.length; i++) {
5310  var rule = state[i];
5311  if (!rule.regex && rule.start) {
5312  rule.regex = rule.start;
5313  if (!rule.next)
5314  rule.next = [];
5315  rule.next.push({
5316  defaultToken: rule.token
5317  }, {
5318  token: rule.token + ".end",
5319  regex: rule.end || rule.start,
5320  next: "pop"
5321  });
5322  rule.token = rule.token + ".start";
5323  rule.push = true;
5324  }
5325  var next = rule.next || rule.push;
5326  if (next && Array.isArray(next)) {
5327  var stateName = rule.stateName;
5328  if (!stateName) {
5329  stateName = rule.token;
5330  if (typeof stateName != "string")
5331  stateName = stateName[0] || "";
5332  if (rules[stateName])
5333  stateName += id++;
5334  }
5335  rules[stateName] = next;
5336  rule.next = stateName;
5337  processState(stateName);
5338  } else if (next == "pop") {
5339  rule.next = popState;
5340  }
5341 
5342  if (rule.push) {
5343  rule.nextState = rule.next || rule.push;
5344  rule.next = pushState;
5345  delete rule.push;
5346  }
5347 
5348  if (rule.rules) {
5349  for (var r in rule.rules) {
5350  if (rules[r]) {
5351  if (rules[r].push)
5352  rules[r].push.apply(rules[r], rule.rules[r]);
5353  } else {
5354  rules[r] = rule.rules[r];
5355  }
5356  }
5357  }
5358  if (rule.include || typeof rule == "string") {
5359  var includeName = rule.include || rule;
5360  var toInsert = rules[includeName];
5361  } else if (Array.isArray(rule))
5362  toInsert = rule;
5363 
5364  if (toInsert) {
5365  var args = [i, 1].concat(toInsert);
5366  if (rule.noEscape)
5367  args = args.filter(function(x) {return !x.next;});
5368  state.splice.apply(state, args);
5369  i--;
5370  toInsert = null;
5371  }
5372 
5373  if (rule.keywordMap) {
