5374  rule.token = this.createKeywordMapper(
5375  rule.keywordMap, rule.defaultToken || "text", rule.caseInsensitive
5376  );
5377  delete rule.defaultToken;
5378  }
5379  }
5380  }
5381  Object.keys(rules).forEach(processState, this);
5382  };
5383 
5384  this.createKeywordMapper = function(map, defaultToken, ignoreCase, splitChar) {
5385  var keywords = Object.create(null);
5386  Object.keys(map).forEach(function(className) {
5387  var a = map[className];
5388  if (ignoreCase)
5389  a = a.toLowerCase();
5390  var list = a.split(splitChar || "|");
5391  for (var i = list.length; i--; )
5392  keywords[list[i]] = className;
5393  });
5394  if (Object.getPrototypeOf(keywords)) {
5395  keywords.__proto__ = null;
5396  }
5397  this.$keywordList = Object.keys(keywords);
5398  map = null;
5399  return ignoreCase
5400  ? function(value) {return keywords[value.toLowerCase()] || defaultToken }
5401  : function(value) {return keywords[value] || defaultToken };
5402  };
5403 
5404  this.getKeywords = function() {
5405  return this.$keywords;
5406  };
5407 
5408 }).call(TextHighlightRules.prototype);
5409 
5410 exports.TextHighlightRules = TextHighlightRules;
5411 });
5412 
5413 define("ace/mode/behaviour",["require","exports","module"], function(require, exports, module) {
5414 "use strict";
5415 
5416 var Behaviour = function() {
5417  this.$behaviours = {};
5418 };
5419 
5420 (function () {
5421 
5422  this.add = function (name, action, callback) {
5423  switch (undefined) {
5424  case this.$behaviours:
5425  this.$behaviours = {};
5426  case this.$behaviours[name]:
5427  this.$behaviours[name] = {};
5428  }
5429  this.$behaviours[name][action] = callback;
5430  }
5431 
5432  this.addBehaviours = function (behaviours) {
5433  for (var key in behaviours) {
5434  for (var action in behaviours[key]) {
5435  this.add(key, action, behaviours[key][action]);
5436  }
5437  }
5438  }
5439 
5440  this.remove = function (name) {
5441  if (this.$behaviours && this.$behaviours[name]) {
5442  delete this.$behaviours[name];
5443  }
5444  }
5445 
5446  this.inherit = function (mode, filter) {
5447  if (typeof mode === "function") {
5448  var behaviours = new mode().getBehaviours(filter);
5449  } else {
5450  var behaviours = mode.getBehaviours(filter);
5451  }
5452  this.addBehaviours(behaviours);
5453  }
5454 
5455  this.getBehaviours = function (filter) {
5456  if (!filter) {
5457  return this.$behaviours;
5458  } else {
5459  var ret = {}
5460  for (var i = 0; i < filter.length; i++) {
5461  if (this.$behaviours[filter[i]]) {
5462  ret[filter[i]] = this.$behaviours[filter[i]];
5463  }
5464  }
5465  return ret;
5466  }
5467  }
5468 
5469 }).call(Behaviour.prototype);
5470 
5471 exports.Behaviour = Behaviour;
5472 });
5473 
5474 define("ace/unicode",["require","exports","module"], function(require, exports, module) {
5475 "use strict";
5476 exports.packages = {};
5477 
5478 addUnicodePackage({
5479  L: "0041-005A0061-007A00AA00B500BA00C0-00D600D8-00F600F8-02C102C6-02D102E0-02E402EC02EE0370-037403760377037A-037D03860388-038A038C038E-03A103A3-03F503F7-0481048A-05250531-055605590561-058705D0-05EA05F0-05F20621-064A066E066F0671-06D306D506E506E606EE06EF06FA-06FC06FF07100712-072F074D-07A507B107CA-07EA07F407F507FA0800-0815081A082408280904-0939093D09500958-0961097109720979-097F0985-098C098F09900993-09A809AA-09B009B209B6-09B909BD09CE09DC09DD09DF-09E109F009F10A05-0A0A0A0F0A100A13-0A280A2A-0A300A320A330A350A360A380A390A59-0A5C0A5E0A72-0A740A85-0A8D0A8F-0A910A93-0AA80AAA-0AB00AB20AB30AB5-0AB90ABD0AD00AE00AE10B05-0B0C0B0F0B100B13-0B280B2A-0B300B320B330B35-0B390B3D0B5C0B5D0B5F-0B610B710B830B85-0B8A0B8E-0B900B92-0B950B990B9A0B9C0B9E0B9F0BA30BA40BA8-0BAA0BAE-0BB90BD00C05-0C0C0C0E-0C100C12-0C280C2A-0C330C35-0C390C3D0C580C590C600C610C85-0C8C0C8E-0C900C92-0CA80CAA-0CB30CB5-0CB90CBD0CDE0CE00CE10D05-0D0C0D0E-0D100D12-0D280D2A-0D390D3D0D600D610D7A-0D7F0D85-0D960D9A-0DB10DB3-0DBB0DBD0DC0-0DC60E01-0E300E320E330E40-0E460E810E820E840E870E880E8A0E8D0E94-0E970E99-0E9F0EA1-0EA30EA50EA70EAA0EAB0EAD-0EB00EB20EB30EBD0EC0-0EC40EC60EDC0EDD0F000F40-0F470F49-0F6C0F88-0F8B1000-102A103F1050-1055105A-105D106110651066106E-10701075-1081108E10A0-10C510D0-10FA10FC1100-1248124A-124D1250-12561258125A-125D1260-1288128A-128D1290-12B012B2-12B512B8-12BE12C012C2-12C512C8-12D612D8-13101312-13151318-135A1380-138F13A0-13F41401-166C166F-167F1681-169A16A0-16EA1700-170C170E-17111720-17311740-17511760-176C176E-17701780-17B317D717DC1820-18771880-18A818AA18B0-18F51900-191C1950-196D1970-19741980-19AB19C1-19C71A00-1A161A20-1A541AA71B05-1B331B45-1B4B1B83-1BA01BAE1BAF1C00-1C231C4D-1C4F1C5A-1C7D1CE9-1CEC1CEE-1CF11D00-1DBF1E00-1F151F18-1F1D1F20-1F451F48-1F4D1F50-1F571F591F5B1F5D1F5F-1F7D1F80-1FB41FB6-1FBC1FBE1FC2-1FC41FC6-1FCC1FD0-1FD31FD6-1FDB1FE0-1FEC1FF2-1FF41FF6-1FFC2071207F2090-209421022107210A-211321152119-211D212421262128212A-212D212F-2139213C-213F2145-2149214E218321842C00-2C2E2C30-2C5E2C60-2CE42CEB-2CEE2D00-2D252D30-2D65 "03780379037F-0383038B038D03A20526-05300557055805600588058B-059005C8-05CF05EB-05EF05F5-05FF06040605061C061D0620065F070E074B074C07B2-07BF07FB-07FF082E082F083F-08FF093A093B094F095609570973-097809800984098D098E0991099209A909B109B3-09B509BA09BB09C509C609C909CA09CF-09D609D8-09DB09DE09E409E509FC-0A000A040A0B-0A0E0A110A120A290A310A340A370A3A0A3B0A3D0A43-0A460A490A4A0A4E-0A500A52-0A580A5D0A5F-0A650A76-0A800A840A8E0A920AA90AB10AB40ABA0ABB0AC60ACA0ACE0ACF0AD1-0ADF0AE40AE50AF00AF2-0B000B040B0D0B0E0B110B120B290B310B340B3A0B3B0B450B460B490B4A0B4E-0B550B58-0B5B0B5E0B640B650B72-0B810B840B8B-0B8D0B910B96-0B980B9B0B9D0BA0-0BA20BA5-0BA70BAB-0BAD0BBA-0BBD0BC3-0BC50BC90BCE0BCF0BD1-0BD60BD8-0BE50BFB-0C000C040C0D0C110C290C340C3A-0C3C0C450C490C4E-0C540C570C5A-0C5F0C640C650C70-0C770C800C810C840C8D0C910CA90CB40CBA0CBB0CC50CC90CCE-0CD40CD7-0CDD0CDF0CE40CE50CF00CF3-0D010D040D0D0D110D290D3A-0D3C0D450D490D4E-0D560D58-0D5F0D640D650D76-0D780D800D810D840D97-0D990DB20DBC0DBE0DBF0DC7-0DC90DCB-0DCE0DD50DD70DE0-0DF10DF5-0E000E3B-0E3E0E5C-0E800E830E850E860E890E8B0E8C0E8E-0E930E980EA00EA40EA60EA80EA90EAC0EBA0EBE0EBF0EC50EC70ECE0ECF0EDA0EDB0EDE-0EFF0F480F6D-0F700F8C-0F8F0F980FBD0FCD0FD9-0FFF10C6-10CF10FD-10FF1249124E124F12571259125E125F1289128E128F12B112B612B712BF12C112C612C712D7131113161317135B-135E137D-137F139A-139F13F5-13FF169D-169F16F1-16FF170D1715-171F1737-173F1754-175F176D17711774-177F17DE17DF17EA-17EF17FA-17FF180F181A-181F1878-187F18AB-18AF18F6-18FF191D-191F192C-192F193C-193F1941-1943196E196F1975-197F19AC-19AF19CA-19CF19DB-19DD1A1C1A1D1A5F1A7D1A7E1A8A-1A8F1A9A-1A9F1AAE-1AFF1B4C-1B4F1B7D-1B7F1BAB-1BAD1BBA-1BFF1C38-1C3A1C4A-1C4C1C80-1CCF1CF3-1CFF1DE7-1DFC1F161F171F1E1F1F1F461F471F4E1F4F1F581F5A1F5C1F5E1F7E1F7F1FB51FC51FD41FD51FDC1FF01FF11FF51FFF2065-206920722073208F2095-209F20B9-20CF20F1-20FF218A-218F23E9-23FF2427-243F244B-245F26CE26E226E4-26E727002705270A270B2728274C274E2753-2755275F27602795-279727B027BF27CB27CD-27CF2B4D-2B4F2B5A-2BFF2C2F2C5F2CF2-2CF82D26-2D2F2D66-2D6E2D70-2D7F2D97-2D9F2DA72DAF2DB72DBF2DC72DCF2DD72DDF2E32-2E7F2E9A2EF4-2EFF2FD6-2FEF2FFC-2FFF3040309730983100-3104312E-3130318F31B8-31BF31E4-31EF321F32FF4DB6-4DBF9FCC-9FFFA48D-A48FA4C7-A4CFA62C-A63FA660A661A674-A67BA698-A69FA6F8-A6FFA78D-A7FAA82C-A82FA83A-A83FA878-A87FA8C5-A8CDA8DA-A8DFA8FC-A8FFA954-A95EA97D-A97FA9CEA9DA-A9DDA9E0-A9FFAA37-AA3FAA4EAA4FAA5AAA5BAA7C-AA7FAAC3-AADAAAE0-ABBFABEEABEFABFA-ABFFD7A4-D7AFD7C7-D7CAD7FC-D7FFFA2EFA2FFA6EFA6FFADA-FAFFFB07-FB12FB18-FB1CFB37FB3DFB3FFB42FB45FBB2-FBD2FD40-FD4FFD90FD91FDC8-FDEFFDFEFDFFFE1A-FE1FFE27-FE2FFE53FE67FE6C-FE6FFE75FEFDFEFEFF00FFBF-FFC1FFC8FFC9FFD0FFD1FFD8FFD9FFDD-FFDFFFE7FFEF-FFF8FFFEFFFF"
5516 });
5517 
5518 function addUnicodePackage (pack) {
5519  var codePoint = /\w{4}/g;
5520  for (var name in pack)
5521  exports.packages[name] = pack[name].replace(codePoint, "\\u$&");
5522 };
5523 
5524 });
5525 
5526 define("ace/token_iterator",["require","exports","module"], function(require, exports, module) {
5527 "use strict";
5528 var TokenIterator = function(session, initialRow, initialColumn) {
5529  this.$session = session;
5530  this.$row = initialRow;
5531  this.$rowTokens = session.getTokens(initialRow);
5532 
5533  var token = session.getTokenAt(initialRow, initialColumn);
5534  this.$tokenIndex = token ? token.index : -1;
5535 };
5536 
5537 (function() {
5538  this.stepBackward = function() {
5539  this.$tokenIndex -= 1;
5540 
5541  while (this.$tokenIndex < 0) {
5542  this.$row -= 1;
5543  if (this.$row < 0) {
5544  this.$row = 0;
5545  return null;
5546  }
5547 
5548  this.$rowTokens = this.$session.getTokens(this.$row);
5549  this.$tokenIndex = this.$rowTokens.length - 1;
5550  }
5551 
5552  return this.$rowTokens[this.$tokenIndex];
5553  };
5554  this.stepForward = function() {
5555  this.$tokenIndex += 1;
5556  var rowCount;
5557  while (this.$tokenIndex >= this.$rowTokens.length) {
5558  this.$row += 1;
5559  if (!rowCount)
5560  rowCount = this.$session.getLength();
5561  if (this.$row >= rowCount) {
5562  this.$row = rowCount - 1;
5563  return null;
5564  }
5565 
5566  this.$rowTokens = this.$session.getTokens(this.$row);
5567  this.$tokenIndex = 0;
5568  }
5569 
5570  return this.$rowTokens[this.$tokenIndex];
5571  };
5572  this.getCurrentToken = function () {
5573  return this.$rowTokens[this.$tokenIndex];
5574  };
5575  this.getCurrentTokenRow = function () {
5576  return this.$row;
5577  };
5578  this.getCurrentTokenColumn = function() {
5579  var rowTokens = this.$rowTokens;
5580  var tokenIndex = this.$tokenIndex;
5581  var column = rowTokens[tokenIndex].start;
5582  if (column !== undefined)
5583  return column;
5584 
5585  column = 0;
5586  while (tokenIndex > 0) {
5587  tokenIndex -= 1;
5588  column += rowTokens[tokenIndex].value.length;
5589  }
5590 
5591  return column;
5592  };
5593 
5594 }).call(TokenIterator.prototype);
5595 
5596 exports.TokenIterator = TokenIterator;
5597 });
5598 
5599 define("ace/mode/text",["require","exports","module","ace/tokenizer","ace/mode/text_highlight_rules","ace/mode/behaviour","ace/unicode","ace/lib/lang","ace/token_iterator","ace/range"], function(require, exports, module) {
5600 "use strict";
5601 
5602 var Tokenizer = require("../tokenizer").Tokenizer;
5603 var TextHighlightRules = require("./text_highlight_rules").TextHighlightRules;
5604 var Behaviour = require("./behaviour").Behaviour;
5605 var unicode = require("../unicode");
5606 var lang = require("../lib/lang");
5607 var TokenIterator = require("../token_iterator").TokenIterator;
5608 var Range = require("../range").Range;
5609 
5610 var Mode = function() {
5611  this.HighlightRules = TextHighlightRules;
5612  this.$behaviour = new Behaviour();
5613 };
5614 
5615 (function() {
5616 
5617  this.tokenRe = new RegExp("^["
5618  + unicode.packages.L
5619  + unicode.packages.Mn + unicode.packages.Mc
5620  + unicode.packages.Nd
5621  + unicode.packages.Pc + "\\$_]+", "g"
5622  );
5623 
5624  this.nonTokenRe = new RegExp("^(?:[^"
5625  + unicode.packages.L
5626  + unicode.packages.Mn + unicode.packages.Mc
5627  + unicode.packages.Nd
5628  + unicode.packages.Pc + "\\$_]|\\s])+", "g"
5629  );
5630 
5631  this.getTokenizer = function() {
5632  if (!this.$tokenizer) {
5633  this.$highlightRules = this.$highlightRules || new this.HighlightRules();
5634  this.$tokenizer = new Tokenizer(this.$highlightRules.getRules());
5635  }
5636  return this.$tokenizer;
5637  };
5638 
5639  this.lineCommentStart = "";
5640  this.blockComment = "";
5641 
5642  this.toggleCommentLines = function(state, session, startRow, endRow) {
5643  var doc = session.doc;
5644 
5645  var ignoreBlankLines = true;
5646  var shouldRemove = true;
5647  var minIndent = Infinity;
5648  var tabSize = session.getTabSize();
5649  var insertAtTabStop = false;
5650 
5651  if (!this.lineCommentStart) {
5652  if (!this.blockComment)
5653  return false;
5654  var lineCommentStart = this.blockComment.start;
5655  var lineCommentEnd = this.blockComment.end;
5656  var regexpStart = new RegExp("^(\\s*)(?:" + lang.escapeRegExp(lineCommentStart) + ")");
5657  var regexpEnd = new RegExp("(?:" + lang.escapeRegExp(lineCommentEnd) + ")\\s*$");
5658 
5659  var comment = function(line, i) {
5660  if (testRemove(line, i))
5661  return;
5662  if (!ignoreBlankLines || /\S/.test(line)) {
5663  doc.insertInLine({row: i, column: line.length}, lineCommentEnd);
5664  doc.insertInLine({row: i, column: minIndent}, lineCommentStart);
5665  }
5666  };
5667 
5668  var uncomment = function(line, i) {
5669  var m;
5670  if (m = line.match(regexpEnd))
5671  doc.removeInLine(i, line.length - m[0].length, line.length);
5672  if (m = line.match(regexpStart))
5673  doc.removeInLine(i, m[1].length, m[0].length);
5674  };
5675 
5676  var testRemove = function(line, row) {
5677  if (regexpStart.test(line))
5678  return true;
5679  var tokens = session.getTokens(row);
5680  for (var i = 0; i < tokens.length; i++) {
5681  if (tokens[i].type === 'comment')
5682  return true;
5683  }
5684  };
5685  } else {
5686  if (Array.isArray(this.lineCommentStart)) {
5687  var regexpStart = this.lineCommentStart.map(lang.escapeRegExp).join("|");
5688  var lineCommentStart = this.lineCommentStart[0];
5689  } else {
5690  var regexpStart = lang.escapeRegExp(this.lineCommentStart);
5691  var lineCommentStart = this.lineCommentStart;
5692  }
5693  regexpStart = new RegExp("^(\\s*)(?:" + regexpStart + ") ?");
5694 
5695  insertAtTabStop = session.getUseSoftTabs();
5696 
5697  var uncomment = function(line, i) {
5698  var m = line.match(regexpStart);
5699  if (!m) return;
5700  var start = m[1].length, end = m[0].length;
5701  if (!shouldInsertSpace(line, start, end) && m[0][end - 1] == " ")
5702  end--;
5703  doc.removeInLine(i, start, end);
5704  };
5705  var commentWithSpace = lineCommentStart + " ";
5706  var comment = function(line, i) {
5707  if (!ignoreBlankLines || /\S/.test(line)) {
5708  if (shouldInsertSpace(line, minIndent, minIndent))
5709  doc.insertInLine({row: i, column: minIndent}, commentWithSpace);
5710  else
5711  doc.insertInLine({row: i, column: minIndent}, lineCommentStart);
5712  }
5713  };
5714  var testRemove = function(line, i) {
5715  return regexpStart.test(line);
5716  };
5717 
5718  var shouldInsertSpace = function(line, before, after) {
5719  var spaces = 0;
5720  while (before-- && line.charAt(before) == " ")
5721  spaces++;
5722  if (spaces % tabSize != 0)
5723  return false;
5724  var spaces = 0;
5725  while (line.charAt(after++) == " ")
5726  spaces++;
5727  if (tabSize > 2)
5728  return spaces % tabSize != tabSize - 1;
5729  else
5730  return spaces % tabSize == 0;
5731  return true;
5732  };
5733  }
5734 
5735  function iter(fun) {
5736  for (var i = startRow; i <= endRow; i++)
5737  fun(doc.getLine(i), i);
5738  }
5739 
5740 
5741  var minEmptyLength = Infinity;
5742  iter(function(line, i) {
5743  var indent = line.search(/\S/);
5744  if (indent !== -1) {
5745  if (indent < minIndent)
5746  minIndent = indent;
5747  if (shouldRemove && !testRemove(line, i))
5748  shouldRemove = false;
5749  } else if (minEmptyLength > line.length) {
5750  minEmptyLength = line.length;
5751  }
5752  });
5753 
5754  if (minIndent == Infinity) {
5755  minIndent = minEmptyLength;
5756  ignoreBlankLines = false;
5757  shouldRemove = false;
5758  }
5759 
5760  if (insertAtTabStop && minIndent % tabSize != 0)
5761  minIndent = Math.floor(minIndent / tabSize) * tabSize;
5762 
5763  iter(shouldRemove ? uncomment : comment);
5764  };
5765 
5766  this.toggleBlockComment = function(state, session, range, cursor) {
5767  var comment = this.blockComment;
5768  if (!comment)
5769  return;
5770  if (!comment.start && comment[0])
5771  comment = comment[0];
5772 
5773  var iterator = new TokenIterator(session, cursor.row, cursor.column);
5774  var token = iterator.getCurrentToken();
5775 
5776  var sel = session.selection;
5777  var initialRange = session.selection.toOrientedRange();
5778  var startRow, colDiff;
5779 
5780  if (token && /comment/.test(token.type)) {
5781  var startRange, endRange;
5782  while (token && /comment/.test(token.type)) {
5783  var i = token.value.indexOf(comment.start);
5784  if (i != -1) {
5785  var row = iterator.getCurrentTokenRow();
5786  var column = iterator.getCurrentTokenColumn() + i;
5787  startRange = new Range(row, column, row, column + comment.start.length);
5788  break;
5789  }
5790  token = iterator.stepBackward();
5791  }
5792 
5793  var iterator = new TokenIterator(session, cursor.row, cursor.column);
5794  var token = iterator.getCurrentToken();
5795  while (token && /comment/.test(token.type)) {
5796  var i = token.value.indexOf(comment.end);
5797  if (i != -1) {
5798  var row = iterator.getCurrentTokenRow();
5799  var column = iterator.getCurrentTokenColumn() + i;
5800  endRange = new Range(row, column, row, column + comment.end.length);
5801  break;
5802  }
5803  token = iterator.stepForward();
5804  }
5805  if (endRange)
5806  session.remove(endRange);
5807  if (startRange) {
5808  session.remove(startRange);
5809  startRow = startRange.start.row;
5810  colDiff = -comment.start.length;
5811  }
5812  } else {
5813  colDiff = comment.start.length;
5814  startRow = range.start.row;
5815  session.insert(range.end, comment.end);
5816  session.insert(range.start, comment.start);
5817  }
5818  if (initialRange.start.row == startRow)
5819  initialRange.start.column += colDiff;
5820  if (initialRange.end.row == startRow)
5821  initialRange.end.column += colDiff;
5822  session.selection.fromOrientedRange(initialRange);
5823  };
5824 
5825  this.getNextLineIndent = function(state, line, tab) {
5826  return this.$getIndent(line);
5827  };
5828 
5829  this.checkOutdent = function(state, line, input) {
5830  return false;
5831  };
5832 
5833  this.autoOutdent = function(state, doc, row) {
5834  };
5835 
5836  this.$getIndent = function(line) {
5837  return line.match(/^\s*/)[0];
5838  };
5839 
5840  this.createWorker = function(session) {
5841  return null;
5842  };
5843 
5844  this.createModeDelegates = function (mapping) {
5845  this.$embeds = [];
5846  this.$modes = {};
5847  for (var i in mapping) {
5848  if (mapping[i]) {
5849  this.$embeds.push(i);
5850  this.$modes[i] = new mapping[i]();
5851  }
5852  }
5853 
5854  var delegations = ['toggleBlockComment', 'toggleCommentLines', 'getNextLineIndent',
5855  'checkOutdent', 'autoOutdent', 'transformAction', 'getCompletions'];
5856 
5857  for (var i = 0; i < delegations.length; i++) {
5858  (function(scope) {
5859  var functionName = delegations[i];
5860  var defaultHandler = scope[functionName];
5861  scope[delegations[i]] = function() {
5862  return this.$delegator(functionName, arguments, defaultHandler);
5863  };
5864  } (this));
5865  }
5866  };
5867 
5868  this.$delegator = function(method, args, defaultHandler) {
5869  var state = args[0];
5870  if (typeof state != "string")
5871  state = state[0];
5872  for (var i = 0; i < this.$embeds.length; i++) {
5873  if (!this.$modes[this.$embeds[i]]) continue;
5874 
5875  var split = state.split(this.$embeds[i]);
5876  if (!split[0] && split[1]) {
5877  args[0] = split[1];
5878  var mode = this.$modes[this.$embeds[i]];
5879  return mode[method].apply(mode, args);
5880  }
5881  }
5882  var ret = defaultHandler.apply(this, args);
5883  return defaultHandler ? ret : undefined;
5884  };
5885 
5886  this.transformAction = function(state, action, editor, session, param) {
5887  if (this.$behaviour) {
5888  var behaviours = this.$behaviour.getBehaviours();
5889  for (var key in behaviours) {
5890  if (behaviours[key][action]) {
5891  var ret = behaviours[key][action].apply(this, arguments);
5892  if (ret) {
5893  return ret;
5894  }
5895  }
5896  }
5897  }
5898  };
5899 
5900  this.getKeywords = function(append) {
5901  if (!this.completionKeywords) {
5902  var rules = this.$tokenizer.rules;
5903  var completionKeywords = [];
5904  for (var rule in rules) {
5905  var ruleItr = rules[rule];
5906  for (var r = 0, l = ruleItr.length; r < l; r++) {
5907  if (typeof ruleItr[r].token === "string") {
5908  if (/keyword|support|storage/.test(ruleItr[r].token))
5909  completionKeywords.push(ruleItr[r].regex);
5910  }
5911  else if (typeof ruleItr[r].token === "object") {
5912  for (var a = 0, aLength = ruleItr[r].token.length; a < aLength; a++) {
5913  if (/keyword|support|storage/.test(ruleItr[r].token[a])) {
5914  var rule = ruleItr[r].regex.match(/\(.+?\)/g)[a];
5915  completionKeywords.push(rule.substr(1, rule.length - 2));
5916  }
5917  }
5918  }
5919  }
5920  }
5921  this.completionKeywords = completionKeywords;
5922  }
5923  if (!append)
5924  return this.$keywordList;
5925  return completionKeywords.concat(this.$keywordList || []);
5926  };
5927 
5928  this.$createKeywordList = function() {
5929  if (!this.$highlightRules)
5930  this.getTokenizer();
5931  return this.$keywordList = this.$highlightRules.$keywordList || [];
5932  };
5933 
5934  this.getCompletions = function(state, session, pos, prefix) {
5935  var keywords = this.$keywordList || this.$createKeywordList();
5936  return keywords.map(function(word) {
5937  return {
5938  name: word,
5939  value: word,
5940  score: 0,
5941  meta: "keyword"
5942  };
5943  });
5944  };
5945 
5946  this.$id = "ace/mode/text";
5947 }).call(Mode.prototype);
5948 
5949 exports.Mode = Mode;
5950 });
5951 
5952 define("ace/anchor",["require","exports","module","ace/lib/oop","ace/lib/event_emitter"], function(require, exports, module) {
5953 "use strict";
5954 
5955 var oop = require("./lib/oop");
5956 var EventEmitter = require("./lib/event_emitter").EventEmitter;
5957 
5958 var Anchor = exports.Anchor = function(doc, row, column) {
5959  this.$onChange = this.onChange.bind(this);
5960  this.attach(doc);
5961 
5962  if (typeof column == "undefined")
5963  this.setPosition(row.row, row.column);
5964  else
5965  this.setPosition(row, column);
5966 };
5967 
5968 (function() {
5969 
5970  oop.implement(this, EventEmitter);
5971  this.getPosition = function() {
5972  return this.$clipPositionToDocument(this.row, this.column);
5973  };
5974  this.getDocument = function() {
5975  return this.document;
5976  };
5977  this.$insertRight = false;
5978  this.onChange = function(e) {
5979  var delta = e.data;
5980  var range = delta.range;
5981 
5982  if (range.start.row == range.end.row && range.start.row != this.row)
5983  return;
5984 
5985  if (range.start.row > this.row)
5986  return;
5987 
5988  if (range.start.row == this.row && range.start.column > this.column)
5989  return;
5990 
5991  var row = this.row;
5992  var column = this.column;
5993  var start = range.start;
5994  var end = range.end;
5995 
5996  if (delta.action === "insertText") {
5997  if (start.row === row && start.column <= column) {
5998  if (start.column === column && this.$insertRight) {
5999  } else if (start.row === end.row) {
6000  column += end.column - start.column;
6001  } else {
6002  column -= start.column;
6003  row += end.row - start.row;
6004  }
6005  } else if (start.row !== end.row && start.row < row) {
6006  row += end.row - start.row;
6007  }
6008  } else if (delta.action === "insertLines") {
6009  if (start.row === row && column === 0 && this.$insertRight) {
6010  }
6011  else if (start.row <= row) {
6012  row += end.row - start.row;
6013  }
6014  } else if (delta.action === "removeText") {
6015  if (start.row === row && start.column < column) {
6016  if (end.column >= column)
6017  column = start.column;
6018  else
6019  column = Math.max(0, column - (end.column - start.column));
6020 
6021  } else if (start.row !== end.row && start.row < row) {
6022  if (end.row === row)
6023  column = Math.max(0, column - end.column) + start.column;
6024  row -= (end.row - start.row);
6025  } else if (end.row === row) {
6026  row -= end.row - start.row;
6027  column = Math.max(0, column - end.column) + start.column;
6028  }
6029  } else if (delta.action == "removeLines") {
6030  if (start.row <= row) {
6031  if (end.row <= row)
6032  row -= end.row - start.row;
6033  else {
6034  row = start.row;
6035  column = 0;
6036  }
6037  }
6038  }
6039 
6040  this.setPosition(row, column, true);
6041  };
6042  this.setPosition = function(row, column, noClip) {
6043  var pos;
6044  if (noClip) {
6045  pos = {
6046  row: row,
6047  column: column
6048  };
6049  } else {
6050  pos = this.$clipPositionToDocument(row, column);
6051  }
6052 
6053  if (this.row == pos.row && this.column == pos.column)
6054  return;
6055 
6056  var old = {
6057  row: this.row,
6058  column: this.column
6059  };
6060 
6061  this.row = pos.row;
6062  this.column = pos.column;
6063  this._signal("change", {
6064  old: old,
6065  value: pos
6066  });
6067  };
6068  this.detach = function() {
6069  this.document.removeEventListener("change", this.$onChange);
6070  };
6071  this.attach = function(doc) {
6072  this.document = doc || this.document;
6073  this.document.on("change", this.$onChange);
6074  };
6075  this.$clipPositionToDocument = function(row, column) {
6076  var pos = {};
6077 
6078  if (row >= this.document.getLength()) {
6079  pos.row = Math.max(0, this.document.getLength() - 1);
6080  pos.column = this.document.getLine(pos.row).length;
6081  }
6082  else if (row < 0) {
6083  pos.row = 0;
6084  pos.column = 0;
6085  }
6086  else {
6087  pos.row = row;
6088  pos.column = Math.min(this.document.getLine(pos.row).length, Math.max(0, column));
6089  }
6090 
6091  if (column < 0)
6092  pos.column = 0;
6093 
6094  return pos;
6095  };
6096 
6097 }).call(Anchor.prototype);
6098 
6099 });
6100 
6101 define("ace/document",["require","exports","module","ace/lib/oop","ace/lib/event_emitter","ace/range","ace/anchor"], function(require, exports, module) {
6102 "use strict";
6103 
6104 var oop = require("./lib/oop");
6105 var EventEmitter = require("./lib/event_emitter").EventEmitter;
6106 var Range = require("./range").Range;
6107 var Anchor = require("./anchor").Anchor;
6108 
6109 var Document = function(text) {
6110  this.$lines = [];
6111  if (text.length === 0) {
6112  this.$lines = [""];
6113  } else if (Array.isArray(text)) {
6114  this._insertLines(0, text);
6115  } else {
6116  this.insert({row: 0, column:0}, text);
6117  }
6118 };
6119 
6120 (function() {
6121 
6122  oop.implement(this, EventEmitter);
6123  this.setValue = function(text) {
6124  var len = this.getLength();
6125  this.remove(new Range(0, 0, len, this.getLine(len-1).length));
6126  this.insert({row: 0, column:0}, text);
6127  };
6128  this.getValue = function() {
6129  return this.getAllLines().join(this.getNewLineCharacter());
6130  };
6131  this.createAnchor = function(row, column) {
6132  return new Anchor(this, row, column);
6133  };
6134  if ("aaa".split(/a/).length === 0)
6135  this.$split = function(text) {
6136  return text.replace(/\r\n|\r/g, "\n").split("\n");
6137  };
6138  else
6139  this.$split = function(text) {
6140  return text.split(/\r\n|\r|\n/);
6141  };
6142 
6143 
6144  this.$detectNewLine = function(text) {
6145  var match = text.match(/^.*?(\r\n|\r|\n)/m);
6146  this.$autoNewLine = match ? match[1] : "\n";
6147  this._signal("changeNewLineMode");
6148  };
6149  this.getNewLineCharacter = function() {
6150  switch (this.$newLineMode) {
6151  case "windows":
6152  return "\r\n";
6153  case "unix":
6154  return "\n";
6155  default:
6156  return this.$autoNewLine || "\n";
6157  }
6158  };
6159 
6160  this.$autoNewLine = "";
6161  this.$newLineMode = "auto";
6162  this.setNewLineMode = function(newLineMode) {
6163  if (this.$newLineMode === newLineMode)
6164  return;
6165 
6166  this.$newLineMode = newLineMode;
6167  this._signal("changeNewLineMode");
6168  };
6169  this.getNewLineMode = function() {
6170  return this.$newLineMode;
6171  };
6172  this.isNewLine = function(text) {
6173  return (text == "\r\n" || text == "\r" || text == "\n");
6174  };
6175  this.getLine = function(row) {
6176  return this.$lines[row] || "";
6177  };
6178  this.getLines = function(firstRow, lastRow) {
6179  return this.$lines.slice(firstRow, lastRow + 1);
6180  };
6181  this.getAllLines = function() {
6182  return this.getLines(0, this.getLength());
6183  };
6184  this.getLength = function() {
6185  return this.$lines.length;
6186  };
6187  this.getTextRange = function(range) {
6188  if (range.start.row == range.end.row) {
6189  return this.getLine(range.start.row)
6190  .substring(range.start.column, range.end.column);
6191  }
6192  var lines = this.getLines(range.start.row, range.end.row);
6193  lines[0] = (lines[0] || "").substring(range.start.column);
6194  var l = lines.length - 1;
6195  if (range.end.row - range.start.row == l)
6196  lines[l] = lines[l].substring(0, range.end.column);
6197  return lines.join(this.getNewLineCharacter());
6198  };
6199 
6200  this.$clipPosition = function(position) {
6201  var length = this.getLength();
6202  if (position.row >= length) {
6203  position.row = Math.max(0, length - 1);
6204  position.column = this.getLine(length-1).length;
6205  } else if (position.row < 0)
6206  position.row = 0;
6207  return position;
6208  };
6209  this.insert = function(position, text) {
6210  if (!text || text.length === 0)
6211  return position;
6212 
6213  position = this.$clipPosition(position);
6214  if (this.getLength() <= 1)
6215  this.$detectNewLine(text);
6216 
6217  var lines = this.$split(text);
6218  var firstLine = lines.splice(0, 1)[0];
6219  var lastLine = lines.length == 0 ? null : lines.splice(lines.length - 1, 1)[0];
6220 
6221  position = this.insertInLine(position, firstLine);
6222  if (lastLine !== null) {
6223  position = this.insertNewLine(position); // terminate first line
6224  position = this._insertLines(position.row, lines);
6225  position = this.insertInLine(position, lastLine || "");
6226  }
6227  return position;
6228  };
6229  this.insertLines = function(row, lines) {
6230  if (row >= this.getLength())
6231  return this.insert({row: row, column: 0}, "\n" + lines.join("\n"));
6232  return this._insertLines(Math.max(row, 0), lines);
6233  };
6234  this._insertLines = function(row, lines) {
6235  if (lines.length == 0)
6236  return {row: row, column: 0};
6237  while (lines.length > 0xF000) {
6238  var end = this._insertLines(row, lines.slice(0, 0xF000));
6239  lines = lines.slice(0xF000);
6240  row = end.row;
6241  }
6242 
6243  var args = [row, 0];
6244  args.push.apply(args, lines);
6245  this.$lines.splice.apply(this.$lines, args);
6246 
6247  var range = new Range(row, 0, row + lines.length, 0);
6248  var delta = {
6249  action: "insertLines",
6250  range: range,
6251  lines: lines
6252  };
6253  this._signal("change", { data: delta });
6254  return range.end;
6255  };
6256  this.insertNewLine = function(position) {
6257  position = this.$clipPosition(position);
6258  var line = this.$lines[position.row] || "";
6259 
6260  this.$lines[position.row] = line.substring(0, position.column);
6261  this.$lines.splice(position.row + 1, 0, line.substring(position.column, line.length));
6262 
6263  var end = {
6264  row : position.row + 1,
6265  column : 0
6266  };
6267 
6268  var delta = {
6269  action: "insertText",
6270  range: Range.fromPoints(position, end),
6271  text: this.getNewLineCharacter()
6272  };
6273  this._signal("change", { data: delta });
6274 
6275  return end;
6276  };
6277  this.insertInLine = function(position, text) {
6278  if (text.length == 0)
6279  return position;
6280 
6281  var line = this.$lines[position.row] || "";
6282 
6283  this.$lines[position.row] = line.substring(0, position.column) + text
6284  + line.substring(position.column);
6285 
6286  var end = {
6287  row : position.row,
6288  column : position.column + text.length
6289  };
6290 
6291  var delta = {
6292  action: "insertText",
6293  range: Range.fromPoints(position, end),
6294  text: text
6295  };
6296  this._signal("change", { data: delta });
6297 
6298  return end;
6299  };
6300  this.remove = function(range) {
6301  if (!(range instanceof Range))
6302  range = Range.fromPoints(range.start, range.end);
6303  range.start = this.$clipPosition(range.start);
6304  range.end = this.$clipPosition(range.end);
6305 
6306  if (range.isEmpty())
6307  return range.start;
6308 
6309  var firstRow = range.start.row;
6310  var lastRow = range.end.row;
6311 
6312  if (range.isMultiLine()) {
6313  var firstFullRow = range.start.column == 0 ? firstRow : firstRow + 1;
6314  var lastFullRow = lastRow - 1;
6315 
6316  if (range.end.column > 0)
6317  this.removeInLine(lastRow, 0, range.end.column);
6318 
6319  if (lastFullRow >= firstFullRow)
6320  this._removeLines(firstFullRow, lastFullRow);
6321 
6322  if (firstFullRow != firstRow) {
6323  this.removeInLine(firstRow, range.start.column, this.getLine(firstRow).length);
6324  this.removeNewLine(range.start.row);
6325  }
6326  }
6327  else {
6328  this.removeInLine(firstRow, range.start.column, range.end.column);
6329  }
6330  return range.start;
6331  };
6332  this.removeInLine = function(row, startColumn, endColumn) {
6333  if (startColumn == endColumn)
6334  return;
6335 
6336  var range = new Range(row, startColumn, row, endColumn);
6337  var line = this.getLine(row);
6338  var removed = line.substring(startColumn, endColumn);
6339  var newLine = line.substring(0, startColumn) + line.substring(endColumn, line.length);
6340  this.$lines.splice(row, 1, newLine);
6341 
6342  var delta = {
6343  action: "removeText",
6344  range: range,
6345  text: removed
6346  };
6347  this._signal("change", { data: delta });
6348  return range.start;
6349  };
6350  this.removeLines = function(firstRow, lastRow) {
6351  if (firstRow < 0 || lastRow >= this.getLength())
6352  return this.remove(new Range(firstRow, 0, lastRow + 1, 0));
6353  return this._removeLines(firstRow, lastRow);
6354  };
6355 
6356  this._removeLines = function(firstRow, lastRow) {
6357  var range = new Range(firstRow, 0, lastRow + 1, 0);
6358  var removed = this.$lines.splice(firstRow, lastRow - firstRow + 1);
6359 
6360  var delta = {
6361  action: "removeLines",
6362  range: range,
6363  nl: this.getNewLineCharacter(),
6364  lines: removed
6365  };
6366  this._signal("change", { data: delta });
6367  return removed;
6368  };
6369  this.removeNewLine = function(row) {
6370  var firstLine = this.getLine(row);
6371  var secondLine = this.getLine(row+1);
6372 
6373  var range = new Range(row, firstLine.length, row+1, 0);
6374  var line = firstLine + secondLine;
6375 
6376  this.$lines.splice(row, 2, line);
6377 
6378  var delta = {
6379  action: "removeText",
6380  range: range,
6381  text: this.getNewLineCharacter()
6382  };
6383  this._signal("change", { data: delta });
6384  };
6385  this.replace = function(range, text) {
6386  if (!(range instanceof Range))
6387  range = Range.fromPoints(range.start, range.end);
6388  if (text.length == 0 && range.isEmpty())
6389  return range.start;
6390  if (text == this.getTextRange(range))
6391  return range.end;
6392 
6393  this.remove(range);
6394  if (text) {
6395  var end = this.insert(range.start, text);
6396  }
6397  else {
6398  end = range.start;
6399  }
6400 
6401  return end;
6402  };
6403  this.applyDeltas = function(deltas) {
6404  for (var i=0; i<deltas.length; i++) {
6405  var delta = deltas[i];
6406  var range = Range.fromPoints(delta.range.start, delta.range.end);
6407 
6408  if (delta.action == "insertLines")
6409  this.insertLines(range.start.row, delta.lines);
6410  else if (delta.action == "insertText")
6411  this.insert(range.start, delta.text);
6412  else if (delta.action == "removeLines")
6413  this._removeLines(range.start.row, range.end.row - 1);
6414  else if (delta.action == "removeText")
6415  this.remove(range);
6416  }
6417  };
6418  this.revertDeltas = function(deltas) {
6419  for (var i=deltas.length-1; i>=0; i--) {
6420  var delta = deltas[i];
6421 
6422  var range = Range.fromPoints(delta.range.start, delta.range.end);
6423 
6424  if (delta.action == "insertLines")
6425  this._removeLines(range.start.row, range.end.row - 1);
6426  else if (delta.action == "insertText")
6427  this.remove(range);
6428  else if (delta.action == "removeLines")
6429  this._insertLines(range.start.row, delta.lines);
6430  else if (delta.action == "removeText")
6431  this.insert(range.start, delta.text);
6432  }
6433  };
6434  this.indexToPosition = function(index, startRow) {
6435  var lines = this.$lines || this.getAllLines();
6436  var newlineLength = this.getNewLineCharacter().length;
6437  for (var i = startRow || 0, l = lines.length; i < l; i++) {
6438  index -= lines[i].length + newlineLength;
6439  if (index < 0)
6440  return {row: i, column: index + lines[i].length + newlineLength};
6441  }
6442  return {row: l-1, column: lines[l-1].length};
6443  };
6444  this.positionToIndex = function(pos, startRow) {
6445  var lines = this.$lines || this.getAllLines();
6446  var newlineLength = this.getNewLineCharacter().length;
6447  var index = 0;
6448  var row = Math.min(pos.row, lines.length);
6449  for (var i = startRow || 0; i < row; ++i)
6450  index += lines[i].length + newlineLength;
6451 
6452  return index + pos.column;
6453  };
6454 
6455 }).call(Document.prototype);
6456 
6457 exports.Document = Document;
6458 });
6459 
6460 define("ace/background_tokenizer",["require","exports","module","ace/lib/oop","ace/lib/event_emitter"], function(require, exports, module) {
6461 "use strict";
6462 
6463 var oop = require("./lib/oop");
6464 var EventEmitter = require("./lib/event_emitter").EventEmitter;
6465 
6466 var BackgroundTokenizer = function(tokenizer, editor) {
6467  this.running = false;
6468  this.lines = [];
6469  this.states = [];
6470  this.currentLine = 0;
6471  this.tokenizer = tokenizer;
6472 
6473  var self = this;
6474 
6475  this.$worker = function() {
6476  if (!self.running) { return; }
6477 
6478  var workerStart = new Date();
6479  var currentLine = self.currentLine;
6480  var endLine = -1;
6481  var doc = self.doc;
6482 
6483  while (self.lines[currentLine])
6484  currentLine++;
6485 
6486  var startLine = currentLine;
6487 
6488  var len = doc.getLength();
6489  var processedLines = 0;
6490  self.running = false;
6491  while (currentLine < len) {
6492  self.$tokenizeRow(currentLine);
6493  endLine = currentLine;
6494  do {
6495  currentLine++;
6496  } while (self.lines[currentLine]);
6497  processedLines ++;
6498  if ((processedLines % 5 === 0) && (new Date() - workerStart) > 20) {
6499  self.running = setTimeout(self.$worker, 20);
6500  break;
6501  }
6502  }
6503  self.currentLine = currentLine;
6504 
6505  if (startLine <= endLine)
6506  self.fireUpdateEvent(startLine, endLine);
6507  };
6508 };
6509 
6510 (function(){
6511 
6512  oop.implement(this, EventEmitter);
6513  this.setTokenizer = function(tokenizer) {
6514  this.tokenizer = tokenizer;
6515  this.lines = [];
6516  this.states = [];
6517 
6518  this.start(0);
6519  };
6520  this.setDocument = function(doc) {
6521  this.doc = doc;
6522  this.lines = [];
6523  this.states = [];
6524 
6525  this.stop();
6526  };
6527  this.fireUpdateEvent = function(firstRow, lastRow) {
6528  var data = {
6529  first: firstRow,
6530  last: lastRow
6531  };
6532  this._signal("update", {data: data});
6533  };
6534  this.start = function(startRow) {
6535  this.currentLine = Math.min(startRow || 0, this.currentLine, this.doc.getLength());
6536  this.lines.splice(this.currentLine, this.lines.length);
6537  this.states.splice(this.currentLine, this.states.length);
6538 
6539  this.stop();
6540  this.running = setTimeout(this.$worker, 700);
6541  };
6542 
6543  this.scheduleStart = function() {
6544  if (!this.running)
6545  this.running = setTimeout(this.$worker, 700);
6546  }
6547 
6548  this.$updateOnChange = function(delta) {
6549  var range = delta.range;
6550  var startRow = range.start.row;
6551  var len = range.end.row - startRow;
6552 
6553  if (len === 0) {
6554  this.lines[startRow] = null;
6555  } else if (delta.action == "removeText" || delta.action == "removeLines") {
6556  this.lines.splice(startRow, len + 1, null);
6557  this.states.splice(startRow, len + 1, null);
6558  } else {
6559  var args = Array(len + 1);
6560  args.unshift(startRow, 1);
6561  this.lines.splice.apply(this.lines, args);
6562  this.states.splice.apply(this.states, args);
6563  }
6564 
6565  this.currentLine = Math.min(startRow, this.currentLine, this.doc.getLength());
6566 
6567  this.stop();
6568  };
6569  this.stop = function() {
6570  if (this.running)
6571  clearTimeout(this.running);
6572  this.running = false;
6573  };
6574  this.getTokens = function(row) {
6575  return this.lines[row] || this.$tokenizeRow(row);
6576  };
6577  this.getState = function(row) {
6578  if (this.currentLine == row)
6579  this.$tokenizeRow(row);
6580  return this.states[row] || "start";
6581  };
6582 
6583  this.$tokenizeRow = function(row) {
6584  var line = this.doc.getLine(row);
6585  var state = this.states[row - 1];
6586 
6587  var data = this.tokenizer.getLineTokens(line, state, row);
6588 
6589  if (this.states[row] + "" !== data.state + "") {
6590  this.states[row] = data.state;
6591  this.lines[row + 1] = null;
6592  if (this.currentLine > row + 1)
6593  this.currentLine = row + 1;
6594  } else if (this.currentLine == row) {
6595  this.currentLine = row + 1;
6596  }
6597 
6598  return this.lines[row] = data.tokens;
6599  };
6600 
6601 }).call(BackgroundTokenizer.prototype);
6602 
6603 exports.BackgroundTokenizer = BackgroundTokenizer;
6604 });
6605 
6606 define("ace/search_highlight",["require","exports","module","ace/lib/lang","ace/lib/oop","ace/range"], function(require, exports, module) {
6607 "use strict";
6608 
6609 var lang = require("./lib/lang");
6610 var oop = require("./lib/oop");
6611 var Range = require("./range").Range;
6612 
6613 var SearchHighlight = function(regExp, clazz, type) {
6614  this.setRegexp(regExp);
6615  this.clazz = clazz;
6616  this.type = type || "text";
6617 };
6618 
6619 (function() {
6620  this.MAX_RANGES = 500;
6621 
6622  this.setRegexp = function(regExp) {
6623  if (this.regExp+"" == regExp+"")
6624  return;
6625  this.regExp = regExp;
6626  this.cache = [];
6627  };
6628 
6629  this.update = function(html, markerLayer, session, config) {
6630  if (!this.regExp)
6631  return;
6632  var start = config.firstRow, end = config.lastRow;
6633 
6634  for (var i = start; i <= end; i++) {
6635  var ranges = this.cache[i];
6636  if (ranges == null) {
6637  ranges = lang.getMatchOffsets(session.getLine(i), this.regExp);
6638  if (ranges.length > this.MAX_RANGES)
6639  ranges = ranges.slice(0, this.MAX_RANGES);
6640  ranges = ranges.map(function(match) {
6641  return new Range(i, match.offset, i, match.offset + match.length);
6642  });
6643  this.cache[i] = ranges.length ? ranges : "";
6644  }
6645 
6646  for (var j = ranges.length; j --; ) {
6647  markerLayer.drawSingleLineMarker(
6648  html, ranges[j].toScreenRange(session), this.clazz, config);
6649  }
6650  }
6651  };
6652 
6653 }).call(SearchHighlight.prototype);
6654 
6655 exports.SearchHighlight = SearchHighlight;
6656 });
6657 
6658 define("ace/edit_session/fold_line",["require","exports","module","ace/range"], function(require, exports, module) {
6659 "use strict";
6660 
6661 var Range = require("../range").Range;
6662 function FoldLine(foldData, folds) {
6663  this.foldData = foldData;
6664  if (Array.isArray(folds)) {
6665  this.folds = folds;
6666  } else {
6667  folds = this.folds = [ folds ];
6668  }
6669 
6670  var last = folds[folds.length - 1];
6671  this.range = new Range(folds[0].start.row, folds[0].start.column,
6672  last.end.row, last.end.column);
6673  this.start = this.range.start;
6674  this.end = this.range.end;
6675 
6676  this.folds.forEach(function(fold) {
6677  fold.setFoldLine(this);
6678  }, this);
6679 }
6680 
6681 (function() {
6682  this.shiftRow = function(shift) {
6683  this.start.row += shift;
6684  this.end.row += shift;
6685  this.folds.forEach(function(fold) {
6686  fold.start.row += shift;
6687  fold.end.row += shift;
6688  });
6689  };
6690 
6691  this.addFold = function(fold) {
6692  if (fold.sameRow) {
6693  if (fold.start.row < this.startRow || fold.endRow > this.endRow) {
6694  throw new Error("Can't add a fold to this FoldLine as it has no connection");
6695  }
6696  this.folds.push(fold);
6697  this.folds.sort(function(a, b) {
6698  return -a.range.compareEnd(b.start.row, b.start.column);
6699  });
6700  if (this.range.compareEnd(fold.start.row, fold.start.column) > 0) {
6701  this.end.row = fold.end.row;
6702  this.end.column = fold.end.column;
6703  } else if (this.range.compareStart(fold.end.row, fold.end.column) < 0) {
6704  this.start.row = fold.start.row;
6705  this.start.column = fold.start.column;
6706  }
6707  } else if (fold.start.row == this.end.row) {
6708  this.folds.push(fold);
6709  this.end.row = fold.end.row;
6710  this.end.column = fold.end.column;
6711  } else if (fold.end.row == this.start.row) {
6712  this.folds.unshift(fold);
6713  this.start.row = fold.start.row;
6714  this.start.column = fold.start.column;
6715  } else {
6716  throw new Error("Trying to add fold to FoldRow that doesn't have a matching row");
6717  }
6718  fold.foldLine = this;
6719  };
6720 
6721  this.containsRow = function(row) {
6722  return row >= this.start.row && row <= this.end.row;
6723  };
6724 
6725  this.walk = function(callback, endRow, endColumn) {
6726  var lastEnd = 0,
6727  folds = this.folds,
6728  fold,
6729  cmp, stop, isNewRow = true;
6730 
6731  if (endRow == null) {
6732  endRow = this.end.row;
6733  endColumn = this.end.column;
6734  }
6735 
6736  for (var i = 0; i < folds.length; i++) {
6737  fold = folds[i];
6738 
6739  cmp = fold.range.compareStart(endRow, endColumn);
6740  if (cmp == -1) {
6741  callback(null, endRow, endColumn, lastEnd, isNewRow);
6742  return;
6743  }
6744 
6745  stop = callback(null, fold.start.row, fold.start.column, lastEnd, isNewRow);
6746  stop = !stop && callback(fold.placeholder, fold.start.row, fold.start.column, lastEnd);
6747  if (stop || cmp === 0) {
6748  return;
6749  }
6750  isNewRow = !fold.sameRow;
6751  lastEnd = fold.end.column;
6752  }
6753  callback(null, endRow, endColumn, lastEnd, isNewRow);
6754  };
6755 
6756  this.getNextFoldTo = function(row, column) {
6757  var fold, cmp;
6758  for (var i = 0; i < this.folds.length; i++) {
6759  fold = this.folds[i];
6760  cmp = fold.range.compareEnd(row, column);
6761  if (cmp == -1) {
6762  return {
6763  fold: fold,
6764  kind: "after"
6765  };
6766  } else if (cmp === 0) {
6767  return {
6768  fold: fold,
6769  kind: "inside"
6770  };
6771  }
6772  }
6773  return null;
6774  };
6775 
6776  this.addRemoveChars = function(row, column, len) {
6777  var ret = this.getNextFoldTo(row, column),
6778  fold, folds;
6779  if (ret) {
6780  fold = ret.fold;
6781  if (ret.kind == "inside"
6782  && fold.start.column != column
6783  && fold.start.row != row)
6784  {
6785  window.console && window.console.log(row, column, fold);
6786  } else if (fold.start.row == row) {
6787  folds = this.folds;
6788  var i = folds.indexOf(fold);
6789  if (i === 0) {
6790  this.start.column += len;
6791  }
6792  for (i; i < folds.length; i++) {
6793  fold = folds[i];
6794  fold.start.column += len;
6795  if (!fold.sameRow) {
6796  return;
6797  }
6798  fold.end.column += len;
6799  }
6800  this.end.column += len;
6801  }
6802  }
6803  };
6804 
6805  this.split = function(row, column) {
6806  var pos = this.getNextFoldTo(row, column);
6807 
6808  if (!pos || pos.kind == "inside")
6809  return null;
6810 
6811  var fold = pos.fold;
6812  var folds = this.folds;
6813  var foldData = this.foldData;
6814 
6815  var i = folds.indexOf(fold);
6816  var foldBefore = folds[i - 1];
6817  this.end.row = foldBefore.end.row;
6818  this.end.column = foldBefore.end.column;
6819  folds = folds.splice(i, folds.length - i);
6820 
6821  var newFoldLine = new FoldLine(foldData, folds);
6822  foldData.splice(foldData.indexOf(this) + 1, 0, newFoldLine);
6823  return newFoldLine;
6824  };
6825 
6826  this.merge = function(foldLineNext) {
6827  var folds = foldLineNext.folds;
6828  for (var i = 0; i < folds.length; i++) {
6829  this.addFold(folds[i]);
6830  }
6831  var foldData = this.foldData;
6832  foldData.splice(foldData.indexOf(foldLineNext), 1);
6833  };
6834 
6835  this.toString = function() {
6836  var ret = [this.range.toString() + ": [" ];
6837 
6838  this.folds.forEach(function(fold) {
6839  ret.push(" " + fold.toString());
6840  });
6841  ret.push("]");
6842  return ret.join("\n");
6843  };
6844 
6845  this.idxToPosition = function(idx) {
6846  var lastFoldEndColumn = 0;
6847 
6848  for (var i = 0; i < this.folds.length; i++) {
6849  var fold = this.folds[i];
6850 
6851  idx -= fold.start.column - lastFoldEndColumn;
6852  if (idx < 0) {
6853  return {
6854  row: fold.start.row,
6855  column: fold.start.column + idx
6856  };
6857  }
6858 
6859  idx -= fold.placeholder.length;
6860  if (idx < 0) {
6861  return fold.start;
6862  }
6863 
6864  lastFoldEndColumn = fold.end.column;
6865  }
6866 
6867  return {
6868  row: this.end.row,
6869  column: this.end.column + idx
6870  };
6871  };
6872 }).call(FoldLine.prototype);
6873 
6874 exports.FoldLine = FoldLine;
6875 });
6876 
6877 define("ace/range_list",["require","exports","module","ace/range"], function(require, exports, module) {
6878 "use strict";
6879 var Range = require("./range").Range;
6880 var comparePoints = Range.comparePoints;
6881 
6882 var RangeList = function() {
6883  this.ranges = [];
6884 };
6885 
6886 (function() {
6887  this.comparePoints = comparePoints;
6888 
6889  this.pointIndex = function(pos, excludeEdges, startIndex) {
6890  var list = this.ranges;
6891 
6892  for (var i = startIndex || 0; i < list.length; i++) {
6893  var range = list[i];
6894  var cmpEnd = comparePoints(pos, range.end);
6895  if (cmpEnd > 0)
6896  continue;
6897  var cmpStart = comparePoints(pos, range.start);
6898  if (cmpEnd === 0)
6899  return excludeEdges && cmpStart !== 0 ? -i-2 : i;
6900  if (cmpStart > 0 || (cmpStart === 0 && !excludeEdges))
6901  return i;
6902 
6903  return -i-1;
6904  }
6905  return -i - 1;
6906  };
6907 
6908  this.add = function(range) {
6909  var excludeEdges = !range.isEmpty();
6910  var startIndex = this.pointIndex(range.start, excludeEdges);
6911  if (startIndex < 0)
6912  startIndex = -startIndex - 1;
6913 
6914  var endIndex = this.pointIndex(range.end, excludeEdges, startIndex);
6915 
6916  if (endIndex < 0)
6917  endIndex = -endIndex - 1;
6918  else
6919  endIndex++;
6920  return this.ranges.splice(startIndex, endIndex - startIndex, range);
6921  };
6922 
6923  this.addList = function(list) {
6924  var removed = [];
6925  for (var i = list.length; i--; ) {
6926  removed.push.call(removed, this.add(list[i]));
6927  }
6928  return removed;
6929  };
6930 
6931  this.substractPoint = function(pos) {
6932  var i = this.pointIndex(pos);
6933 
6934  if (i >= 0)
6935  return this.ranges.splice(i, 1);
6936  };
6937  this.merge = function() {
6938  var removed = [];
6939  var list = this.ranges;
6940 
6941  list = list.sort(function(a, b) {
6942  return comparePoints(a.start, b.start);
6943  });
6944 
6945  var next = list[0], range;
6946  for (var i = 1; i < list.length; i++) {
6947  range = next;
6948  next = list[i];
6949  var cmp = comparePoints(range.end, next.start);
6950  if (cmp < 0)
6951  continue;
6952 
6953  if (cmp == 0 && !range.isEmpty() && !next.isEmpty())
6954  continue;
6955 
6956  if (comparePoints(range.end, next.end) < 0) {
6957  range.end.row = next.end.row;
6958  range.end.column = next.end.column;
6959  }
6960 
6961  list.splice(i, 1);
6962  removed.push(next);
6963  next = range;
6964  i--;
6965  }
6966 
6967  this.ranges = list;
6968 
6969  return removed;
6970  };
6971 
6972  this.contains = function(row, column) {
6973  return this.pointIndex({row: row, column: column}) >= 0;
6974  };
6975 
6976  this.containsPoint = function(pos) {
6977  return this.pointIndex(pos) >= 0;
6978  };
6979 
6980  this.rangeAtPoint = function(pos) {
6981  var i = this.pointIndex(pos);
6982  if (i >= 0)
6983  return this.ranges[i];
6984  };
6985 
6986 
6987  this.clipRows = function(startRow, endRow) {
6988  var list = this.ranges;
6989  if (list[0].start.row > endRow || list[list.length - 1].start.row < startRow)
6990  return [];
6991 
6992  var startIndex = this.pointIndex({row: startRow, column: 0});
6993  if (startIndex < 0)
6994  startIndex = -startIndex - 1;
6995  var endIndex = this.pointIndex({row: endRow, column: 0}, startIndex);
6996  if (endIndex < 0)
6997  endIndex = -endIndex - 1;
6998 
6999  var clipped = [];
7000  for (var i = startIndex; i < endIndex; i++) {
7001  clipped.push(list[i]);
7002  }
7003  return clipped;
7004  };
7005 
7006  this.removeAll = function() {
7007  return this.ranges.splice(0, this.ranges.length);
7008  };
7009 
7010  this.attach = function(session) {
7011  if (this.session)
7012  this.detach();
7013 
7014  this.session = session;
7015  this.onChange = this.$onChange.bind(this);
7016 
7017  this.session.on('change', this.onChange);
7018  };
7019 
7020  this.detach = function() {
7021  if (!this.session)
7022  return;
7023  this.session.removeListener('change', this.onChange);
7024  this.session = null;
7025  };
7026 
7027  this.$onChange = function(e) {
7028  var changeRange = e.data.range;
7029  if (e.data.action[0] == "i"){
7030  var start = changeRange.start;
7031  var end = changeRange.end;
7032  } else {
7033  var end = changeRange.start;
7034  var start = changeRange.end;
7035  }
7036  var startRow = start.row;
7037  var endRow = end.row;
7038  var lineDif = endRow - startRow;
7039 
7040  var colDiff = -start.column + end.column;
7041  var ranges = this.ranges;
7042 
7043  for (var i = 0, n = ranges.length; i < n; i++) {
7044  var r = ranges[i];
7045  if (r.end.row < startRow)
7046  continue;
7047  if (r.start.row > startRow)
7048  break;
7049 
7050  if (r.start.row == startRow && r.start.column >= start.column ) {
7051  if (r.start.column == start.column && this.$insertRight) {
7052  } else {
7053  r.start.column += colDiff;
7054  r.start.row += lineDif;
7055  }
7056  }
7057  if (r.end.row == startRow && r.end.column >= start.column) {
7058  if (r.end.column == start.column && this.$insertRight) {
7059  continue;
7060  }
7061  if (r.end.column == start.column && colDiff > 0 && i < n - 1) {
7062  if (r.end.column > r.start.column && r.end.column == ranges[i+1].start.column)
7063  r.end.column -= colDiff;
7064  }
7065  r.end.column += colDiff;
7066  r.end.row += lineDif;
7067  }
7068  }
7069 
7070  if (lineDif != 0 && i < n) {
7071  for (; i < n; i++) {
7072  var r = ranges[i];
7073  r.start.row += lineDif;
7074  r.end.row += lineDif;
7075  }
7076  }
7077  };
7078 
7079 }).call(RangeList.prototype);
7080 
7081 exports.RangeList = RangeList;
7082 });
7083 
7084 define("ace/edit_session/fold",["require","exports","module","ace/range","ace/range_list","ace/lib/oop"], function(require, exports, module) {
7085 "use strict";
7086 
7087 var Range = require("../range").Range;
7088 var RangeList = require("../range_list").RangeList;
7089 var oop = require("../lib/oop")
7090 var Fold = exports.Fold = function(range, placeholder) {
7091  this.foldLine = null;
7092  this.placeholder = placeholder;
7093  this.range = range;
7094  this.start = range.start;
7095  this.end = range.end;
7096 
7097  this.sameRow = range.start.row == range.end.row;
7098  this.subFolds = this.ranges = [];
7099 };
7100 
7101 oop.inherits(Fold, RangeList);
7102 
7103 (function() {
7104 
7105  this.toString = function() {
7106  return '"' + this.placeholder + '" ' + this.range.toString();
7107  };
7108 
7109  this.setFoldLine = function(foldLine) {
7110  this.foldLine = foldLine;
7111  this.subFolds.forEach(function(fold) {
7112  fold.setFoldLine(foldLine);
7113  });
7114  };
7115 
7116  this.clone = function() {
7117  var range = this.range.clone();
7118  var fold = new Fold(range, this.placeholder);
7119  this.subFolds.forEach(function(subFold) {
7120  fold.subFolds.push(subFold.clone());
7121  });
7122  fold.collapseChildren = this.collapseChildren;
7123  return fold;
7124  };
7125 
7126  this.addSubFold = function(fold) {
7127  if (this.range.isEqual(fold))
7128  return;
7129 
7130  if (!this.range.containsRange(fold))
7131  throw new Error("A fold can't intersect already existing fold" + fold.range + this.range);
7132  consumeRange(fold, this.start);
7133 
7134  var row = fold.start.row, column = fold.start.column;
7135  for (var i = 0, cmp = -1; i < this.subFolds.length; i++) {
7136  cmp = this.subFolds[i].range.compare(row, column);
7137  if (cmp != 1)
7138  break;
7139  }
7140  var afterStart = this.subFolds[i];
7141 
7142  if (cmp == 0)
7143  return afterStart.addSubFold(fold);
7144  var row = fold.range.end.row, column = fold.range.end.column;
7145  for (var j = i, cmp = -1; j < this.subFolds.length; j++) {
7146  cmp = this.subFolds[j].range.compare(row, column);
7147  if (cmp != 1)
7148  break;
7149  }
7150  var afterEnd = this.subFolds[j];
7151 
7152  if (cmp == 0)
7153  throw new Error("A fold can't intersect already existing fold" + fold.range + this.range);
7154 
7155  var consumedFolds = this.subFolds.splice(i, j - i, fold);
7156  fold.setFoldLine(this.foldLine);
7157 
7158  return fold;
7159  };
7160 
7161  this.restoreRange = function(range) {
7162  return restoreRange(range, this.start);
7163  };
7164 
7165 }).call(Fold.prototype);
7166 
7167 function consumePoint(point, anchor) {
7168  point.row -= anchor.row;
7169  if (point.row == 0)
7170  point.column -= anchor.column;
7171 }
7172 function consumeRange(range, anchor) {
7173  consumePoint(range.start, anchor);
7174  consumePoint(range.end, anchor);
7175 }
7176 function restorePoint(point, anchor) {
7177  if (point.row == 0)
7178  point.column += anchor.column;
7179  point.row += anchor.row;
7180 }
7181 function restoreRange(range, anchor) {
7182  restorePoint(range.start, anchor);
7183  restorePoint(range.end, anchor);
7184 }
7185 
7186 });
7187 
7188 define("ace/edit_session/folding",["require","exports","module","ace/range","ace/edit_session/fold_line","ace/edit_session/fold","ace/token_iterator"], function(require, exports, module) {
7189 "use strict";
7190 
7191 var Range = require("../range").Range;
7192 var FoldLine = require("./fold_line").FoldLine;
7193 var Fold = require("./fold").Fold;
7194 var TokenIterator = require("../token_iterator").TokenIterator;
7195 
7196 function Folding() {
7197  this.getFoldAt = function(row, column, side) {
7198  var foldLine = this.getFoldLine(row);
7199  if (!foldLine)
7200  return null;
7201 
7202  var folds = foldLine.folds;
7203  for (var i = 0; i < folds.length; i++) {
7204  var fold = folds[i];
7205  if (fold.range.contains(row, column)) {
7206  if (side == 1 && fold.range.isEnd(row, column)) {
7207  continue;
7208  } else if (side == -1 && fold.range.isStart(row, column)) {
7209  continue;
7210  }
7211  return fold;
7212  }
7213  }
7214  };
7215  this.getFoldsInRange = function(range) {
7216  var start = range.start;
7217  var end = range.end;
7218  var foldLines = this.$foldData;
7219  var foundFolds = [];
7220 
7221  start.column += 1;
7222  end.column -= 1;
7223 
7224  for (var i = 0; i < foldLines.length; i++) {
7225  var cmp = foldLines[i].range.compareRange(range);
7226  if (cmp == 2) {
7227  continue;
7228  }
7229  else if (cmp == -2) {
7230  break;
7231  }
7232 
7233  var folds = foldLines[i].folds;
7234  for (var j = 0; j < folds.length; j++) {
7235  var fold = folds[j];
7236  cmp = fold.range.compareRange(range);
7237  if (cmp == -2) {
7238  break;
7239  } else if (cmp == 2) {
7240  continue;
7241  } else
7242  if (cmp == 42) {
7243  break;
7244  }
7245  foundFolds.push(fold);
7246  }
7247  }
7248  start.column -= 1;
7249  end.column += 1;
7250 
7251  return foundFolds;
7252  };
7253 
7254  this.getFoldsInRangeList = function(ranges) {
7255  if (Array.isArray(ranges)) {
7256  var folds = [];
7257  ranges.forEach(function(range) {
7258  folds = folds.concat(this.getFoldsInRange(range));
7259  }, this);
7260  } else {
7261  var folds = this.getFoldsInRange(ranges);
7262  }
7263  return folds;
7264  }
7265  this.getAllFolds = function() {
7266  var folds = [];
7267  var foldLines = this.$foldData;
7268 
7269  for (var i = 0; i < foldLines.length; i++)
7270  for (var j = 0; j < foldLines[i].folds.length; j++)
7271  folds.push(foldLines[i].folds[j]);
7272 
7273  return folds;
7274  };
7275  this.getFoldStringAt = function(row, column, trim, foldLine) {
7276  foldLine = foldLine || this.getFoldLine(row);
7277  if (!foldLine)
7278  return null;
7279 
7280  var lastFold = {
7281  end: { column: 0 }
7282  };
7283  var str, fold;
7284  for (var i = 0; i < foldLine.folds.length; i++) {
7285  fold = foldLine.folds[i];
7286  var cmp = fold.range.compareEnd(row, column);
7287  if (cmp == -1) {
7288  str = this
7289  .getLine(fold.start.row)
7290  .substring(lastFold.end.column, fold.start.column);
7291  break;
7292  }
7293  else if (cmp === 0) {
7294  return null;
7295  }
7296  lastFold = fold;
7297  }
7298  if (!str)
7299  str = this.getLine(fold.start.row).substring(lastFold.end.column);
7300 
7301  if (trim == -1)
7302  return str.substring(0, column - lastFold.end.column);
7303  else if (trim == 1)
7304  return str.substring(column - lastFold.end.column);
7305  else
7306  return str;
7307  };
7308 
7309  this.getFoldLine = function(docRow, startFoldLine) {
7310  var foldData = this.$foldData;
7311  var i = 0;
7312  if (startFoldLine)
7313  i = foldData.indexOf(startFoldLine);
7314  if (i == -1)
7315  i = 0;
7316  for (i; i < foldData.length; i++) {
7317  var foldLine = foldData[i];
7318  if (foldLine.start.row <= docRow && foldLine.end.row >= docRow) {
7319  return foldLine;
7320  } else if (foldLine.end.row > docRow) {
7321  return null;
7322  }
7323  }
7324  return null;
7325  };
7326  this.getNextFoldLine = function(docRow, startFoldLine) {
7327  var foldData = this.$foldData;
7328  var i = 0;
7329  if (startFoldLine)
7330  i = foldData.indexOf(startFoldLine);
7331  if (i == -1)
7332  i = 0;
7333  for (i; i < foldData.length; i++) {
7334  var foldLine = foldData[i];
7335  if (foldLine.end.row >= docRow) {
7336  return foldLine;
7337  }
7338  }
7339  return null;
7340  };
7341 
7342  this.getFoldedRowCount = function(first, last) {
7343  var foldData = this.$foldData, rowCount = last-first+1;
7344  for (var i = 0; i < foldData.length; i++) {
7345  var foldLine = foldData[i],
7346  end = foldLine.end.row,
7347  start = foldLine.start.row;
7348  if (end >= last) {
7349  if(start < last) {
7350  if(start >= first)
7351  rowCount -= last-start;
7352  else
7353  rowCount = 0;//in one fold
7354  }
7355  break;
7356  } else if(end >= first){
7357  if (start >= first) //fold inside range
7358  rowCount -= end-start;
7359  else
7360  rowCount -= end-first+1;
7361  }
7362  }
7363  return rowCount;
7364  };
7365 
7366  this.$addFoldLine = function(foldLine) {
7367  this.$foldData.push(foldLine);
7368  this.$foldData.sort(function(a, b) {
7369  return a.start.row - b.start.row;
7370  });
7371  return foldLine;
7372  };
7373  this.addFold = function(placeholder, range) {
7374  var foldData = this.$foldData;
7375  var added = false;
7376  var fold;
7377 
7378  if (placeholder instanceof Fold)
7379  fold = placeholder;
7380  else {
7381  fold = new Fold(range, placeholder);
7382  fold.collapseChildren = range.collapseChildren;
7383  }
7384  this.$clipRangeToDocument(fold.range);
7385 
7386  var startRow = fold.start.row;
7387  var startColumn = fold.start.column;
7388  var endRow = fold.end.row;
7389  var endColumn = fold.end.column;
7390  if (!(startRow < endRow ||
7391  startRow == endRow && startColumn <= endColumn - 2))
7392  throw new Error("The range has to be at least 2 characters width");
7393 
7394  var startFold = this.getFoldAt(startRow, startColumn, 1);
7395  var endFold = this.getFoldAt(endRow, endColumn, -1);
7396  if (startFold && endFold == startFold)
7397  return startFold.addSubFold(fold);
7398 
7399  if (startFold && !startFold.range.isStart(startRow, startColumn))
7400  this.removeFold(startFold);
7401 
7402  if (endFold && !endFold.range.isEnd(endRow, endColumn))
7403  this.removeFold(endFold);
7404  var folds = this.getFoldsInRange(fold.range);
7405  if (folds.length > 0) {
7406  this.removeFolds(folds);
7407  folds.forEach(function(subFold) {
7408  fold.addSubFold(subFold);
7409  });
7410  }
7411 
7412  for (var i = 0; i < foldData.length; i++) {
7413  var foldLine = foldData[i];
7414  if (endRow == foldLine.start.row) {
7415  foldLine.addFold(fold);
7416  added = true;
7417  break;
7418  } else if (startRow == foldLine.end.row) {
7419  foldLine.addFold(fold);
7420  added = true;
7421  if (!fold.sameRow) {
7422  var foldLineNext = foldData[i + 1];
7423  if (foldLineNext && foldLineNext.start.row == endRow) {
7424  foldLine.merge(foldLineNext);
7425  break;
7426  }
7427  }
7428  break;
7429  } else if (endRow <= foldLine.start.row) {
7430  break;
7431  }
7432  }
7433 
7434  if (!added)
7435  foldLine = this.$addFoldLine(new FoldLine(this.$foldData, fold));
7436 
7437  if (this.$useWrapMode)
7438  this.$updateWrapData(foldLine.start.row, foldLine.start.row);
7439  else
7440  this.$updateRowLengthCache(foldLine.start.row, foldLine.start.row);
7441  this.$modified = true;
7442  this._emit("changeFold", { data: fold, action: "add" });
7443 
7444  return fold;
7445  };
7446 
7447  this.addFolds = function(folds) {
7448  folds.forEach(function(fold) {
7449  this.addFold(fold);
7450  }, this);
7451  };
7452 
7453  this.removeFold = function(fold) {
7454  var foldLine = fold.foldLine;
7455  var startRow = foldLine.start.row;
7456  var endRow = foldLine.end.row;
7457 
7458  var foldLines = this.$foldData;
7459  var folds = foldLine.folds;
7460  if (folds.length == 1) {
7461  foldLines.splice(foldLines.indexOf(foldLine), 1);
7462  } else
7463  if (foldLine.range.isEnd(fold.end.row, fold.end.column)) {
7464  folds.pop();
7465  foldLine.end.row = folds[folds.length - 1].end.row;
7466  foldLine.end.column = folds[folds.length - 1].end.column;
7467  } else
7468  if (foldLine.range.isStart(fold.start.row, fold.start.column)) {
7469  folds.shift();
7470  foldLine.start.row = folds[0].start.row;
7471  foldLine.start.column = folds[0].start.column;
7472  } else
7473  if (fold.sameRow) {
7474  folds.splice(folds.indexOf(fold), 1);
7475  } else
7476  {
7477  var newFoldLine = foldLine.split(fold.start.row, fold.start.column);
7478  folds = newFoldLine.folds;
7479  folds.shift();
7480  newFoldLine.start.row = folds[0].start.row;
7481  newFoldLine.start.column = folds[0].start.column;
7482  }
7483 
7484  if (!this.$updating) {
7485  if (this.$useWrapMode)
7486  this.$updateWrapData(startRow, endRow);
7487  else
7488  this.$updateRowLengthCache(startRow, endRow);
7489  }
7490  this.$modified = true;
7491  this._emit("changeFold", { data: fold, action: "remove" });
7492  };
7493 
7494  this.removeFolds = function(folds) {
7495  var cloneFolds = [];
7496  for (var i = 0; i < folds.length; i++) {
7497  cloneFolds.push(folds[i]);
7498  }
7499 
7500  cloneFolds.forEach(function(fold) {
7501  this.removeFold(fold);
7502  }, this);
7503  this.$modified = true;
7504  };
7505 
7506  this.expandFold = function(fold) {
7507  this.removeFold(fold);
7508  fold.subFolds.forEach(function(subFold) {
7509  fold.restoreRange(subFold);
7510  this.addFold(subFold);
7511  }, this);
7512  if (fold.collapseChildren > 0) {
7513  this.foldAll(fold.start.row+1, fold.end.row, fold.collapseChildren-1);
7514  }
7515  fold.subFolds = [];
7516  };
7517 
7518  this.expandFolds = function(folds) {
7519  folds.forEach(function(fold) {
7520  this.expandFold(fold);
7521  }, this);
7522  };
7523 
7524  this.unfold = function(location, expandInner) {
7525  var range, folds;
7526  if (location == null) {
7527  range = new Range(0, 0, this.getLength(), 0);
7528  expandInner = true;
7529  } else if (typeof location == "number")
7530  range = new Range(location, 0, location, this.getLine(location).length);
7531  else if ("row" in location)
7532  range = Range.fromPoints(location, location);
7533  else
7534  range = location;
7535 
7536  folds = this.getFoldsInRangeList(range);
7537  if (expandInner) {
7538  this.removeFolds(folds);
7539  } else {
7540  var subFolds = folds;
7541  while (subFolds.length) {
7542  this.expandFolds(subFolds);
7543  subFolds = this.getFoldsInRangeList(range);
7544  }
7545  }
7546  if (folds.length)
7547  return folds;
7548  };
7549  this.isRowFolded = function(docRow, startFoldRow) {
7550  return !!this.getFoldLine(docRow, startFoldRow);
7551  };
7552 
7553  this.getRowFoldEnd = function(docRow, startFoldRow) {
7554  var foldLine = this.getFoldLine(docRow, startFoldRow);
7555  return foldLine ? foldLine.end.row : docRow;
7556  };
7557 
7558  this.getRowFoldStart = function(docRow, startFoldRow) {
7559  var foldLine = this.getFoldLine(docRow, startFoldRow);
7560  return foldLine ? foldLine.start.row : docRow;
7561  };
7562 
7563  this.getFoldDisplayLine = function(foldLine, endRow, endColumn, startRow, startColumn) {
7564  if (startRow == null)
7565  startRow = foldLine.start.row;
7566  if (startColumn == null)
7567  startColumn = 0;
7568  if (endRow == null)
7569  endRow = foldLine.end.row;
7570  if (endColumn == null)
7571  endColumn = this.getLine(endRow).length;
7572  var doc = this.doc;
7573  var textLine = "";
7574 
7575  foldLine.walk(function(placeholder, row, column, lastColumn) {
7576  if (row < startRow)
7577  return;
7578  if (row == startRow) {
7579  if (column < startColumn)
7580  return;
7581  lastColumn = Math.max(startColumn, lastColumn);
7582  }
7583 
7584  if (placeholder != null) {
7585  textLine += placeholder;
7586  } else {
7587  textLine += doc.getLine(row).substring(lastColumn, column);
7588  }
7589  }, endRow, endColumn);
7590  return textLine;
7591  };
7592 
7593  this.getDisplayLine = function(row, endColumn, startRow, startColumn) {
7594  var foldLine = this.getFoldLine(row);
7595 
7596  if (!foldLine) {
7597  var line;
7598  line = this.doc.getLine(row);
7599  return line.substring(startColumn || 0, endColumn || line.length);
7600  } else {
7601  return this.getFoldDisplayLine(
7602  foldLine, row, endColumn, startRow, startColumn);
7603  }
7604  };
7605 
7606  this.$cloneFoldData = function() {
7607  var fd = [];
7608  fd = this.$foldData.map(function(foldLine) {
7609  var folds = foldLine.folds.map(function(fold) {
7610  return fold.clone();
7611  });
7612  return new FoldLine(fd, folds);
7613  });
7614 
7615  return fd;
7616  };
7617 
7618  this.toggleFold = function(tryToUnfold) {
7619  var selection = this.selection;
7620  var range = selection.getRange();
7621  var fold;
7622  var bracketPos;
7623 
7624  if (range.isEmpty()) {
7625  var cursor = range.start;
7626  fold = this.getFoldAt(cursor.row, cursor.column);
7627 
7628  if (fold) {
7629  this.expandFold(fold);
7630  return;
7631  } else if (bracketPos = this.findMatchingBracket(cursor)) {
7632  if (range.comparePoint(bracketPos) == 1) {
7633  range.end = bracketPos;
7634  } else {
7635  range.start = bracketPos;
7636  range.start.column++;
7637  range.end.column--;
7638  }
7639  } else if (bracketPos = this.findMatchingBracket({row: cursor.row, column: cursor.column + 1})) {
7640  if (range.comparePoint(bracketPos) == 1)
7641  range.end = bracketPos;
7642  else
7643  range.start = bracketPos;
7644 
7645  range.start.column++;
7646  } else {
7647  range = this.getCommentFoldRange(cursor.row, cursor.column) || range;
7648  }
7649  } else {
7650  var folds = this.getFoldsInRange(range);
7651  if (tryToUnfold && folds.length) {
7652  this.expandFolds(folds);
7653  return;
7654  } else if (folds.length == 1 ) {
7655  fold = folds[0];
7656  }
7657  }
7658 
7659  if (!fold)
7660  fold = this.getFoldAt(range.start.row, range.start.column);
7661 
7662  if (fold && fold.range.toString() == range.toString()) {
7663  this.expandFold(fold);
7664  return;
7665  }
7666 
7667  var placeholder = "...";
7668  if (!range.isMultiLine()) {
7669  placeholder = this.getTextRange(range);
7670  if(placeholder.length < 4)
7671  return;
7672  placeholder = placeholder.trim().substring(0, 2) + "..";
7673  }
7674 
7675  this.addFold(placeholder, range);
7676  };
7677 
7678  this.getCommentFoldRange = function(row, column, dir) {
7679  var iterator = new TokenIterator(this, row, column);
7680  var token = iterator.getCurrentToken();
7681  if (token && /^comment|string/.test(token.type)) {
7682  var range = new Range();
7683  var re = new RegExp(token.type.replace(/\..*/, "\\."));
7684  if (dir != 1) {
7685  do {
7686  token = iterator.stepBackward();
7687  } while(token && re.test(token.type));
7688  iterator.stepForward();
7689  }
7690 
7691  range.start.row = iterator.getCurrentTokenRow();
7692  range.start.column = iterator.getCurrentTokenColumn() + 2;
7693 
7694  iterator = new TokenIterator(this, row, column);
7695 
7696  if (dir != -1) {
7697  do {
7698  token = iterator.stepForward();
7699  } while(token && re.test(token.type));
7700  token = iterator.stepBackward();
7701  } else
7702  token = iterator.getCurrentToken();
7703 
7704  range.end.row = iterator.getCurrentTokenRow();
7705  range.end.column = iterator.getCurrentTokenColumn() + token.value.length - 2;
7706  return range;
7707  }
7708  };
7709 
7710  this.foldAll = function(startRow, endRow, depth) {
7711  if (depth == undefined)
7712  depth = 100000; // JSON.stringify doesn't hanle Infinity
7713  var foldWidgets = this.foldWidgets;
7714  if (!foldWidgets)
7715  return; // mode doesn't support folding
7716  endRow = endRow || this.getLength();
7717  startRow = startRow || 0;
7718  for (var row = startRow; row < endRow; row++) {
7719  if (foldWidgets[row] == null)
7720  foldWidgets[row] = this.getFoldWidget(row);
7721  if (foldWidgets[row] != "start")
7722  continue;
7723 
7724  var range = this.getFoldWidgetRange(row);
7725  if (range && range.isMultiLine()
7726  && range.end.row <= endRow
7727  && range.start.row >= startRow
7728  ) {
7729  row = range.end.row;
7730  try {
7731  var fold = this.addFold("...", range);
7732  if (fold)
7733  fold.collapseChildren = depth;
7734  } catch(e) {}
7735  }
7736  }
7737  };
7738  this.$foldStyles = {
7739  "manual": 1,
7740  "markbegin": 1,
7741  "markbeginend": 1
7742  };
7743  this.$foldStyle = "markbegin";
7744  this.setFoldStyle = function(style) {
7745  if (!this.$foldStyles[style])
7746  throw new Error("invalid fold style: " + style + "[" + Object.keys(this.$foldStyles).join(", ") + "]");
7747 
7748  if (this.$foldStyle == style)
7749  return;
7750 
7751  this.$foldStyle = style;
7752 
7753  if (style == "manual")
7754  this.unfold();
7755  var mode = this.$foldMode;
7756  this.$setFolding(null);
7757  this.$setFolding(mode);
7758  };
7759 
7760  this.$setFolding = function(foldMode) {
7761  if (this.$foldMode == foldMode)
7762  return;
7763 
7764  this.$foldMode = foldMode;
7765 
7766  this.off('change', this.$updateFoldWidgets);
7767  this.off('tokenizerUpdate', this.$tokenizerUpdateFoldWidgets);
7768  this._emit("changeAnnotation");
7769 
7770  if (!foldMode || this.$foldStyle == "manual") {
7771  this.foldWidgets = null;
7772  return;
7773  }
7774 
7775  this.foldWidgets = [];
7776  this.getFoldWidget = foldMode.getFoldWidget.bind(foldMode, this, this.$foldStyle);
7777  this.getFoldWidgetRange = foldMode.getFoldWidgetRange.bind(foldMode, this, this.$foldStyle);
7778 
7779  this.$updateFoldWidgets = this.updateFoldWidgets.bind(this);
7780  this.$tokenizerUpdateFoldWidgets = this.tokenizerUpdateFoldWidgets.bind(this);
7781  this.on('change', this.$updateFoldWidgets);
7782  this.on('tokenizerUpdate', this.$tokenizerUpdateFoldWidgets);
7783  };
7784 
7785  this.getParentFoldRangeData = function (row, ignoreCurrent) {
7786  var fw = this.foldWidgets;
7787  if (!fw || (ignoreCurrent && fw[row]))
7788  return {};
7789 
7790  var i = row - 1, firstRange;
7791  while (i >= 0) {
7792  var c = fw[i];
7793  if (c == null)
7794  c = fw[i] = this.getFoldWidget(i);
7795 
7796  if (c == "start") {
7797  var range = this.getFoldWidgetRange(i);
7798  if (!firstRange)
7799  firstRange = range;
7800  if (range && range.end.row >= row)
7801  break;
7802  }
7803  i--;
7804  }
7805 
7806  return {
7807  range: i !== -1 && range,
7808  firstRange: firstRange
7809  };
7810  }
7811 
7812  this.onFoldWidgetClick = function(row, e) {
7813  e = e.domEvent;
7814  var options = {
7815  children: e.shiftKey,
7816  all: e.ctrlKey || e.metaKey,
7817  siblings: e.altKey
7818  };
7819 
7820  var range = this.$toggleFoldWidget(row, options);
7821  if (!range) {
7822  var el = (e.target || e.srcElement)
7823  if (el && /ace_fold-widget/.test(el.className))
7824  el.className += " ace_invalid";
7825  }
7826  };
7827 
7828  this.$toggleFoldWidget = function(row, options) {
7829  if (!this.getFoldWidget)
7830  return;
7831  var type = this.getFoldWidget(row);
7832  var line = this.getLine(row);
7833 
7834  var dir = type === "end" ? -1 : 1;
7835  var fold = this.getFoldAt(row, dir === -1 ? 0 : line.length, dir);
7836 
7837  if (fold) {
7838  if (options.children || options.all)
7839  this.removeFold(fold);
7840  else
7841  this.expandFold(fold);
7842  return;
7843  }
7844 
7845  var range = this.getFoldWidgetRange(row, true);
7846  if (range && !range.isMultiLine()) {
7847  fold = this.getFoldAt(range.start.row, range.start.column, 1);
7848  if (fold && range.isEqual(fold.range)) {
7849  this.removeFold(fold);
7850  return;
7851  }
7852  }
7853 
7854  if (options.siblings) {
7855  var data = this.getParentFoldRangeData(row);
7856  if (data.range) {
7857  var startRow = data.range.start.row + 1;
7858  var endRow = data.range.end.row;
7859  }
7860  this.foldAll(startRow, endRow, options.all ? 10000 : 0);
7861  } else if (options.children) {
7862  endRow = range ? range.end.row : this.getLength();
7863  this.foldAll(row + 1, range.end.row, options.all ? 10000 : 0);
7864  } else if (range) {
7865  if (options.all)
7866  range.collapseChildren = 10000;
7867  this.addFold("...", range);
7868  }
7869 
7870  return range;
7871  };
7872 
7873 
7874 
7875  this.toggleFoldWidget = function(toggleParent) {
7876  var row = this.selection.getCursor().row;
7877  row = this.getRowFoldStart(row);
7878  var range = this.$toggleFoldWidget(row, {});
7879 
7880  if (range)
7881  return;
7882  var data = this.getParentFoldRangeData(row, true);
7883  range = data.range || data.firstRange;
7884 
7885  if (range) {
7886  row = range.start.row;
7887  var fold = this.getFoldAt(row, this.getLine(row).length, 1);
7888 
7889  if (fold) {
7890  this.removeFold(fold);
7891  } else {
7892  this.addFold("...", range);
7893  }
7894  }
7895  };
7896 
7897  this.updateFoldWidgets = function(e) {
7898  var delta = e.data;
7899  var range = delta.range;
7900  var firstRow = range.start.row;
7901  var len = range.end.row - firstRow;
7902 
7903  if (len === 0) {
7904  this.foldWidgets[firstRow] = null;
7905  } else if (delta.action == "removeText" || delta.action == "removeLines") {
7906  this.foldWidgets.splice(firstRow, len + 1, null);
7907  } else {
7908  var args = Array(len + 1);
7909  args.unshift(firstRow, 1);
7910  this.foldWidgets.splice.apply(this.foldWidgets, args);
7911  }
7912  };
7913  this.tokenizerUpdateFoldWidgets = function(e) {
7914  var rows = e.data;
7915  if (rows.first != rows.last) {
7916  if (this.foldWidgets.length > rows.first)
7917  this.foldWidgets.splice(rows.first, this.foldWidgets.length);
7918  }
7919  }
7920 }
7921 
7922 exports.Folding = Folding;
7923 
7924 });
7925 
7926 define("ace/edit_session/bracket_match",["require","exports","module","ace/token_iterator","ace/range"], function(require, exports, module) {
7927 "use strict";
7928 
7929 var TokenIterator = require("../token_iterator").TokenIterator;
7930 var Range = require("../range").Range;
7931 
7932 
7933 function BracketMatch() {
7934 
7935  this.findMatchingBracket = function(position, chr) {
7936  if (position.column == 0) return null;
7937 
7938  var charBeforeCursor = chr || this.getLine(position.row).charAt(position.column-1);
7939  if (charBeforeCursor == "") return null;
7940
