7941  var match = charBeforeCursor.match(/([\(\[\{])|([\)\]\}])/);
7942  if (!match)
7943  return null;
7944 
7945  if (match[1])
7946  return this.$findClosingBracket(match[1], position);
7947  else
7948  return this.$findOpeningBracket(match[2], position);
7949  };
7950 
7951  this.getBracketRange = function(pos) {
7952  var line = this.getLine(pos.row);
7953  var before = true, range;
7954 
7955  var chr = line.charAt(pos.column-1);
7956  var match = chr && chr.match(/([\(\[\{])|([\)\]\}])/);
7957  if (!match) {
7958  chr = line.charAt(pos.column);
7959  pos = {row: pos.row, column: pos.column + 1};
7960  match = chr && chr.match(/([\(\[\{])|([\)\]\}])/);
7961  before = false;
7962  }
7963  if (!match)
7964  return null;
7965 
7966  if (match[1]) {
7967  var bracketPos = this.$findClosingBracket(match[1], pos);
7968  if (!bracketPos)
7969  return null;
7970  range = Range.fromPoints(pos, bracketPos);
7971  if (!before) {
7972  range.end.column++;
7973  range.start.column--;
7974  }
7975  range.cursor = range.end;
7976  } else {
7977  var bracketPos = this.$findOpeningBracket(match[2], pos);
7978  if (!bracketPos)
7979  return null;
7980  range = Range.fromPoints(bracketPos, pos);
7981  if (!before) {
7982  range.start.column++;
7983  range.end.column--;
7984  }
7985  range.cursor = range.start;
7986  }
7987 
7988  return range;
7989  };
7990 
7991  this.$brackets = {
7992  ")": "(",
7993  "(": ")",
7994  "]": "[",
7995  "[": "]",
7996  "{": "}",
7997  "}": "{"
7998  };
7999 
8000  this.$findOpeningBracket = function(bracket, position, typeRe) {
8001  var openBracket = this.$brackets[bracket];
8002  var depth = 1;
8003 
8004  var iterator = new TokenIterator(this, position.row, position.column);
8005  var token = iterator.getCurrentToken();
8006  if (!token)
8007  token = iterator.stepForward();
8008  if (!token)
8009  return;
8010 
8011  if (!typeRe){
8012  typeRe = new RegExp(
8013  "(\\.?" +
8014  token.type.replace(".", "\\.").replace("rparen", ".paren")
8015  .replace(/\b(?:end|start|begin)\b/, "")
8016  + ")+"
8017  );
8018  }
8019  var valueIndex = position.column - iterator.getCurrentTokenColumn() - 2;
8020  var value = token.value;
8021 
8022  while (true) {
8023 
8024  while (valueIndex >= 0) {
8025  var chr = value.charAt(valueIndex);
8026  if (chr == openBracket) {
8027  depth -= 1;
8028  if (depth == 0) {
8029  return {row: iterator.getCurrentTokenRow(),
8030  column: valueIndex + iterator.getCurrentTokenColumn()};
8031  }
8032  }
8033  else if (chr == bracket) {
8034  depth += 1;
8035  }
8036  valueIndex -= 1;
8037  }
8038  do {
8039  token = iterator.stepBackward();
8040  } while (token && !typeRe.test(token.type));
8041 
8042  if (token == null)
8043  break;
8044 
8045  value = token.value;
8046  valueIndex = value.length - 1;
8047  }
8048 
8049  return null;
8050  };
8051 
8052  this.$findClosingBracket = function(bracket, position, typeRe) {
8053  var closingBracket = this.$brackets[bracket];
8054  var depth = 1;
8055 
8056  var iterator = new TokenIterator(this, position.row, position.column);
8057  var token = iterator.getCurrentToken();
8058  if (!token)
8059  token = iterator.stepForward();
8060  if (!token)
8061  return;
8062 
8063  if (!typeRe){
8064  typeRe = new RegExp(
8065  "(\\.?" +
8066  token.type.replace(".", "\\.").replace("lparen", ".paren")
8067  .replace(/\b(?:end|start|begin)\b/, "")
8068  + ")+"
8069  );
8070  }
8071  var valueIndex = position.column - iterator.getCurrentTokenColumn();
8072 
8073  while (true) {
8074 
8075  var value = token.value;
8076  var valueLength = value.length;
8077  while (valueIndex < valueLength) {
8078  var chr = value.charAt(valueIndex);
8079  if (chr == closingBracket) {
8080  depth -= 1;
8081  if (depth == 0) {
8082  return {row: iterator.getCurrentTokenRow(),
8083  column: valueIndex + iterator.getCurrentTokenColumn()};
8084  }
8085  }
8086  else if (chr == bracket) {
8087  depth += 1;
8088  }
8089  valueIndex += 1;
8090  }
8091  do {
8092  token = iterator.stepForward();
8093  } while (token && !typeRe.test(token.type));
8094 
8095  if (token == null)
8096  break;
8097 
8098  valueIndex = 0;
8099  }
8100 
8101  return null;
8102  };
8103 }
8104 exports.BracketMatch = BracketMatch;
8105 
8106 });
8107 
8108 define("ace/edit_session",["require","exports","module","ace/lib/oop","ace/lib/lang","ace/config","ace/lib/event_emitter","ace/selection","ace/mode/text","ace/range","ace/document","ace/background_tokenizer","ace/search_highlight","ace/edit_session/folding","ace/edit_session/bracket_match"], function(require, exports, module) {
8109 "use strict";
8110 
8111 var oop = require("./lib/oop");
8112 var lang = require("./lib/lang");
8113 var config = require("./config");
8114 var EventEmitter = require("./lib/event_emitter").EventEmitter;
8115 var Selection = require("./selection").Selection;
8116 var TextMode = require("./mode/text").Mode;
8117 var Range = require("./range").Range;
8118 var Document = require("./document").Document;
8119 var BackgroundTokenizer = require("./background_tokenizer").BackgroundTokenizer;
8120 var SearchHighlight = require("./search_highlight").SearchHighlight;
8121 
8122 var EditSession = function(text, mode) {
8123  this.$breakpoints = [];
8124  this.$decorations = [];
8125  this.$frontMarkers = {};
8126  this.$backMarkers = {};
8127  this.$markerId = 1;
8128  this.$undoSelect = true;
8129 
8130  this.$foldData = [];
8131  this.$foldData.toString = function() {
8132  return this.join("\n");
8133  }
8134  this.on("changeFold", this.onChangeFold.bind(this));
8135  this.$onChange = this.onChange.bind(this);
8136 
8137  if (typeof text != "object" || !text.getLine)
8138  text = new Document(text);
8139 
8140  this.setDocument(text);
8141  this.selection = new Selection(this);
8142 
8143  config.resetOptions(this);
8144  this.setMode(mode);
8145  config._signal("session", this);
8146 };
8147 
8148 
8149 (function() {
8150 
8151  oop.implement(this, EventEmitter);
8152  this.setDocument = function(doc) {
8153  if (this.doc)
8154  this.doc.removeListener("change", this.$onChange);
8155 
8156  this.doc = doc;
8157  doc.on("change", this.$onChange);
8158 
8159  if (this.bgTokenizer)
8160  this.bgTokenizer.setDocument(this.getDocument());
8161 
8162  this.resetCaches();
8163  };
8164  this.getDocument = function() {
8165  return this.doc;
8166  };
8167  this.$resetRowCache = function(docRow) {
8168  if (!docRow) {
8169  this.$docRowCache = [];
8170  this.$screenRowCache = [];
8171  return;
8172  }
8173  var l = this.$docRowCache.length;
8174  var i = this.$getRowCacheIndex(this.$docRowCache, docRow) + 1;
8175  if (l > i) {
8176  this.$docRowCache.splice(i, l);
8177  this.$screenRowCache.splice(i, l);
8178  }
8179  };
8180 
8181  this.$getRowCacheIndex = function(cacheArray, val) {
8182  var low = 0;
8183  var hi = cacheArray.length - 1;
8184 
8185  while (low <= hi) {
8186  var mid = (low + hi) >> 1;
8187  var c = cacheArray[mid];
8188 
8189  if (val > c)
8190  low = mid + 1;
8191  else if (val < c)
8192  hi = mid - 1;
8193  else
8194  return mid;
8195  }
8196 
8197  return low -1;
8198  };
8199 
8200  this.resetCaches = function() {
8201  this.$modified = true;
8202  this.$wrapData = [];
8203  this.$rowLengthCache = [];
8204  this.$resetRowCache(0);
8205  if (this.bgTokenizer)
8206  this.bgTokenizer.start(0);
8207  };
8208 
8209  this.onChangeFold = function(e) {
8210  var fold = e.data;
8211  this.$resetRowCache(fold.start.row);
8212  };
8213 
8214  this.onChange = function(e) {
8215  var delta = e.data;
8216  this.$modified = true;
8217 
8218  this.$resetRowCache(delta.range.start.row);
8219 
8220  var removedFolds = this.$updateInternalDataOnChange(e);
8221  if (!this.$fromUndo && this.$undoManager && !delta.ignore) {
8222  this.$deltasDoc.push(delta);
8223  if (removedFolds && removedFolds.length != 0) {
8224  this.$deltasFold.push({
8225  action: "removeFolds",
8226  folds: removedFolds
8227  });
8228  }
8229 
8230  this.$informUndoManager.schedule();
8231  }
8232 
8233  this.bgTokenizer && this.bgTokenizer.$updateOnChange(delta);
8234  this._signal("change", e);
8235  };
8236  this.setValue = function(text) {
8237  this.doc.setValue(text);
8238  this.selection.moveTo(0, 0);
8239 
8240  this.$resetRowCache(0);
8241  this.$deltas = [];
8242  this.$deltasDoc = [];
8243  this.$deltasFold = [];
8244  this.setUndoManager(this.$undoManager);
8245  this.getUndoManager().reset();
8246  };
8247  this.getValue =
8248  this.toString = function() {
8249  return this.doc.getValue();
8250  };
8251  this.getSelection = function() {
8252  return this.selection;
8253  };
8254  this.getState = function(row) {
8255  return this.bgTokenizer.getState(row);
8256  };
8257  this.getTokens = function(row) {
8258  return this.bgTokenizer.getTokens(row);
8259  };
8260  this.getTokenAt = function(row, column) {
8261  var tokens = this.bgTokenizer.getTokens(row);
8262  var token, c = 0;
8263  if (column == null) {
8264  i = tokens.length - 1;
8265  c = this.getLine(row).length;
8266  } else {
8267  for (var i = 0; i < tokens.length; i++) {
8268  c += tokens[i].value.length;
8269  if (c >= column)
8270  break;
8271  }
8272  }
8273  token = tokens[i];
8274  if (!token)
8275  return null;
8276  token.index = i;
8277  token.start = c - token.value.length;
8278  return token;
8279  };
8280  this.setUndoManager = function(undoManager) {
8281  this.$undoManager = undoManager;
8282  this.$deltas = [];
8283  this.$deltasDoc = [];
8284  this.$deltasFold = [];
8285 
8286  if (this.$informUndoManager)
8287  this.$informUndoManager.cancel();
8288 
8289  if (undoManager) {
8290  var self = this;
8291 
8292  this.$syncInformUndoManager = function() {
8293  self.$informUndoManager.cancel();
8294 
8295  if (self.$deltasFold.length) {
8296  self.$deltas.push({
8297  group: "fold",
8298  deltas: self.$deltasFold
8299  });
8300  self.$deltasFold = [];
8301  }
8302 
8303  if (self.$deltasDoc.length) {
8304  self.$deltas.push({
8305  group: "doc",
8306  deltas: self.$deltasDoc
8307  });
8308  self.$deltasDoc = [];
8309  }
8310 
8311  if (self.$deltas.length > 0) {
8312  undoManager.execute({
8313  action: "aceupdate",
8314  args: [self.$deltas, self],
8315  merge: self.mergeUndoDeltas
8316  });
8317  }
8318  self.mergeUndoDeltas = false;
8319  self.$deltas = [];
8320  };
8321  this.$informUndoManager = lang.delayedCall(this.$syncInformUndoManager);
8322  }
8323  };
8324  this.markUndoGroup = function() {
8325  if (this.$syncInformUndoManager)
8326  this.$syncInformUndoManager();
8327  };
8328 
8329  this.$defaultUndoManager = {
8330  undo: function() {},
8331  redo: function() {},
8332  reset: function() {}
8333  };
8334  this.getUndoManager = function() {
8335  return this.$undoManager || this.$defaultUndoManager;
8336  };
8337  this.getTabString = function() {
8338  if (this.getUseSoftTabs()) {
8339  return lang.stringRepeat(" ", this.getTabSize());
8340  } else {
8341  return "\t";
8342  }
8343  };
8344  this.setUseSoftTabs = function(val) {
8345  this.setOption("useSoftTabs", val);
8346  };
8347  this.getUseSoftTabs = function() {
8348  return this.$useSoftTabs && !this.$mode.$indentWithTabs;
8349  };
8350  this.setTabSize = function(tabSize) {
8351  this.setOption("tabSize", tabSize);
8352  };
8353  this.getTabSize = function() {
8354  return this.$tabSize;
8355  };
8356  this.isTabStop = function(position) {
8357  return this.$useSoftTabs && (position.column % this.$tabSize === 0);
8358  };
8359 
8360  this.$overwrite = false;
8361  this.setOverwrite = function(overwrite) {
8362  this.setOption("overwrite", overwrite);
8363  };
8364  this.getOverwrite = function() {
8365  return this.$overwrite;
8366  };
8367  this.toggleOverwrite = function() {
8368  this.setOverwrite(!this.$overwrite);
8369  };
8370  this.addGutterDecoration = function(row, className) {
8371  if (!this.$decorations[row])
8372  this.$decorations[row] = "";
8373  this.$decorations[row] += " " + className;
8374  this._signal("changeBreakpoint", {});
8375  };
8376  this.removeGutterDecoration = function(row, className) {
8377  this.$decorations[row] = (this.$decorations[row] || "").replace(" " + className, "");
8378  this._signal("changeBreakpoint", {});
8379  };
8380  this.getBreakpoints = function() {
8381  return this.$breakpoints;
8382  };
8383  this.setBreakpoints = function(rows) {
8384  this.$breakpoints = [];
8385  for (var i=0; i<rows.length; i++) {
8386  this.$breakpoints[rows[i]] = "ace_breakpoint";
8387  }
8388  this._signal("changeBreakpoint", {});
8389  };
8390  this.clearBreakpoints = function() {
8391  this.$breakpoints = [];
8392  this._signal("changeBreakpoint", {});
8393  };
8394  this.setBreakpoint = function(row, className) {
8395  if (className === undefined)
8396  className = "ace_breakpoint";
8397  if (className)
8398  this.$breakpoints[row] = className;
8399  else
8400  delete this.$breakpoints[row];
8401  this._signal("changeBreakpoint", {});
8402  };
8403  this.clearBreakpoint = function(row) {
8404  delete this.$breakpoints[row];
8405  this._signal("changeBreakpoint", {});
8406  };
8407  this.addMarker = function(range, clazz, type, inFront) {
8408  var id = this.$markerId++;
8409 
8410  var marker = {
8411  range : range,
8412  type : type || "line",
8413  renderer: typeof type == "function" ? type : null,
8414  clazz : clazz,
8415  inFront: !!inFront,
8416  id: id
8417  };
8418 
8419  if (inFront) {
8420  this.$frontMarkers[id] = marker;
8421  this._signal("changeFrontMarker");
8422  } else {
8423  this.$backMarkers[id] = marker;
8424  this._signal("changeBackMarker");
8425  }
8426 
8427  return id;
8428  };
8429  this.addDynamicMarker = function(marker, inFront) {
8430  if (!marker.update)
8431  return;
8432  var id = this.$markerId++;
8433  marker.id = id;
8434  marker.inFront = !!inFront;
8435 
8436  if (inFront) {
8437  this.$frontMarkers[id] = marker;
8438  this._signal("changeFrontMarker");
8439  } else {
8440  this.$backMarkers[id] = marker;
8441  this._signal("changeBackMarker");
8442  }
8443 
8444  return marker;
8445  };
8446  this.removeMarker = function(markerId) {
8447  var marker = this.$frontMarkers[markerId] || this.$backMarkers[markerId];
8448  if (!marker)
8449  return;
8450 
8451  var markers = marker.inFront ? this.$frontMarkers : this.$backMarkers;
8452  if (marker) {
8453  delete (markers[markerId]);
8454  this._signal(marker.inFront ? "changeFrontMarker" : "changeBackMarker");
8455  }
8456  };
8457  this.getMarkers = function(inFront) {
8458  return inFront ? this.$frontMarkers : this.$backMarkers;
8459  };
8460 
8461  this.highlight = function(re) {
8462  if (!this.$searchHighlight) {
8463  var highlight = new SearchHighlight(null, "ace_selected-word", "text");
8464  this.$searchHighlight = this.addDynamicMarker(highlight);
8465  }
8466  this.$searchHighlight.setRegexp(re);
8467  };
8468  this.highlightLines = function(startRow, endRow, clazz, inFront) {
8469  if (typeof endRow != "number") {
8470  clazz = endRow;
8471  endRow = startRow;
8472  }
8473  if (!clazz)
8474  clazz = "ace_step";
8475 
8476  var range = new Range(startRow, 0, endRow, Infinity);
8477  range.id = this.addMarker(range, clazz, "fullLine", inFront);
8478  return range;
8479  };
8480  this.setAnnotations = function(annotations) {
8481  this.$annotations = annotations;
8482  this._signal("changeAnnotation", {});
8483  };
8484  this.getAnnotations = function() {
8485  return this.$annotations || [];
8486  };
8487  this.clearAnnotations = function() {
8488  this.setAnnotations([]);
8489  };
8490  this.$detectNewLine = function(text) {
8491  var match = text.match(/^.*?(\r?\n)/m);
8492  if (match) {
8493  this.$autoNewLine = match[1];
8494  } else {
8495  this.$autoNewLine = "\n";
8496  }
8497  };
8498  this.getWordRange = function(row, column) {
8499  var line = this.getLine(row);
8500 
8501  var inToken = false;
8502  if (column > 0)
8503  inToken = !!line.charAt(column - 1).match(this.tokenRe);
8504 
8505  if (!inToken)
8506  inToken = !!line.charAt(column).match(this.tokenRe);
8507 
8508  if (inToken)
8509  var re = this.tokenRe;
8510  else if (/^\s+$/.test(line.slice(column-1, column+1)))
8511  var re = /\s/;
8512  else
8513  var re = this.nonTokenRe;
8514 
8515  var start = column;
8516  if (start > 0) {
8517  do {
8518  start--;
8519  }
8520  while (start >= 0 && line.charAt(start).match(re));
8521  start++;
8522  }
8523 
8524  var end = column;
8525  while (end < line.length && line.charAt(end).match(re)) {
8526  end++;
8527  }
8528 
8529  return new Range(row, start, row, end);
8530  };
8531  this.getAWordRange = function(row, column) {
8532  var wordRange = this.getWordRange(row, column);
8533  var line = this.getLine(wordRange.end.row);
8534 
8535  while (line.charAt(wordRange.end.column).match(/[ \t]/)) {
8536  wordRange.end.column += 1;
8537  }
8538  return wordRange;
8539  };
8540  this.setNewLineMode = function(newLineMode) {
8541  this.doc.setNewLineMode(newLineMode);
8542  };
8543  this.getNewLineMode = function() {
8544  return this.doc.getNewLineMode();
8545  };
8546  this.setUseWorker = function(useWorker) { this.setOption("useWorker", useWorker); };
8547  this.getUseWorker = function() { return this.$useWorker; };
8548  this.onReloadTokenizer = function(e) {
8549  var rows = e.data;
8550  this.bgTokenizer.start(rows.first);
8551  this._signal("tokenizerUpdate", e);
8552  };
8553 
8554  this.$modes = {};
8555  this.$mode = null;
8556  this.$modeId = null;
8557  this.setMode = function(mode, cb) {
8558  if (mode && typeof mode === "object") {
8559  if (mode.getTokenizer)
8560  return this.$onChangeMode(mode);
8561  var options = mode;
8562  var path = options.path;
8563  } else {
8564  path = mode || "ace/mode/text";
8565  }
8566  if (!this.$modes["ace/mode/text"])
8567  this.$modes["ace/mode/text"] = new TextMode();
8568 
8569  if (this.$modes[path] && !options) {
8570  this.$onChangeMode(this.$modes[path]);
8571  cb && cb();
8572  return;
8573  }
8574  this.$modeId = path;
8575  config.loadModule(["mode", path], function(m) {
8576  if (this.$modeId !== path)
8577  return cb && cb();
8578  if (this.$modes[path] && !options)
8579  return this.$onChangeMode(this.$modes[path]);
8580  if (m && m.Mode) {
8581  m = new m.Mode(options);
8582  if (!options) {
8583  this.$modes[path] = m;
8584  m.$id = path;
8585  }
8586  this.$onChangeMode(m);
8587  cb && cb();
8588  }
8589  }.bind(this));
8590  if (!this.$mode)
8591  this.$onChangeMode(this.$modes["ace/mode/text"], true);
8592  };
8593 
8594  this.$onChangeMode = function(mode, $isPlaceholder) {
8595  if (!$isPlaceholder)
8596  this.$modeId = mode.$id;
8597  if (this.$mode === mode)
8598  return;
8599 
8600  this.$mode = mode;
8601 
8602  this.$stopWorker();
8603 
8604  if (this.$useWorker)
8605  this.$startWorker();
8606 
8607  var tokenizer = mode.getTokenizer();
8608 
8609  if(tokenizer.addEventListener !== undefined) {
8610  var onReloadTokenizer = this.onReloadTokenizer.bind(this);
8611  tokenizer.addEventListener("update", onReloadTokenizer);
8612  }
8613 
8614  if (!this.bgTokenizer) {
8615  this.bgTokenizer = new BackgroundTokenizer(tokenizer);
8616  var _self = this;
8617  this.bgTokenizer.addEventListener("update", function(e) {
8618  _self._signal("tokenizerUpdate", e);
8619  });
8620  } else {
8621  this.bgTokenizer.setTokenizer(tokenizer);
8622  }
8623 
8624  this.bgTokenizer.setDocument(this.getDocument());
8625 
8626  this.tokenRe = mode.tokenRe;
8627  this.nonTokenRe = mode.nonTokenRe;
8628 
8629 
8630  if (!$isPlaceholder) {
8631  if (mode.attachToSession)
8632  mode.attachToSession(this);
8633  this.$options.wrapMethod.set.call(this, this.$wrapMethod);
8634  this.$setFolding(mode.foldingRules);
8635  this.bgTokenizer.start(0);
8636  this._emit("changeMode");
8637  }
8638  };
8639 
8640  this.$stopWorker = function() {
8641  if (this.$worker) {
8642  this.$worker.terminate();
8643  this.$worker = null;
8644  }
8645  };
8646 
8647  this.$startWorker = function() {
8648  try {
8649  this.$worker = this.$mode.createWorker(this);
8650  } catch (e) {
8651  config.warn("Could not load worker", e);
8652  this.$worker = null;
8653  }
8654  };
8655  this.getMode = function() {
8656  return this.$mode;
8657  };
8658 
8659  this.$scrollTop = 0;
8660  this.setScrollTop = function(scrollTop) {
8661  if (this.$scrollTop === scrollTop || isNaN(scrollTop))
8662  return;
8663 
8664  this.$scrollTop = scrollTop;
8665  this._signal("changeScrollTop", scrollTop);
8666  };
8667  this.getScrollTop = function() {
8668  return this.$scrollTop;
8669  };
8670 
8671  this.$scrollLeft = 0;
8672  this.setScrollLeft = function(scrollLeft) {
8673  if (this.$scrollLeft === scrollLeft || isNaN(scrollLeft))
8674  return;
8675 
8676  this.$scrollLeft = scrollLeft;
8677  this._signal("changeScrollLeft", scrollLeft);
8678  };
8679  this.getScrollLeft = function() {
8680  return this.$scrollLeft;
8681  };
8682  this.getScreenWidth = function() {
8683  this.$computeWidth();
8684  if (this.lineWidgets)
8685  return Math.max(this.getLineWidgetMaxWidth(), this.screenWidth);
8686  return this.screenWidth;
8687  };
8688 
8689  this.getLineWidgetMaxWidth = function() {
8690  if (this.lineWidgetsWidth != null) return this.lineWidgetsWidth;
8691  var width = 0;
8692  this.lineWidgets.forEach(function(w) {
8693  if (w && w.screenWidth > width)
8694  width = w.screenWidth;
8695  });
8696  return this.lineWidgetWidth = width;
8697  };
8698 
8699  this.$computeWidth = function(force) {
8700  if (this.$modified || force) {
8701  this.$modified = false;
8702 
8703  if (this.$useWrapMode)
8704  return this.screenWidth = this.$wrapLimit;
8705 
8706  var lines = this.doc.getAllLines();
8707  var cache = this.$rowLengthCache;
8708  var longestScreenLine = 0;
8709  var foldIndex = 0;
8710  var foldLine = this.$foldData[foldIndex];
8711  var foldStart = foldLine ? foldLine.start.row : Infinity;
8712  var len = lines.length;
8713 
8714  for (var i = 0; i < len; i++) {
8715  if (i > foldStart) {
8716  i = foldLine.end.row + 1;
8717  if (i >= len)
8718  break;
8719  foldLine = this.$foldData[foldIndex++];
8720  foldStart = foldLine ? foldLine.start.row : Infinity;
8721  }
8722 
8723  if (cache[i] == null)
8724  cache[i] = this.$getStringScreenWidth(lines[i])[0];
8725 
8726  if (cache[i] > longestScreenLine)
8727  longestScreenLine = cache[i];
8728  }
8729  this.screenWidth = longestScreenLine;
8730  }
8731  };
8732  this.getLine = function(row) {
8733  return this.doc.getLine(row);
8734  };
8735  this.getLines = function(firstRow, lastRow) {
8736  return this.doc.getLines(firstRow, lastRow);
8737  };
8738  this.getLength = function() {
8739  return this.doc.getLength();
8740  };
8741  this.getTextRange = function(range) {
8742  return this.doc.getTextRange(range || this.selection.getRange());
8743  };
8744  this.insert = function(position, text) {
8745  return this.doc.insert(position, text);
8746  };
8747  this.remove = function(range) {
8748  return this.doc.remove(range);
8749  };
8750  this.undoChanges = function(deltas, dontSelect) {
8751  if (!deltas.length)
8752  return;
8753 
8754  this.$fromUndo = true;
8755  var lastUndoRange = null;
8756  for (var i = deltas.length - 1; i != -1; i--) {
8757  var delta = deltas[i];
8758  if (delta.group == "doc") {
8759  this.doc.revertDeltas(delta.deltas);
8760  lastUndoRange =
8761  this.$getUndoSelection(delta.deltas, true, lastUndoRange);
8762  } else {
8763  delta.deltas.forEach(function(foldDelta) {
8764  this.addFolds(foldDelta.folds);
8765  }, this);
8766  }
8767  }
8768  this.$fromUndo = false;
8769  lastUndoRange &&
8770  this.$undoSelect &&
8771  !dontSelect &&
8772  this.selection.setSelectionRange(lastUndoRange);
8773  return lastUndoRange;
8774  };
8775  this.redoChanges = function(deltas, dontSelect) {
8776  if (!deltas.length)
8777  return;
8778 
8779  this.$fromUndo = true;
8780  var lastUndoRange = null;
8781  for (var i = 0; i < deltas.length; i++) {
8782  var delta = deltas[i];
8783  if (delta.group == "doc") {
8784  this.doc.applyDeltas(delta.deltas);
8785  lastUndoRange =
8786  this.$getUndoSelection(delta.deltas, false, lastUndoRange);
8787  }
8788  }
8789  this.$fromUndo = false;
8790  lastUndoRange &&
8791  this.$undoSelect &&
8792  !dontSelect &&
8793  this.selection.setSelectionRange(lastUndoRange);
8794  return lastUndoRange;
8795  };
8796  this.setUndoSelect = function(enable) {
8797  this.$undoSelect = enable;
8798  };
8799 
8800  this.$getUndoSelection = function(deltas, isUndo, lastUndoRange) {
8801  function isInsert(delta) {
8802  var insert =
8803  delta.action === "insertText" || delta.action === "insertLines";
8804  return isUndo ? !insert : insert;
8805  }
8806 
8807  var delta = deltas[0];
8808  var range, point;
8809  var lastDeltaIsInsert = false;
8810  if (isInsert(delta)) {
8811  range = Range.fromPoints(delta.range.start, delta.range.end);
8812  lastDeltaIsInsert = true;
8813  } else {
8814  range = Range.fromPoints(delta.range.start, delta.range.start);
8815  lastDeltaIsInsert = false;
8816  }
8817 
8818  for (var i = 1; i < deltas.length; i++) {
8819  delta = deltas[i];
8820  if (isInsert(delta)) {
8821  point = delta.range.start;
8822  if (range.compare(point.row, point.column) == -1) {
8823  range.setStart(delta.range.start);
8824  }
8825  point = delta.range.end;
8826  if (range.compare(point.row, point.column) == 1) {
8827  range.setEnd(delta.range.end);
8828  }
8829  lastDeltaIsInsert = true;
8830  } else {
8831  point = delta.range.start;
8832  if (range.compare(point.row, point.column) == -1) {
8833  range =
8834  Range.fromPoints(delta.range.start, delta.range.start);
8835  }
8836  lastDeltaIsInsert = false;
8837  }
8838  }
8839  if (lastUndoRange != null) {
8840  if (Range.comparePoints(lastUndoRange.start, range.start) === 0) {
8841  lastUndoRange.start.column += range.end.column - range.start.column;
8842  lastUndoRange.end.column += range.end.column - range.start.column;
8843  }
8844 
8845  var cmp = lastUndoRange.compareRange(range);
8846  if (cmp == 1) {
8847  range.setStart(lastUndoRange.start);
8848  } else if (cmp == -1) {
8849  range.setEnd(lastUndoRange.end);
8850  }
8851  }
8852 
8853  return range;
8854  };
8855  this.replace = function(range, text) {
8856  return this.doc.replace(range, text);
8857  };
8858  this.moveText = function(fromRange, toPosition, copy) {
8859  var text = this.getTextRange(fromRange);
8860  var folds = this.getFoldsInRange(fromRange);
8861 
8862  var toRange = Range.fromPoints(toPosition, toPosition);
8863  if (!copy) {
8864  this.remove(fromRange);
8865  var rowDiff = fromRange.start.row - fromRange.end.row;
8866  var collDiff = rowDiff ? -fromRange.end.column : fromRange.start.column - fromRange.end.column;
8867  if (collDiff) {
8868  if (toRange.start.row == fromRange.end.row && toRange.start.column > fromRange.end.column)
8869  toRange.start.column += collDiff;
8870  if (toRange.end.row == fromRange.end.row && toRange.end.column > fromRange.end.column)
8871  toRange.end.column += collDiff;
8872  }
8873  if (rowDiff && toRange.start.row >= fromRange.end.row) {
8874  toRange.start.row += rowDiff;
8875  toRange.end.row += rowDiff;
8876  }
8877  }
8878 
8879  toRange.end = this.insert(toRange.start, text);
8880  if (folds.length) {
8881  var oldStart = fromRange.start;
8882  var newStart = toRange.start;
8883  var rowDiff = newStart.row - oldStart.row;
8884  var collDiff = newStart.column - oldStart.column;
8885  this.addFolds(folds.map(function(x) {
8886  x = x.clone();
8887  if (x.start.row == oldStart.row)
8888  x.start.column += collDiff;
8889  if (x.end.row == oldStart.row)
8890  x.end.column += collDiff;
8891  x.start.row += rowDiff;
8892  x.end.row += rowDiff;
8893  return x;
8894  }));
8895  }
8896 
8897  return toRange;
8898  };
8899  this.indentRows = function(startRow, endRow, indentString) {
8900  indentString = indentString.replace(/\t/g, this.getTabString());
8901  for (var row=startRow; row<=endRow; row++)
8902  this.insert({row: row, column:0}, indentString);
8903  };
8904  this.outdentRows = function (range) {
8905  var rowRange = range.collapseRows();
8906  var deleteRange = new Range(0, 0, 0, 0);
8907  var size = this.getTabSize();
8908 
8909  for (var i = rowRange.start.row; i <= rowRange.end.row; ++i) {
8910  var line = this.getLine(i);
8911 
8912  deleteRange.start.row = i;
8913  deleteRange.end.row = i;
8914  for (var j = 0; j < size; ++j)
8915  if (line.charAt(j) != ' ')
8916  break;
8917  if (j < size && line.charAt(j) == '\t') {
8918  deleteRange.start.column = j;
8919  deleteRange.end.column = j + 1;
8920  } else {
8921  deleteRange.start.column = 0;
8922  deleteRange.end.column = j;
8923  }
8924  this.remove(deleteRange);
8925  }
8926  };
8927 
8928  this.$moveLines = function(firstRow, lastRow, dir) {
8929  firstRow = this.getRowFoldStart(firstRow);
8930  lastRow = this.getRowFoldEnd(lastRow);
8931  if (dir < 0) {
8932  var row = this.getRowFoldStart(firstRow + dir);
8933  if (row < 0) return 0;
8934  var diff = row-firstRow;
8935  } else if (dir > 0) {
8936  var row = this.getRowFoldEnd(lastRow + dir);
8937  if (row > this.doc.getLength()-1) return 0;
8938  var diff = row-lastRow;
8939  } else {
8940  firstRow = this.$clipRowToDocument(firstRow);
8941  lastRow = this.$clipRowToDocument(lastRow);
8942  var diff = lastRow - firstRow + 1;
8943  }
8944 
8945  var range = new Range(firstRow, 0, lastRow, Number.MAX_VALUE);
8946  var folds = this.getFoldsInRange(range).map(function(x){
8947  x = x.clone();
8948  x.start.row += diff;
8949  x.end.row += diff;
8950  return x;
8951  });
8952 
8953  var lines = dir == 0
8954  ? this.doc.getLines(firstRow, lastRow)
8955  : this.doc.removeLines(firstRow, lastRow);
8956  this.doc.insertLines(firstRow+diff, lines);
8957  folds.length && this.addFolds(folds);
8958  return diff;
8959  };
8960  this.moveLinesUp = function(firstRow, lastRow) {
8961  return this.$moveLines(firstRow, lastRow, -1);
8962  };
8963  this.moveLinesDown = function(firstRow, lastRow) {
8964  return this.$moveLines(firstRow, lastRow, 1);
8965  };
8966  this.duplicateLines = function(firstRow, lastRow) {
8967  return this.$moveLines(firstRow, lastRow, 0);
8968  };
8969 
8970 
8971  this.$clipRowToDocument = function(row) {
8972  return Math.max(0, Math.min(row, this.doc.getLength()-1));
8973  };
8974 
8975  this.$clipColumnToRow = function(row, column) {
8976  if (column < 0)
8977  return 0;
8978  return Math.min(this.doc.getLine(row).length, column);
8979  };
8980 
8981 
8982  this.$clipPositionToDocument = function(row, column) {
8983  column = Math.max(0, column);
8984 
8985  if (row < 0) {
8986  row = 0;
8987  column = 0;
8988  } else {
8989  var len = this.doc.getLength();
8990  if (row >= len) {
8991  row = len - 1;
8992  column = this.doc.getLine(len-1).length;
8993  } else {
8994  column = Math.min(this.doc.getLine(row).length, column);
8995  }
8996  }
8997 
8998  return {
8999  row: row,
9000  column: column
9001  };
9002  };
9003 
9004  this.$clipRangeToDocument = function(range) {
9005  if (range.start.row < 0) {
9006  range.start.row = 0;
9007  range.start.column = 0;
9008  } else {
9009  range.start.column = this.$clipColumnToRow(
9010  range.start.row,
9011  range.start.column
9012  );
9013  }
9014 
9015  var len = this.doc.getLength() - 1;
9016  if (range.end.row > len) {
9017  range.end.row = len;
9018  range.end.column = this.doc.getLine(len).length;
9019  } else {
9020  range.end.column = this.$clipColumnToRow(
9021  range.end.row,
9022  range.end.column
9023  );
9024  }
9025  return range;
9026  };
9027  this.$wrapLimit = 80;
9028  this.$useWrapMode = false;
9029  this.$wrapLimitRange = {
9030  min : null,
9031  max : null
9032  };
9033  this.setUseWrapMode = function(useWrapMode) {
9034  if (useWrapMode != this.$useWrapMode) {
9035  this.$useWrapMode = useWrapMode;
9036  this.$modified = true;
9037  this.$resetRowCache(0);
9038  if (useWrapMode) {
9039  var len = this.getLength();
9040  this.$wrapData = Array(len);
9041  this.$updateWrapData(0, len - 1);
9042  }
9043 
9044  this._signal("changeWrapMode");
9045  }
9046  };
9047  this.getUseWrapMode = function() {
9048  return this.$useWrapMode;
9049  };
9050  this.setWrapLimitRange = function(min, max) {
9051  if (this.$wrapLimitRange.min !== min || this.$wrapLimitRange.max !== max) {
9052  this.$wrapLimitRange = {
9053  min: min,
9054  max: max
9055  };
9056  this.$modified = true;
9057  this._signal("changeWrapMode");
9058  }
9059  };
9060  this.adjustWrapLimit = function(desiredLimit, $printMargin) {
9061  var limits = this.$wrapLimitRange;
9062  if (limits.max < 0)
9063  limits = {min: $printMargin, max: $printMargin};
9064  var wrapLimit = this.$constrainWrapLimit(desiredLimit, limits.min, limits.max);
9065  if (wrapLimit != this.$wrapLimit && wrapLimit > 1) {
9066  this.$wrapLimit = wrapLimit;
9067  this.$modified = true;
9068  if (this.$useWrapMode) {
9069  this.$updateWrapData(0, this.getLength() - 1);
9070  this.$resetRowCache(0);
9071  this._signal("changeWrapLimit");
9072  }
9073  return true;
9074  }
9075  return false;
9076  };
9077 
9078  this.$constrainWrapLimit = function(wrapLimit, min, max) {
9079  if (min)
9080  wrapLimit = Math.max(min, wrapLimit);
9081 
9082  if (max)
9083  wrapLimit = Math.min(max, wrapLimit);
9084 
9085  return wrapLimit;
9086  };
9087  this.getWrapLimit = function() {
9088  return this.$wrapLimit;
9089  };
9090  this.setWrapLimit = function (limit) {
9091  this.setWrapLimitRange(limit, limit);
9092  };
9093  this.getWrapLimitRange = function() {
9094  return {
9095  min : this.$wrapLimitRange.min,
9096  max : this.$wrapLimitRange.max
9097  };
9098  };
9099 
9100  this.$updateInternalDataOnChange = function(e) {
9101  var useWrapMode = this.$useWrapMode;
9102  var len;
9103  var action = e.data.action;
9104  var firstRow = e.data.range.start.row;
9105  var lastRow = e.data.range.end.row;
9106  var start = e.data.range.start;
9107  var end = e.data.range.end;
9108  var removedFolds = null;
9109 
9110  if (action.indexOf("Lines") != -1) {
9111  if (action == "insertLines") {
9112  lastRow = firstRow + (e.data.lines.length);
9113  } else {
9114  lastRow = firstRow;
9115  }
9116  len = e.data.lines ? e.data.lines.length : lastRow - firstRow;
9117  } else {
9118  len = lastRow - firstRow;
9119  }
9120 
9121  this.$updating = true;
9122  if (len != 0) {
9123  if (action.indexOf("remove") != -1) {
9124  this[useWrapMode ? "$wrapData" : "$rowLengthCache"].splice(firstRow, len);
9125 
9126  var foldLines = this.$foldData;
9127  removedFolds = this.getFoldsInRange(e.data.range);
9128  this.removeFolds(removedFolds);
9129 
9130  var foldLine = this.getFoldLine(end.row);
9131  var idx = 0;
9132  if (foldLine) {
9133  foldLine.addRemoveChars(end.row, end.column, start.column - end.column);
9134  foldLine.shiftRow(-len);
9135 
9136  var foldLineBefore = this.getFoldLine(firstRow);
9137  if (foldLineBefore && foldLineBefore !== foldLine) {
9138  foldLineBefore.merge(foldLine);
9139  foldLine = foldLineBefore;
9140  }
9141  idx = foldLines.indexOf(foldLine) + 1;
9142  }
9143 
9144  for (idx; idx < foldLines.length; idx++) {
9145  var foldLine = foldLines[idx];
9146  if (foldLine.start.row >= end.row) {
9147  foldLine.shiftRow(-len);
9148  }
9149  }
9150 
9151  lastRow = firstRow;
9152  } else {
9153  var args = Array(len);
9154  args.unshift(firstRow, 0);
9155  var arr = useWrapMode ? this.$wrapData : this.$rowLengthCache
9156  arr.splice.apply(arr, args);
9157  var foldLines = this.$foldData;
9158  var foldLine = this.getFoldLine(firstRow);
9159  var idx = 0;
9160  if (foldLine) {
9161  var cmp = foldLine.range.compareInside(start.row, start.column);
9162  if (cmp == 0) {
9163  foldLine = foldLine.split(start.row, start.column);
9164  if (foldLine) {
9165  foldLine.shiftRow(len);
9166  foldLine.addRemoveChars(lastRow, 0, end.column - start.column);
9167  }
9168  } else
9169  if (cmp == -1) {
9170  foldLine.addRemoveChars(firstRow, 0, end.column - start.column);
9171  foldLine.shiftRow(len);
9172  }
9173  idx = foldLines.indexOf(foldLine) + 1;
9174  }
9175 
9176  for (idx; idx < foldLines.length; idx++) {
9177  var foldLine = foldLines[idx];
9178  if (foldLine.start.row >= firstRow) {
9179  foldLine.shiftRow(len);
9180  }
9181  }
9182  }
9183  } else {
9184  len = Math.abs(e.data.range.start.column - e.data.range.end.column);
9185  if (action.indexOf("remove") != -1) {
9186  removedFolds = this.getFoldsInRange(e.data.range);
9187  this.removeFolds(removedFolds);
9188 
9189  len = -len;
9190  }
9191  var foldLine = this.getFoldLine(firstRow);
9192  if (foldLine) {
9193  foldLine.addRemoveChars(firstRow, start.column, len);
9194  }
9195  }
9196 
9197  if (useWrapMode && this.$wrapData.length != this.doc.getLength()) {
9198  console.error("doc.getLength() and $wrapData.length have to be the same!");
9199  }
9200  this.$updating = false;
9201 
9202  if (useWrapMode)
9203  this.$updateWrapData(firstRow, lastRow);
9204  else
9205  this.$updateRowLengthCache(firstRow, lastRow);
9206 
9207  return removedFolds;
9208  };
9209 
9210  this.$updateRowLengthCache = function(firstRow, lastRow, b) {
9211  this.$rowLengthCache[firstRow] = null;
9212  this.$rowLengthCache[lastRow] = null;
9213  };
9214 
9215  this.$updateWrapData = function(firstRow, lastRow) {
9216  var lines = this.doc.getAllLines();
9217  var tabSize = this.getTabSize();
9218  var wrapData = this.$wrapData;
9219  var wrapLimit = this.$wrapLimit;
9220  var tokens;
9221  var foldLine;
9222 
9223  var row = firstRow;
9224  lastRow = Math.min(lastRow, lines.length - 1);
9225  while (row <= lastRow) {
9226  foldLine = this.getFoldLine(row, foldLine);
9227  if (!foldLine) {
9228  tokens = this.$getDisplayTokens(lines[row]);
9229  wrapData[row] = this.$computeWrapSplits(tokens, wrapLimit, tabSize);
9230  row ++;
9231  } else {
9232  tokens = [];
9233  foldLine.walk(function(placeholder, row, column, lastColumn) {
9234  var walkTokens;
9235  if (placeholder != null) {
9236  walkTokens = this.$getDisplayTokens(
9237  placeholder, tokens.length);
9238  walkTokens[0] = PLACEHOLDER_START;
9239  for (var i = 1; i < walkTokens.length; i++) {
9240  walkTokens[i] = PLACEHOLDER_BODY;
9241  }
9242  } else {
9243  walkTokens = this.$getDisplayTokens(
9244  lines[row].substring(lastColumn, column),
9245  tokens.length);
9246  }
9247  tokens = tokens.concat(walkTokens);
9248  }.bind(this),
9249  foldLine.end.row,
9250  lines[foldLine.end.row].length + 1
9251  );
9252 
9253  wrapData[foldLine.start.row] = this.$computeWrapSplits(tokens, wrapLimit, tabSize);
9254  row = foldLine.end.row + 1;
9255  }
9256  }
9257  };
9258  var CHAR = 1,
9259  CHAR_EXT = 2,
9260  PLACEHOLDER_START = 3,
9261  PLACEHOLDER_BODY = 4,
9262  PUNCTUATION = 9,
9263  SPACE = 10,
9264  TAB = 11,
9265  TAB_SPACE = 12;
9266 
9267 
9268  this.$computeWrapSplits = function(tokens, wrapLimit) {
9269  if (tokens.length == 0) {
9270  return [];
9271  }
9272 
9273  var splits = [];
9274  var displayLength = tokens.length;
9275  var lastSplit = 0, lastDocSplit = 0;
9276 
9277  var isCode = this.$wrapAsCode;
9278 
9279  function addSplit(screenPos) {
9280  var displayed = tokens.slice(lastSplit, screenPos);
9281  var len = displayed.length;
9282  displayed.join("").
9283  replace(/12/g, function() {
9284  len -= 1;
9285  }).
9286  replace(/2/g, function() {
9287  len -= 1;
9288  });
9289 
9290  lastDocSplit += len;
9291  splits.push(lastDocSplit);
9292  lastSplit = screenPos;
9293  }
9294 
9295  while (displayLength - lastSplit > wrapLimit) {
9296  var split = lastSplit + wrapLimit;
9297  if (tokens[split - 1] >= SPACE && tokens[split] >= SPACE) {
9298  addSplit(split);
9299  continue;
9300  }
9301  if (tokens[split] == PLACEHOLDER_START || tokens[split] == PLACEHOLDER_BODY) {
9302  for (split; split != lastSplit - 1; split--) {
9303  if (tokens[split] == PLACEHOLDER_START) {
9304  break;
9305  }
9306  }
9307  if (split > lastSplit) {
9308  addSplit(split);
9309  continue;
9310  }
9311  split = lastSplit + wrapLimit;
9312  for (split; split < tokens.length; split++) {
9313  if (tokens[split] != PLACEHOLDER_BODY) {
9314  break;
9315  }
9316  }
9317  if (split == tokens.length) {
9318  break; // Breaks the while-loop.
9319  }
9320  addSplit(split);
9321  continue;
9322  }
9323  var minSplit = Math.max(split - (isCode ? 10 : wrapLimit-(wrapLimit>>2)), lastSplit - 1);
9324  while (split > minSplit && tokens[split] < PLACEHOLDER_START) {
9325  split --;
9326  }
9327  if (isCode) {
9328  while (split > minSplit && tokens[split] < PLACEHOLDER_START) {
9329  split --;
9330  }
9331  while (split > minSplit && tokens[split] == PUNCTUATION) {
9332  split --;
9333  }
9334  } else {
9335  while (split > minSplit && tokens[split] < SPACE) {
9336  split --;
9337  }
9338  }
9339  if (split > minSplit) {
9340  addSplit(++split);
9341  continue;
9342  }
9343  split = lastSplit + wrapLimit;
9344  if (tokens[split] == CHAR_EXT)
9345  split--;
9346  addSplit(split);
9347  }
9348  return splits;
9349  };
9350  this.$getDisplayTokens = function(str, offset) {
9351  var arr = [];
9352  var tabSize;
9353  offset = offset || 0;
9354 
9355  for (var i = 0; i < str.length; i++) {
9356  var c = str.charCodeAt(i);
9357  if (c == 9) {
9358  tabSize = this.getScreenTabSize(arr.length + offset);
9359  arr.push(TAB);
9360  for (var n = 1; n < tabSize; n++) {
9361  arr.push(TAB_SPACE);
9362  }
9363  }
9364  else if (c == 32) {
9365  arr.push(SPACE);
9366  } else if((c > 39 && c < 48) || (c > 57 && c < 64)) {
9367  arr.push(PUNCTUATION);
9368  }
9369  else if (c >= 0x1100 && isFullWidth(c)) {
9370  arr.push(CHAR, CHAR_EXT);
9371  } else {
9372  arr.push(CHAR);
9373  }
9374  }
9375  return arr;
9376  };
9377  this.$getStringScreenWidth = function(str, maxScreenColumn, screenColumn) {
9378  if (maxScreenColumn == 0)
9379  return [0, 0];
9380  if (maxScreenColumn == null)
9381  maxScreenColumn = Infinity;
9382  screenColumn = screenColumn || 0;
9383 
9384  var c, column;
9385  for (column = 0; column < str.length; column++) {
9386  c = str.charCodeAt(column);
9387  if (c == 9) {
9388  screenColumn += this.getScreenTabSize(screenColumn);
9389  }
9390  else if (c >= 0x1100 && isFullWidth(c)) {
9391  screenColumn += 2;
9392  } else {
9393  screenColumn += 1;
9394  }
9395  if (screenColumn > maxScreenColumn) {
9396  break;
9397  }
9398  }
9399 
9400  return [screenColumn, column];
9401  };
9402 
9403  this.lineWidgets = null;
9404  this.getRowLength = function(row) {
9405  if (this.lineWidgets)
9406  var h = this.lineWidgets[row] && this.lineWidgets[row].rowCount || 0;
9407  else
9408  h = 0
9409  if (!this.$useWrapMode || !this.$wrapData[row]) {
9410  return 1 + h;
9411  } else {
9412  return this.$wrapData[row].length + 1 + h;
9413  }
9414  };
9415  this.getRowLineCount = function(row) {
9416  if (!this.$useWrapMode || !this.$wrapData[row]) {
9417  return 1;
9418  } else {
9419  return this.$wrapData[row].length + 1;
9420  }
9421  };
9422  this.getScreenLastRowColumn = function(screenRow) {
9423  var pos = this.screenToDocumentPosition(screenRow, Number.MAX_VALUE);
9424  return this.documentToScreenColumn(pos.row, pos.column);
9425  };
9426  this.getDocumentLastRowColumn = function(docRow, docColumn) {
9427  var screenRow = this.documentToScreenRow(docRow, docColumn);
9428  return this.getScreenLastRowColumn(screenRow);
9429  };
9430  this.getDocumentLastRowColumnPosition = function(docRow, docColumn) {
9431  var screenRow = this.documentToScreenRow(docRow, docColumn);
9432  return this.screenToDocumentPosition(screenRow, Number.MAX_VALUE / 10);
9433  };
9434  this.getRowSplitData = function(row) {
9435  if (!this.$useWrapMode) {
9436  return undefined;
9437  } else {
9438  return this.$wrapData[row];
9439  }
9440  };
9441  this.getScreenTabSize = function(screenColumn) {
9442  return this.$tabSize - screenColumn % this.$tabSize;
9443  };
9444 
9445 
9446  this.screenToDocumentRow = function(screenRow, screenColumn) {
9447  return this.screenToDocumentPosition(screenRow, screenColumn).row;
9448  };
9449 
9450 
9451  this.screenToDocumentColumn = function(screenRow, screenColumn) {
9452  return this.screenToDocumentPosition(screenRow, screenColumn).column;
9453  };
9454  this.screenToDocumentPosition = function(screenRow, screenColumn) {
9455  if (screenRow < 0)
9456  return {row: 0, column: 0};
9457 
9458  var line;
9459  var docRow = 0;
9460  var docColumn = 0;
9461  var column;
9462  var row = 0;
9463  var rowLength = 0;
9464 
9465  var rowCache = this.$screenRowCache;
9466  var i = this.$getRowCacheIndex(rowCache, screenRow);
9467  var l = rowCache.length;
9468  if (l && i >= 0) {
9469  var row = rowCache[i];
9470  var docRow = this.$docRowCache[i];
9471  var doCache = screenRow > rowCache[l - 1];
9472  } else {
9473  var doCache = !l;
9474  }
9475 
9476  var maxRow = this.getLength() - 1;
9477  var foldLine = this.getNextFoldLine(docRow);
9478  var foldStart = foldLine ? foldLine.start.row : Infinity;
9479 
9480  while (row <= screenRow) {
9481  rowLength = this.getRowLength(docRow);
9482  if (row + rowLength > screenRow || docRow >= maxRow) {
9483  break;
9484  } else {
9485  row += rowLength;
9486  docRow++;
9487  if (docRow > foldStart) {
9488  docRow = foldLine.end.row+1;
9489  foldLine = this.getNextFoldLine(docRow, foldLine);
9490  foldStart = foldLine ? foldLine.start.row : Infinity;
9491  }
9492  }
9493 
9494  if (doCache) {
9495  this.$docRowCache.push(docRow);
9496  this.$screenRowCache.push(row);
9497  }
9498  }
9499 
9500  if (foldLine && foldLine.start.row <= docRow) {
9501  line = this.getFoldDisplayLine(foldLine);
9502  docRow = foldLine.start.row;
9503  } else if (row + rowLength <= screenRow || docRow > maxRow) {
9504  return {
9505  row: maxRow,
9506  column: this.getLine(maxRow).length
9507  };
9508  } else {
9509  line = this.getLine(docRow);
9510  foldLine = null;
9511  }
9512 
9513  if (this.$useWrapMode) {
9514  var splits = this.$wrapData[docRow];
9515  if (splits) {
9516  var splitIndex = Math.floor(screenRow - row);
9517  column = splits[splitIndex];
9518  if(splitIndex > 0 && splits.length) {
9519  docColumn = splits[splitIndex - 1] || splits[splits.length - 1];
9520  line = line.substring(docColumn);
9521  }
9522  }
9523  }
9524 
9525  docColumn += this.$getStringScreenWidth(line, screenColumn)[1];
9526  if (this.$useWrapMode && docColumn >= column)
9527  docColumn = column - 1;
9528 
9529  if (foldLine)
9530  return foldLine.idxToPosition(docColumn);
9531 
9532  return {row: docRow, column: docColumn};
9533  };
9534  this.documentToScreenPosition = function(docRow, docColumn) {
9535  if (typeof docColumn === "undefined")
9536  var pos = this.$clipPositionToDocument(docRow.row, docRow.column);
9537  else
9538  pos = this.$clipPositionToDocument(docRow, docColumn);
9539 
9540  docRow = pos.row;
9541  docColumn = pos.column;
9542 
9543  var screenRow = 0;
9544  var foldStartRow = null;
9545  var fold = null;
9546  fold = this.getFoldAt(docRow, docColumn, 1);
9547  if (fold) {
9548  docRow = fold.start.row;
9549  docColumn = fold.start.column;
9550  }
9551 
9552  var rowEnd, row = 0;
9553 
9554 
9555  var rowCache = this.$docRowCache;
9556  var i = this.$getRowCacheIndex(rowCache, docRow);
9557  var l = rowCache.length;
9558  if (l && i >= 0) {
9559  var row = rowCache[i];
9560  var screenRow = this.$screenRowCache[i];
9561  var doCache = docRow > rowCache[l - 1];
9562  } else {
9563  var doCache = !l;
9564  }
9565 
9566  var foldLine = this.getNextFoldLine(row);
9567  var foldStart = foldLine ?foldLine.start.row :Infinity;
9568 
9569  while (row < docRow) {
9570  if (row >= foldStart) {
9571  rowEnd = foldLine.end.row + 1;
9572  if (rowEnd > docRow)
9573  break;
9574  foldLine = this.getNextFoldLine(rowEnd, foldLine);
9575  foldStart = foldLine ?foldLine.start.row :Infinity;
9576  }
9577  else {
9578  rowEnd = row + 1;
9579  }
9580 
9581  screenRow += this.getRowLength(row);
9582  row = rowEnd;
9583 
9584  if (doCache) {
9585  this.$docRowCache.push(row);
9586  this.$screenRowCache.push(screenRow);
9587  }
9588  }
9589  var textLine = "";
9590  if (foldLine && row >= foldStart) {
9591  textLine = this.getFoldDisplayLine(foldLine, docRow, docColumn);
9592  foldStartRow = foldLine.start.row;
9593  } else {
9594  textLine = this.getLine(docRow).substring(0, docColumn);
9595  foldStartRow = docRow;
9596  }
9597  if (this.$useWrapMode) {
9598  var wrapRow = this.$wrapData[foldStartRow];
9599  if (wrapRow) {
9600  var screenRowOffset = 0;
9601  while (textLine.length >= wrapRow[screenRowOffset]) {
9602  screenRow ++;
9603  screenRowOffset++;
9604  }
9605  textLine = textLine.substring(
9606  wrapRow[screenRowOffset - 1] || 0, textLine.length
9607  );
9608  }
9609  }
9610 
9611  return {
9612  row: screenRow,
9613  column: this.$getStringScreenWidth(textLine)[0]
9614  };
9615  };
9616  this.documentToScreenColumn = function(row, docColumn) {
9617  return this.documentToScreenPosition(row, docColumn).column;
9618  };
9619  this.documentToScreenRow = function(docRow, docColumn) {
9620  return this.documentToScreenPosition(docRow, docColumn).row;
9621  };
9622  this.getScreenLength = function() {
9623  var screenRows = 0;
9624  var fold = null;
9625  if (!this.$useWrapMode) {
9626  screenRows = this.getLength();
9627  var foldData = this.$foldData;
9628  for (var i = 0; i < foldData.length; i++) {
9629  fold = foldData[i];
9630  screenRows -= fold.end.row - fold.start.row;
9631  }
9632  } else {
9633  var lastRow = this.$wrapData.length;
9634  var row = 0, i = 0;
9635  var fold = this.$foldData[i++];
9636  var foldStart = fold ? fold.start.row :Infinity;
9637 
9638  while (row < lastRow) {
9639  var splits = this.$wrapData[row];
9640  screenRows += splits ? splits.length + 1 : 1;
9641  row ++;
9642  if (row > foldStart) {
9643  row = fold.end.row+1;
9644  fold = this.$foldData[i++];
9645  foldStart = fold ?fold.start.row :Infinity;
9646  }
9647  }
9648  }
9649  if (this.lineWidgets)
9650  screenRows += this.$getWidgetScreenLength();
9651 
9652  return screenRows;
9653  };
9654  this.$setFontMetrics = function(fm) {
9655  };
9656 
9657  this.destroy = function() {
9658  if (this.bgTokenizer) {
9659  this.bgTokenizer.setDocument(null);
9660  this.bgTokenizer = null;
9661  }
9662  this.$stopWorker();
9663  };
9664  function isFullWidth(c) {
9665  if (c < 0x1100)
9666  return false;
9667  return c >= 0x1100 && c <= 0x115F ||
9668  c >= 0x11A3 && c <= 0x11A7 ||
9669  c >= 0x11FA && c <= 0x11FF ||
9670  c >= 0x2329 && c <= 0x232A ||
9671  c >= 0x2E80 && c <= 0x2E99 ||
9672  c >= 0x2E9B && c <= 0x2EF3 ||
9673  c >= 0x2F00 && c <= 0x2FD5 ||
9674  c >= 0x2FF0 && c <= 0x2FFB ||
9675  c >= 0x3000 && c <= 0x303E ||
9676  c >= 0x3041 && c <= 0x3096 ||
9677  c >= 0x3099 && c <= 0x30FF ||
9678  c >= 0x3105 && c <= 0x312D ||
9679  c >= 0x3131 && c <= 0x318E ||
9680  c >= 0x3190 && c <= 0x31BA ||
9681  c >= 0x31C0 && c <= 0x31E3 ||
9682  c >= 0x31F0 && c <= 0x321E ||
9683  c >= 0x3220 && c <= 0x3247 ||
9684  c >= 0x3250 && c <= 0x32FE ||
9685  c >= 0x3300 && c <= 0x4DBF ||
9686  c >= 0x4E00 && c <= 0xA48C ||
9687  c >= 0xA490 && c <= 0xA4C6 ||
9688  c >= 0xA960 && c <= 0xA97C ||
9689  c >= 0xAC00 && c <= 0xD7A3 ||
9690  c >= 0xD7B0 && c <= 0xD7C6 ||
9691  c >= 0xD7CB && c <= 0xD7FB ||
9692  c >= 0xF900 && c <= 0xFAFF ||
9693  c >= 0xFE10 && c <= 0xFE19 ||
9694  c >= 0xFE30 && c <= 0xFE52 ||
9695  c >= 0xFE54 && c <= 0xFE66 ||
9696  c >= 0xFE68 && c <= 0xFE6B ||
9697  c >= 0xFF01 && c <= 0xFF60 ||
9698  c >= 0xFFE0 && c <= 0xFFE6;
9699  };
9700 
9701 }).call(EditSession.prototype);
9702 
9703 require("./edit_session/folding").Folding.call(EditSession.prototype);
9704 require("./edit_session/bracket_match").BracketMatch.call(EditSession.prototype);
9705 
9706 
9707 config.defineOptions(EditSession.prototype, "session", {
9708  wrap: {
9709  set: function(value) {
9710  if (!value || value == "off")
9711  value = false;
9712  else if (value == "free")
9713  value = true;
9714  else if (value == "printMargin")
9715  value = -1;
9716  else if (typeof value == "string")
9717  value = parseInt(value, 10) || false;
9718 
9719  if (this.$wrap == value)
9720  return;
9721  if (!value) {
9722  this.setUseWrapMode(false);
9723  } else {
9724  var col = typeof value == "number" ? value : null;
9725  this.setWrapLimitRange(col, col);
9726  this.setUseWrapMode(true);
9727  }
9728  this.$wrap = value;
9729  },
9730  get: function() {
9731  if (this.getUseWrapMode()) {
9732  if (this.$wrap == -1)
9733  return "printMargin";
9734  if (!this.getWrapLimitRange().min)
9735  return "free";
9736  return this.$wrap;
9737  }
9738  return "off";
9739  },
9740  handlesSet: true
9741  },
9742  wrapMethod: {
9743  set: function(val) {
9744  val = val == "auto"
9745  ? this.$mode.type != "text"
9746  : val != "text";
9747  if (val != this.$wrapAsCode) {
9748  this.$wrapAsCode = val;
9749  if (this.$useWrapMode) {
9750  this.$modified = true;
9751  this.$resetRowCache(0);
9752  this.$updateWrapData(0, this.getLength() - 1);
9753  }
9754  }
9755  },
9756  initialValue: "auto"
9757  },
9758  firstLineNumber: {
9759  set: function() {this._signal("changeBreakpoint");},
9760  initialValue: 1
9761  },
9762  useWorker: {
9763  set: function(useWorker) {
9764  this.$useWorker = useWorker;
9765 
9766  this.$stopWorker();
9767  if (useWorker)
9768  this.$startWorker();
9769  },
9770  initialValue: true
9771  },
9772  useSoftTabs: {initialValue: true},
9773  tabSize: {
9774  set: function(tabSize) {
9775  if (isNaN(tabSize) || this.$tabSize === tabSize) return;
9776 
9777  this.$modified = true;
9778  this.$rowLengthCache = [];
9779  this.$tabSize = tabSize;
9780  this._signal("changeTabSize");
9781  },
9782  initialValue: 4,
9783  handlesSet: true
9784  },
9785  overwrite: {
9786  set: function(val) {this._signal("changeOverwrite");},
9787  initialValue: false
9788  },
9789  newLineMode: {
9790  set: function(val) {this.doc.setNewLineMode(val)},
9791  get: function() {return this.doc.getNewLineMode()},
9792  handlesSet: true
9793  },
9794  mode: {
9795  set: function(val) { this.setMode(val) },
9796  get: function() { return this.$modeId }
9797  }
9798 });
9799 
9800 exports.EditSession = EditSession;
9801 });
9802 
9803 define("ace/search",["require","exports","module","ace/lib/lang","ace/lib/oop","ace/range"], function(require, exports, module) {
9804 "use strict";
9805 
9806 var lang = require("./lib/lang");
9807 var oop = require("./lib/oop");
9808 var Range = require("./range").Range;
9809 
9810 var Search = function() {
9811  this.$options = {};
9812 };
9813 
9814 (function() {
9815  this.set = function(options) {
9816  oop.mixin(this.$options, options);
9817  return this;
9818  };
9819  this.getOptions = function() {
9820  return lang.copyObject(this.$options);
9821  };
9822  this.setOptions = function(options) {
9823  this.$options = options;
9824  };
9825  this.find = function(session) {
9826  var options = this.$options;
9827  var iterator = this.$matchIterator(session, options);
9828  if (!iterator)
9829  return false;
9830 
9831  var firstRange = null;
9832  iterator.forEach(function(range, row, offset) {
9833  if (!range.start) {
9834  var column = range.offset + (offset || 0);
9835  firstRange = new Range(row, column, row, column + range.length);
9836  if (!range.length && options.start && options.start.start
9837  && options.skipCurrent != false && firstRange.isEqual(options.start)
9838  ) {
9839  firstRange = null;
9840  return false;
9841  }
9842  } else
9843  firstRange = range;
9844  return true;
9845  });
9846 
9847  return firstRange;
9848  };
9849  this.findAll = function(session) {
9850  var options = this.$options;
9851  if (!options.needle)
9852  return [];
9853  this.$assembleRegExp(options);
9854 
9855  var range = options.range;
9856  var lines = range
9857  ? session.getLines(range.start.row, range.end.row)
9858  : session.doc.getAllLines();
9859 
9860  var ranges = [];
9861  var re = options.re;
9862  if (options.$isMultiLine) {
9863  var len = re.length;
9864  var maxRow = lines.length - len;
9865  var prevRange;
9866  outer: for (var row = re.offset || 0; row <= maxRow; row++) {
9867  for (var j = 0; j < len; j++)
9868  if (lines[row + j].search(re[j]) == -1)
9869  continue outer;
9870 
9871  var startLine = lines[row];
9872  var line = lines[row + len - 1];
9873  var startIndex = startLine.length - startLine.match(re[0])[0].length;
9874  var endIndex = line.match(re[len - 1])[0].length;
9875 
9876  if (prevRange && prevRange.end.row === row &&
9877  prevRange.end.column > startIndex
9878  ) {
9879  continue;
9880  }
9881  ranges.push(prevRange = new Range(
9882  row, startIndex, row + len - 1, endIndex
9883  ));
9884  if (len > 2)
9885  row = row + len - 2;
9886  }
9887  } else {
9888  for (var i = 0; i < lines.length; i++) {
9889  var matches = lang.getMatchOffsets(lines[i], re);
9890  for (var j = 0; j < matches.length; j++) {
9891  var match = matches[j];
9892  ranges.push(new Range(i, match.offset, i, match.offset + match.length));
9893  }
9894  }
9895  }
9896 
9897  if (range) {
9898  var startColumn = range.start.column;
9899  var endColumn = range.start.column;
9900  var i = 0, j = ranges.length - 1;
9901  while (i < j && ranges[i].start.column < startColumn && ranges[i].start.row == range.start.row)
9902  i++;
9903 
9904  while (i < j && ranges[j].end.column > endColumn && ranges[j].end.row == range.end.row)
9905  j--;
9906 
9907  ranges = ranges.slice(i, j + 1);
9908  for (i = 0, j = ranges.length; i < j; i++) {
9909  ranges[i].start.row += range.start.row;
9910  ranges[i].end.row += range.start.row;
9911  }
9912  }
9913 
9914  return ranges;
9915  };
9916  this.replace = function(input, replacement) {
9917  var options = this.$options;
9918 
9919  var re = this.$assembleRegExp(options);
9920  if (options.$isMultiLine)
9921  return replacement;
9922 
9923  if (!re)
9924  return;
9925 
9926  var match = re.exec(input);
9927  if (!match || match[0].length != input.length)
9928  return null;
9929 
9930  replacement = input.replace(re, replacement);
9931  if (options.preserveCase) {
9932  replacement = replacement.split("");
9933  for (var i = Math.min(input.length, input.length); i--; ) {
9934  var ch = input[i];
9935  if (ch && ch.toLowerCase() != ch)
9936  replacement[i] = replacement[i].toUpperCase();
9937  else
9938  replacement[i] = replacement[i].toLowerCase();
9939  }
9940  replacement = replacement.join("");
9941  }
9942 
9943  return replacement;
9944  };
9945 
9946  this.$matchIterator = function(session, options) {
9947  var re = this.$assembleRegExp(options);
9948  if (!re)
9949  return false;
9950 
9951  var callback;
9952  if (options.$isMultiLine) {
9953  var len = re.length;
9954  var matchIterator = function(line, row, offset) {
9955  var startIndex = line.search(re[0]);
9956  if (startIndex == -1)
9957  return;
9958  for (var i = 1; i < len; i++) {
9959  line = session.getLine(row + i);
9960  if (line.search(re[i]) == -1)
9961  return;
9962  }
9963 
9964  var endIndex = line.match(re[len - 1])[0].length;
9965 
9966  var range = new Range(row, startIndex, row + len - 1, endIndex);
9967  if (re.offset == 1) {
9968  range.start.row--;
9969  range.start.column = Number.MAX_VALUE;
9970  } else if (offset)
9971  range.start.column += offset;
9972 
9973  if (callback(range))
9974  return true;
9975  };
9976  } else if (options.backwards) {
9977  var matchIterator = function(line, row, startIndex) {
9978  var matches = lang.getMatchOffsets(line, re);
9979  for (var i = matches.length-1; i >= 0; i--)
9980  if (callback(matches[i], row, startIndex))
9981  return true;
9982  };
9983  } else {
9984  var matchIterator = function(line, row, startIndex) {
9985  var matches = lang.getMatchOffsets(line, re);
9986  for (var i = 0; i < matches.length; i++)
9987  if (callback(matches[i], row, startIndex))
9988  return true;
9989  };
9990  }
9991 
9992  var lineIterator = this.$lineIterator(session, options);
9993 
9994  return {
9995  forEach: function(_callback) {
9996  callback = _callback;
9997  lineIterator.forEach(matchIterator);
9998  }
9999  };
10000  };
10001 
10002  this.$assembleRegExp = function(options, $disableFakeMultiline) {
10003  if (options.needle instanceof RegExp)
10004  return options.re = options.needle;
10005 
10006  var needle = options.needle;
10007 
10008  if (!options.needle)
10009  return options.re = false;
10010 
10011  if (!options.regExp)
10012  needle = lang.escapeRegExp(needle);
10013 
10014  if (options.wholeWord)
10015  needle = "\\b" + needle + "\\b";
10016 
10017  var modifier = options.caseSensitive ? "gm" : "gmi";
10018 
10019  options.$isMultiLine = !$disableFakeMultiline && /[\n\r]/.test(needle);
10020  if (options.$isMultiLine)
10021  return options.re = this.$assembleMultilineRegExp(needle, modifier);
10022 
10023  try {
10024  var re = new RegExp(needle, modifier);
10025  } catch(e) {
10026  re = false;
10027  }
10028  return options.re = re;
10029  };
10030 
10031  this.$assembleMultilineRegExp = function(needle, modifier) {
10032  var parts = needle.replace(/\r\n|\r|\n/g, "$\n^").split("\n");
10033  var re = [];
10034  for (var i = 0; i < parts.length; i++) try {
10035  re.push(new RegExp(parts[i], modifier));
10036  } catch(e) {
10037  return false;
10038  }
10039  if (parts[0] == "") {
10040  re.shift();
10041  re.offset = 1;
10042  } else {
10043  re.offset = 0;
10044  }
10045  return re;
10046  };
10047 
10048  this.$lineIterator = function(session, options) {
10049  var backwards = options.backwards == true;
10050  var skipCurrent = options.skipCurrent != false;
10051 
10052  var range = options.range;
10053  var start = options.start;
10054  if (!start)
10055  start = range ? range[backwards ? "end" : "start"] : session.selection.getRange();
10056 
10057  if (start.start)
10058  start = start[skipCurrent != backwards ? "end" : "start"];
10059 
10060  var firstRow = range ? range.start.row : 0;
10061  var lastRow = range ? range.end.row : session.getLength() - 1;
10062 
10063  var forEach = backwards ? function(callback) {
10064  var row = start.row;
10065 
10066  var line = session.getLine(row).substring(0, start.column);
10067  if (callback(line, row))
10068  return;
10069 
10070  for (row--; row >= firstRow; row--)
10071  if (callback(session.getLine(row), row))
10072  return;
10073 
10074  if (options.wrap == false)
10075  return;
10076 
10077  for (row = lastRow, firstRow = start.row; row >= firstRow; row--)
10078  if (callback(session.getLine(row), row))
10079  return;
10080  } : function(callback) {
10081  var row = start.row;
10082 
10083  var line = session.getLine(row).substr(start.column);
10084  if (callback(line, row, start.column))
10085  return;
10086 
10087  for (row = row+1; row <= lastRow; row++)
10088  if (callback(session.getLine(row), row))
10089  return;
10090 
10091  if (options.wrap == false)
10092  return;
10093 
10094  for (row = firstRow, lastRow = start.row; row <= lastRow; row++)
10095  if (callback(session.getLine(row), row))
10096  return;
10097  };
10098 
10099  return {forEach: forEach};
10100  };
10101 
10102 }).call(Search.prototype);
10103 
10104 exports.Search = Search;
10105 });
10106 
10107 define("ace/keyboard/hash_handler",["require","exports","module","ace/lib/keys","ace/lib/useragent"], function(require, exports, module) {
10108 "use strict";
10109 
10110 var keyUtil = require("../lib/keys");
10111 var useragent = require("../lib/useragent");
10112 var KEY_MODS = keyUtil.KEY_MODS;
10113 
10114 function HashHandler(config, platform) {
10115  this.platform = platform || (useragent.isMac ? "mac" : "win");
10116  this.commands = {};
10117  this.commandKeyBinding = {};
10118  this.addCommands(config);
10119  this.$singleCommand = true;
10120 }
10121 
10122 function MultiHashHandler(config, platform) {
10123  HashHandler.call(this, config, platform);
10124  this.$singleCommand = false;
10125 }
10126 
10127 MultiHashHandler.prototype = HashHandler.prototype;
10128 
10129 (function() {
10130 
10131 
10132  this.addCommand = function(command) {
10133  if (this.commands[command.name])
10134  this.removeCommand(command);
10135 
10136  this.commands[command.name] = command;
10137 
10138  if (command.bindKey)
10139  this._buildKeyHash(command);
10140  };
10141 
10142  this.removeCommand = function(command, keepCommand) {
10143  var name = command && (typeof command === 'string' ? command : command.name);
10144  command = this.commands[name];
10145  if (!keepCommand)
10146  delete this.commands[name];
10147  var ckb = this.commandKeyBinding;
10148  for (var keyId in ckb) {
10149  var cmdGroup = ckb[keyId];
10150  if (cmdGroup == command) {
10151  delete ckb[keyId];
10152  } else if (Array.isArray(cmdGroup)) {
10153  var i = cmdGroup.indexOf(command);
10154  if (i != -1) {
10155  cmdGroup.splice(i, 1);
10156  if (cmdGroup.length == 1)
10157  ckb[keyId] = cmdGroup[0];
10158  }
10159  }
10160  }
10161  };
10162 
10163  this.bindKey = function(key, command, asDefault) {
10164  if (typeof key == "object")
10165  key = key[this.platform];
10166  if (!key)
10167  return;
10168  if (typeof command == "function")
10169  return this.addCommand({exec: command, bindKey: key, name: command.name || key});
10170 
10171  key.split("|").forEach(function(keyPart) {
10172  var chain = "";
10173  if (keyPart.indexOf(" ") != -1) {
10174  var parts = keyPart.split(/\s+/);
10175  keyPart = parts.pop();
10176  parts.forEach(function(keyPart) {
10177  var binding = this.parseKeys(keyPart);
10178  var id = KEY_MODS[binding.hashId] + binding.key;
10179  chain += (chain ? " " : "") + id;
10180  this._addCommandToBinding(chain, "chainKeys");
10181  }, this);
10182  chain += " ";
10183  }
10184  var binding = this.parseKeys(keyPart);
10185  var id = KEY_MODS[binding.hashId] + binding.key;
10186  this._addCommandToBinding(chain + id, command, asDefault);
10187  }, this);
10188  };
10189 
10190  this._addCommandToBinding = function(keyId, command, asDefault) {
10191  var ckb = this.commandKeyBinding, i;
10192  if (!command) {
10193  delete ckb[keyId];
10194  } else if (!ckb[keyId] || this.$singleCommand) {
10195  ckb[keyId] = command;
10196  } else {
10197  if (!Array.isArray(ckb[keyId])) {
10198  ckb[keyId] = [ckb[keyId]];
10199  } else if ((i = ckb[keyId].indexOf(command)) != -1) {
10200  ckb[keyId].splice(i, 1);
10201  }
10202 
10203  if (asDefault || command.isDefault)
10204  ckb[keyId].unshift(command);
10205  else
10206  ckb[keyId].push(command);
10207  }
10208  };
10209 
10210  this.addCommands = function(commands) {
10211  commands && Object.keys(commands).forEach(function(name) {
10212  var command = commands[name];
10213  if (!command)
10214  return;
10215 
10216  if (typeof command === "string")
10217  return this.bindKey(command, name);
10218 
10219  if (typeof command === "function")
10220  command = { exec: command };
10221 
10222  if (typeof command !== "object")
10223  return;
10224 
10225  if (!command.name)
10226  command.name = name;
10227 
10228  this.addCommand(command);
10229  }, this);
10230  };
10231 
10232  this.removeCommands = function(commands) {
10233  Object.keys(commands).forEach(function(name) {
10234  this.removeCommand(commands[name]);
10235  }, this);
10236  };
10237 
10238  this.bindKeys = function(keyList) {
10239  Object.keys(keyList).forEach(function(key) {
10240  this.bindKey(key, keyList[key]);
10241  }, this);
10242  };
10243 
10244  this._buildKeyHash = function(command) {
10245  this.bindKey(command.bindKey, command);
10246  };
10247  this.parseKeys = function(keys) {
10248  var parts = keys.toLowerCase().split(/[\-\+]([\-\+])?/).filter(function(x){return x});
10249  var key = parts.pop();
10250 
10251  var keyCode = keyUtil[key];
10252  if (keyUtil.FUNCTION_KEYS[keyCode])
10253  key = keyUtil.FUNCTION_KEYS[keyCode].toLowerCase();
10254  else if (!parts.length)
10255  return {key: key, hashId: -1};
10256  else if (parts.length == 1 && parts[0] == "shift")
10257  return {key: key.toUpperCase(), hashId: -1};
10258 
10259  var hashId = 0;
10260  for (var i = parts.length; i--;) {
10261  var modifier = keyUtil.KEY_MODS[parts[i]];
10262  if (modifier == null) {
10263  if (typeof console != "undefined")
10264  console.error("invalid modifier " + parts[i] + " in " + keys);
10265  return false;
10266  }
10267  hashId |= modifier;
10268  }
10269  return {key: key, hashId: hashId};
10270  };
10271 
10272  this.findKeyCommand = function findKeyCommand(hashId, keyString) {
10273  var key = KEY_MODS[hashId] + keyString;
10274  return this.commandKeyBinding[key];
10275  };
10276 
10277  this.handleKeyboard = function(data, hashId, keyString, keyCode) {
10278  var key = KEY_MODS[hashId] + keyString;
10279  var command = this.commandKeyBinding[key];
10280  if (data.$keyChain) {
10281  data.$keyChain += " " + key;
10282  command = this.commandKeyBinding[data.$keyChain] || command;
10283  }
10284 
10285  if (command) {
10286  if (command == "chainKeys" || command[command.length - 1] == "chainKeys") {
10287  data.$keyChain = data.$keyChain || key;
10288  return {command: "null"};
10289  }
10290  }
10291 
10292  if (data.$keyChain && keyCode > 0)
10293  data.$keyChain = "";
10294  return {command: command};
10295  };
10296 
10297 }).call(HashHandler.prototype);
10298 
10299 exports.HashHandler = HashHandler;
10300 exports.MultiHashHandler = MultiHashHandler;
10301 });
10302 
10303 define("ace/commands/command_manager",["require","exports","module","ace/lib/oop","ace/keyboard/hash_handler","ace/lib/event_emitter"], function(require, exports, module) {
10304 "use strict";
10305 
10306 var oop = require("../lib/oop");
10307 var MultiHashHandler = require("../keyboard/hash_handler").MultiHashHandler;
10308 var EventEmitter = require("../lib/event_emitter").EventEmitter;
10309 
10310 var CommandManager = function(platform, commands) {
10311  MultiHashHandler.call(this, commands, platform);
10312  this.byName = this.commands;
10313  this.setDefaultHandler("exec", function(e) {
10314  return e.command.exec(e.editor, e.args || {});
10315  });
10316 };
10317 
10318 oop.inherits(CommandManager, MultiHashHandler);
10319 
10320 (function() {
10321 
10322  oop.implement(this, EventEmitter);
10323 
10324  this.exec = function(command, editor, args) {
10325  if (Array.isArray(command)) {
10326  for (var i = command.length; i--; ) {
10327  if (this.exec(command[i], editor, args)) return true;
10328  }
10329  return false;
10330  }
10331 
10332  if (typeof command === "string")
10333  command = this.commands[command];
10334 
10335  if (!command)
10336  return false;
10337 
10338  if (editor && editor.$readOnly && !command.readOnly)
10339  return false;
10340 
10341  var e = {editor: editor, command: command, args: args};
10342  e.returnValue = this._emit("exec", e);
10343  this._signal("afterExec", e);
10344 
10345  return e.returnValue === false ? false : true;
10346  };
10347 
10348  this.toggleRecording = function(editor) {
10349  if (this.$inReplay)
10350  return;
10351 
10352  editor && editor._emit("changeStatus");
10353  if (this.recording) {
10354  this.macro.pop();
10355  this.removeEventListener("exec", this.$addCommandToMacro);
10356 
10357  if (!this.macro.length)
10358  this.macro = this.oldMacro;
10359 
10360  return this.recording = false;
10361  }
10362  if (!this.$addCommandToMacro) {
10363  this.$addCommandToMacro = function(e) {
10364  this.macro.push([e.command, e.args]);
10365  }.bind(this);
10366  }
10367 
10368  this.oldMacro = this.macro;
10369  this.macro = [];
10370  this.on("exec", this.$addCommandToMacro);
10371  return this.recording = true;
10372  };
10373 
10374  this.replay = function(editor) {
10375  if (this.$inReplay || !this.macro)
10376  return;
10377 
10378  if (this.recording)
10379  return this.toggleRecording(editor);
10380 
10381  try {
10382  this.$inReplay = true;
10383  this.macro.forEach(function(x) {
10384  if (typeof x == "string")
10385  this.exec(x, editor);
10386  else
10387  this.exec(x[0], editor, x[1]);
10388  }, this);
10389  } finally {
10390  this.$inReplay = false;
10391  }
10392  };
10393 
10394  this.trimMacro = function(m) {
10395  return m.map(function(x){
10396  if (typeof x[0] != "string")
10397  x[0] = x[0].name;
10398  if (!x[1])
10399  x = x[0];
10400  return x;
10401  });
10402  };
10403 
10404 }).call(CommandManager.prototype);
10405 
10406 exports.CommandManager = CommandManager;
10407 
10408 });
10409 
10410 define("ace/commands/default_commands",["require","exports","module","ace/lib/lang","ace/config","ace/range"], function(require, exports, module) {
10411 "use strict";
10412 
10413 var lang = require("../lib/lang");
10414 var config = require("../config");
10415 var Range = require("../range").Range;
10416 
10417 function bindKey(win, mac) {
10418  return {win: win, mac: mac};
10419 }
10420 exports.commands = [{
10421  name: "showSettingsMenu",
10422  bindKey: bindKey("Ctrl-,", "Command-,"),
10423  exec: function(editor) {
10424  config.loadModule("ace/ext/settings_menu", function(module) {
10425  module.init(editor);
10426  editor.showSettingsMenu();
10427  });
10428  },
10429  readOnly: true
10430 }, {
10431  name: "goToNextError",
10432  bindKey: bindKey("Alt-E", "Ctrl-E"),
10433  exec: function(editor) {
10434  config.loadModule("ace/ext/error_marker", function(module) {
10435  module.showErrorMarker(editor, 1);
10436  });
10437  },
10438  scrollIntoView: "animate",
10439  readOnly: true
10440 }, {
10441  name: "goToPreviousError",
10442  bindKey: bindKey("Alt-Shift-E", "Ctrl-Shift-E"),
10443  exec: function(editor) {
10444  config.loadModule("ace/ext/error_marker", function(module) {
10445  module.showErrorMarker(editor, -1);
10446  });
10447  },
10448  scrollIntoView: "animate",
10449  readOnly: true
10450 }, {
10451  name: "selectall",
10452  bindKey: bindKey("Ctrl-A", "Command-A"),
10453  exec: function(editor) { editor.selectAll(); },
10454  readOnly: true
10455 }, {
10456  name: "centerselection",
10457  bindKey: bindKey(null, "Ctrl-L"),
10458  exec: function(editor) { editor.centerSelection(); },
10459  readOnly: true
10460 }, {

10464  var line = parseInt(prompt("Enter line number:"), 10);
10465  if (!isNaN(line)) {
10466  editor.gotoLine(line);
10467  }
10468  },
10469  readOnly: true
10470 }, {

10474  scrollIntoView: "center",
10475  readOnly: true
10476 }, {

10478  bindKey: bindKey("Alt-Shift-L|Ctrl-Shift-F1", "Command-Alt-Shift-L|Command-Shift-F1"),
10479  exec: function(editor) { editor.session.toggleFold(true); },
10480  scrollIntoView: "center",
10481  readOnly: true
10482 }, {

10494 }, {

10515 }, {

10519  multiSelectAction: "forEach",
10520  scrollIntoView: "center",

10526  multiSelectAction: "forEach",

10528  readOnly: true

10533  if (editor.selection.isEmpty())
10534  editor.selection.selectWord();
10535  else
10536  editor.findNext();
10537  },
10538  readOnly: true
10539 }, {
10540  name: "selectOrFindPrevious",
10541  bindKey: bindKey("Alt-Shift-K", "Ctrl-Shift-G"),
10542  exec: function(editor) {
10543  if (editor.selection.isEmpty())
10544  editor.selection.selectWord();
10545  else
10546  editor.findPrevious();
10547  },
10548  readOnly: true
10549 }, {
10550  name: "find",
10551  bindKey: bindKey("Ctrl-F", "Command-F"),
10552  exec: function(editor) {
10553  config.loadModule("ace/ext/searchbox", function(e) {e.Search(editor)});
10554  },
10555  readOnly: true
10556 }, {

10560  readOnly: true
10561 }, {

10564  exec: function(editor) { editor.getSelection().selectFileStart(); },

10690  readOnly: true
10691 }, {
10692  name: "selectright",
10693  bindKey: bindKey("Shift-Right", "Shift-Right"),
10694  exec: function(editor) { editor.getSelection().selectRight(); },
10695  multiSelectAction: "forEach",
10696  scrollIntoView: "cursor",
10697  readOnly: true
10698 }, {
10699  name: "gotoright",

10703  scrollIntoView: "cursor",
10704  readOnly: true

10802

10804  editor.session.remove(range);
10805  editor.clearSelection();
10806  }
10807  },
10808  scrollIntoView: "cursor",
10809  multiSelectAction: "forEach"

10907  } else {

10909  }

10971  multiSelectAction: "forEach",
10972  scrollIntoView: "cursor"
10973 }, {
10974  name: "splitline",
10975  bindKey: bindKey(null, "Ctrl-O"),
10976  exec: function(editor) { editor.splitLine(); },
10977  multiSelectAction: "forEach",
10978  scrollIntoView: "cursor"
10979 }, {
10980  name: "transposeletters",
10981  bindKey: bindKey("Ctrl-T", "Ctrl-T"),
10982  exec: function(editor) { editor.transposeLetters(); },
10983  multiSelectAction: function(editor) {editor.transposeSelections(1); },
10984  scrollIntoView: "cursor"
10985 }, {
10986  name: "touppercase",
10987  bindKey: bindKey("Ctrl-U", "Ctrl-U"),
10988  exec: function(editor) { editor.toUpperCase(); },
10989  multiSelectAction: "forEach",
10990  scrollIntoView: "cursor"
10991 }, {
10992  name: "tolowercase",
10993  bindKey: bindKey("Ctrl-Shift-U", "Ctrl-Shift-U"),
10994  exec: function(editor) { editor.toLowerCase(); },
10995  multiSelectAction: "forEach",
10996  scrollIntoView: "cursor"
10997 }, {
10998  name: "expandtoline",
10999  bindKey: bindKey("Ctrl-Shift-L", "Command-Shift-L"),
11000  exec: function(editor) {
11001  var range = editor.selection.getRange();
11002 
11003  range.start.column = range.end.column = 0;
11004  range.end.row++;
11005  editor.selection.setRange(range, false);
11006  },
11007  multiSelectAction: "forEach",
11008  scrollIntoView: "cursor",
11009  readOnly: true
11010 }, {
11011  name: "joinlines",
11012  bindKey: bindKey(null, null),
11013  exec: function(editor) {
11014  var isBackwards = editor.selection.isBackwards();
11015  var selectionStart = isBackwards ? editor.selection.getSelectionLead() : editor.selection.getSelectionAnchor();
11016  var selectionEnd = isBackwards ? editor.selection.getSelectionAnchor() : editor.selection.getSelectionLead();
11017  var firstLineEndCol = editor.session.doc.getLine(selectionStart.row).length;
11018  var selectedText = editor.session.doc.getTextRange(editor.selection.getRange());
11019  var selectedCount = selectedText.replace(/\n\s*/, " ").length;
11020  var insertLine = editor.session.doc.getLine(selectionStart.row);
11021 
11022  for (var i = selectionStart.row + 1; i <= selectionEnd.row + 1; i++) {
11023  var curLine = lang.stringTrimLeft(lang.stringTrimRight(editor.session.doc.getLine(i)));
11024  if (curLine.length !== 0) {
11025  curLine = " " + curLine;
11026  }
11027  insertLine += curLine;
11028  }
11029 
11030  if (selectionEnd.row + 1 < (editor.session.doc.getLength() - 1)) {
11031  insertLine += editor.session.doc.getNewLineCharacter();
11032  }
11033 
11034  editor.clearSelection();
11035  editor.session.doc.replace(new Range(selectionStart.row, 0, selectionEnd.row + 2, 0), insertLine);
11036 
11037  if (selectedCount > 0) {
11038  editor.selection.moveCursorTo(selectionStart.row, selectionStart.column);
11039  editor.selection.selectTo(selectionStart.row, selectionStart.column + selectedCount);
11040  } else {
11041  firstLineEndCol = editor.session.doc.getLine(selectionStart.row).length > firstLineEndCol ? (firstLineEndCol + 1) : firstLineEndCol;
11042  editor.selection.moveCursorTo(selectionStart.row, firstLineEndCol);
11043  }
11044  },
11045  multiSelectAction: "forEach",
11046  readOnly: true
11047 }, {
11048  name: "invertSelection",
11049  bindKey: bindKey(null, null),
11050  exec: function(editor) {
11051  var endRow = editor.session.doc.getLength() - 1;
11052  var endCol = editor.session.doc.getLine(endRow).length;
11053  var ranges = editor.selection.rangeList.ranges;
11054  var newRanges = [];
11055  if (ranges.length < 1) {
11056  ranges = [editor.selection.getRange()];
11057  }
11058 
11059  for (var i = 0; i < ranges.length; i++) {
11060  if (i == (ranges.length - 1)) {
11061  if (!(ranges[i].end.row === endRow && ranges[i].end.column === endCol)) {
11062  newRanges.push(new Range(ranges[i].end.row, ranges[i].end.column, endRow, endCol));
11063  }
11064  }
11065 
11066  if (i === 0) {
