11067  if (!(ranges[i].start.row === 0 && ranges[i].start.column === 0)) {
11068  newRanges.push(new Range(0, 0, ranges[i].start.row, ranges[i].start.column));
11069  }
11070  } else {
11071  newRanges.push(new Range(ranges[i-1].end.row, ranges[i-1].end.column, ranges[i].start.row, ranges[i].start.column));
11072  }
11073  }
11074 
11075  editor.exitMultiSelectMode();
11076  editor.clearSelection();
11077 
11078  for(var i = 0; i < newRanges.length; i++) {
11079  editor.selection.addRange(newRanges[i], false);
11080  }
11081  },
11082  readOnly: true,
11083  scrollIntoView: "none"
11084 }];
11085 
11086 });
11087 
11088 define("ace/editor",["require","exports","module","ace/lib/fixoldbrowsers","ace/lib/oop","ace/lib/dom","ace/lib/lang","ace/lib/useragent","ace/keyboard/textinput","ace/mouse/mouse_handler","ace/mouse/fold_handler","ace/keyboard/keybinding","ace/edit_session","ace/search","ace/range","ace/lib/event_emitter","ace/commands/command_manager","ace/commands/default_commands","ace/config","ace/token_iterator"], function(require, exports, module) {
11089 "use strict";
11090 
11091 require("./lib/fixoldbrowsers");
11092 
11093 var oop = require("./lib/oop");
11094 var dom = require("./lib/dom");
11095 var lang = require("./lib/lang");
11096 var useragent = require("./lib/useragent");
11097 var TextInput = require("./keyboard/textinput").TextInput;
11098 var MouseHandler = require("./mouse/mouse_handler").MouseHandler;
11099 var FoldHandler = require("./mouse/fold_handler").FoldHandler;
11100 var KeyBinding = require("./keyboard/keybinding").KeyBinding;
11101 var EditSession = require("./edit_session").EditSession;
11102 var Search = require("./search").Search;
11103 var Range = require("./range").Range;
11104 var EventEmitter = require("./lib/event_emitter").EventEmitter;
11105 var CommandManager = require("./commands/command_manager").CommandManager;
11106 var defaultCommands = require("./commands/default_commands").commands;
11107 var config = require("./config");
11108 var TokenIterator = require("./token_iterator").TokenIterator;
11109 var Editor = function(renderer, session) {
11110  var container = renderer.getContainerElement();
11111  this.container = container;
11112  this.renderer = renderer;
11113 
11114  this.commands = new CommandManager(useragent.isMac ? "mac" : "win", defaultCommands);
11115  this.textInput = new TextInput(renderer.getTextAreaContainer(), this);
11116  this.renderer.textarea = this.textInput.getElement();
11117  this.keyBinding = new KeyBinding(this);
11118  this.$mouseHandler = new MouseHandler(this);
11119  new FoldHandler(this);
11120 
11121  this.$blockScrolling = 0;
11122  this.$search = new Search().set({
11123  wrap: true
11124  });
11125 
11126  this.$historyTracker = this.$historyTracker.bind(this);
11127  this.commands.on("exec", this.$historyTracker);
11128 
11129  this.$initOperationListeners();
11130 
11131  this._$emitInputEvent = lang.delayedCall(function() {
11132  this._signal("input", {});
11133  if (this.session && this.session.bgTokenizer)
11134  this.session.bgTokenizer.scheduleStart();
11135  }.bind(this));
11136 
11137  this.on("change", function(_, _self) {
11138  _self._$emitInputEvent.schedule(31);
11139  });
11140 
11141  this.setSession(session || new EditSession(""));
11142  config.resetOptions(this);
11143  config._signal("editor", this);
11144 };
11145 
11146 (function(){
11147 
11148  oop.implement(this, EventEmitter);
11149 
11150  this.$initOperationListeners = function() {
11151  function last(a) {return a[a.length - 1]}
11152 
11153  this.selections = [];
11154  this.commands.on("exec", this.startOperation.bind(this), true);
11155  this.commands.on("afterExec", this.endOperation.bind(this), true);
11156 
11157  this.$opResetTimer = lang.delayedCall(this.endOperation.bind(this));
11158 
11159  this.on("change", function() {
11160  this.curOp || this.startOperation();
11161  this.curOp.docChanged = true;
11162  }.bind(this), true);
11163 
11164  this.on("changeSelection", function() {
11165  this.curOp || this.startOperation();
11166  this.curOp.selectionChanged = true;
11167  }.bind(this), true);
11168  };
11169 
11170  this.curOp = null;
11171  this.prevOp = {};
11172  this.startOperation = function(commadEvent) {
11173  if (this.curOp) {
11174  if (!commadEvent || this.curOp.command)
11175  return;
11176  this.prevOp = this.curOp;
11177  }
11178  if (!commadEvent) {
11179  this.previousCommand = null;
11180  commadEvent = {};
11181  }
11182 
11183  this.$opResetTimer.schedule();
11184  this.curOp = {
11185  command: commadEvent.command || {},
11186  args: commadEvent.args,
11187  scrollTop: this.renderer.scrollTop
11188  };
11189  if (this.curOp.command.name)
11190  this.$blockScrolling++;
11191  };
11192 
11193  this.endOperation = function(e) {
11194  if (this.curOp) {
11195  if (e && e.returnValue === false)
11196  return this.curOp = null;
11197  this._signal("beforeEndOperation");
11198  var command = this.curOp.command;
11199  if (command.name && this.$blockScrolling)
11200  this.$blockScrolling--;
11201  if (command && command.scrollIntoView) {
11202  switch (command.scrollIntoView) {
11203  case "center":
11204  this.renderer.scrollCursorIntoView(null, 0.5);
11205  break;
11206  case "animate":
11207  case "cursor":
11208  this.renderer.scrollCursorIntoView();
11209  break;
11210  case "selectionPart":
11211  var range = this.selection.getRange();
11212  var config = this.renderer.layerConfig;
11213  if (range.start.row >= config.lastRow || range.end.row <= config.firstRow) {
11214  this.renderer.scrollSelectionIntoView(this.selection.anchor, this.selection.lead);
11215  }
11216  break;
11217  default:
11218  break;
11219  }
11220  if (command.scrollIntoView == "animate")
11221  this.renderer.animateScrolling(this.curOp.scrollTop);
11222  }
11223 
11224  this.prevOp = this.curOp;
11225  this.curOp = null;
11226  }
11227  };
11228  this.$mergeableCommands = ["backspace", "del", "insertstring"];
11229  this.$historyTracker = function(e) {
11230  if (!this.$mergeUndoDeltas)
11231  return;
11232 
11233  var prev = this.prevOp;
11234  var mergeableCommands = this.$mergeableCommands;
11235  var shouldMerge = prev.command && (e.command.name == prev.command.name);
11236  if (e.command.name == "insertstring") {
11237  var text = e.args;
11238  if (this.mergeNextCommand === undefined)
11239  this.mergeNextCommand = true;
11240 
11241  shouldMerge = shouldMerge
11242  && this.mergeNextCommand // previous command allows to coalesce with
11243  && (!/\s/.test(text) || /\s/.test(prev.args)); // previous insertion was of same type
11244 
11245  this.mergeNextCommand = true;
11246  } else {
11247  shouldMerge = shouldMerge
11248  && mergeableCommands.indexOf(e.command.name) !== -1; // the command is mergeable
11249  }
11250 
11251  if (
11252  this.$mergeUndoDeltas != "always"
11253  && Date.now() - this.sequenceStartTime > 2000
11254  ) {
11255  shouldMerge = false; // the sequence is too long
11256  }
11257 
11258  if (shouldMerge)
11259  this.session.mergeUndoDeltas = true;
11260  else if (mergeableCommands.indexOf(e.command.name) !== -1)
11261  this.sequenceStartTime = Date.now();
11262  };
11263  this.setKeyboardHandler = function(keyboardHandler, cb) {
11264  if (keyboardHandler && typeof keyboardHandler === "string") {
11265  this.$keybindingId = keyboardHandler;
11266  var _self = this;
11267  config.loadModule(["keybinding", keyboardHandler], function(module) {
11268  if (_self.$keybindingId == keyboardHandler)
11269  _self.keyBinding.setKeyboardHandler(module && module.handler);
11270  cb && cb();
11271  });
11272  } else {
11273  this.$keybindingId = null;
11274  this.keyBinding.setKeyboardHandler(keyboardHandler);
11275  cb && cb();
11276  }
11277  };
11278  this.getKeyboardHandler = function() {
11279  return this.keyBinding.getKeyboardHandler();
11280  };
11281  this.setSession = function(session) {
11282  if (this.session == session)
11283  return;
11284 
11285  var oldSession = this.session;
11286  if (oldSession) {
11287  this.session.removeEventListener("change", this.$onDocumentChange);
11288  this.session.removeEventListener("changeMode", this.$onChangeMode);
11289  this.session.removeEventListener("tokenizerUpdate", this.$onTokenizerUpdate);
11290  this.session.removeEventListener("changeTabSize", this.$onChangeTabSize);
11291  this.session.removeEventListener("changeWrapLimit", this.$onChangeWrapLimit);
11292  this.session.removeEventListener("changeWrapMode", this.$onChangeWrapMode);
11293  this.session.removeEventListener("onChangeFold", this.$onChangeFold);
11294  this.session.removeEventListener("changeFrontMarker", this.$onChangeFrontMarker);
11295  this.session.removeEventListener("changeBackMarker", this.$onChangeBackMarker);
11296  this.session.removeEventListener("changeBreakpoint", this.$onChangeBreakpoint);
11297  this.session.removeEventListener("changeAnnotation", this.$onChangeAnnotation);
11298  this.session.removeEventListener("changeOverwrite", this.$onCursorChange);
11299  this.session.removeEventListener("changeScrollTop", this.$onScrollTopChange);
11300  this.session.removeEventListener("changeScrollLeft", this.$onScrollLeftChange);
11301 
11302  var selection = this.session.getSelection();
11303  selection.removeEventListener("changeCursor", this.$onCursorChange);
11304  selection.removeEventListener("changeSelection", this.$onSelectionChange);
11305  }
11306 
11307  this.session = session;
11308  if (session) {
11309  this.$onDocumentChange = this.onDocumentChange.bind(this);
11310  session.addEventListener("change", this.$onDocumentChange);
11311  this.renderer.setSession(session);
11312 
11313  this.$onChangeMode = this.onChangeMode.bind(this);
11314  session.addEventListener("changeMode", this.$onChangeMode);
11315 
11316  this.$onTokenizerUpdate = this.onTokenizerUpdate.bind(this);
11317  session.addEventListener("tokenizerUpdate", this.$onTokenizerUpdate);
11318 
11319  this.$onChangeTabSize = this.renderer.onChangeTabSize.bind(this.renderer);
11320  session.addEventListener("changeTabSize", this.$onChangeTabSize);
11321 
11322  this.$onChangeWrapLimit = this.onChangeWrapLimit.bind(this);
11323  session.addEventListener("changeWrapLimit", this.$onChangeWrapLimit);
11324 
11325  this.$onChangeWrapMode = this.onChangeWrapMode.bind(this);
11326  session.addEventListener("changeWrapMode", this.$onChangeWrapMode);
11327 
11328  this.$onChangeFold = this.onChangeFold.bind(this);
11329  session.addEventListener("changeFold", this.$onChangeFold);
11330 
11331  this.$onChangeFrontMarker = this.onChangeFrontMarker.bind(this);
11332  this.session.addEventListener("changeFrontMarker", this.$onChangeFrontMarker);
11333 
11334  this.$onChangeBackMarker = this.onChangeBackMarker.bind(this);
11335  this.session.addEventListener("changeBackMarker", this.$onChangeBackMarker);
11336 
11337  this.$onChangeBreakpoint = this.onChangeBreakpoint.bind(this);
11338  this.session.addEventListener("changeBreakpoint", this.$onChangeBreakpoint);
11339 
11340  this.$onChangeAnnotation = this.onChangeAnnotation.bind(this);
11341  this.session.addEventListener("changeAnnotation", this.$onChangeAnnotation);
11342 
11343  this.$onCursorChange = this.onCursorChange.bind(this);
11344  this.session.addEventListener("changeOverwrite", this.$onCursorChange);
11345 
11346  this.$onScrollTopChange = this.onScrollTopChange.bind(this);
11347  this.session.addEventListener("changeScrollTop", this.$onScrollTopChange);
11348 
11349  this.$onScrollLeftChange = this.onScrollLeftChange.bind(this);
11350  this.session.addEventListener("changeScrollLeft", this.$onScrollLeftChange);
11351 
11352  this.selection = session.getSelection();
11353  this.selection.addEventListener("changeCursor", this.$onCursorChange);
11354 
11355  this.$onSelectionChange = this.onSelectionChange.bind(this);
11356  this.selection.addEventListener("changeSelection", this.$onSelectionChange);
11357 
11358  this.onChangeMode();
11359 
11360  this.$blockScrolling += 1;
11361  this.onCursorChange();
11362  this.$blockScrolling -= 1;
11363 
11364  this.onScrollTopChange();
11365  this.onScrollLeftChange();
11366  this.onSelectionChange();
11367  this.onChangeFrontMarker();
11368  this.onChangeBackMarker();
11369  this.onChangeBreakpoint();
11370  this.onChangeAnnotation();
11371  this.session.getUseWrapMode() && this.renderer.adjustWrapLimit();
11372  this.renderer.updateFull();
11373  } else {
11374  this.selection = null;
11375  this.renderer.setSession(session);
11376  }
11377 
11378  this._signal("changeSession", {
11379  session: session,
11380  oldSession: oldSession
11381  });
11382 
11383  oldSession && oldSession._signal("changeEditor", {oldEditor: this});
11384  session && session._signal("changeEditor", {editor: this});
11385  };
11386  this.getSession = function() {
11387  return this.session;
11388  };
11389  this.setValue = function(val, cursorPos) {
11390  this.session.doc.setValue(val);
11391 
11392  if (!cursorPos)
11393  this.selectAll();
11394  else if (cursorPos == 1)
11395  this.navigateFileEnd();
11396  else if (cursorPos == -1)
11397  this.navigateFileStart();
11398 
11399  return val;
11400  };
11401  this.getValue = function() {
11402  return this.session.getValue();
11403  };
11404  this.getSelection = function() {
11405  return this.selection;
11406  };
11407  this.resize = function(force) {
11408  this.renderer.onResize(force);
11409  };
11410  this.setTheme = function(theme, cb) {
11411  this.renderer.setTheme(theme, cb);
11412  };
11413  this.getTheme = function() {
11414  return this.renderer.getTheme();
11415  };
11416  this.setStyle = function(style) {
11417  this.renderer.setStyle(style);
11418  };
11419  this.unsetStyle = function(style) {
11420  this.renderer.unsetStyle(style);
11421  };
11422  this.getFontSize = function () {
11423  return this.getOption("fontSize") ||
11424  dom.computedStyle(this.container, "fontSize");
11425  };
11426  this.setFontSize = function(size) {
11427  this.setOption("fontSize", size);
11428  };
11429 
11430  this.$highlightBrackets = function() {
11431  if (this.session.$bracketHighlight) {
11432  this.session.removeMarker(this.session.$bracketHighlight);
11433  this.session.$bracketHighlight = null;
11434  }
11435 
11436  if (this.$highlightPending) {
11437  return;
11438  }
11439  var self = this;
11440  this.$highlightPending = true;
11441  setTimeout(function() {
11442  self.$highlightPending = false;
11443  var session = self.session;
11444  if (!session || !session.bgTokenizer) return;
11445  var pos = session.findMatchingBracket(self.getCursorPosition());
11446  if (pos) {
11447  var range = new Range(pos.row, pos.column, pos.row, pos.column + 1);
11448  } else if (session.$mode.getMatching) {
11449  var range = session.$mode.getMatching(self.session);
11450  }
11451  if (range)
11452  session.$bracketHighlight = session.addMarker(range, "ace_bracket", "text");
11453  }, 50);
11454  };
11455  this.$highlightTags = function() {
11456  if (this.$highlightTagPending)
11457  return;
11458  var self = this;
11459  this.$highlightTagPending = true;
11460  setTimeout(function() {
11461  self.$highlightTagPending = false;
11462 
11463  var session = self.session;
11464  if (!session || !session.bgTokenizer) return;
11465 
11466  var pos = self.getCursorPosition();
11467  var iterator = new TokenIterator(self.session, pos.row, pos.column);
11468  var token = iterator.getCurrentToken();
11469 
11470  if (!token || !/\b(?:tag-open|tag-name)/.test(token.type)) {
11471  session.removeMarker(session.$tagHighlight);
11472  session.$tagHighlight = null;
11473  return;
11474  }
11475 
11476  if (token.type.indexOf("tag-open") != -1)
11477  token = iterator.stepForward();
11478 
11479  var tag = token.value;
11480  var depth = 0;
11481  var prevToken = iterator.stepBackward();
11482 
11483  if (prevToken.value == '<'){
11484  do {
11485  prevToken = token;
11486  token = iterator.stepForward();
11487 
11488  if (token && token.value === tag && token.type.indexOf('tag-name') !== -1) {
11489  if (prevToken.value === '<'){
11490  depth++;
11491  } else if (prevToken.value === '</'){
11492  depth--;
11493  }
11494  }
11495 
11496  } while (token && depth >= 0);
11497  } else {
11498  do {
11499  token = prevToken;
11500  prevToken = iterator.stepBackward();
11501 
11502  if (token && token.value === tag && token.type.indexOf('tag-name') !== -1) {
11503  if (prevToken.value === '<') {
11504  depth++;
11505  } else if (prevToken.value === '</') {
11506  depth--;
11507  }
11508  }
11509  } while (prevToken && depth <= 0);
11510  iterator.stepForward();
11511  }
11512 
11513  if (!token) {
11514  session.removeMarker(session.$tagHighlight);
11515  session.$tagHighlight = null;
11516  return;
11517  }
11518 
11519  var row = iterator.getCurrentTokenRow();
11520  var column = iterator.getCurrentTokenColumn();
11521  var range = new Range(row, column, row, column+token.value.length);
11522  if (session.$tagHighlight && range.compareRange(session.$backMarkers[session.$tagHighlight].range)!==0) {
11523  session.removeMarker(session.$tagHighlight);
11524  session.$tagHighlight = null;
11525  }
11526 
11527  if (range && !session.$tagHighlight)
11528  session.$tagHighlight = session.addMarker(range, "ace_bracket", "text");
11529  }, 50);
11530  };
11531  this.focus = function() {
11532  var _self = this;
11533  setTimeout(function() {
11534  _self.textInput.focus();
11535  });
11536  this.textInput.focus();
11537  };
11538  this.isFocused = function() {
11539  return this.textInput.isFocused();
11540  };
11541  this.blur = function() {
11542  this.textInput.blur();
11543  };
11544  this.onFocus = function(e) {
11545  if (this.$isFocused)
11546  return;
11547  this.$isFocused = true;
11548  this.renderer.showCursor();
11549  this.renderer.visualizeFocus();
11550  this._emit("focus", e);
11551  };
11552  this.onBlur = function(e) {
11553  if (!this.$isFocused)
11554  return;
11555  this.$isFocused = false;
11556  this.renderer.hideCursor();
11557  this.renderer.visualizeBlur();
11558  this._emit("blur", e);
11559  };
11560 
11561  this.$cursorChange = function() {
11562  this.renderer.updateCursor();
11563  };
11564  this.onDocumentChange = function(e) {
11565  var delta = e.data;
11566  var range = delta.range;
11567  var lastRow;
11568 
11569  if (range.start.row == range.end.row && delta.action != "insertLines" && delta.action != "removeLines")
11570  lastRow = range.end.row;
11571  else
11572  lastRow = Infinity;
11573  this.renderer.updateLines(range.start.row, lastRow, this.session.$useWrapMode);
11574 
11575  this._signal("change", e);
11576  this.$cursorChange();
11577  this.$updateHighlightActiveLine();
11578  };
11579 
11580  this.onTokenizerUpdate = function(e) {
11581  var rows = e.data;
11582  this.renderer.updateLines(rows.first, rows.last);
11583  };
11584 
11585 
11586  this.onScrollTopChange = function() {
11587  this.renderer.scrollToY(this.session.getScrollTop());
11588  };
11589 
11590  this.onScrollLeftChange = function() {
11591  this.renderer.scrollToX(this.session.getScrollLeft());
11592  };
11593  this.onCursorChange = function() {
11594  this.$cursorChange();
11595 
11596  if (!this.$blockScrolling) {
11597  config.warn("Automatically scrolling cursor into view after selection change",
11598  "this will be disabled in the next version",
11599  "set editor.$blockScrolling = Infinity to disable this message"
11600  );
11601  this.renderer.scrollCursorIntoView();
11602  }
11603 
11604  this.$highlightBrackets();
11605  this.$highlightTags();
11606  this.$updateHighlightActiveLine();
11607  this._signal("changeSelection");
11608  };
11609 
11610  this.$updateHighlightActiveLine = function() {
11611  var session = this.getSession();
11612 
11613  var highlight;
11614  if (this.$highlightActiveLine) {
11615  if ((this.$selectionStyle != "line" || !this.selection.isMultiLine()))
11616  highlight = this.getCursorPosition();
11617  if (this.renderer.$maxLines && this.session.getLength() === 1 && !(this.renderer.$minLines > 1))
11618  highlight = false;
11619  }
11620 
11621  if (session.$highlightLineMarker && !highlight) {
11622  session.removeMarker(session.$highlightLineMarker.id);
11623  session.$highlightLineMarker = null;
11624  } else if (!session.$highlightLineMarker && highlight) {
11625  var range = new Range(highlight.row, highlight.column, highlight.row, Infinity);
11626  range.id = session.addMarker(range, "ace_active-line", "screenLine");
11627  session.$highlightLineMarker = range;
11628  } else if (highlight) {
11629  session.$highlightLineMarker.start.row = highlight.row;
11630  session.$highlightLineMarker.end.row = highlight.row;
11631  session.$highlightLineMarker.start.column = highlight.column;
11632  session._signal("changeBackMarker");
11633  }
11634  };
11635 
11636  this.onSelectionChange = function(e) {
11637  var session = this.session;
11638 
11639  if (session.$selectionMarker) {
11640  session.removeMarker(session.$selectionMarker);
11641  }
11642  session.$selectionMarker = null;
11643 
11644  if (!this.selection.isEmpty()) {
11645  var range = this.selection.getRange();
11646  var style = this.getSelectionStyle();
11647  session.$selectionMarker = session.addMarker(range, "ace_selection", style);
11648  } else {
11649  this.$updateHighlightActiveLine();
11650  }
11651 
11652  var re = this.$highlightSelectedWord && this.$getSelectionHighLightRegexp();
11653  this.session.highlight(re);
11654 
11655  this._signal("changeSelection");
11656  };
11657 
11658  this.$getSelectionHighLightRegexp = function() {
11659  var session = this.session;
11660 
11661  var selection = this.getSelectionRange();
11662  if (selection.isEmpty() || selection.isMultiLine())
11663  return;
11664 
11665  var startOuter = selection.start.column - 1;
11666  var endOuter = selection.end.column + 1;
11667  var line = session.getLine(selection.start.row);
11668  var lineCols = line.length;
11669  var needle = line.substring(Math.max(startOuter, 0),
11670  Math.min(endOuter, lineCols));
11671  if ((startOuter >= 0 && /^[\w\d]/.test(needle)) ||
11672  (endOuter <= lineCols && /[\w\d]$/.test(needle)))
11673  return;
11674 
11675  needle = line.substring(selection.start.column, selection.end.column);
11676  if (!/^[\w\d]+$/.test(needle))
11677  return;
11678 
11679  var re = this.$search.$assembleRegExp({
11680  wholeWord: true,
11681  caseSensitive: true,
11682  needle: needle
11683  });
11684 
11685  return re;
11686  };
11687 
11688 
11689  this.onChangeFrontMarker = function() {
11690  this.renderer.updateFrontMarkers();
11691  };
11692 
11693  this.onChangeBackMarker = function() {
11694  this.renderer.updateBackMarkers();
11695  };
11696 
11697 
11698  this.onChangeBreakpoint = function() {
11699  this.renderer.updateBreakpoints();
11700  };
11701 
11702  this.onChangeAnnotation = function() {
11703  this.renderer.setAnnotations(this.session.getAnnotations());
11704  };
11705 
11706 
11707  this.onChangeMode = function(e) {
11708  this.renderer.updateText();
11709  this._emit("changeMode", e);
11710  };
11711 
11712 
11713  this.onChangeWrapLimit = function() {
11714  this.renderer.updateFull();
11715  };
11716 
11717  this.onChangeWrapMode = function() {
11718  this.renderer.onResize(true);
11719  };
11720 
11721 
11722  this.onChangeFold = function() {
11723  this.$updateHighlightActiveLine();
11724  this.renderer.updateFull();
11725  };
11726  this.getSelectedText = function() {
11727  return this.session.getTextRange(this.getSelectionRange());
11728  };
11729  this.getCopyText = function() {
11730  var text = this.getSelectedText();
11731  this._signal("copy", text);
11732  return text;
11733  };
11734  this.onCopy = function() {
11735  this.commands.exec("copy", this);
11736  };
11737  this.onCut = function() {
11738  this.commands.exec("cut", this);
11739  };
11740  this.onPaste = function(text) {
11741  if (this.$readOnly)
11742  return;
11743 
11744  var e = {text: text};
11745  this._signal("paste", e);
11746  text = e.text;
11747  if (!this.inMultiSelectMode || this.inVirtualSelectionMode) {
11748  this.insert(text);
11749  } else {
11750  var lines = text.split(/\r\n|\r|\n/);
11751  var ranges = this.selection.rangeList.ranges;
11752 
11753  if (lines.length > ranges.length || lines.length < 2 || !lines[1])
11754  return this.commands.exec("insertstring", this, text);
11755 
11756  for (var i = ranges.length; i--;) {
11757  var range = ranges[i];
11758  if (!range.isEmpty())
11759  this.session.remove(range);
11760 
11761  this.session.insert(range.start, lines[i]);
11762  }
11763  }
11764  this.renderer.scrollCursorIntoView();
11765  };
11766 
11767  this.execCommand = function(command, args) {
11768  return this.commands.exec(command, this, args);
11769  };
11770  this.insert = function(text, pasted) {
11771  var session = this.session;
11772  var mode = session.getMode();
11773  var cursor = this.getCursorPosition();
11774 
11775  if (this.getBehavioursEnabled() && !pasted) {
11776  var transform = mode.transformAction(session.getState(cursor.row), 'insertion', this, session, text);
11777  if (transform) {
11778  if (text !== transform.text) {
11779  this.session.mergeUndoDeltas = false;
11780  this.$mergeNextCommand = false;
11781  }
11782  text = transform.text;
11783 
11784  }
11785  }
11786 
11787  if (text == "\t")
11788  text = this.session.getTabString();
11789  if (!this.selection.isEmpty()) {
11790  var range = this.getSelectionRange();
11791  cursor = this.session.remove(range);
11792  this.clearSelection();
11793  }
11794  else if (this.session.getOverwrite()) {
11795  var range = new Range.fromPoints(cursor, cursor);
11796  range.end.column += text.length;
11797  this.session.remove(range);
11798  }
11799 
11800  if (text == "\n" || text == "\r\n") {
11801  var line = session.getLine(cursor.row);
11802  if (cursor.column > line.search(/\S|$/)) {
11803  var d = line.substr(cursor.column).search(/\S|$/);
11804  session.doc.removeInLine(cursor.row, cursor.column, cursor.column + d);
11805  }
11806  }
11807  this.clearSelection();
11808 
11809  var start = cursor.column;
11810  var lineState = session.getState(cursor.row);
11811  var line = session.getLine(cursor.row);
11812  var shouldOutdent = mode.checkOutdent(lineState, line, text);
11813  var end = session.insert(cursor, text);
11814 
11815  if (transform && transform.selection) {
11816  if (transform.selection.length == 2) { // Transform relative to the current column
11817  this.selection.setSelectionRange(
11818  new Range(cursor.row, start + transform.selection[0],
11819  cursor.row, start + transform.selection[1]));
11820  } else { // Transform relative to the current row.
11821  this.selection.setSelectionRange(
11822  new Range(cursor.row + transform.selection[0],
11823  transform.selection[1],
11824  cursor.row + transform.selection[2],
11825  transform.selection[3]));
11826  }
11827  }
11828 
11829  if (session.getDocument().isNewLine(text)) {
11830  var lineIndent = mode.getNextLineIndent(lineState, line.slice(0, cursor.column), session.getTabString());
11831 
11832  session.insert({row: cursor.row+1, column: 0}, lineIndent);
11833  }
11834  if (shouldOutdent)
11835  mode.autoOutdent(lineState, session, cursor.row);
11836  };
11837 
11838  this.onTextInput = function(text) {
11839  this.keyBinding.onTextInput(text);
11840  };
11841 
11842  this.onCommandKey = function(e, hashId, keyCode) {
11843  this.keyBinding.onCommandKey(e, hashId, keyCode);
11844  };
11845  this.setOverwrite = function(overwrite) {
11846  this.session.setOverwrite(overwrite);
11847  };
11848  this.getOverwrite = function() {
11849  return this.session.getOverwrite();
11850  };
11851  this.toggleOverwrite = function() {
11852  this.session.toggleOverwrite();
11853  };
11854  this.setScrollSpeed = function(speed) {
11855  this.setOption("scrollSpeed", speed);
11856  };
11857  this.getScrollSpeed = function() {
11858  return this.getOption("scrollSpeed");
11859  };
11860  this.setDragDelay = function(dragDelay) {
11861  this.setOption("dragDelay", dragDelay);
11862  };
11863  this.getDragDelay = function() {
11864  return this.getOption("dragDelay");
11865  };
11866  this.setSelectionStyle = function(val) {
11867  this.setOption("selectionStyle", val);
11868  };
11869  this.getSelectionStyle = function() {
11870  return this.getOption("selectionStyle");
11871  };
11872  this.setHighlightActiveLine = function(shouldHighlight) {
11873  this.setOption("highlightActiveLine", shouldHighlight);
11874  };
11875  this.getHighlightActiveLine = function() {
11876  return this.getOption("highlightActiveLine");
11877  };
11878  this.setHighlightGutterLine = function(shouldHighlight) {
11879  this.setOption("highlightGutterLine", shouldHighlight);
11880  };
11881 
11882  this.getHighlightGutterLine = function() {
11883  return this.getOption("highlightGutterLine");
11884  };
11885  this.setHighlightSelectedWord = function(shouldHighlight) {
11886  this.setOption("highlightSelectedWord", shouldHighlight);
11887  };
11888  this.getHighlightSelectedWord = function() {
11889  return this.$highlightSelectedWord;
11890  };
11891 
11892  this.setAnimatedScroll = function(shouldAnimate){
11893  this.renderer.setAnimatedScroll(shouldAnimate);
11894  };
11895 
11896  this.getAnimatedScroll = function(){
11897  return this.renderer.getAnimatedScroll();
11898  };
11899  this.setShowInvisibles = function(showInvisibles) {
11900  this.renderer.setShowInvisibles(showInvisibles);
11901  };
11902  this.getShowInvisibles = function() {
11903  return this.renderer.getShowInvisibles();
11904  };
11905 
11906  this.setDisplayIndentGuides = function(display) {
11907  this.renderer.setDisplayIndentGuides(display);
11908  };
11909 
11910  this.getDisplayIndentGuides = function() {
11911  return this.renderer.getDisplayIndentGuides();
11912  };
11913  this.setShowPrintMargin = function(showPrintMargin) {
11914  this.renderer.setShowPrintMargin(showPrintMargin);
11915  };
11916  this.getShowPrintMargin = function() {
11917  return this.renderer.getShowPrintMargin();
11918  };
11919  this.setPrintMarginColumn = function(showPrintMargin) {
11920  this.renderer.setPrintMarginColumn(showPrintMargin);
11921  };
11922  this.getPrintMarginColumn = function() {
11923  return this.renderer.getPrintMarginColumn();
11924  };
11925  this.setReadOnly = function(readOnly) {
11926  this.setOption("readOnly", readOnly);
11927  };
11928  this.getReadOnly = function() {
11929  return this.getOption("readOnly");
11930  };
11931  this.setBehavioursEnabled = function (enabled) {
11932  this.setOption("behavioursEnabled", enabled);
11933  };
11934  this.getBehavioursEnabled = function () {
11935  return this.getOption("behavioursEnabled");
11936  };
11937  this.setWrapBehavioursEnabled = function (enabled) {
11938  this.setOption("wrapBehavioursEnabled", enabled);
11939  };
11940  this.getWrapBehavioursEnabled = function () {
11941  return this.getOption("wrapBehavioursEnabled");
11942  };
11943  this.setShowFoldWidgets = function(show) {
11944  this.setOption("showFoldWidgets", show);
11945 
11946  };
11947  this.getShowFoldWidgets = function() {
11948  return this.getOption("showFoldWidgets");
11949  };
11950 
11951  this.setFadeFoldWidgets = function(fade) {
11952  this.setOption("fadeFoldWidgets", fade);
11953  };
11954 
11955  this.getFadeFoldWidgets = function() {
11956  return this.getOption("fadeFoldWidgets");
11957  };
11958  this.remove = function(dir) {
11959  if (this.selection.isEmpty()){
11960  if (dir == "left")
11961  this.selection.selectLeft();
11962  else
11963  this.selection.selectRight();
11964  }
11965 
11966  var range = this.getSelectionRange();
11967  if (this.getBehavioursEnabled()) {
11968  var session = this.session;
11969  var state = session.getState(range.start.row);
11970  var new_range = session.getMode().transformAction(state, 'deletion', this, session, range);
11971 
11972  if (range.end.column === 0) {
11973  var text = session.getTextRange(range);
11974  if (text[text.length - 1] == "\n") {
11975  var line = session.getLine(range.end.row);
11976  if (/^\s+$/.test(line)) {
11977  range.end.column = line.length;
11978  }
11979  }
11980  }
11981  if (new_range)
11982  range = new_range;
11983  }
11984 
11985  this.session.remove(range);
11986  this.clearSelection();
11987  };
11988  this.removeWordRight = function() {
11989  if (this.selection.isEmpty())
11990  this.selection.selectWordRight();
11991 
11992  this.session.remove(this.getSelectionRange());
11993  this.clearSelection();
11994  };
11995  this.removeWordLeft = function() {
11996  if (this.selection.isEmpty())
11997  this.selection.selectWordLeft();
11998 
11999  this.session.remove(this.getSelectionRange());
12000  this.clearSelection();
12001  };
12002  this.removeToLineStart = function() {
12003  if (this.selection.isEmpty())
12004  this.selection.selectLineStart();
12005 
12006  this.session.remove(this.getSelectionRange());
12007  this.clearSelection();
12008  };
12009  this.removeToLineEnd = function() {
12010  if (this.selection.isEmpty())
12011  this.selection.selectLineEnd();
12012 
12013  var range = this.getSelectionRange();
12014  if (range.start.column == range.end.column && range.start.row == range.end.row) {
12015  range.end.column = 0;
12016  range.end.row++;
12017  }
12018 
12019  this.session.remove(range);
12020  this.clearSelection();
12021  };
12022  this.splitLine = function() {
12023  if (!this.selection.isEmpty()) {
12024  this.session.remove(this.getSelectionRange());
12025  this.clearSelection();
12026  }
12027 
12028  var cursor = this.getCursorPosition();
12029  this.insert("\n");
12030  this.moveCursorToPosition(cursor);
12031  };
12032  this.transposeLetters = function() {
12033  if (!this.selection.isEmpty()) {
12034  return;
12035  }
12036 
12037  var cursor = this.getCursorPosition();
12038  var column = cursor.column;
12039  if (column === 0)
12040  return;
12041 
12042  var line = this.session.getLine(cursor.row);
12043  var swap, range;
12044  if (column < line.length) {
12045  swap = line.charAt(column) + line.charAt(column-1);
12046  range = new Range(cursor.row, column-1, cursor.row, column+1);
12047  }
12048  else {
12049  swap = line.charAt(column-1) + line.charAt(column-2);
12050  range = new Range(cursor.row, column-2, cursor.row, column);
12051  }
12052  this.session.replace(range, swap);
12053  };
12054  this.toLowerCase = function() {
12055  var originalRange = this.getSelectionRange();
12056  if (this.selection.isEmpty()) {
12057  this.selection.selectWord();
12058  }
12059 
12060  var range = this.getSelectionRange();
12061  var text = this.session.getTextRange(range);
12062  this.session.replace(range, text.toLowerCase());
12063  this.selection.setSelectionRange(originalRange);
12064  };
12065  this.toUpperCase = function() {
12066  var originalRange = this.getSelectionRange();
12067  if (this.selection.isEmpty()) {
12068  this.selection.selectWord();
12069  }
12070 
12071  var range = this.getSelectionRange();
12072  var text = this.session.getTextRange(range);
12073  this.session.replace(range, text.toUpperCase());
12074  this.selection.setSelectionRange(originalRange);
12075  };
12076  this.indent = function() {
12077  var session = this.session;
12078  var range = this.getSelectionRange();
12079 
12080  if (range.start.row < range.end.row) {
12081  var rows = this.$getSelectedRows();
12082  session.indentRows(rows.first, rows.last, "\t");
12083  return;
12084  } else if (range.start.column < range.end.column) {
12085  var text = session.getTextRange(range);
12086  if (!/^\s+$/.test(text)) {
12087  var rows = this.$getSelectedRows();
12088  session.indentRows(rows.first, rows.last, "\t");
12089  return;
12090  }
12091  }
12092 
12093  var line = session.getLine(range.start.row);
12094  var position = range.start;
12095  var size = session.getTabSize();
12096  var column = session.documentToScreenColumn(position.row, position.column);
12097 
12098  if (this.session.getUseSoftTabs()) {
12099  var count = (size - column % size);
12100  var indentString = lang.stringRepeat(" ", count);
12101  } else {
12102  var count = column % size;
12103  while (line[range.start.column] == " " && count) {
12104  range.start.column--;
12105  count--;
12106  }
12107  this.selection.setSelectionRange(range);
12108  indentString = "\t";
12109  }
12110  return this.insert(indentString);
12111  };
12112  this.blockIndent = function() {
12113  var rows = this.$getSelectedRows();
12114  this.session.indentRows(rows.first, rows.last, "\t");
12115  };
12116  this.blockOutdent = function() {
12117  var selection = this.session.getSelection();
12118  this.session.outdentRows(selection.getRange());
12119  };
12120  this.sortLines = function() {
12121  var rows = this.$getSelectedRows();
12122  var session = this.session;
12123 
12124  var lines = [];
12125  for (i = rows.first; i <= rows.last; i++)
12126  lines.push(session.getLine(i));
12127 
12128  lines.sort(function(a, b) {
12129  if (a.toLowerCase() < b.toLowerCase()) return -1;
12130  if (a.toLowerCase() > b.toLowerCase()) return 1;
12131  return 0;
12132  });
12133 
12134  var deleteRange = new Range(0, 0, 0, 0);
12135  for (var i = rows.first; i <= rows.last; i++) {
12136  var line = session.getLine(i);
12137  deleteRange.start.row = i;
12138  deleteRange.end.row = i;
12139  deleteRange.end.column = line.length;
12140  session.replace(deleteRange, lines[i-rows.first]);
12141  }
12142  };
12143  this.toggleCommentLines = function() {
12144  var state = this.session.getState(this.getCursorPosition().row);
12145  var rows = this.$getSelectedRows();
12146  this.session.getMode().toggleCommentLines(state, this.session, rows.first, rows.last);
12147  };
12148 
12149  this.toggleBlockComment = function() {
12150  var cursor = this.getCursorPosition();
12151  var state = this.session.getState(cursor.row);
12152  var range = this.getSelectionRange();
12153  this.session.getMode().toggleBlockComment(state, this.session, range, cursor);
12154  };
12155  this.getNumberAt = function(row, column) {
12156  var _numberRx = /[\-]?[0-9]+(?:\.[0-9]+)?/g;
12157  _numberRx.lastIndex = 0;
12158 
12159  var s = this.session.getLine(row);
12160  while (_numberRx.lastIndex < column) {
12161  var m = _numberRx.exec(s);
12162  if(m.index <= column && m.index+m[0].length >= column){
12163  var number = {
12164  value: m[0],
12165  start: m.index,
12166  end: m.index+m[0].length
12167  };
12168  return number;
12169  }
12170  }
12171  return null;
12172  };
12173  this.modifyNumber = function(amount) {
12174  var row = this.selection.getCursor().row;
12175  var column = this.selection.getCursor().column;
12176  var charRange = new Range(row, column-1, row, column);
12177 
12178  var c = this.session.getTextRange(charRange);
12179  if (!isNaN(parseFloat(c)) && isFinite(c)) {
12180  var nr = this.getNumberAt(row, column);
12181  if (nr) {
12182  var fp = nr.value.indexOf(".") >= 0 ? nr.start + nr.value.indexOf(".") + 1 : nr.end;
12183  var decimals = nr.start + nr.value.length - fp;
12184 
12185  var t = parseFloat(nr.value);
12186  t *= Math.pow(10, decimals);
12187 
12188 
12189  if(fp !== nr.end && column < fp){
12190  amount *= Math.pow(10, nr.end - column - 1);
12191  } else {
12192  amount *= Math.pow(10, nr.end - column);
12193  }
12194 
12195  t += amount;
12196  t /= Math.pow(10, decimals);
12197  var nnr = t.toFixed(decimals);
12198  var replaceRange = new Range(row, nr.start, row, nr.end);
12199  this.session.replace(replaceRange, nnr);
12200  this.moveCursorTo(row, Math.max(nr.start +1, column + nnr.length - nr.value.length));
12201 
12202  }
12203  }
12204  };
12205  this.removeLines = function() {
12206  var rows = this.$getSelectedRows();
12207  var range;
12208  if (rows.first === 0 || rows.last+1 < this.session.getLength())
12209  range = new Range(rows.first, 0, rows.last+1, 0);
12210  else
12211  range = new Range(
12212  rows.first-1, this.session.getLine(rows.first-1).length,
12213  rows.last, this.session.getLine(rows.last).length
12214  );
12215  this.session.remove(range);
12216  this.clearSelection();
12217  };
12218 
12219  this.duplicateSelection = function() {
12220  var sel = this.selection;
12221  var doc = this.session;
12222  var range = sel.getRange();
12223  var reverse = sel.isBackwards();
12224  if (range.isEmpty()) {
12225  var row = range.start.row;
12226  doc.duplicateLines(row, row);
12227  } else {
12228  var point = reverse ? range.start : range.end;
12229  var endPoint = doc.insert(point, doc.getTextRange(range), false);
12230  range.start = point;
12231  range.end = endPoint;
12232 
12233  sel.setSelectionRange(range, reverse);
12234  }
12235  };
12236  this.moveLinesDown = function() {
12237  this.$moveLines(1, false);
12238  };
12239  this.moveLinesUp = function() {
12240  this.$moveLines(-1, false);
12241  };
12242  this.moveText = function(range, toPosition, copy) {
12243  return this.session.moveText(range, toPosition, copy);
12244  };
12245  this.copyLinesUp = function() {
12246  this.$moveLines(-1, true);
12247  };
12248  this.copyLinesDown = function() {
12249  this.$moveLines(1, true);
12250  };
12251  this.$moveLines = function(dir, copy) {
12252  var rows, moved;
12253  var selection = this.selection;
12254  if (!selection.inMultiSelectMode || this.inVirtualSelectionMode) {
12255  var range = selection.toOrientedRange();
12256  rows = this.$getSelectedRows(range);
12257  moved = this.session.$moveLines(rows.first, rows.last, copy ? 0 : dir);
12258  if (copy && dir == -1) moved = 0;
12259  range.moveBy(moved, 0);
12260  selection.fromOrientedRange(range);
12261  } else {
12262  var ranges = selection.rangeList.ranges;
12263  selection.rangeList.detach(this.session);
12264  this.inVirtualSelectionMode = true;
12265 
12266  var diff = 0;
12267  var totalDiff = 0;
12268  var l = ranges.length;
12269  for (var i = 0; i < l; i++) {
12270  var rangeIndex = i;
12271  ranges[i].moveBy(diff, 0);
12272  rows = this.$getSelectedRows(ranges[i]);
12273  var first = rows.first;
12274  var last = rows.last;
12275  while (++i < l) {
12276  if (totalDiff) ranges[i].moveBy(totalDiff, 0);
12277  var subRows = this.$getSelectedRows(ranges[i]);
12278  if (copy && subRows.first != last)
12279  break;
12280  else if (!copy && subRows.first > last + 1)
12281  break;
12282  last = subRows.last;
12283  }
12284  i--;
12285  diff = this.session.$moveLines(first, last, copy ? 0 : dir);
12286  if (copy && dir == -1) rangeIndex = i + 1;
12287  while (rangeIndex <= i) {
12288  ranges[rangeIndex].moveBy(diff, 0);
12289  rangeIndex++;
12290  }
12291  if (!copy) diff = 0;
12292  totalDiff += diff;
12293  }
12294 
12295  selection.fromOrientedRange(selection.ranges[0]);
12296  selection.rangeList.attach(this.session);
12297  this.inVirtualSelectionMode = false;
12298  }
12299  };
12300  this.$getSelectedRows = function(range) {
12301  range = (range || this.getSelectionRange()).collapseRows();
12302 
12303  return {
12304  first: this.session.getRowFoldStart(range.start.row),
12305  last: this.session.getRowFoldEnd(range.end.row)
12306  };
12307  };
12308 
12309  this.onCompositionStart = function(text) {
12310  this.renderer.showComposition(this.getCursorPosition());
12311  };
12312 
12313  this.onCompositionUpdate = function(text) {
12314  this.renderer.setCompositionText(text);
12315  };
12316 
12317  this.onCompositionEnd = function() {
12318  this.renderer.hideComposition();
12319  };
12320  this.getFirstVisibleRow = function() {
12321  return this.renderer.getFirstVisibleRow();
12322  };
12323  this.getLastVisibleRow = function() {
12324  return this.renderer.getLastVisibleRow();
12325  };
12326  this.isRowVisible = function(row) {
12327  return (row >= this.getFirstVisibleRow() && row <= this.getLastVisibleRow());
12328  };
12329  this.isRowFullyVisible = function(row) {
12330  return (row >= this.renderer.getFirstFullyVisibleRow() && row <= this.renderer.getLastFullyVisibleRow());
12331  };
12332  this.$getVisibleRowCount = function() {
12333  return this.renderer.getScrollBottomRow() - this.renderer.getScrollTopRow() + 1;
12334  };
12335 
12336  this.$moveByPage = function(dir, select) {
12337  var renderer = this.renderer;
12338  var config = this.renderer.layerConfig;
12339  var rows = dir * Math.floor(config.height / config.lineHeight);
12340 
12341  this.$blockScrolling++;
12342  if (select === true) {
12343  this.selection.$moveSelection(function(){
12344  this.moveCursorBy(rows, 0);
12345  });
12346  } else if (select === false) {
12347  this.selection.moveCursorBy(rows, 0);
12348  this.selection.clearSelection();
12349  }
12350  this.$blockScrolling--;
12351 
12352  var scrollTop = renderer.scrollTop;
12353 
12354  renderer.scrollBy(0, rows * config.lineHeight);
12355  if (select != null)
12356  renderer.scrollCursorIntoView(null, 0.5);
12357 
12358  renderer.animateScrolling(scrollTop);
12359  };
12360  this.selectPageDown = function() {
12361  this.$moveByPage(1, true);
12362  };
12363  this.selectPageUp = function() {
12364  this.$moveByPage(-1, true);
12365  };
12366  this.gotoPageDown = function() {
12367  this.$moveByPage(1, false);
12368  };
12369  this.gotoPageUp = function() {
12370  this.$moveByPage(-1, false);
12371  };
12372  this.scrollPageDown = function() {
12373  this.$moveByPage(1);
12374  };
12375  this.scrollPageUp = function() {
12376  this.$moveByPage(-1);
12377  };
12378  this.scrollToRow = function(row) {
12379  this.renderer.scrollToRow(row);
12380  };
12381  this.scrollToLine = function(line, center, animate, callback) {
12382  this.renderer.scrollToLine(line, center, animate, callback);
12383  };
12384  this.centerSelection = function() {
12385  var range = this.getSelectionRange();
12386  var pos = {
12387  row: Math.floor(range.start.row + (range.end.row - range.start.row) / 2),
12388  column: Math.floor(range.start.column + (range.end.column - range.start.column) / 2)
12389  };
12390  this.renderer.alignCursor(pos, 0.5);
12391  };
12392  this.getCursorPosition = function() {
12393  return this.selection.getCursor();
12394  };
12395  this.getCursorPositionScreen = function() {
12396  return this.session.documentToScreenPosition(this.getCursorPosition());
12397  };
12398  this.getSelectionRange = function() {
12399  return this.selection.getRange();
12400  };
12401  this.selectAll = function() {
12402  this.$blockScrolling += 1;
12403  this.selection.selectAll();
12404  this.$blockScrolling -= 1;
12405  };
12406  this.clearSelection = function() {
12407  this.selection.clearSelection();
12408  };
12409  this.moveCursorTo = function(row, column) {
12410  this.selection.moveCursorTo(row, column);
12411  };
12412  this.moveCursorToPosition = function(pos) {
12413  this.selection.moveCursorToPosition(pos);
12414  };
12415  this.jumpToMatching = function(select, expand) {
12416  var cursor = this.getCursorPosition();
12417  var iterator = new TokenIterator(this.session, cursor.row, cursor.column);
12418  var prevToken = iterator.getCurrentToken();
12419  var token = prevToken || iterator.stepForward();
12420 
12421  if (!token) return;
12422  var matchType;
12423  var found = false;
12424  var depth = {};
12425  var i = cursor.column - token.start;
12426  var bracketType;
12427  var brackets = {
12428  ")": "(",
12429  "(": "(",
12430  "]": "[",
12431  "[": "[",
12432  "{": "{",
12433  "}": "{"
12434  };
12435 
12436  do {
12437  if (token.value.match(/[{}()\[\]]/g)) {
12438  for (; i < token.value.length && !found; i++) {
12439  if (!brackets[token.value[i]]) {
12440  continue;
12441  }
12442 
12443  bracketType = brackets[token.value[i]] + '.' + token.type.replace("rparen", "lparen");
12444 
12445  if (isNaN(depth[bracketType])) {
12446  depth[bracketType] = 0;
12447  }
12448 
12449  switch (token.value[i]) {
12450  case '(':
12451  case '[':
12452  case '{':
12453  depth[bracketType]++;
12454  break;
12455  case ')':
12456  case ']':
12457  case '}':
12458  depth[bracketType]--;
12459 
12460  if (depth[bracketType] === -1) {
12461  matchType = 'bracket';
12462  found = true;
12463  }
12464  break;
12465  }
12466  }
12467  }
12468  else if (token && token.type.indexOf('tag-name') !== -1) {
12469  if (isNaN(depth[token.value])) {
12470  depth[token.value] = 0;
12471  }
12472 
12473  if (prevToken.value === '<') {
12474  depth[token.value]++;
12475  }
12476  else if (prevToken.value === '</') {
12477  depth[token.value]--;
12478  }
12479 
12480  if (depth[token.value] === -1) {
12481  matchType = 'tag';
12482  found = true;
12483  }
12484  }
12485 
12486  if (!found) {
12487  prevToken = token;
12488  token = iterator.stepForward();
12489  i = 0;
12490  }
12491  } while (token && !found);
12492  if (!matchType)
12493  return;
12494 
12495  var range, pos;
12496  if (matchType === 'bracket') {
12497  range = this.session.getBracketRange(cursor);
12498  if (!range) {
12499  range = new Range(
12500  iterator.getCurrentTokenRow(),
12501  iterator.getCurrentTokenColumn() + i - 1,
12502  iterator.getCurrentTokenRow(),
12503  iterator.getCurrentTokenColumn() + i - 1
12504  );
12505  pos = range.start;
12506  if (expand || pos.row === cursor.row && Math.abs(pos.column - cursor.column) < 2)
12507  range = this.session.getBracketRange(pos);
12508  }
12509  }
12510  else if (matchType === 'tag') {
12511  if (token && token.type.indexOf('tag-name') !== -1)
12512  var tag = token.value;
12513  else
12514  return;
12515 
12516  range = new Range(
12517  iterator.getCurrentTokenRow(),
12518  iterator.getCurrentTokenColumn() - 2,
12519  iterator.getCurrentTokenRow(),
12520  iterator.getCurrentTokenColumn() - 2
12521  );
12522  if (range.compare(cursor.row, cursor.column) === 0) {
12523  found = false;
12524  do {
12525  token = prevToken;
12526  prevToken = iterator.stepBackward();
12527 
12528  if (prevToken) {
12529  if (prevToken.type.indexOf('tag-close') !== -1) {
12530  range.setEnd(iterator.getCurrentTokenRow(), iterator.getCurrentTokenColumn() + 1);
12531  }
12532 
12533  if (token.value === tag && token.type.indexOf('tag-name') !== -1) {
12534  if (prevToken.value === '<') {
12535  depth[tag]++;
12536  }
12537  else if (prevToken.value === '</') {
12538  depth[tag]--;
12539  }
12540 
12541  if (depth[tag] === 0)
12542  found = true;
12543  }
12544  }
12545  } while (prevToken && !found);
12546  }
12547  if (token && token.type.indexOf('tag-name')) {
12548  pos = range.start;
12549  if (pos.row == cursor.row && Math.abs(pos.column - cursor.column) < 2)
12550  pos = range.end;
12551  }
12552  }
12553 
12554  pos = range && range.cursor || pos;
12555  if (pos) {
12556  if (select) {
12557  if (range && expand) {
12558  this.selection.setRange(range);
12559  } else if (range && range.isEqual(this.getSelectionRange())) {
12560  this.clearSelection();
12561  } else {
12562  this.selection.selectTo(pos.row, pos.column);
12563  }
12564  } else {
12565  this.selection.moveTo(pos.row, pos.column);
12566  }
12567  }
12568  };
12569  this.gotoLine = function(lineNumber, column, animate) {
12570  this.selection.clearSelection();
12571  this.session.unfold({row: lineNumber - 1, column: column || 0});
12572 
12573  this.$blockScrolling += 1;
12574  this.exitMultiSelectMode && this.exitMultiSelectMode();
12575  this.moveCursorTo(lineNumber - 1, column || 0);
12576  this.$blockScrolling -= 1;
12577 
12578  if (!this.isRowFullyVisible(lineNumber - 1))
12579  this.scrollToLine(lineNumber - 1, true, animate);
12580  };
12581  this.navigateTo = function(row, column) {
12582  this.selection.moveTo(row, column);
12583  };
12584  this.navigateUp = function(times) {
12585  if (this.selection.isMultiLine() && !this.selection.isBackwards()) {
12586  var selectionStart = this.selection.anchor.getPosition();
12587  return this.moveCursorToPosition(selectionStart);
12588  }
12589  this.selection.clearSelection();
12590  this.selection.moveCursorBy(-times || -1, 0);
12591  };
12592  this.navigateDown = function(times) {
12593  if (this.selection.isMultiLine() && this.selection.isBackwards()) {
12594  var selectionEnd = this.selection.anchor.getPosition();
12595  return this.moveCursorToPosition(selectionEnd);
12596  }
12597  this.selection.clearSelection();
12598  this.selection.moveCursorBy(times || 1, 0);
12599  };
12600  this.navigateLeft = function(times) {
12601  if (!this.selection.isEmpty()) {
12602  var selectionStart = this.getSelectionRange().start;
12603  this.moveCursorToPosition(selectionStart);
12604  }
12605  else {
12606  times = times || 1;
12607  while (times--) {
12608  this.selection.moveCursorLeft();
12609  }
12610  }
12611  this.clearSelection();
12612  };
12613  this.navigateRight = function(times) {
12614  if (!this.selection.isEmpty()) {
12615  var selectionEnd = this.getSelectionRange().end;
12616  this.moveCursorToPosition(selectionEnd);
12617  }
12618  else {
12619  times = times || 1;
12620  while (times--) {
12621  this.selection.moveCursorRight();
12622  }
12623  }
12624  this.clearSelection();
12625  };
12626  this.navigateLineStart = function() {
12627  this.selection.moveCursorLineStart();
12628  this.clearSelection();
12629  };
12630  this.navigateLineEnd = function() {
12631  this.selection.moveCursorLineEnd();
12632  this.clearSelection();
12633  };
12634  this.navigateFileEnd = function() {
12635  this.selection.moveCursorFileEnd();
12636  this.clearSelection();
12637  };
12638  this.navigateFileStart = function() {
12639  this.selection.moveCursorFileStart();
12640  this.clearSelection();
12641  };
12642  this.navigateWordRight = function() {
12643  this.selection.moveCursorWordRight();
12644  this.clearSelection();
12645  };
12646  this.navigateWordLeft = function() {
12647  this.selection.moveCursorWordLeft();
12648  this.clearSelection();
12649  };
12650  this.replace = function(replacement, options) {
12651  if (options)
12652  this.$search.set(options);
12653 
12654  var range = this.$search.find(this.session);
12655  var replaced = 0;
12656  if (!range)
12657  return replaced;
12658 
12659  if (this.$tryReplace(range, replacement)) {
12660  replaced = 1;
12661  }
12662  if (range !== null) {
12663  this.selection.setSelectionRange(range);
12664  this.renderer.scrollSelectionIntoView(range.start, range.end);
12665  }
12666 
12667  return replaced;
12668  };
12669  this.replaceAll = function(replacement, options) {
12670  if (options) {
12671  this.$search.set(options);
12672  }
12673 
12674  var ranges = this.$search.findAll(this.session);
12675  var replaced = 0;
12676  if (!ranges.length)
12677  return replaced;
12678 
12679  this.$blockScrolling += 1;
12680 
12681  var selection = this.getSelectionRange();
12682  this.selection.moveTo(0, 0);
12683 
12684  for (var i = ranges.length - 1; i >= 0; --i) {
12685  if(this.$tryReplace(ranges[i], replacement)) {
12686  replaced++;
12687  }
12688  }
12689 
12690  this.selection.setSelectionRange(selection);
12691  this.$blockScrolling -= 1;
12692 
12693  return replaced;
12694  };
12695 
12696  this.$tryReplace = function(range, replacement) {
12697  var input = this.session.getTextRange(range);
12698  replacement = this.$search.replace(input, replacement);
12699  if (replacement !== null) {
12700  range.end = this.session.replace(range, replacement);
12701  return range;
12702  } else {
12703  return null;
12704  }
12705  };
12706  this.getLastSearchOptions = function() {
12707  return this.$search.getOptions();
12708  };
12709  this.find = function(needle, options, animate) {
12710  if (!options)
12711  options = {};
12712 
12713  if (typeof needle == "string" || needle instanceof RegExp)
12714  options.needle = needle;
12715  else if (typeof needle == "object")
12716  oop.mixin(options, needle);
12717 
12718  var range = this.selection.getRange();
12719  if (options.needle == null) {
12720  needle = this.session.getTextRange(range)
12721  || this.$search.$options.needle;
12722  if (!needle) {
12723  range = this.session.getWordRange(range.start.row, range.start.column);
12724  needle = this.session.getTextRange(range);
12725  }
12726  this.$search.set({needle: needle});
12727  }
12728 
12729  this.$search.set(options);
12730  if (!options.start)
12731  this.$search.set({start: range});
12732 
12733  var newRange = this.$search.find(this.session);
12734  if (options.preventScroll)
12735  return newRange;
12736  if (newRange) {
12737  this.revealRange(newRange, animate);
12738  return newRange;
12739  }
12740  if (options.backwards)
12741  range.start = range.end;
12742  else
12743  range.end = range.start;
12744  this.selection.setRange(range);
12745  };
12746  this.findNext = function(options, animate) {
12747  this.find({skipCurrent: true, backwards: false}, options, animate);
12748  };
12749  this.findPrevious = function(options, animate) {
12750  this.find(options, {skipCurrent: true, backwards: true}, animate);
12751  };
12752 
12753  this.revealRange = function(range, animate) {
12754  this.$blockScrolling += 1;
12755  this.session.unfold(range);
12756  this.selection.setSelectionRange(range);
12757  this.$blockScrolling -= 1;
12758 
12759  var scrollTop = this.renderer.scrollTop;
12760  this.renderer.scrollSelectionIntoView(range.start, range.end, 0.5);
12761  if (animate !== false)
12762  this.renderer.animateScrolling(scrollTop);
12763  };
12764  this.undo = function() {
12765  this.$blockScrolling++;
12766  this.session.getUndoManager().undo();
12767  this.$blockScrolling--;
12768  this.renderer.scrollCursorIntoView(null, 0.5);
12769  };
12770  this.redo = function() {
12771  this.$blockScrolling++;
12772  this.session.getUndoManager().redo();
12773  this.$blockScrolling--;
12774  this.renderer.scrollCursorIntoView(null, 0.5);
12775  };
12776  this.destroy = function() {
12777  this.renderer.destroy();
12778  this._signal("destroy", this);
12779  if (this.session) {
12780  this.session.destroy();
12781  }
12782  };
12783  this.setAutoScrollEditorIntoView = function(enable) {
12784  if (!enable)
12785  return;
12786  var rect;
12787  var self = this;
12788  var shouldScroll = false;
12789  if (!this.$scrollAnchor)
12790  this.$scrollAnchor = document.createElement("div");
12791  var scrollAnchor = this.$scrollAnchor;
12792  scrollAnchor.style.cssText = "position:absolute";
12793  this.container.insertBefore(scrollAnchor, this.container.firstChild);
12794  var onChangeSelection = this.on("changeSelection", function() {
12795  shouldScroll = true;
12796  });
12797  var onBeforeRender = this.renderer.on("beforeRender", function() {
12798  if (shouldScroll)
12799  rect = self.renderer.container.getBoundingClientRect();
12800  });
12801  var onAfterRender = this.renderer.on("afterRender", function() {
12802  if (shouldScroll && rect && (self.isFocused()
12803  || self.searchBox && self.searchBox.isFocused())
12804  ) {
12805  var renderer = self.renderer;
12806  var pos = renderer.$cursorLayer.$pixelPos;
12807  var config = renderer.layerConfig;
12808  var top = pos.top - config.offset;
12809  if (pos.top >= 0 && top + rect.top < 0) {
12810  shouldScroll = true;
12811  } else if (pos.top < config.height &&
12812  pos.top + rect.top + config.lineHeight > window.innerHeight) {
12813  shouldScroll = false;
12814  } else {
12815  shouldScroll = null;
12816  }
12817  if (shouldScroll != null) {
12818  scrollAnchor.style.top = top + "px";
12819  scrollAnchor.style.left = pos.left + "px";
12820  scrollAnchor.style.height = config.lineHeight + "px";
12821  scrollAnchor.scrollIntoView(shouldScroll);
12822  }
12823  shouldScroll = rect = null;
12824  }
12825  });
12826  this.setAutoScrollEditorIntoView = function(enable) {
12827  if (enable)
12828  return;
12829  delete this.setAutoScrollEditorIntoView;
12830  this.removeEventListener("changeSelection", onChangeSelection);
12831  this.renderer.removeEventListener("afterRender", onAfterRender);
12832  this.renderer.removeEventListener("beforeRender", onBeforeRender);
12833  };
12834  };
12835 
12836 
12837  this.$resetCursorStyle = function() {
12838  var style = this.$cursorStyle || "ace";
12839  var cursorLayer = this.renderer.$cursorLayer;
12840  if (!cursorLayer)
12841  return;
12842  cursorLayer.setSmoothBlinking(/smooth/.test(style));
12843  cursorLayer.isBlinking = !this.$readOnly && style != "wide";
12844  dom.setCssClass(cursorLayer.element, "ace_slim-cursors", /slim/.test(style));
12845  };
12846 
12847 }).call(Editor.prototype);
12848 
12849 
12850 
12851 config.defineOptions(Editor.prototype, "editor", {
12852  selectionStyle: {
12853  set: function(style) {
12854  this.onSelectionChange();
12855  this._signal("changeSelectionStyle", {data: style});
12856  },
12857  initialValue: "line"
12858  },
12859  highlightActiveLine: {
12860  set: function() {this.$updateHighlightActiveLine();},
12861  initialValue: true
12862  },
12863  highlightSelectedWord: {
12864  set: function(shouldHighlight) {this.$onSelectionChange();},
12865  initialValue: true
12866  },
12867  readOnly: {
12868  set: function(readOnly) {
12869  this.$resetCursorStyle();
12870  },
12871  initialValue: false
12872  },
12873  cursorStyle: {
12874  set: function(val) { this.$resetCursorStyle(); },
12875  values: ["ace", "slim", "smooth", "wide"],
12876  initialValue: "ace"
12877  },
12878  mergeUndoDeltas: {
12879  values: [false, true, "always"],
12880  initialValue: true
12881  },
12882  behavioursEnabled: {initialValue: true},
12883  wrapBehavioursEnabled: {initialValue: true},
12884  autoScrollEditorIntoView: {
12885  set: function(val) {this.setAutoScrollEditorIntoView(val)}
12886  },
12887 
12888  hScrollBarAlwaysVisible: "renderer",
12889  vScrollBarAlwaysVisible: "renderer",
12890  highlightGutterLine: "renderer",
12891  animatedScroll: "renderer",
12892  showInvisibles: "renderer",
12893  showPrintMargin: "renderer",
12894  printMarginColumn: "renderer",
12895  printMargin: "renderer",
12896  fadeFoldWidgets: "renderer",
12897  showFoldWidgets: "renderer",
12898  showLineNumbers: "renderer",
12899  showGutter: "renderer",
12900  displayIndentGuides: "renderer",
12901  fontSize: "renderer",
12902  fontFamily: "renderer",
12903  maxLines: "renderer",
12904  minLines: "renderer",
12905  scrollPastEnd: "renderer",
12906  fixedWidthGutter: "renderer",
12907  theme: "renderer",
12908 
12909  scrollSpeed: "$mouseHandler",
12910  dragDelay: "$mouseHandler",
12911  dragEnabled: "$mouseHandler",
12912  focusTimout: "$mouseHandler",
12913  tooltipFollowsMouse: "$mouseHandler",
12914 
12915  firstLineNumber: "session",
12916  overwrite: "session",
12917  newLineMode: "session",
12918  useWorker: "session",
12919  useSoftTabs: "session",
12920  tabSize: "session",
12921  wrap: "session",
12922  foldStyle: "session",
12923  mode: "session"
12924 });
12925 
12926 exports.Editor = Editor;
12927 });
12928 
12929 define("ace/undomanager",["require","exports","module"], function(require, exports, module) {
12930 "use strict";
12931 var UndoManager = function() {
12932  this.reset();
12933 };
12934 
12935 (function() {
12936  this.execute = function(options) {
12937  var deltas = options.args[0];
12938  this.$doc = options.args[1];
12939  if (options.merge && this.hasUndo()){
12940  this.dirtyCounter--;
12941  deltas = this.$undoStack.pop().concat(deltas);
12942  }
12943  this.$undoStack.push(deltas);
12944  this.$redoStack = [];
12945 
12946  if (this.dirtyCounter < 0) {
12947  this.dirtyCounter = NaN;
12948  }
12949  this.dirtyCounter++;
12950  };
12951  this.undo = function(dontSelect) {
12952  var deltas = this.$undoStack.pop();
12953  var undoSelectionRange = null;
12954  if (deltas) {
12955  undoSelectionRange =
12956  this.$doc.undoChanges(deltas, dontSelect);
12957  this.$redoStack.push(deltas);
12958  this.dirtyCounter--;
12959  }
12960 
12961  return undoSelectionRange;
12962  };
12963  this.redo = function(dontSelect) {
12964  var deltas = this.$redoStack.pop();
12965  var redoSelectionRange = null;
12966  if (deltas) {
12967  redoSelectionRange =
12968  this.$doc.redoChanges(deltas, dontSelect);
12969  this.$undoStack.push(deltas);
12970  this.dirtyCounter++;
12971  }
12972 
12973  return redoSelectionRange;
12974  };
12975  this.reset = function() {
12976  this.$undoStack = [];
12977  this.$redoStack = [];
12978  this.dirtyCounter = 0;
12979  };
12980  this.hasUndo = function() {
12981  return this.$undoStack.length > 0;
12982  };
12983  this.hasRedo = function() {
12984  return this.$redoStack.length > 0;
12985  };
12986  this.markClean = function() {
12987  this.dirtyCounter = 0;
12988  };
12989  this.isClean = function() {
12990  return this.dirtyCounter === 0;
12991  };
12992 
12993 }).call(UndoManager.prototype);
12994 
12995 exports.UndoManager = UndoManager;
12996 });
12997 
12998 define("ace/layer/gutter",["require","exports","module","ace/lib/dom","ace/lib/oop","ace/lib/lang","ace/lib/event_emitter"], function(require, exports, module) {
12999 "use strict";
13000 
13001 var dom = require("../lib/dom");
13002 var oop = require("../lib/oop");
13003 var lang = require("../lib/lang");
13004 var EventEmitter = require("../lib/event_emitter").EventEmitter;
13005 
13006 var Gutter = function(parentEl) {
13007  this.element = dom.createElement("div");
13008  this.element.className = "ace_layer ace_gutter-layer";
13009  parentEl.appendChild(this.element);
13010  this.setShowFoldWidgets(this.$showFoldWidgets);
13011 
13012  this.gutterWidth = 0;
13013 
13014  this.$annotations = [];
13015  this.$updateAnnotations = this.$updateAnnotations.bind(this);
13016 
13017  this.$cells = [];
13018 };
13019 
13020 (function() {
13021 
13022  oop.implement(this, EventEmitter);
13023 
13024  this.setSession = function(session) {
13025  if (this.session)
13026  this.session.removeEventListener("change", this.$updateAnnotations);
13027  this.session = session;
13028  if (session)
13029  session.on("change", this.$updateAnnotations);
13030  };
13031 
13032  this.addGutterDecoration = function(row, className){
13033  if (window.console)
13034  console.warn && console.warn("deprecated use session.addGutterDecoration");
13035  this.session.addGutterDecoration(row, className);
13036  };
13037 
13038  this.removeGutterDecoration = function(row, className){
13039  if (window.console)
13040  console.warn && console.warn("deprecated use session.removeGutterDecoration");
13041  this.session.removeGutterDecoration(row, className);
13042  };
13043 
13044  this.setAnnotations = function(annotations) {
13045  this.$annotations = [];
13046  for (var i = 0; i < annotations.length; i++) {
13047  var annotation = annotations[i];
13048  var row = annotation.row;
13049  var rowInfo = this.$annotations[row];
13050  if (!rowInfo)
13051  rowInfo = this.$annotations[row] = {text: []};
13052 
13053  var annoText = annotation.text;
13054  annoText = annoText ? lang.escapeHTML(annoText) : annotation.html || "";
13055 
13056  if (rowInfo.text.indexOf(annoText) === -1)
13057  rowInfo.text.push(annoText);
13058 
13059  var type = annotation.type;
13060  if (type == "error")
13061  rowInfo.className = " ace_error";
13062  else if (type == "warning" && rowInfo.className != " ace_error")
13063  rowInfo.className = " ace_warning";
13064  else if (type == "info" && (!rowInfo.className))
13065  rowInfo.className = " ace_info";
13066  }
13067  };
13068 
13069  this.$updateAnnotations = function (e) {
13070  if (!this.$annotations.length)
13071  return;
13072  var delta = e.data;
13073  var range = delta.range;
13074  var firstRow = range.start.row;
13075  var len = range.end.row - firstRow;
13076  if (len === 0) {
13077  } else if (delta.action == "removeText" || delta.action == "removeLines") {
13078  this.$annotations.splice(firstRow, len + 1, null);
13079  } else {
13080  var args = new Array(len + 1);
13081  args.unshift(firstRow, 1);
13082  this.$annotations.splice.apply(this.$annotations, args);
13083  }
13084  };
13085 
13086  this.update = function(config) {
13087  var session = this.session;
13088  var firstRow = config.firstRow;
13089  var lastRow = Math.min(config.lastRow + config.gutterOffset, // needed to compensate for hor scollbar
13090  session.getLength() - 1);
13091  var fold = session.getNextFoldLine(firstRow);
13092  var foldStart = fold ? fold.start.row : Infinity;
13093  var foldWidgets = this.$showFoldWidgets && session.foldWidgets;
13094  var breakpoints = session.$breakpoints;
13095  var decorations = session.$decorations;
13096  var firstLineNumber = session.$firstLineNumber;
13097  var lastLineNumber = 0;
13098 
13099  var gutterRenderer = session.gutterRenderer || this.$renderer;
13100 
13101  var cell = null;
13102  var index = -1;
13103  var row = firstRow;
13104  while (true) {
13105  if (row > foldStart) {
13106  row = fold.end.row + 1;
13107  fold = session.getNextFoldLine(row, fold);
13108  foldStart = fold ? fold.start.row : Infinity;
13109  }
13110  if (row > lastRow) {
13111  while (this.$cells.length > index + 1) {
13112  cell = this.$cells.pop();
13113  this.element.removeChild(cell.element);
13114  }
13115  break;
13116  }
13117 
13118  cell = this.$cells[++index];
13119  if (!cell) {
13120  cell = {element: null, textNode: null, foldWidget: null};
13121  cell.element = dom.createElement("div");
13122  cell.textNode = document.createTextNode('');
13123  cell.element.appendChild(cell.textNode);
13124  this.element.appendChild(cell.element);
13125  this.$cells[index] = cell;
13126  }
13127 
13128  var className = "ace_gutter-cell ";
13129  if (breakpoints[row])
13130  className += breakpoints[row];
13131  if (decorations[row])
13132  className += decorations[row];
13133  if (this.$annotations[row])
13134  className += this.$annotations[row].className;
13135  if (cell.element.className != className)
13136  cell.element.className = className;
13137 
13138  var height = session.getRowLength(row) * config.lineHeight + "px";
13139  if (height != cell.element.style.height)
13140  cell.element.style.height = height;
13141 
13142  if (foldWidgets) {
13143  var c = foldWidgets[row];
13144  if (c == null)
13145  c = foldWidgets[row] = session.getFoldWidget(row);
13146  }
13147 
13148  if (c) {
13149  if (!cell.foldWidget) {
13150  cell.foldWidget = dom.createElement("span");
13151  cell.element.appendChild(cell.foldWidget);
13152  }
13153  var className = "ace_fold-widget ace_" + c;
13154  if (c == "start" && row == foldStart && row < fold.end.row)
13155  className += " ace_closed";
13156  else
13157  className += " ace_open";
13158  if (cell.foldWidget.className != className)
13159  cell.foldWidget.className = className;
13160 
13161  var height = config.lineHeight + "px";
13162  if (cell.foldWidget.style.height != height)
13163  cell.foldWidget.style.height = height;
13164  } else {
13165  if (cell.foldWidget) {
13166  cell.element.removeChild(cell.foldWidget);
13167  cell.foldWidget = null;
13168  }
13169  }
13170 
13171  var text = lastLineNumber = gutterRenderer
13172  ? gutterRenderer.getText(session, row)
13173  : row + firstLineNumber;
13174  if (text != cell.textNode.data)
13175  cell.textNode.data = text;
13176 
13177  row++;
13178  }
13179 
13180  this.element.style.height = config.minHeight + "px";
13181 
13182  if (this.$fixedWidth || session.$useWrapMode)
13183  lastLineNumber = session.getLength() + firstLineNumber;
13184 
13185  var gutterWidth = gutterRenderer
13186  ? gutterRenderer.getWidth(session, lastLineNumber, config)
13187  : lastLineNumber.toString().length * config.characterWidth;
13188 
13189  var padding = this.$padding || this.$computePadding();
13190  gutterWidth += padding.left + padding.right;
13191  if (gutterWidth !== this.gutterWidth && !isNaN(gutterWidth)) {
13192  this.gutterWidth = gutterWidth;
13193  this.element.style.width = Math.ceil(this.gutterWidth) + "px";
13194  this._emit("changeGutterWidth", gutterWidth);
13195  }
13196  };
13197 
13198  this.$fixedWidth = false;
13199 
13200  this.$showLineNumbers = true;
13201  this.$renderer = "";
13202  this.setShowLineNumbers = function(show) {
13203  this.$renderer = !show && {
13204  getWidth: function() {return ""},
13205  getText: function() {return ""}
13206  };
13207  };
13208 
13209  this.getShowLineNumbers = function() {
13210  return this.$showLineNumbers;
13211  };
13212 
13213  this.$showFoldWidgets = true;
13214  this.setShowFoldWidgets = function(show) {
13215  if (show)
13216  dom.addCssClass(this.element, "ace_folding-enabled");
13217  else
13218  dom.removeCssClass(this.element, "ace_folding-enabled");
13219 
13220  this.$showFoldWidgets = show;
13221  this.$padding = null;
13222  };
13223 
13224  this.getShowFoldWidgets = function() {
13225  return this.$showFoldWidgets;
13226  };
13227 
13228  this.$computePadding = function() {
13229  if (!this.element.firstChild)
13230  return {left: 0, right: 0};
13231  var style = dom.computedStyle(this.element.firstChild);
13232  this.$padding = {};
13233  this.$padding.left = parseInt(style.paddingLeft) + 1 || 0;
13234  this.$padding.right = parseInt(style.paddingRight) || 0;
13235  return this.$padding;
13236  };
13237 
13238  this.getRegion = function(point) {
13239  var padding = this.$padding || this.$computePadding();
13240  var rect = this.element.getBoundingClientRect();
13241  if (point.x < padding.left + rect.left)
13242  return "markers";
13243  if (this.$showFoldWidgets && point.x > rect.right - padding.right)
13244  return "foldWidgets";
13245  };
13246 
13247 }).call(Gutter.prototype);
13248 
13249 exports.Gutter = Gutter;
13250 
13251 });
13252 
13253 define("ace/layer/marker",["require","exports","module","ace/range","ace/lib/dom"], function(require, exports, module) {
13254 "use strict";
13255 
13256 var Range = require("../range").Range;
13257 var dom = require("../lib/dom");
13258 
13259 var Marker = function(parentEl) {
13260  this.element = dom.createElement("div");
13261  this.element.className = "ace_layer ace_marker-layer";
13262  parentEl.appendChild(this.element);
13263 };
13264 
13265 (function() {
13266 
13267  this.$padding = 0;
13268 
13269  this.setPadding = function(padding) {
13270  this.$padding = padding;
13271  };
13272  this.setSession = function(session) {
13273  this.session = session;
13274  };
13275 
13276  this.setMarkers = function(markers) {
13277  this.markers = markers;
13278  };
13279 
13280  this.update = function(config) {
13281  var config = config || this.config;
13282  if (!config)
13283  return;
13284 
13285  this.config = config;
13286 
13287 
13288  var html = [];
13289  for (var key in this.markers) {
13290  var marker = this.markers[key];
13291 
13292  if (!marker.range) {
13293  marker.update(html, this, this.session, config);
13294  continue;
13295  }
13296 
13297  var range = marker.range.clipRows(config.firstRow, config.lastRow);
13298  if (range.isEmpty()) continue;
13299 
13300  range = range.toScreenRange(this.session);
13301  if (marker.renderer) {
13302  var top = this.$getTop(range.start.row, config);
13303  var left = this.$padding + range.start.column * config.characterWidth;
13304  marker.renderer(html, range, left, top, config);
13305  } else if (marker.type == "fullLine") {
13306  this.drawFullLineMarker(html, range, marker.clazz, config);
13307  } else if (marker.type == "screenLine") {
13308  this.drawScreenLineMarker(html, range, marker.clazz, config);
13309  } else if (range.isMultiLine()) {
13310  if (marker.type == "text")
13311  this.drawTextMarker(html, range, marker.clazz, config);
13312  else
13313  this.drawMultiLineMarker(html, range, marker.clazz, config);
13314  } else {
13315  this.drawSingleLineMarker(html, range, marker.clazz + " ace_start", config);
13316  }
13317  }
13318  this.element.innerHTML = html.join("");
13319  };
13320 
13321  this.$getTop = function(row, layerConfig) {
13322  return (row - layerConfig.firstRowScreen) * layerConfig.lineHeight;
13323  };
13324  this.drawTextMarker = function(stringBuilder, range, clazz, layerConfig, extraStyle) {
13325  var row = range.start.row;
13326 
13327  var lineRange = new Range(
13328  row, range.start.column,
13329  row, this.session.getScreenLastRowColumn(row)
13330  );
13331  this.drawSingleLineMarker(stringBuilder, lineRange, clazz + " ace_start", layerConfig, 1, extraStyle);
13332  row = range.end.row;
13333  lineRange = new Range(row, 0, row, range.end.column);
13334  this.drawSingleLineMarker(stringBuilder, lineRange, clazz, layerConfig, 0, extraStyle);
13335 
13336  for (row = range.start.row + 1; row < range.end.row; row++) {
13337  lineRange.start.row = row;
13338  lineRange.end.row = row;
13339  lineRange.end.column = this.session.getScreenLastRowColumn(row);
13340  this.drawSingleLineMarker(stringBuilder, lineRange, clazz, layerConfig, 1, extraStyle);
13341  }
13342  };
13343  this.drawMultiLineMarker = function(stringBuilder, range, clazz, config, extraStyle) {
13344  var padding = this.$padding;
13345  var height = config.lineHeight;
13346  var top = this.$getTop(range.start.row, config);
13347  var left = padding + range.start.column * config.characterWidth;
13348  extraStyle = extraStyle || "";
13349 
13350  stringBuilder.push(
13351  "<div class='", clazz, " ace_start' style='",
13352  "height:", height, "px;",
13353  "right:0;",
13354  "top:", top, "px;",
13355  "left:", left, "px;", extraStyle, "'></div>"
13356  );
13357  top = this.$getTop(range.end.row, config);
13358  var width = range.end.column * config.characterWidth;
13359 
13360  stringBuilder.push(
13361  "<div class='", clazz, "' style='",
13362  "height:", height, "px;",
13363  "width:", width, "px;",
13364  "top:", top, "px;",
13365  "left:", padding, "px;", extraStyle, "'></div>"
13366  );
13367  height = (range.end.row - range.start.row - 1) * config.lineHeight;
13368  if (height < 0)
13369  return;
13370  top = this.$getTop(range.start.row + 1, config);
13371 
13372  stringBuilder.push(
13373  "<div class='", clazz, "' style='",
13374  "height:", height, "px;",
13375  "right:0;",
13376  "top:", top, "px;",
13377  "left:", padding, "px;", extraStyle, "'></div>"
13378  );
13379  };
13380  this.drawSingleLineMarker = function(stringBuilder, range, clazz, config, extraLength, extraStyle) {
13381  var height = config.lineHeight;
13382  var width = (range.end.column + (extraLength || 0) - range.start.column) * config.characterWidth;
13383 
13384  var top = this.$getTop(range.start.row, config);
13385  var left = this.$padding + range.start.column * config.characterWidth;
13386 
13387  stringBuilder.push(
13388  "<div class='", clazz, "' style='",
13389  "height:", height, "px;",
13390  "width:", width, "px;",
13391  "top:", top, "px;",
13392  "left:", left, "px;", extraStyle || "", "'></div>"
13393  );
13394  };
13395 
13396  this.drawFullLineMarker = function(stringBuilder, range, clazz, config, extraStyle) {
13397  var top = this.$getTop(range.start.row, config);
13398  var height = config.lineHeight;
13399  if (range.start.row != range.end.row)
13400  height += this.$getTop(range.end.row, config) - top;
13401 
13402  stringBuilder.push(
13403  "<div class='", clazz, "' style='",
13404  "height:", height, "px;",
13405  "top:", top, "px;",
13406  "left:0;right:0;", extraStyle || "", "'></div>"
13407  );
13408  };
13409 
13410  this.drawScreenLineMarker = function(stringBuilder, range, clazz, config, extraStyle) {
13411  var top = this.$getTop(range.start.row, config);
13412  var height = config.lineHeight;
13413 
13414  stringBuilder.push(
13415  "<div class='", clazz, "' style='",
13416  "height:", height, "px;",
13417  "top:", top, "px;",
13418  "left:0;right:0;", extraStyle || "", "'></div>"
13419  );
13420  };
13421 
13422 }).call(Marker.prototype);
13423 
13424 exports.Marker = Marker;
13425 
13426 });
13427 
13428 define("ace/layer/text",["require","exports","module","ace/lib/oop","ace/lib/dom","ace/lib/lang","ace/lib/useragent","ace/lib/event_emitter"], function(require, exports, module) {
13429 "use strict";
13430
