13431 var oop = require("../lib/oop");
13432 var dom = require("../lib/dom");
13433 var lang = require("../lib/lang");
13434 var useragent = require("../lib/useragent");
13435 var EventEmitter = require("../lib/event_emitter").EventEmitter;
13436 
13437 var Text = function(parentEl) {
13438  this.element = dom.createElement("div");
13439  this.element.className = "ace_layer ace_text-layer";
13440  parentEl.appendChild(this.element);
13441  this.$updateEolChar = this.$updateEolChar.bind(this);
13442 };
13443 
13444 (function() {
13445 
13446  oop.implement(this, EventEmitter);
13447 
13448  this.EOF_CHAR = "\xB6";
13449  this.EOL_CHAR_LF = "\xAC";
13450  this.EOL_CHAR_CRLF = "\xa4";
13451  this.EOL_CHAR = this.EOL_CHAR_LF;
13452  this.TAB_CHAR = "\u2192"; //"\u21E5";
13453  this.SPACE_CHAR = "\xB7";
13454  this.$padding = 0;
13455 
13456  this.$updateEolChar = function() {
13457  var EOL_CHAR = this.session.doc.getNewLineCharacter() == "\n"
13458  ? this.EOL_CHAR_LF
13459  : this.EOL_CHAR_CRLF;
13460  if (this.EOL_CHAR != EOL_CHAR) {
13461  this.EOL_CHAR = EOL_CHAR;
13462  return true;
13463  }
13464  }
13465 
13466  this.setPadding = function(padding) {
13467  this.$padding = padding;
13468  this.element.style.padding = "0 " + padding + "px";
13469  };
13470 
13471  this.getLineHeight = function() {
13472  return this.$fontMetrics.$characterSize.height || 0;
13473  };
13474 
13475  this.getCharacterWidth = function() {
13476  return this.$fontMetrics.$characterSize.width || 0;
13477  };
13478 
13479  this.$setFontMetrics = function(measure) {
13480  this.$fontMetrics = measure;
13481  this.$fontMetrics.on("changeCharacterSize", function(e) {
13482  this._signal("changeCharacterSize", e);
13483  }.bind(this));
13484  this.$pollSizeChanges();
13485  }
13486 
13487  this.checkForSizeChanges = function() {
13488  this.$fontMetrics.checkForSizeChanges();
13489  };
13490  this.$pollSizeChanges = function() {
13491  return this.$pollSizeChangesTimer = this.$fontMetrics.$pollSizeChanges();
13492  };
13493  this.setSession = function(session) {
13494  this.session = session;
13495  if (session)
13496  this.$computeTabString();
13497  };
13498 
13499  this.showInvisibles = false;
13500  this.setShowInvisibles = function(showInvisibles) {
13501  if (this.showInvisibles == showInvisibles)
13502  return false;
13503 
13504  this.showInvisibles = showInvisibles;
13505  this.$computeTabString();
13506  return true;
13507  };
13508 
13509  this.displayIndentGuides = true;
13510  this.setDisplayIndentGuides = function(display) {
13511  if (this.displayIndentGuides == display)
13512  return false;
13513 
13514  this.displayIndentGuides = display;
13515  this.$computeTabString();
13516  return true;
13517  };
13518 
13519  this.$tabStrings = [];
13520  this.onChangeTabSize =
13521  this.$computeTabString = function() {
13522  var tabSize = this.session.getTabSize();
13523  this.tabSize = tabSize;
13524  var tabStr = this.$tabStrings = [0];
13525  for (var i = 1; i < tabSize + 1; i++) {
13526  if (this.showInvisibles) {
13527  tabStr.push("<span class='ace_invisible ace_invisible_tab'>"
13528  + this.TAB_CHAR
13529  + lang.stringRepeat("\xa0", i - 1)
13530  + "</span>");
13531  } else {
13532  tabStr.push(lang.stringRepeat("\xa0", i));
13533  }
13534  }
13535  if (this.displayIndentGuides) {
13536  this.$indentGuideRe = /\s\S| \t|\t |\s$/;
13537  var className = "ace_indent-guide";
13538  var spaceClass = "";
13539  var tabClass = "";
13540  if (this.showInvisibles) {
13541  className += " ace_invisible";
13542  spaceClass = " ace_invisible_space";
13543  tabClass = " ace_invisible_tab";
13544  var spaceContent = lang.stringRepeat(this.SPACE_CHAR, this.tabSize);
13545  var tabContent = this.TAB_CHAR + lang.stringRepeat("\xa0", this.tabSize - 1);
13546  } else{
13547  var spaceContent = lang.stringRepeat("\xa0", this.tabSize);
13548  var tabContent = spaceContent;
13549  }
13550 
13551  this.$tabStrings[" "] = "<span class='" + className + spaceClass + "'>" + spaceContent + "</span>";
13552  this.$tabStrings["\t"] = "<span class='" + className + tabClass + "'>" + tabContent + "</span>";
13553  }
13554  };
13555 
13556  this.updateLines = function(config, firstRow, lastRow) {
13557  if (this.config.lastRow != config.lastRow ||
13558  this.config.firstRow != config.firstRow) {
13559  this.scrollLines(config);
13560  }
13561  this.config = config;
13562 
13563  var first = Math.max(firstRow, config.firstRow);
13564  var last = Math.min(lastRow, config.lastRow);
13565 
13566  var lineElements = this.element.childNodes;
13567  var lineElementsIdx = 0;
13568 
13569  for (var row = config.firstRow; row < first; row++) {
13570  var foldLine = this.session.getFoldLine(row);
13571  if (foldLine) {
13572  if (foldLine.containsRow(first)) {
13573  first = foldLine.start.row;
13574  break;
13575  } else {
13576  row = foldLine.end.row;
13577  }
13578  }
13579  lineElementsIdx ++;
13580  }
13581 
13582  var row = first;
13583  var foldLine = this.session.getNextFoldLine(row);
13584  var foldStart = foldLine ? foldLine.start.row : Infinity;
13585 
13586  while (true) {
13587  if (row > foldStart) {
13588  row = foldLine.end.row+1;
13589  foldLine = this.session.getNextFoldLine(row, foldLine);
13590  foldStart = foldLine ? foldLine.start.row :Infinity;
13591  }
13592  if (row > last)
13593  break;
13594 
13595  var lineElement = lineElements[lineElementsIdx++];
13596  if (lineElement) {
13597  var html = [];
13598  this.$renderLine(
13599  html, row, !this.$useLineGroups(), row == foldStart ? foldLine : false
13600  );
13601  lineElement.style.height = config.lineHeight * this.session.getRowLength(row) + "px";
13602  lineElement.innerHTML = html.join("");
13603  }
13604  row++;
13605  }
13606  };
13607 
13608  this.scrollLines = function(config) {
13609  var oldConfig = this.config;
13610  this.config = config;
13611 
13612  if (!oldConfig || oldConfig.lastRow < config.firstRow)
13613  return this.update(config);
13614 
13615  if (config.lastRow < oldConfig.firstRow)
13616  return this.update(config);
13617 
13618  var el = this.element;
13619  if (oldConfig.firstRow < config.firstRow)
13620  for (var row=this.session.getFoldedRowCount(oldConfig.firstRow, config.firstRow - 1); row>0; row--)
13621  el.removeChild(el.firstChild);
13622 
13623  if (oldConfig.lastRow > config.lastRow)
13624  for (var row=this.session.getFoldedRowCount(config.lastRow + 1, oldConfig.lastRow); row>0; row--)
13625  el.removeChild(el.lastChild);
13626 
13627  if (config.firstRow < oldConfig.firstRow) {
13628  var fragment = this.$renderLinesFragment(config, config.firstRow, oldConfig.firstRow - 1);
13629  if (el.firstChild)
13630  el.insertBefore(fragment, el.firstChild);
13631  else
13632  el.appendChild(fragment);
13633  }
13634 
13635  if (config.lastRow > oldConfig.lastRow) {
13636  var fragment = this.$renderLinesFragment(config, oldConfig.lastRow + 1, config.lastRow);
13637  el.appendChild(fragment);
13638  }
13639  };
13640 
13641  this.$renderLinesFragment = function(config, firstRow, lastRow) {
13642  var fragment = this.element.ownerDocument.createDocumentFragment();
13643  var row = firstRow;
13644  var foldLine = this.session.getNextFoldLine(row);
13645  var foldStart = foldLine ? foldLine.start.row : Infinity;
13646 
13647  while (true) {
13648  if (row > foldStart) {
13649  row = foldLine.end.row+1;
13650  foldLine = this.session.getNextFoldLine(row, foldLine);
13651  foldStart = foldLine ? foldLine.start.row : Infinity;
13652  }
13653  if (row > lastRow)
13654  break;
13655 
13656  var container = dom.createElement("div");
13657 
13658  var html = [];
13659  this.$renderLine(html, row, false, row == foldStart ? foldLine : false);
13660  container.innerHTML = html.join("");
13661  if (this.$useLineGroups()) {
13662  container.className = 'ace_line_group';
13663  fragment.appendChild(container);
13664  container.style.height = config.lineHeight * this.session.getRowLength(row) + "px";
13665 
13666  } else {
13667  while(container.firstChild)
13668  fragment.appendChild(container.firstChild);
13669  }
13670 
13671  row++;
13672  }
13673  return fragment;
13674  };
13675 
13676  this.update = function(config) {
13677  this.config = config;
13678 
13679  var html = [];
13680  var firstRow = config.firstRow, lastRow = config.lastRow;
13681 
13682  var row = firstRow;
13683  var foldLine = this.session.getNextFoldLine(row);
13684  var foldStart = foldLine ? foldLine.start.row : Infinity;
13685 
13686  while (true) {
13687  if (row > foldStart) {
13688  row = foldLine.end.row+1;
13689  foldLine = this.session.getNextFoldLine(row, foldLine);
13690  foldStart = foldLine ? foldLine.start.row :Infinity;
13691  }
13692  if (row > lastRow)
13693  break;
13694 
13695  if (this.$useLineGroups())
13696  html.push("<div class='ace_line_group' style='height:", config.lineHeight*this.session.getRowLength(row), "px'>")
13697 
13698  this.$renderLine(html, row, false, row == foldStart ? foldLine : false);
13699 
13700  if (this.$useLineGroups())
13701  html.push("</div>"); // end the line group
13702 
13703  row++;
13704  }
13705  this.element.innerHTML = html.join("");
13706  };
13707 
13708  this.$textToken = {
13709  "text": true,
13710  "rparen": true,
13711  "lparen": true
13712  };
13713 
13714  this.$renderToken = function(stringBuilder, screenColumn, token, value) {
13715  var self = this;
13716  var replaceReg = /\t|&|<|( +)|([\x00-\x1f\x80-\xa0\xad\u1680\u180E\u2000-\u200f\u2028\u2029\u202F\u205F\u3000\uFEFF])|[\u1100-\u115F\u11A3-\u11A7\u11FA-\u11FF\u2329-\u232A\u2E80-\u2E99\u2E9B-\u2EF3\u2F00-\u2FD5\u2FF0-\u2FFB\u3000-\u303E\u3041-\u3096\u3099-\u30FF\u3105-\u312D\u3131-\u318E\u3190-\u31BA\u31C0-\u31E3\u31F0-\u321E\u3220-\u3247\u3250-\u32FE\u3300-\u4DBF\u4E00-\uA48C\uA490-\uA4C6\uA960-\uA97C\uAC00-\uD7A3\uD7B0-\uD7C6\uD7CB-\uD7FB\uF900-\uFAFF\uFE10-\uFE19\uFE30-\uFE52\uFE54-\uFE66\uFE68-\uFE6B\uFF01-\uFF60\uFFE0-\uFFE6]/g;
13717  var replaceFunc = function(c, a, b, tabIdx, idx4) {
13718  if (a) {
13719  return self.showInvisibles ?
13720  "<span class='ace_invisible ace_invisible_space'>" + lang.stringRepeat(self.SPACE_CHAR, c.length) + "</span>" :
13721  lang.stringRepeat("\xa0", c.length);
13722  } else if (c == "&") {
13723  return "&#38;";
13724  } else if (c == "<") {
13725  return "&#60;";
13726  } else if (c == "\t") {
13727  var tabSize = self.session.getScreenTabSize(screenColumn + tabIdx);
13728  screenColumn += tabSize - 1;
13729  return self.$tabStrings[tabSize];
13730  } else if (c == "\u3000") {
13731  var classToUse = self.showInvisibles ? "ace_cjk ace_invisible ace_invisible_space" : "ace_cjk";
13732  var space = self.showInvisibles ? self.SPACE_CHAR : "";
13733  screenColumn += 1;
13734  return "<span class='" + classToUse + "' style='width:" +
13735  (self.config.characterWidth * 2) +
13736  "px'>" + space + "</span>";
13737  } else if (b) {
13738  return "<span class='ace_invisible ace_invisible_space ace_invalid'>" + self.SPACE_CHAR + "</span>";
13739  } else {
13740  screenColumn += 1;
13741  return "<span class='ace_cjk' style='width:" +
13742  (self.config.characterWidth * 2) +
13743  "px'>" + c + "</span>";
13744  }
13745  };
13746 
13747  var output = value.replace(replaceReg, replaceFunc);
13748 
13749  if (!this.$textToken[token.type]) {
13750  var classes = "ace_" + token.type.replace(/\./g, " ace_");
13751  var style = "";
13752  if (token.type == "fold")
13753  style = " style='width:" + (token.value.length * this.config.characterWidth) + "px;' ";
13754  stringBuilder.push("<span class='", classes, "'", style, ">", output, "</span>");
13755  }
13756  else {
13757  stringBuilder.push(output);
13758  }
13759  return screenColumn + value.length;
13760  };
13761 
13762  this.renderIndentGuide = function(stringBuilder, value, max) {
13763  var cols = value.search(this.$indentGuideRe);
13764  if (cols <= 0 || cols >= max)
13765  return value;
13766  if (value[0] == " ") {
13767  cols -= cols % this.tabSize;
13768  stringBuilder.push(lang.stringRepeat(this.$tabStrings[" "], cols/this.tabSize));
13769  return value.substr(cols);
13770  } else if (value[0] == "\t") {
13771  stringBuilder.push(lang.stringRepeat(this.$tabStrings["\t"], cols));
13772  return value.substr(cols);
13773  }
13774  return value;
13775  };
13776 
13777  this.$renderWrappedLine = function(stringBuilder, tokens, splits, onlyContents) {
13778  var chars = 0;
13779  var split = 0;
13780  var splitChars = splits[0];
13781  var screenColumn = 0;
13782 
13783  for (var i = 0; i < tokens.length; i++) {
13784  var token = tokens[i];
13785  var value = token.value;
13786  if (i == 0 && this.displayIndentGuides) {
13787  chars = value.length;
13788  value = this.renderIndentGuide(stringBuilder, value, splitChars);
13789  if (!value)
13790  continue;
13791  chars -= value.length;
13792  }
13793 
13794  if (chars + value.length < splitChars) {
13795  screenColumn = this.$renderToken(stringBuilder, screenColumn, token, value);
13796  chars += value.length;
13797  } else {
13798  while (chars + value.length >= splitChars) {
13799  screenColumn = this.$renderToken(
13800  stringBuilder, screenColumn,
13801  token, value.substring(0, splitChars - chars)
13802  );
13803  value = value.substring(splitChars - chars);
13804  chars = splitChars;
13805 
13806  if (!onlyContents) {
13807  stringBuilder.push("</div>",
13808  "<div class='ace_line' style='height:",
13809  this.config.lineHeight, "px'>"
13810  );
13811  }
13812 
13813  split ++;
13814  screenColumn = 0;
13815  splitChars = splits[split] || Number.MAX_VALUE;
13816  }
13817  if (value.length != 0) {
13818  chars += value.length;
13819  screenColumn = this.$renderToken(
13820  stringBuilder, screenColumn, token, value
13821  );
13822  }
13823  }
13824  }
13825  };
13826 
13827  this.$renderSimpleLine = function(stringBuilder, tokens) {
13828  var screenColumn = 0;
13829  var token = tokens[0];
13830  var value = token.value;
13831  if (this.displayIndentGuides)
13832  value = this.renderIndentGuide(stringBuilder, value);
13833  if (value)
13834  screenColumn = this.$renderToken(stringBuilder, screenColumn, token, value);
13835  for (var i = 1; i < tokens.length; i++) {
13836  token = tokens[i];
13837  value = token.value;
13838  screenColumn = this.$renderToken(stringBuilder, screenColumn, token, value);
13839  }
13840  };
13841  this.$renderLine = function(stringBuilder, row, onlyContents, foldLine) {
13842  if (!foldLine && foldLine != false)
13843  foldLine = this.session.getFoldLine(row);
13844 
13845  if (foldLine)
13846  var tokens = this.$getFoldLineTokens(row, foldLine);
13847  else
13848  var tokens = this.session.getTokens(row);
13849 
13850 
13851  if (!onlyContents) {
13852  stringBuilder.push(
13853  "<div class='ace_line' style='height:",
13854  this.config.lineHeight * (
13855  this.$useLineGroups() ? 1 :this.session.getRowLength(row)
13856  ), "px'>"
13857  );
13858  }
13859 
13860  if (tokens.length) {
13861  var splits = this.session.getRowSplitData(row);
13862  if (splits && splits.length)
13863  this.$renderWrappedLine(stringBuilder, tokens, splits, onlyContents);
13864  else
13865  this.$renderSimpleLine(stringBuilder, tokens);
13866  }
13867 
13868  if (this.showInvisibles) {
13869  if (foldLine)
13870  row = foldLine.end.row
13871 
13872  stringBuilder.push(
13873  "<span class='ace_invisible ace_invisible_eol'>",
13874  row == this.session.getLength() - 1 ? this.EOF_CHAR : this.EOL_CHAR,
13875  "</span>"
13876  );
13877  }
13878  if (!onlyContents)
13879  stringBuilder.push("</div>");
13880  };
13881 
13882  this.$getFoldLineTokens = function(row, foldLine) {
13883  var session = this.session;
13884  var renderTokens = [];
13885 
13886  function addTokens(tokens, from, to) {
13887  var idx = 0, col = 0;
13888  while ((col + tokens[idx].value.length) < from) {
13889  col += tokens[idx].value.length;
13890  idx++;
13891 
13892  if (idx == tokens.length)
13893  return;
13894  }
13895  if (col != from) {
13896  var value = tokens[idx].value.substring(from - col);
13897  if (value.length > (to - from))
13898  value = value.substring(0, to - from);
13899 
13900  renderTokens.push({
13901  type: tokens[idx].type,
13902  value: value
13903  });
13904 
13905  col = from + value.length;
13906  idx += 1;
13907  }
13908 
13909  while (col < to && idx < tokens.length) {
13910  var value = tokens[idx].value;
13911  if (value.length + col > to) {
13912  renderTokens.push({
13913  type: tokens[idx].type,
13914  value: value.substring(0, to - col)
13915  });
13916  } else
13917  renderTokens.push(tokens[idx]);
13918  col += value.length;
13919  idx += 1;
13920  }
13921  }
13922 
13923  var tokens = session.getTokens(row);
13924  foldLine.walk(function(placeholder, row, column, lastColumn, isNewRow) {
13925  if (placeholder != null) {
13926  renderTokens.push({
13927  type: "fold",
13928  value: placeholder
13929  });
13930  } else {
13931  if (isNewRow)
13932  tokens = session.getTokens(row);
13933 
13934  if (tokens.length)
13935  addTokens(tokens, lastColumn, column);
13936  }
13937  }, foldLine.end.row, this.session.getLine(foldLine.end.row).length);
13938 
13939  return renderTokens;
13940  };
13941 
13942  this.$useLineGroups = function() {
13943  return this.session.getUseWrapMode();
13944  };
13945 
13946  this.destroy = function() {
13947  clearInterval(this.$pollSizeChangesTimer);
13948  if (this.$measureNode)
13949  this.$measureNode.parentNode.removeChild(this.$measureNode);
13950  delete this.$measureNode;
13951  };
13952 
13953 }).call(Text.prototype);
13954 
13955 exports.Text = Text;
13956 
13957 });
13958 
13959 define("ace/layer/cursor",["require","exports","module","ace/lib/dom"], function(require, exports, module) {
13960 "use strict";
13961 
13962 var dom = require("../lib/dom");
13963 var IE8;
13964 
13965 var Cursor = function(parentEl) {
13966  this.element = dom.createElement("div");
13967  this.element.className = "ace_layer ace_cursor-layer";
13968  parentEl.appendChild(this.element);
13969 
13970  if (IE8 === undefined)
13971  IE8 = "opacity" in this.element;
13972 
13973  this.isVisible = false;
13974  this.isBlinking = true;
13975  this.blinkInterval = 1000;
13976  this.smoothBlinking = false;
13977 
13978  this.cursors = [];
13979  this.cursor = this.addCursor();
13980  dom.addCssClass(this.element, "ace_hidden-cursors");
13981  this.$updateCursors = this.$updateVisibility.bind(this);
13982 };
13983 
13984 (function() {
13985 
13986  this.$updateVisibility = function(val) {
13987  var cursors = this.cursors;
13988  for (var i = cursors.length; i--; )
13989  cursors[i].style.visibility = val ? "" : "hidden";
13990  };
13991  this.$updateOpacity = function(val) {
13992  var cursors = this.cursors;
13993  for (var i = cursors.length; i--; )
13994  cursors[i].style.opacity = val ? "" : "0";
13995  };
13996 
13997 
13998  this.$padding = 0;
13999  this.setPadding = function(padding) {
14000  this.$padding = padding;
14001  };
14002 
14003  this.setSession = function(session) {
14004  this.session = session;
14005  };
14006 
14007  this.setBlinking = function(blinking) {
14008  if (blinking != this.isBlinking){
14009  this.isBlinking = blinking;
14010  this.restartTimer();
14011  }
14012  };
14013 
14014  this.setBlinkInterval = function(blinkInterval) {
14015  if (blinkInterval != this.blinkInterval){
14016  this.blinkInterval = blinkInterval;
14017  this.restartTimer();
14018  }
14019  };
14020 
14021  this.setSmoothBlinking = function(smoothBlinking) {
14022  if (smoothBlinking != this.smoothBlinking && !IE8) {
14023  this.smoothBlinking = smoothBlinking;
14024  dom.setCssClass(this.element, "ace_smooth-blinking", smoothBlinking);
14025  this.$updateCursors(true);
14026  this.$updateCursors = (smoothBlinking
14027  ? this.$updateOpacity
14028  : this.$updateVisibility).bind(this);
14029  this.restartTimer();
14030  }
14031  };
14032 
14033  this.addCursor = function() {
14034  var el = dom.createElement("div");
14035  el.className = "ace_cursor";
14036  this.element.appendChild(el);
14037  this.cursors.push(el);
14038  return el;
14039  };
14040 
14041  this.removeCursor = function() {
14042  if (this.cursors.length > 1) {
14043  var el = this.cursors.pop();
14044  el.parentNode.removeChild(el);
14045  return el;
14046  }
14047  };
14048 
14049  this.hideCursor = function() {
14050  this.isVisible = false;
14051  dom.addCssClass(this.element, "ace_hidden-cursors");
14052  this.restartTimer();
14053  };
14054 
14055  this.showCursor = function() {
14056  this.isVisible = true;
14057  dom.removeCssClass(this.element, "ace_hidden-cursors");
14058  this.restartTimer();
14059  };
14060 
14061  this.restartTimer = function() {
14062  var update = this.$updateCursors;
14063  clearInterval(this.intervalId);
14064  clearTimeout(this.timeoutId);
14065  if (this.smoothBlinking) {
14066  dom.removeCssClass(this.element, "ace_smooth-blinking");
14067  }
14068 
14069  update(true);
14070 
14071  if (!this.isBlinking || !this.blinkInterval || !this.isVisible)
14072  return;
14073 
14074  if (this.smoothBlinking) {
14075  setTimeout(function(){
14076  dom.addCssClass(this.element, "ace_smooth-blinking");
14077  }.bind(this));
14078  }
14079 
14080  var blink = function(){
14081  this.timeoutId = setTimeout(function() {
14082  update(false);
14083  }, 0.6 * this.blinkInterval);
14084  }.bind(this);
14085 
14086  this.intervalId = setInterval(function() {
14087  update(true);
14088  blink();
14089  }, this.blinkInterval);
14090 
14091  blink();
14092  };
14093 
14094  this.getPixelPosition = function(position, onScreen) {
14095  if (!this.config || !this.session)
14096  return {left : 0, top : 0};
14097 
14098  if (!position)
14099  position = this.session.selection.getCursor();
14100  var pos = this.session.documentToScreenPosition(position);
14101  var cursorLeft = this.$padding + pos.column * this.config.characterWidth;
14102  var cursorTop = (pos.row - (onScreen ? this.config.firstRowScreen : 0)) *
14103  this.config.lineHeight;
14104 
14105  return {left : cursorLeft, top : cursorTop};
14106  };
14107 
14108  this.update = function(config) {
14109  this.config = config;
14110 
14111  var selections = this.session.$selectionMarkers;
14112  var i = 0, cursorIndex = 0;
14113 
14114  if (selections === undefined || selections.length === 0){
14115  selections = [{cursor: null}];
14116  }
14117 
14118  for (var i = 0, n = selections.length; i < n; i++) {
14119  var pixelPos = this.getPixelPosition(selections[i].cursor, true);
14120  if ((pixelPos.top > config.height + config.offset ||
14121  pixelPos.top < 0) && i > 1) {
14122  continue;
14123  }
14124 
14125  var style = (this.cursors[cursorIndex++] || this.addCursor()).style;
14126 
14127  if (!this.drawCursor) {
14128  style.left = pixelPos.left + "px";
14129  style.top = pixelPos.top + "px";
14130  style.width = config.characterWidth + "px";
14131  style.height = config.lineHeight + "px";
14132  } else {
14133  this.drawCursor(style, pixelPos, config, selections[i], this.session);
14134  }
14135  }
14136  while (this.cursors.length > cursorIndex)
14137  this.removeCursor();
14138 
14139  var overwrite = this.session.getOverwrite();
14140  this.$setOverwrite(overwrite);
14141  this.$pixelPos = pixelPos;
14142  this.restartTimer();
14143  };
14144 
14145  this.drawCursor = null;
14146 
14147  this.$setOverwrite = function(overwrite) {
14148  if (overwrite != this.overwrite) {
14149  this.overwrite = overwrite;
14150  if (overwrite)
14151  dom.addCssClass(this.element, "ace_overwrite-cursors");
14152  else
14153  dom.removeCssClass(this.element, "ace_overwrite-cursors");
14154  }
14155  };
14156 
14157  this.destroy = function() {
14158  clearInterval(this.intervalId);
14159  clearTimeout(this.timeoutId);
14160  };
14161 
14162 }).call(Cursor.prototype);
14163 
14164 exports.Cursor = Cursor;
14165 
14166 });
14167 
14168 define("ace/scrollbar",["require","exports","module","ace/lib/oop","ace/lib/dom","ace/lib/event","ace/lib/event_emitter"], function(require, exports, module) {
14169 "use strict";
14170 
14171 var oop = require("./lib/oop");
14172 var dom = require("./lib/dom");
14173 var event = require("./lib/event");
14174 var EventEmitter = require("./lib/event_emitter").EventEmitter;
14175 var ScrollBar = function(parent) {
14176  this.element = dom.createElement("div");
14177  this.element.className = "ace_scrollbar ace_scrollbar" + this.classSuffix;
14178 
14179  this.inner = dom.createElement("div");
14180  this.inner.className = "ace_scrollbar-inner";
14181  this.element.appendChild(this.inner);
14182 
14183  parent.appendChild(this.element);
14184 
14185  this.setVisible(false);
14186  this.skipEvent = false;
14187 
14188  event.addListener(this.element, "scroll", this.onScroll.bind(this));
14189  event.addListener(this.element, "mousedown", event.preventDefault);
14190 };
14191 
14192 (function() {
14193  oop.implement(this, EventEmitter);
14194 
14195  this.setVisible = function(isVisible) {
14196  this.element.style.display = isVisible ? "" : "none";
14197  this.isVisible = isVisible;
14198  };
14199 }).call(ScrollBar.prototype);
14200 var VScrollBar = function(parent, renderer) {
14201  ScrollBar.call(this, parent);
14202  this.scrollTop = 0;
14203  renderer.$scrollbarWidth =
14204  this.width = dom.scrollbarWidth(parent.ownerDocument);
14205  this.inner.style.width =
14206  this.element.style.width = (this.width || 15) + 5 + "px";
14207 };
14208 
14209 oop.inherits(VScrollBar, ScrollBar);
14210 
14211 (function() {
14212 
14213  this.classSuffix = '-v';
14214  this.onScroll = function() {
14215  if (!this.skipEvent) {
14216  this.scrollTop = this.element.scrollTop;
14217  this._emit("scroll", {data: this.scrollTop});
14218  }
14219  this.skipEvent = false;
14220  };
14221  this.getWidth = function() {
14222  return this.isVisible ? this.width : 0;
14223  };
14224  this.setHeight = function(height) {
14225  this.element.style.height = height + "px";
14226  };
14227  this.setInnerHeight = function(height) {
14228  this.inner.style.height = height + "px";
14229  };
14230  this.setScrollHeight = function(height) {
14231  this.inner.style.height = height + "px";
14232  };
14233  this.setScrollTop = function(scrollTop) {
14234  if (this.scrollTop != scrollTop) {
14235  this.skipEvent = true;
14236  this.scrollTop = this.element.scrollTop = scrollTop;
14237  }
14238  };
14239 
14240 }).call(VScrollBar.prototype);
14241 var HScrollBar = function(parent, renderer) {
14242  ScrollBar.call(this, parent);
14243  this.scrollLeft = 0;
14244  this.height = renderer.$scrollbarWidth;
14245  this.inner.style.height =
14246  this.element.style.height = (this.height || 15) + 5 + "px";
14247 };
14248 
14249 oop.inherits(HScrollBar, ScrollBar);
14250 
14251 (function() {
14252 
14253  this.classSuffix = '-h';
14254  this.onScroll = function() {
14255  if (!this.skipEvent) {
14256  this.scrollLeft = this.element.scrollLeft;
14257  this._emit("scroll", {data: this.scrollLeft});
14258  }
14259  this.skipEvent = false;
14260  };
14261  this.getHeight = function() {
14262  return this.isVisible ? this.height : 0;
14263  };
14264  this.setWidth = function(width) {
14265  this.element.style.width = width + "px";
14266  };
14267  this.setInnerWidth = function(width) {
14268  this.inner.style.width = width + "px";
14269  };
14270  this.setScrollWidth = function(width) {
14271  this.inner.style.width = width + "px";
14272  };
14273  this.setScrollLeft = function(scrollLeft) {
14274  if (this.scrollLeft != scrollLeft) {
14275  this.skipEvent = true;
14276  this.scrollLeft = this.element.scrollLeft = scrollLeft;
14277  }
14278  };
14279 
14280 }).call(HScrollBar.prototype);
14281 
14282 
14283 exports.ScrollBar = VScrollBar; // backward compatibility
14284 exports.ScrollBarV = VScrollBar; // backward compatibility
14285 exports.ScrollBarH = HScrollBar; // backward compatibility
14286 
14287 exports.VScrollBar = VScrollBar;
14288 exports.HScrollBar = HScrollBar;
14289 });
14290 
14291 define("ace/renderloop",["require","exports","module","ace/lib/event"], function(require, exports, module) {
14292 "use strict";
14293 
14294 var event = require("./lib/event");
14295 
14296 
14297 var RenderLoop = function(onRender, win) {
14298  this.onRender = onRender;
14299  this.pending = false;
14300  this.changes = 0;
14301  this.window = win || window;
14302 };
14303 
14304 (function() {
14305 
14306 
14307  this.schedule = function(change) {
14308  this.changes = this.changes | change;
14309  if (!this.pending && this.changes) {
14310  this.pending = true;
14311  var _self = this;
14312  event.nextFrame(function() {
14313  _self.pending = false;
14314  var changes;
14315  while (changes = _self.changes) {
14316  _self.changes = 0;
14317  _self.onRender(changes);
14318  }
14319  }, this.window);
14320  }
14321  };
14322 
14323 }).call(RenderLoop.prototype);
14324 
14325 exports.RenderLoop = RenderLoop;
14326 });
14327 
14328 define("ace/layer/font_metrics",["require","exports","module","ace/lib/oop","ace/lib/dom","ace/lib/lang","ace/lib/useragent","ace/lib/event_emitter"], function(require, exports, module) {
14329 
14330 var oop = require("../lib/oop");
14331 var dom = require("../lib/dom");
14332 var lang = require("../lib/lang");
14333 var useragent = require("../lib/useragent");
14334 var EventEmitter = require("../lib/event_emitter").EventEmitter;
14335 
14336 var CHAR_COUNT = 0;
14337 
14338 var FontMetrics = exports.FontMetrics = function(parentEl, interval) {
14339  this.el = dom.createElement("div");
14340  this.$setMeasureNodeStyles(this.el.style, true);
14341 
14342  this.$main = dom.createElement("div");
14343  this.$setMeasureNodeStyles(this.$main.style);
14344 
14345  this.$measureNode = dom.createElement("div");
14346  this.$setMeasureNodeStyles(this.$measureNode.style);
14347 
14348 
14349  this.el.appendChild(this.$main);
14350  this.el.appendChild(this.$measureNode);
14351  parentEl.appendChild(this.el);
14352 
14353  if (!CHAR_COUNT)
14354  this.$testFractionalRect();
14355  this.$measureNode.innerHTML = lang.stringRepeat("X", CHAR_COUNT);
14356 
14357  this.$characterSize = {width: 0, height: 0};
14358  this.checkForSizeChanges();
14359 };
14360 
14361 (function() {
14362 
14363  oop.implement(this, EventEmitter);
14364 
14365  this.$characterSize = {width: 0, height: 0};
14366 
14367  this.$testFractionalRect = function() {
14368  var el = dom.createElement("div");
14369  this.$setMeasureNodeStyles(el.style);
14370  el.style.width = "0.2px";
14371  document.documentElement.appendChild(el);
14372  var w = el.getBoundingClientRect().width;
14373  if (w > 0 && w < 1)
14374  CHAR_COUNT = 50;
14375  else
14376  CHAR_COUNT = 100;
14377  el.parentNode.removeChild(el);
14378  };
14379 
14380  this.$setMeasureNodeStyles = function(style, isRoot) {
14381  style.width = style.height = "auto";
14382  style.left = style.top = "0px";
14383  style.visibility = "hidden";
14384  style.position = "absolute";
14385  style.whiteSpace = "pre";
14386 
14387  if (useragent.isIE < 8) {
14388  style["font-family"] = "inherit";
14389  } else {
14390  style.font = "inherit";
14391  }
14392  style.overflow = isRoot ? "hidden" : "visible";
14393  };
14394 
14395  this.checkForSizeChanges = function() {
14396  var size = this.$measureSizes();
14397  if (size && (this.$characterSize.width !== size.width || this.$characterSize.height !== size.height)) {
14398  this.$measureNode.style.fontWeight = "bold";
14399  var boldSize = this.$measureSizes();
14400  this.$measureNode.style.fontWeight = "";
14401  this.$characterSize = size;
14402  this.charSizes = Object.create(null);
14403  this.allowBoldFonts = boldSize && boldSize.width === size.width && boldSize.height === size.height;
14404  this._emit("changeCharacterSize", {data: size});
14405  }
14406  };
14407 
14408  this.$pollSizeChanges = function() {
14409  if (this.$pollSizeChangesTimer)
14410  return this.$pollSizeChangesTimer;
14411  var self = this;
14412  return this.$pollSizeChangesTimer = setInterval(function() {
14413  self.checkForSizeChanges();
14414  }, 500);
14415  };
14416 
14417  this.setPolling = function(val) {
14418  if (val) {
14419  this.$pollSizeChanges();
14420  } else {
14421  if (this.$pollSizeChangesTimer)
14422  this.$pollSizeChangesTimer;
14423  }
14424  };
14425 
14426  this.$measureSizes = function() {
14427  if (CHAR_COUNT === 50) {
14428  var rect = null;
14429  try {
14430  rect = this.$measureNode.getBoundingClientRect();
14431  } catch(e) {
14432  rect = {width: 0, height:0 };
14433  };
14434  var size = {
14435  height: rect.height,
14436  width: rect.width / CHAR_COUNT
14437  };
14438  } else {
14439  var size = {
14440  height: this.$measureNode.clientHeight,
14441  width: this.$measureNode.clientWidth / CHAR_COUNT
14442  };
14443  }
14444  if (size.width === 0 || size.height === 0)
14445  return null;
14446  return size;
14447  };
14448 
14449  this.$measureCharWidth = function(ch) {
14450  this.$main.innerHTML = lang.stringRepeat(ch, CHAR_COUNT);
14451  var rect = this.$main.getBoundingClientRect();
14452  return rect.width / CHAR_COUNT;
14453  };
14454 
14455  this.getCharacterWidth = function(ch) {
14456  var w = this.charSizes[ch];
14457  if (w === undefined) {
14458  this.charSizes[ch] = this.$measureCharWidth(ch) / this.$characterSize.width;
14459  }
14460  return w;
14461  };
14462 
14463  this.destroy = function() {
14464  clearInterval(this.$pollSizeChangesTimer);
14465  if (this.el && this.el.parentNode)
14466  this.el.parentNode.removeChild(this.el);
14467  };
14468 
14469 }).call(FontMetrics.prototype);
14470 
14471 });
14472 
14473 define("ace/virtual_renderer",["require","exports","module","ace/lib/oop","ace/lib/dom","ace/config","ace/lib/useragent","ace/layer/gutter","ace/layer/marker","ace/layer/text","ace/layer/cursor","ace/scrollbar","ace/scrollbar","ace/renderloop","ace/layer/font_metrics","ace/lib/event_emitter"], function(require, exports, module) {
14474 "use strict";
14475 
14476 var oop = require("./lib/oop");
14477 var dom = require("./lib/dom");
14478 var config = require("./config");
14479 var useragent = require("./lib/useragent");
14480 var GutterLayer = require("./layer/gutter").Gutter;
14481 var MarkerLayer = require("./layer/marker").Marker;
14482 var TextLayer = require("./layer/text").Text;
14483 var CursorLayer = require("./layer/cursor").Cursor;
14484 var HScrollBar = require("./scrollbar").HScrollBar;
14485 var VScrollBar = require("./scrollbar").VScrollBar;
14486 var RenderLoop = require("./renderloop").RenderLoop;
14487 var FontMetrics = require("./layer/font_metrics").FontMetrics;
14488 var EventEmitter = require("./lib/event_emitter").EventEmitter;
14489 var editorCss = ".ace_editor {\
14490 position: relative;\
14491 overflow: hidden;\
14492 font: 12px/normal 'Monaco', 'Menlo', 'Ubuntu Mono', 'Consolas', 'source-code-pro', monospace;\
14493 direction: ltr;\
14494 }\
14495 .ace_scroller {\
14496 position: absolute;\
14497 overflow: hidden;\
14498 top: 0;\
14499 bottom: 0;\
14500 background-color: inherit;\
14501 -ms-user-select: none;\
14502 -moz-user-select: none;\
14503 -webkit-user-select: none;\
14504 user-select: none;\
14505 cursor: text;\
14506 }\
14507 .ace_content {\
14508 position: absolute;\
14509 -moz-box-sizing: border-box;\
14510 -webkit-box-sizing: border-box;\
14511 box-sizing: border-box;\
14512 min-width: 100%;\
14513 }\
14514 .ace_dragging .ace_scroller:before{\
14515 position: absolute;\
14516 top: 0;\
14517 left: 0;\
14518 right: 0;\
14519 bottom: 0;\
14520 content: '';\
14521 background: rgba(250, 250, 250, 0.01);\
14522 z-index: 1000;\
14523 }\
14524 .ace_dragging.ace_dark .ace_scroller:before{\
14525 background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.01);\
14526 }\
14527 .ace_selecting, .ace_selecting * {\
14528 cursor: text !important;\
14529 }\
14530 .ace_gutter {\
14531 position: absolute;\
14532 overflow : hidden;\
14533 width: auto;\
14534 top: 0;\
14535 bottom: 0;\
14536 left: 0;\
14537 cursor: default;\
14538 z-index: 4;\
14539 -ms-user-select: none;\
14540 -moz-user-select: none;\

14843 ";
14844 
14845 dom.importCssString(editorCss, "ace_editor");
14846 
14847 var VirtualRenderer = function(container, theme) {
14848  var _self = this;
14849 
14850  this.container = container || dom.createElement("div");
14851  this.$keepTextAreaAtCursor = !useragent.isOldIE;
14852 
14853  dom.addCssClass(this.container, "ace_editor");
14854 
14855  this.setTheme(theme);
14856 
14857  this.$gutter = dom.createElement("div");
14858  this.$gutter.className = "ace_gutter";
14859  this.container.appendChild(this.$gutter);
14860 
14861  this.scroller = dom.createElement("div");
14862  this.scroller.className = "ace_scroller";
14863  this.container.appendChild(this.scroller);
14864 
14865  this.content = dom.createElement("div");
14866  this.content.className = "ace_content";
14867  this.scroller.appendChild(this.content);
14868 
14869  this.$gutterLayer = new GutterLayer(this.$gutter);
14870  this.$gutterLayer.on("changeGutterWidth", this.onGutterResize.bind(this));
14871 
14872  this.$markerBack = new MarkerLayer(this.content);
14873 
14874  var textLayer = this.$textLayer = new TextLayer(this.content);
14875  this.canvas = textLayer.element;
14876 
14877  this.$markerFront = new MarkerLayer(this.content);
14878 
14879  this.$cursorLayer = new CursorLayer(this.content);
14880  this.$horizScroll = false;
14881  this.$vScroll = false;
14882 
14883  this.scrollBar =
14884  this.scrollBarV = new VScrollBar(this.container, this);
14885  this.scrollBarH = new HScrollBar(this.container, this);
14886  this.scrollBarV.addEventListener("scroll", function(e) {
14887  if (!_self.$scrollAnimation)
14888  _self.session.setScrollTop(e.data - _self.scrollMargin.top);
14889  });
14890  this.scrollBarH.addEventListener("scroll", function(e) {
14891  if (!_self.$scrollAnimation)
14892  _self.session.setScrollLeft(e.data - _self.scrollMargin.left);
14893  });
14894 
14895  this.scrollTop = 0;
14896  this.scrollLeft = 0;
14897 
14898  this.cursorPos = {
14899  row : 0,
14900  column : 0
14901  };
14902 
14903  this.$fontMetrics = new FontMetrics(this.container, 500);
14904  this.$textLayer.$setFontMetrics(this.$fontMetrics);
14905  this.$textLayer.addEventListener("changeCharacterSize", function(e) {
14906  _self.updateCharacterSize();
14907  _self.onResize(true, _self.gutterWidth, _self.$size.width, _self.$size.height);
14908  _self._signal("changeCharacterSize", e);
14909  });
14910 
14911  this.$size = {
14912  width: 0,
14913  height: 0,
14914  scrollerHeight: 0,
14915  scrollerWidth: 0,
14916  $dirty: true
14917  };
14918 
14919  this.layerConfig = {
14920  width : 1,
14921  padding : 0,
14922  firstRow : 0,
14923  firstRowScreen: 0,
14924  lastRow : 0,
14925  lineHeight : 0,
14926  characterWidth : 0,
14927  minHeight : 1,
14928  maxHeight : 1,
14929  offset : 0,
14930  height : 1,
14931  gutterOffset: 1
14932  };
14933 
14934  this.scrollMargin = {
14935  left: 0,
14936  right: 0,
14937  top: 0,
14938  bottom: 0,
14939  v: 0,
14940  h: 0
14941  };
14942 
14943  this.$loop = new RenderLoop(
14944  this.$renderChanges.bind(this),
14945  this.container.ownerDocument.defaultView
14946  );
14947  this.$loop.schedule(this.CHANGE_FULL);
14948 
14949  this.updateCharacterSize();
14950  this.setPadding(4);
14951  config.resetOptions(this);
14952  config._emit("renderer", this);
14953 };
14954 
14955 (function() {
14956 
14957  this.CHANGE_CURSOR = 1;
14958  this.CHANGE_MARKER = 2;
14959  this.CHANGE_GUTTER = 4;
14960  this.CHANGE_SCROLL = 8;
14961  this.CHANGE_LINES = 16;
14962  this.CHANGE_TEXT = 32;
14963  this.CHANGE_SIZE = 64;
14964  this.CHANGE_MARKER_BACK = 128;
14965  this.CHANGE_MARKER_FRONT = 256;
14966  this.CHANGE_FULL = 512;
14967  this.CHANGE_H_SCROLL = 1024;
14968 
14969  oop.implement(this, EventEmitter);
14970 
14971  this.updateCharacterSize = function() {
14972  if (this.$textLayer.allowBoldFonts != this.$allowBoldFonts) {
14973  this.$allowBoldFonts = this.$textLayer.allowBoldFonts;
14974  this.setStyle("ace_nobold", !this.$allowBoldFonts);
14975  }
14976 
14977  this.layerConfig.characterWidth =
14978  this.characterWidth = this.$textLayer.getCharacterWidth();
14979  this.layerConfig.lineHeight =
14980  this.lineHeight = this.$textLayer.getLineHeight();
14981  this.$updatePrintMargin();
14982  };
14983  this.setSession = function(session) {
14984  if (this.session)
14985  this.session.doc.off("changeNewLineMode", this.onChangeNewLineMode);
14986 
14987  this.session = session;
14988  if (session && this.scrollMargin.top && session.getScrollTop() <= 0)
14989  session.setScrollTop(-this.scrollMargin.top);
14990 
14991  this.$cursorLayer.setSession(session);
14992  this.$markerBack.setSession(session);
14993  this.$markerFront.setSession(session);
14994  this.$gutterLayer.setSession(session);
14995  this.$textLayer.setSession(session);
14996  if (!session)
14997  return;
14998 
14999  this.$loop.schedule(this.CHANGE_FULL);
15000  this.session.$setFontMetrics(this.$fontMetrics);
15001 
15002  this.onChangeNewLineMode = this.onChangeNewLineMode.bind(this);
15003  this.onChangeNewLineMode()
15004  this.session.doc.on("changeNewLineMode", this.onChangeNewLineMode);
15005  };
15006  this.updateLines = function(firstRow, lastRow, force) {
15007  if (lastRow === undefined)
15008  lastRow = Infinity;
15009 
15010  if (!this.$changedLines) {
15011  this.$changedLines = {
15012  firstRow: firstRow,
15013  lastRow: lastRow
15014  };
15015  }
15016  else {
15017  if (this.$changedLines.firstRow > firstRow)
15018  this.$changedLines.firstRow = firstRow;
15019 
15020  if (this.$changedLines.lastRow < lastRow)
15021  this.$changedLines.lastRow = lastRow;
15022  }
15023  if (this.$changedLines.lastRow < this.layerConfig.firstRow) {
15024  if (force)
15025  this.$changedLines.lastRow = this.layerConfig.lastRow;
15026  else
15027  return;
15028  }
15029  if (this.$changedLines.firstRow > this.layerConfig.lastRow)
15030  return;
15031  this.$loop.schedule(this.CHANGE_LINES);
15032  };
15033 
15034  this.onChangeNewLineMode = function() {
15035  this.$loop.schedule(this.CHANGE_TEXT);
15036  this.$textLayer.$updateEolChar();
15037  };
15038 
15039  this.onChangeTabSize = function() {
15040  this.$loop.schedule(this.CHANGE_TEXT | this.CHANGE_MARKER);
15041  this.$textLayer.onChangeTabSize();
15042  };
15043  this.updateText = function() {
15044  this.$loop.schedule(this.CHANGE_TEXT);
15045  };
15046  this.updateFull = function(force) {
15047  if (force)
15048  this.$renderChanges(this.CHANGE_FULL, true);
15049  else
15050  this.$loop.schedule(this.CHANGE_FULL);
15051  };
15052  this.updateFontSize = function() {
15053  this.$textLayer.checkForSizeChanges();
15054  };
15055 
15056  this.$changes = 0;
15057  this.$updateSizeAsync = function() {
15058  if (this.$loop.pending)
15059  this.$size.$dirty = true;
15060  else
15061  this.onResize();
15062  };
15063  this.onResize = function(force, gutterWidth, width, height) {
15064  if (this.resizing > 2)
15065  return;
15066  else if (this.resizing > 0)
15067  this.resizing++;
15068  else
15069  this.resizing = force ? 1 : 0;
15070  var el = this.container;
15071  if (!height)
15072  height = el.clientHeight || el.scrollHeight;
15073  if (!width)
15074  width = el.clientWidth || el.scrollWidth;
15075  var changes = this.$updateCachedSize(force, gutterWidth, width, height);
15076 
15077 
15078  if (!this.$size.scrollerHeight || (!width && !height))
15079  return this.resizing = 0;
15080 
15081  if (force)
15082  this.$gutterLayer.$padding = null;
15083 
15084  if (force)
15085  this.$renderChanges(changes | this.$changes, true);
15086  else
15087  this.$loop.schedule(changes | this.$changes);
15088 
15089  if (this.resizing)
15090  this.resizing = 0;
15091  this.scrollBarV.scrollLeft = this.scrollBarV.scrollTop = null;
15092  };
15093 
15094  this.$updateCachedSize = function(force, gutterWidth, width, height) {
15095  height -= (this.$extraHeight || 0);
15096  var changes = 0;
15097  var size = this.$size;
15098  var oldSize = {
15099  width: size.width,
15100  height: size.height,
15101  scrollerHeight: size.scrollerHeight,
15102  scrollerWidth: size.scrollerWidth
15103  };
15104  if (height && (force || size.height != height)) {
15105  size.height = height;
15106  changes |= this.CHANGE_SIZE;
15107 
15108  size.scrollerHeight = size.height;
15109  if (this.$horizScroll)
15110  size.scrollerHeight -= this.scrollBarH.getHeight();
15111  this.scrollBarV.element.style.bottom = this.scrollBarH.getHeight() + "px";
15112 
15113  changes = changes | this.CHANGE_SCROLL;
15114  }
15115 
15116  if (width && (force || size.width != width)) {
15117  changes |= this.CHANGE_SIZE;
15118  size.width = width;
15119 
15120  if (gutterWidth == null)
15121  gutterWidth = this.$showGutter ? this.$gutter.offsetWidth : 0;
15122 
15123  this.gutterWidth = gutterWidth;
15124 
15125  this.scrollBarH.element.style.left =
15126  this.scroller.style.left = gutterWidth + "px";
15127  size.scrollerWidth = Math.max(0, width - gutterWidth - this.scrollBarV.getWidth());
15128 
15129  this.scrollBarH.element.style.right =
15130  this.scroller.style.right = this.scrollBarV.getWidth() + "px";
15131  this.scroller.style.bottom = this.scrollBarH.getHeight() + "px";
15132 
15133  if (this.session && this.session.getUseWrapMode() && this.adjustWrapLimit() || force)
15134  changes |= this.CHANGE_FULL;
15135  }
15136 
15137  size.$dirty = !width || !height;
15138 
15139  if (changes)
15140  this._signal("resize", oldSize);
15141 
15142  return changes;
15143  };
15144 
15145  this.onGutterResize = function() {
15146  var gutterWidth = this.$showGutter ? this.$gutter.offsetWidth : 0;
15147  if (gutterWidth != this.gutterWidth)
15148  this.$changes |= this.$updateCachedSize(true, gutterWidth, this.$size.width, this.$size.height);
15149 
15150  if (this.session.getUseWrapMode() && this.adjustWrapLimit()) {
15151  this.$loop.schedule(this.CHANGE_FULL);
15152  } else if (this.$size.$dirty) {
15153  this.$loop.schedule(this.CHANGE_FULL);
15154  } else {
15155  this.$computeLayerConfig();
15156  this.$loop.schedule(this.CHANGE_MARKER);
15157  }
15158  };
15159  this.adjustWrapLimit = function() {
15160  var availableWidth = this.$size.scrollerWidth - this.$padding * 2;
15161  var limit = Math.floor(availableWidth / this.characterWidth);
15162  return this.session.adjustWrapLimit(limit, this.$showPrintMargin && this.$printMarginColumn);
15163  };
15164  this.setAnimatedScroll = function(shouldAnimate){
15165  this.setOption("animatedScroll", shouldAnimate);
15166  };
15167  this.getAnimatedScroll = function() {
15168  return this.$animatedScroll;
15169  };
15170  this.setShowInvisibles = function(showInvisibles) {
15171  this.setOption("showInvisibles", showInvisibles);
15172  };
15173  this.getShowInvisibles = function() {
15174  return this.getOption("showInvisibles");
15175  };
15176  this.getDisplayIndentGuides = function() {
15177  return this.getOption("displayIndentGuides");
15178  };
15179 
15180  this.setDisplayIndentGuides = function(display) {
15181  this.setOption("displayIndentGuides", display);
15182  };
15183  this.setShowPrintMargin = function(showPrintMargin) {
15184  this.setOption("showPrintMargin", showPrintMargin);
15185  };
15186  this.getShowPrintMargin = function() {
15187  return this.getOption("showPrintMargin");
15188  };
15189  this.setPrintMarginColumn = function(showPrintMargin) {
15190  this.setOption("printMarginColumn", showPrintMargin);
15191  };
15192  this.getPrintMarginColumn = function() {
15193  return this.getOption("printMarginColumn");
15194  };
15195  this.getShowGutter = function(){
15196  return this.getOption("showGutter");
15197  };
15198  this.setShowGutter = function(show){
15199  return this.setOption("showGutter", show);
15200  };
15201 
15202  this.getFadeFoldWidgets = function(){
15203  return this.getOption("fadeFoldWidgets")
15204  };
15205 
15206  this.setFadeFoldWidgets = function(show) {
15207  this.setOption("fadeFoldWidgets", show);
15208  };
15209 
15210  this.setHighlightGutterLine = function(shouldHighlight) {
15211  this.setOption("highlightGutterLine", shouldHighlight);
15212  };
15213 
15214  this.getHighlightGutterLine = function() {
15215  return this.getOption("highlightGutterLine");
15216  };
15217 
15218  this.$updateGutterLineHighlight = function() {
15219  var pos = this.$cursorLayer.$pixelPos;
15220  var height = this.layerConfig.lineHeight;
15221  if (this.session.getUseWrapMode()) {
15222  var cursor = this.session.selection.getCursor();
15223  cursor.column = 0;
15224  pos = this.$cursorLayer.getPixelPosition(cursor, true);
15225  height *= this.session.getRowLength(cursor.row);
15226  }
15227  this.$gutterLineHighlight.style.top = pos.top - this.layerConfig.offset + "px";
15228  this.$gutterLineHighlight.style.height = height + "px";
15229  };
15230 
15231  this.$updatePrintMargin = function() {
15232  if (!this.$showPrintMargin && !this.$printMarginEl)
15233  return;
15234 
15235  if (!this.$printMarginEl) {
15236  var containerEl = dom.createElement("div");
15237  containerEl.className = "ace_layer ace_print-margin-layer";
15238  this.$printMarginEl = dom.createElement("div");
15239  this.$printMarginEl.className = "ace_print-margin";
15240  containerEl.appendChild(this.$printMarginEl);
15241  this.content.insertBefore(containerEl, this.content.firstChild);
15242  }
15243 
15244  var style = this.$printMarginEl.style;
15245  style.left = ((this.characterWidth * this.$printMarginColumn) + this.$padding) + "px";
15246  style.visibility = this.$showPrintMargin ? "visible" : "hidden";
15247 
15248  if (this.session && this.session.$wrap == -1)
15249  this.adjustWrapLimit();
15250  };
15251  this.getContainerElement = function() {
15252  return this.container;
15253  };
15254  this.getMouseEventTarget = function() {
15255  return this.content;
15256  };
15257  this.getTextAreaContainer = function() {
15258  return this.container;
15259  };
15260  this.$moveTextAreaToCursor = function() {
15261  if (!this.$keepTextAreaAtCursor)
15262  return;
15263  var config = this.layerConfig;
15264  var posTop = this.$cursorLayer.$pixelPos.top;
15265  var posLeft = this.$cursorLayer.$pixelPos.left;
15266  posTop -= config.offset;
15267 
15268  var style = this.textarea.style;
15269  var h = this.lineHeight;
15270  if (posTop < 0 || posTop > config.height - h) {
15271  style.top = style.left = "0";
15272  return;
15273  }
15274 
15275  var w = this.characterWidth;
15276  if (this.$composition) {
15277  var val = this.textarea.value.replace(/^\x01+/, "");
15278  w *= (this.session.$getStringScreenWidth(val)[0]+2);
15279  h += 2;
15280  }
15281  posLeft -= this.scrollLeft;
15282  if (posLeft > this.$size.scrollerWidth - w)
15283  posLeft = this.$size.scrollerWidth - w;
15284 
15285  posLeft += this.gutterWidth;
15286  style.height = h + "px";
15287  style.width = w + "px";
15288  style.left = Math.min(posLeft, this.$size.scrollerWidth - w) + "px";
15289  style.top = Math.min(posTop, this.$size.height - h) + "px";
15290  };
15291  this.getFirstVisibleRow = function() {
15292  return this.layerConfig.firstRow;
15293  };
15294  this.getFirstFullyVisibleRow = function() {
15295  return this.layerConfig.firstRow + (this.layerConfig.offset === 0 ? 0 : 1);
15296  };
15297  this.getLastFullyVisibleRow = function() {
15298  var flint = Math.floor((this.layerConfig.height + this.layerConfig.offset) / this.layerConfig.lineHeight);
15299  return this.layerConfig.firstRow - 1 + flint;
15300  };
15301  this.getLastVisibleRow = function() {
15302  return this.layerConfig.lastRow;
15303  };
15304 
15305  this.$padding = null;
15306  this.setPadding = function(padding) {
15307  this.$padding = padding;
15308  this.$textLayer.setPadding(padding);
15309  this.$cursorLayer.setPadding(padding);
15310  this.$markerFront.setPadding(padding);
15311  this.$markerBack.setPadding(padding);
15312  this.$loop.schedule(this.CHANGE_FULL);
15313  this.$updatePrintMargin();
15314  };
15315 
15316  this.setScrollMargin = function(top, bottom, left, right) {
15317  var sm = this.scrollMargin;
15318  sm.top = top|0;
15319  sm.bottom = bottom|0;
15320  sm.right = right|0;
15321  sm.left = left|0;
15322  sm.v = sm.top + sm.bottom;
15323  sm.h = sm.left + sm.right;
15324  if (sm.top && this.scrollTop <= 0 && this.session)
15325  this.session.setScrollTop(-sm.top);
15326  this.updateFull();
15327  };
15328  this.getHScrollBarAlwaysVisible = function() {
15329  return this.$hScrollBarAlwaysVisible;
15330  };
15331  this.setHScrollBarAlwaysVisible = function(alwaysVisible) {
15332  this.setOption("hScrollBarAlwaysVisible", alwaysVisible);
15333  };
15334  this.getVScrollBarAlwaysVisible = function() {
15335  return this.$hScrollBarAlwaysVisible;
15336  };
15337  this.setVScrollBarAlwaysVisible = function(alwaysVisible) {
15338  this.setOption("vScrollBarAlwaysVisible", alwaysVisible);
15339  };
15340 
15341  this.$updateScrollBarV = function() {
15342  var scrollHeight = this.layerConfig.maxHeight;
15343  var scrollerHeight = this.$size.scrollerHeight;
15344  if (!this.$maxLines && this.$scrollPastEnd) {
15345  scrollHeight -= (scrollerHeight - this.lineHeight) * this.$scrollPastEnd;
15346  if (this.scrollTop > scrollHeight - scrollerHeight) {
15347  scrollHeight = this.scrollTop + scrollerHeight;
15348  this.scrollBarV.scrollTop = null;
15349  }
15350  }
15351  this.scrollBarV.setScrollHeight(scrollHeight + this.scrollMargin.v);
15352  this.scrollBarV.setScrollTop(this.scrollTop + this.scrollMargin.top);
15353  };
15354  this.$updateScrollBarH = function() {
15355  this.scrollBarH.setScrollWidth(this.layerConfig.width + 2 * this.$padding + this.scrollMargin.h);
15356  this.scrollBarH.setScrollLeft(this.scrollLeft + this.scrollMargin.left);
15357  };
15358 
15359  this.$frozen = false;
15360  this.freeze = function() {
15361  this.$frozen = true;
15362  };
15363 
15364  this.unfreeze = function() {
15365  this.$frozen = false;
15366  };
15367 
15368  this.$renderChanges = function(changes, force) {
15369  if (this.$changes) {
15370  changes |= this.$changes;
15371  this.$changes = 0;
15372  }
15373  if ((!this.session || !this.container.offsetWidth || this.$frozen) || (!changes && !force)) {
15374  this.$changes |= changes;
15375  return;
15376  }
15377  if (this.$size.$dirty) {
15378  this.$changes |= changes;
15379  return this.onResize(true);
15380  }
15381  if (!this.lineHeight) {
15382  this.$textLayer.checkForSizeChanges();
15383  }
15384 
15385  this._signal("beforeRender");
15386  var config = this.layerConfig;
15387  if (changes & this.CHANGE_FULL ||
15388  changes & this.CHANGE_SIZE ||
15389  changes & this.CHANGE_TEXT ||
15390  changes & this.CHANGE_LINES ||
15391  changes & this.CHANGE_SCROLL ||
15392  changes & this.CHANGE_H_SCROLL
15393  ) {
15394  changes |= this.$computeLayerConfig();
15395  if (config.firstRow != this.layerConfig.firstRow && config.firstRowScreen == this.layerConfig.firstRowScreen) {
15396  var st = this.scrollTop + (config.firstRow - this.layerConfig.firstRow) * this.lineHeight;
15397  if (st > 0) {
15398  this.scrollTop = st;
15399  changes = changes | this.CHANGE_SCROLL;
15400  changes |= this.$computeLayerConfig();
15401  }
15402  }
15403  config = this.layerConfig;
15404  this.$updateScrollBarV();
15405  if (changes & this.CHANGE_H_SCROLL)
15406  this.$updateScrollBarH();
15407  this.$gutterLayer.element.style.marginTop = (-config.offset) + "px";
15408  this.content.style.marginTop = (-config.offset) + "px";
15409  this.content.style.width = config.width + 2 * this.$padding + "px";
15410  this.content.style.height = config.minHeight + "px";
15411  }
15412  if (changes & this.CHANGE_H_SCROLL) {
15413  this.content.style.marginLeft = -this.scrollLeft + "px";
15414  this.scroller.className = this.scrollLeft <= 0 ? "ace_scroller" : "ace_scroller ace_scroll-left";
15415  }
15416  if (changes & this.CHANGE_FULL) {
15417  this.$textLayer.update(config);
15418  if (this.$showGutter)
15419  this.$gutterLayer.update(config);
15420  this.$markerBack.update(config);
15421  this.$markerFront.update(config);
15422  this.$cursorLayer.update(config);
15423  this.$moveTextAreaToCursor();
15424  this.$highlightGutterLine && this.$updateGutterLineHighlight();
15425  this._signal("afterRender");
15426  return;
15427  }
15428  if (changes & this.CHANGE_SCROLL) {
15429  if (changes & this.CHANGE_TEXT || changes & this.CHANGE_LINES)
15430  this.$textLayer.update(config);
15431  else
15432  this.$textLayer.scrollLines(config);
15433 
15434  if (this.$showGutter)
15435  this.$gutterLayer.update(config);
15436  this.$markerBack.update(config);
15437  this.$markerFront.update(config);
15438  this.$cursorLayer.update(config);
15439  this.$highlightGutterLine && this.$updateGutterLineHighlight();
15440  this.$moveTextAreaToCursor();
15441  this._signal("afterRender");
15442  return;
15443  }
15444 
15445  if (changes & this.CHANGE_TEXT) {
15446  this.$textLayer.update(config);
15447  if (this.$showGutter)
15448  this.$gutterLayer.update(config);
15449  }
15450  else if (changes & this.CHANGE_LINES) {
15451  if (this.$updateLines() || (changes & this.CHANGE_GUTTER) && this.$showGutter)
15452  this.$gutterLayer.update(config);
15453  }
15454  else if (changes & this.CHANGE_TEXT || changes & this.CHANGE_GUTTER) {
15455  if (this.$showGutter)
15456  this.$gutterLayer.update(config);
15457  }
15458 
15459  if (changes & this.CHANGE_CURSOR) {
15460  this.$cursorLayer.update(config);
15461  this.$moveTextAreaToCursor();
15462  this.$highlightGutterLine && this.$updateGutterLineHighlight();
15463  }
15464 
15465  if (changes & (this.CHANGE_MARKER | this.CHANGE_MARKER_FRONT)) {
15466  this.$markerFront.update(config);
15467  }
15468 
15469  if (changes & (this.CHANGE_MARKER | this.CHANGE_MARKER_BACK)) {
15470  this.$markerBack.update(config);
15471  }
15472 
15473  this._signal("afterRender");
15474  };
15475 
15476 
15477  this.$autosize = function() {
15478  var height = this.session.getScreenLength() * this.lineHeight;
15479  var maxHeight = this.$maxLines * this.lineHeight;
15480  var desiredHeight = Math.max(
15481  (this.$minLines||1) * this.lineHeight,
15482  Math.min(maxHeight, height)
15483  ) + this.scrollMargin.v + (this.$extraHeight || 0);
15484  var vScroll = height > maxHeight;
15485 
15486  if (desiredHeight != this.desiredHeight ||
15487  this.$size.height != this.desiredHeight || vScroll != this.$vScroll) {
15488  if (vScroll != this.$vScroll) {
15489  this.$vScroll = vScroll;
15490  this.scrollBarV.setVisible(vScroll);
15491  }
15492 
15493  var w = this.container.clientWidth;
15494  this.container.style.height = desiredHeight + "px";
15495  this.$updateCachedSize(true, this.$gutterWidth, w, desiredHeight);
15496  this.desiredHeight = desiredHeight;
15497 
15498  this._signal("autosize");
15499  }
15500  };
15501 
15502  this.$computeLayerConfig = function() {
15503  if (this.$maxLines && this.lineHeight > 1)
15504  this.$autosize();
15505 
15506  var session = this.session;
15507  var size = this.$size;
15508 
15509  var hideScrollbars = size.height <= 2 * this.lineHeight;
15510  var screenLines = this.session.getScreenLength();
15511  var maxHeight = screenLines * this.lineHeight;
15512 
15513  var offset = this.scrollTop % this.lineHeight;
15514  var minHeight = size.scrollerHeight + this.lineHeight;
15515 
15516  var longestLine = this.$getLongestLine();
15517 
15518  var horizScroll = !hideScrollbars && (this.$hScrollBarAlwaysVisible ||
15519  size.scrollerWidth - longestLine - 2 * this.$padding < 0);
15520 
15521  var hScrollChanged = this.$horizScroll !== horizScroll;
15522  if (hScrollChanged) {
15523  this.$horizScroll = horizScroll;
15524  this.scrollBarH.setVisible(horizScroll);
15525  }
15526 
15527  var scrollPastEnd = !this.$maxLines && this.$scrollPastEnd
15528  ? (size.scrollerHeight - this.lineHeight) * this.$scrollPastEnd
15529  : 0;
15530  maxHeight += scrollPastEnd;
15531 
15532  this.session.setScrollTop(Math.max(-this.scrollMargin.top,
15533  Math.min(this.scrollTop, maxHeight - size.scrollerHeight + this.scrollMargin.bottom)));
15534 
15535  this.session.setScrollLeft(Math.max(-this.scrollMargin.left, Math.min(this.scrollLeft,
15536  longestLine + 2 * this.$padding - size.scrollerWidth + this.scrollMargin.right)));
15537 
15538  var vScroll = !hideScrollbars && (this.$vScrollBarAlwaysVisible ||
15539  size.scrollerHeight - maxHeight + scrollPastEnd < 0 || this.scrollTop);
15540  var vScrollChanged = this.$vScroll !== vScroll;
15541  if (vScrollChanged) {
15542  this.$vScroll = vScroll;
15543  this.scrollBarV.setVisible(vScroll);
15544  }
15545 
15546  var lineCount = Math.ceil(minHeight / this.lineHeight) - 1;
15547  var firstRow = Math.max(0, Math.round((this.scrollTop - offset) / this.lineHeight));
15548  var lastRow = firstRow + lineCount;
15549  var firstRowScreen, firstRowHeight;
15550  var lineHeight = this.lineHeight;
15551  firstRow = session.screenToDocumentRow(firstRow, 0);
15552  var foldLine = session.getFoldLine(firstRow);
15553  if (foldLine) {
15554  firstRow = foldLine.start.row;
15555  }
15556 
15557  firstRowScreen = session.documentToScreenRow(firstRow, 0);
15558  firstRowHeight = session.getRowLength(firstRow) * lineHeight;
15559 
15560  lastRow = Math.min(session.screenToDocumentRow(lastRow, 0), session.getLength() - 1);
15561  minHeight = size.scrollerHeight + session.getRowLength(lastRow) * lineHeight +
15562  firstRowHeight;
15563 
15564  offset = this.scrollTop - firstRowScreen * lineHeight;
15565 
15566  var changes = 0;
15567  if (this.layerConfig.width != longestLine)
15568  changes = this.CHANGE_H_SCROLL;
15569  if (hScrollChanged || vScrollChanged) {
15570  changes = this.$updateCachedSize(true, this.gutterWidth, size.width, size.height);
15571  this._signal("scrollbarVisibilityChanged");
15572  if (vScrollChanged)
15573  longestLine = this.$getLongestLine();
15574  }
15575 
15576  this.layerConfig = {
15577  width : longestLine,
15578  padding : this.$padding,
15579  firstRow : firstRow,
15580  firstRowScreen: firstRowScreen,
15581  lastRow : lastRow,
15582  lineHeight : lineHeight,
15583  characterWidth : this.characterWidth,
15584  minHeight : minHeight,
15585  maxHeight : maxHeight,
15586  offset : offset,
15587  gutterOffset : Math.max(0, Math.ceil((offset + size.height - size.scrollerHeight) / lineHeight)),
15588  height : this.$size.scrollerHeight
15589  };
15590 
15591  return changes;
15592  };
15593 
15594  this.$updateLines = function() {
15595  var firstRow = this.$changedLines.firstRow;
15596  var lastRow = this.$changedLines.lastRow;
15597  this.$changedLines = null;
15598 
15599  var layerConfig = this.layerConfig;
15600 
15601  if (firstRow > layerConfig.lastRow + 1) { return; }
15602  if (lastRow < layerConfig.firstRow) { return; }
15603  if (lastRow === Infinity) {
15604  if (this.$showGutter)
15605  this.$gutterLayer.update(layerConfig);
15606  this.$textLayer.update(layerConfig);
15607  return;
15608  }
15609  this.$textLayer.updateLines(layerConfig, firstRow, lastRow);
15610  return true;
15611  };
15612 
15613  this.$getLongestLine = function() {
15614  var charCount = this.session.getScreenWidth();
15615  if (this.showInvisibles && !this.session.$useWrapMode)
15616  charCount += 1;
15617 
15618  return Math.max(this.$size.scrollerWidth - 2 * this.$padding, Math.round(charCount * this.characterWidth));
15619  };
15620  this.updateFrontMarkers = function() {
15621  this.$markerFront.setMarkers(this.session.getMarkers(true));
15622  this.$loop.schedule(this.CHANGE_MARKER_FRONT);
15623  };
15624  this.updateBackMarkers = function() {
15625  this.$markerBack.setMarkers(this.session.getMarkers());
15626  this.$loop.schedule(this.CHANGE_MARKER_BACK);
15627  };
15628  this.addGutterDecoration = function(row, className){
15629  this.$gutterLayer.addGutterDecoration(row, className);
15630  };
15631  this.removeGutterDecoration = function(row, className){
15632  this.$gutterLayer.removeGutterDecoration(row, className);
15633  };
15634  this.updateBreakpoints = function(rows) {
15635  this.$loop.schedule(this.CHANGE_GUTTER);
15636  };
15637  this.setAnnotations = function(annotations) {
15638  this.$gutterLayer.setAnnotations(annotations);
15639  this.$loop.schedule(this.CHANGE_GUTTER);
15640  };
15641  this.updateCursor = function() {
15642  this.$loop.schedule(this.CHANGE_CURSOR);
15643  };
15644  this.hideCursor = function() {
15645  this.$cursorLayer.hideCursor();
15646  };
15647  this.showCursor = function() {
15648  this.$cursorLayer.showCursor();
15649  };
15650 
15651  this.scrollSelectionIntoView = function(anchor, lead, offset) {
15652  this.scrollCursorIntoView(anchor, offset);
15653  this.scrollCursorIntoView(lead, offset);
15654  };
15655  this.scrollCursorIntoView = function(cursor, offset, $viewMargin) {
15656  if (this.$size.scrollerHeight === 0)
15657  return;
15658 
15659  var pos = this.$cursorLayer.getPixelPosition(cursor);
15660 
15661  var left = pos.left;
15662  var top = pos.top;
15663 
15664  var topMargin = $viewMargin && $viewMargin.top || 0;
15665  var bottomMargin = $viewMargin && $viewMargin.bottom || 0;
15666 
15667  var scrollTop = this.$scrollAnimation ? this.session.getScrollTop() : this.scrollTop;
15668 
15669  if (scrollTop + topMargin > top) {
15670  if (offset)
15671  top -= offset * this.$size.scrollerHeight;
15672  if (top === 0)
15673  top = -this.scrollMargin.top;
15674  this.session.setScrollTop(top);
15675  } else if (scrollTop + this.$size.scrollerHeight - bottomMargin < top + this.lineHeight) {
15676  if (offset)
15677  top += offset * this.$size.scrollerHeight;
15678  this.session.setScrollTop(top + this.lineHeight - this.$size.scrollerHeight);
15679  }
15680 
15681  var scrollLeft = this.scrollLeft;
15682 
15683  if (scrollLeft > left) {
15684  if (left < this.$padding + 2 * this.layerConfig.characterWidth)
15685  left = -this.scrollMargin.left;
15686  this.session.setScrollLeft(left);
15687  } else if (scrollLeft + this.$size.scrollerWidth < left + this.characterWidth) {
15688  this.session.setScrollLeft(Math.round(left + this.characterWidth - this.$size.scrollerWidth));
15689  } else if (scrollLeft <= this.$padding && left - scrollLeft < this.characterWidth) {
15690  this.session.setScrollLeft(0);
15691  }
15692  };
15693  this.getScrollTop = function() {
15694  return this.session.getScrollTop();
15695  };
15696  this.getScrollLeft = function() {
15697  return this.session.getScrollLeft();
15698  };
15699  this.getScrollTopRow = function() {
15700  return this.scrollTop / this.lineHeight;
15701  };
15702  this.getScrollBottomRow = function() {
15703  return Math.max(0, Math.floor((this.scrollTop + this.$size.scrollerHeight) / this.lineHeight) - 1);
15704  };
15705  this.scrollToRow = function(row) {
15706  this.session.setScrollTop(row * this.lineHeight);
15707  };
15708 
15709  this.alignCursor = function(cursor, alignment) {
15710  if (typeof cursor == "number")
15711  cursor = {row: cursor, column: 0};
15712 
15713  var pos = this.$cursorLayer.getPixelPosition(cursor);
15714  var h = this.$size.scrollerHeight - this.lineHeight;
15715  var offset = pos.top - h * (alignment || 0);
15716 
15717  this.session.setScrollTop(offset);
15718  return offset;
15719  };
15720 
15721  this.STEPS = 8;
15722  this.$calcSteps = function(fromValue, toValue){
15723  var i = 0;
15724  var l = this.STEPS;
15725  var steps = [];
15726 
15727  var func = function(t, x_min, dx) {
15728  return dx * (Math.pow(t - 1, 3) + 1) + x_min;
15729  };
15730 
15731  for (i = 0; i < l; ++i)
15732  steps.push(func(i / this.STEPS, fromValue, toValue - fromValue));
15733 
15734  return steps;
15735  };
15736  this.scrollToLine = function(line, center, animate, callback) {
15737  var pos = this.$cursorLayer.getPixelPosition({row: line, column: 0});
15738  var offset = pos.top;
15739  if (center)
15740  offset -= this.$size.scrollerHeight / 2;
15741 
15742  var initialScroll = this.scrollTop;
15743  this.session.setScrollTop(offset);
15744  if (animate !== false)
15745  this.animateScrolling(initialScroll, callback);
15746  };
15747 
15748  this.animateScrolling = function(fromValue, callback) {
15749  var toValue = this.scrollTop;
15750  if (!this.$animatedScroll)
15751  return;
15752  var _self = this;
15753 
15754  if (fromValue == toValue)
15755  return;
15756 
15757  if (this.$scrollAnimation) {
15758  var oldSteps = this.$scrollAnimation.steps;
15759  if (oldSteps.length) {
15760  fromValue = oldSteps[0];
15761  if (fromValue == toValue)
15762  return;
15763  }
15764  }
15765 
15766  var steps = _self.$calcSteps(fromValue, toValue);
15767  this.$scrollAnimation = {from: fromValue, to: toValue, steps: steps};
15768 
15769  clearInterval(this.$timer);
15770 
15771  _self.session.setScrollTop(steps.shift());
15772  _self.session.$scrollTop = toValue;
15773  this.$timer = setInterval(function() {
15774  if (steps.length) {
15775  _self.session.setScrollTop(steps.shift());
15776  _self.session.$scrollTop = toValue;
15777  } else if (toValue != null) {
15778  _self.session.$scrollTop = -1;
15779  _self.session.setScrollTop(toValue);
15780  toValue = null;
15781  } else {
15782  _self.$timer = clearInterval(_self.$timer);
15783  _self.$scrollAnimation = null;
15784  callback && callback();
15785  }
15786  }, 10);
15787  };
15788  this.scrollToY = function(scrollTop) {
15789  if (this.scrollTop !== scrollTop) {
15790  this.$loop.schedule(this.CHANGE_SCROLL);
15791  this.scrollTop = scrollTop;
15792  }
15793  };
15794  this.scrollToX = function(scrollLeft) {
15795  if (this.scrollLeft !== scrollLeft)
15796  this.scrollLeft = scrollLeft;
15797  this.$loop.schedule(this.CHANGE_H_SCROLL);
15798  };
15799  this.scrollTo = function(x, y) {
15800  this.session.setScrollTop(y);
15801  this.session.setScrollLeft(y);
15802  };
15803  this.scrollBy = function(deltaX, deltaY) {
15804  deltaY && this.session.setScrollTop(this.session.getScrollTop() + deltaY);
15805  deltaX && this.session.setScrollLeft(this.session.getScrollLeft() + deltaX);
15806  };
15807  this.isScrollableBy = function(deltaX, deltaY) {
15808  if (deltaY < 0 && this.session.getScrollTop() >= 1 - this.scrollMargin.top)
15809  return true;
15810  if (deltaY > 0 && this.session.getScrollTop() + this.$size.scrollerHeight
15811  - this.layerConfig.maxHeight < -1 + this.scrollMargin.bottom)
15812  return true;
15813  if (deltaX < 0 && this.session.getScrollLeft() >= 1 - this.scrollMargin.left)
15814  return true;
15815  if (deltaX > 0 && this.session.getScrollLeft() + this.$size.scrollerWidth
15816  - this.layerConfig.width < -1 + this.scrollMargin.right)
15817  return true;
15818  };
15819 
15820  this.pixelToScreenCoordinates = function(x, y) {
15821  var canvasPos = this.scroller.getBoundingClientRect();
15822 
15823  var offset = (x + this.scrollLeft - canvasPos.left - this.$padding) / this.characterWidth;
15824  var row = Math.floor((y + this.scrollTop - canvasPos.top) / this.lineHeight);
15825  var col = Math.round(offset);
15826 
15827  return {row: row, column: col, side: offset - col > 0 ? 1 : -1};
15828  };
15829 
15830  this.screenToTextCoordinates = function(x, y) {
15831  var canvasPos = this.scroller.getBoundingClientRect();
15832 
15833  var col = Math.round(
15834  (x + this.scrollLeft - canvasPos.left - this.$padding) / this.characterWidth
15835  );
15836 
15837  var row = (y + this.scrollTop - canvasPos.top) / this.lineHeight;
15838 
15839  return this.session.screenToDocumentPosition(row, Math.max(col, 0));
15840  };
15841  this.textToScreenCoordinates = function(row, column) {
15842  var canvasPos = this.scroller.getBoundingClientRect();
15843  var pos = this.session.documentToScreenPosition(row, column);
15844 
15845  var x = this.$padding + Math.round(pos.column * this.characterWidth);
15846  var y = pos.row * this.lineHeight;
15847 
15848  return {
15849  pageX: canvasPos.left + x - this.scrollLeft,
15850  pageY: canvasPos.top + y - this.scrollTop
15851  };
15852  };
15853  this.visualizeFocus = function() {
15854  dom.addCssClass(this.container, "ace_focus");
15855  };
15856  this.visualizeBlur = function() {
15857  dom.removeCssClass(this.container, "ace_focus");
15858  };
15859  this.showComposition = function(position) {
15860  if (!this.$composition)
15861  this.$composition = {
15862  keepTextAreaAtCursor: this.$keepTextAreaAtCursor,
15863  cssText: this.textarea.style.cssText
15864  };
15865 
15866  this.$keepTextAreaAtCursor = true;
15867  dom.addCssClass(this.textarea, "ace_composition");
15868  this.textarea.style.cssText = "";
15869  this.$moveTextAreaToCursor();
15870  };
15871  this.setCompositionText = function(text) {
15872  this.$moveTextAreaToCursor();
15873  };
15874  this.hideComposition = function() {
15875  if (!this.$composition)
15876  return;
15877 
15878  dom.removeCssClass(this.textarea, "ace_composition");
15879  this.$keepTextAreaAtCursor = this.$composition.keepTextAreaAtCursor;
15880  this.textarea.style.cssText = this.$composition.cssText;
15881  this.$composition = null;
15882  };
15883  this.setTheme = function(theme, cb) {
15884  var _self = this;
15885  this.$themeId = theme;
15886  _self._dispatchEvent('themeChange',{theme:theme});
15887 
15888  if (!theme || typeof theme == "string") {
15889  var moduleName = theme || this.$options.theme.initialValue;
15890  config.loadModule(["theme", moduleName], afterLoad);
15891  } else {
15892  afterLoad(theme);
15893  }
15894 
15895  function afterLoad(module) {
15896  if (_self.$themeId != theme)
15897  return cb && cb();
15898  if (!module.cssClass)
15899  return;
15900  dom.importCssString(
15901  module.cssText,
15902  module.cssClass,
15903  _self.container.ownerDocument
15904  );
15905 
15906  if (_self.theme)
15907  dom.removeCssClass(_self.container, _self.theme.cssClass);
15908 
15909  var padding = "padding" in module ? module.padding
15910  : "padding" in (_self.theme || {}) ? 4 : _self.$padding;
15911  if (_self.$padding && padding != _self.$padding)
15912  _self.setPadding(padding);
15913  _self.$theme = module.cssClass;
15914 
15915  _self.theme = module;
15916  dom.addCssClass(_self.container, module.cssClass);
15917  dom.setCssClass(_self.container, "ace_dark", module.isDark);
15918  if (_self.$size) {
15919  _self.$size.width = 0;
15920  _self.$updateSizeAsync();
15921  }
15922 
15923  _self._dispatchEvent('themeLoaded', {theme:module});
15924  cb && cb();
15925  }
15926  };
15927  this.getTheme = function() {
15928  return this.$themeId;
15929  };
15930  this.setStyle = function(style, include) {
15931  dom.setCssClass(this.container, style, include !== false);
15932  };
15933  this.unsetStyle = function(style) {
15934  dom.removeCssClass(this.container, style);
15935  };
15936 
15937  this.setCursorStyle = function(style) {
15938  if (this.scroller.style.cursor != style)
15939  this.scroller.style.cursor = style;
15940  };
15941  this.setMouseCursor = function(cursorStyle) {
15942  this.scroller.style.cursor = cursorStyle;
15943  };
15944  this.destroy = function() {
15945  this.$textLayer.destroy();
15946  this.$cursorLayer.destroy();
15947  };
15948 
15949 }).call(VirtualRenderer.prototype);
15950 
15951 
15952 config.defineOptions(VirtualRenderer.prototype, "renderer", {
15953  animatedScroll: {initialValue: false},
15954  showInvisibles: {
15955  set: function(value) {
15956  if (this.$textLayer.setShowInvisibles(value))
15957  this.$loop.schedule(this.CHANGE_TEXT);
15958  },
15959  initialValue: false
15960  },
15961  showPrintMargin: {
15962  set: function() { this.$updatePrintMargin(); },
15963  initialValue: true
15964  },
15965  printMarginColumn: {
15966  set: function() { this.$updatePrintMargin(); },
15967  initialValue: 80
15968  },
15969  printMargin: {
15970  set: function(val) {
15971  if (typeof val == "number")
15972  this.$printMarginColumn = val;
15973  this.$showPrintMargin = !!val;
15974  this.$updatePrintMargin();
15975  },
15976  get: function() {
15977  return this.$showPrintMargin && this.$printMarginColumn;
15978  }
15979  },
15980  showGutter: {
15981  set: function(show){
15982  this.$gutter.style.display = show ? "block" : "none";
15983  this.$loop.schedule(this.CHANGE_FULL);
15984  this.onGutterResize();
15985  },
15986  initialValue: true
15987  },
15988  fadeFoldWidgets: {
15989  set: function(show) {
15990  dom.setCssClass(this.$gutter, "ace_fade-fold-widgets", show);
15991  },
15992  initialValue: false
15993  },
15994  showFoldWidgets: {
15995  set: function(show) {this.$gutterLayer.setShowFoldWidgets(show)},
15996  initialValue: true
15997  },
15998  showLineNumbers: {
15999  set: function(show) {
16000  this.$gutterLayer.setShowLineNumbers(show);
16001  this.$loop.schedule(this.CHANGE_GUTTER);
16002  },
16003  initialValue: true
16004  },
16005  displayIndentGuides: {
16006  set: function(show) {
16007  if (this.$textLayer.setDisplayIndentGuides(show))
16008  this.$loop.schedule(this.CHANGE_TEXT);
16009  },
16010  initialValue: true
16011  },
16012  highlightGutterLine: {
16013  set: function(shouldHighlight) {
16014  if (!this.$gutterLineHighlight) {
16015  this.$gutterLineHighlight = dom.createElement("div");
16016  this.$gutterLineHighlight.className = "ace_gutter-active-line";
16017  this.$gutter.appendChild(this.$gutterLineHighlight);
16018  return;
16019  }
16020 
16021  this.$gutterLineHighlight.style.display = shouldHighlight ? "" : "none";
16022  if (this.$cursorLayer.$pixelPos)
16023  this.$updateGutterLineHighlight();
16024  },
16025  initialValue: false,
16026  value: true
16027  },
16028  hScrollBarAlwaysVisible: {
16029  set: function(val) {
16030  if (!this.$hScrollBarAlwaysVisible || !this.$horizScroll)
16031  this.$loop.schedule(this.CHANGE_SCROLL);
16032  },
16033  initialValue: false
16034  },
16035  vScrollBarAlwaysVisible: {
16036  set: function(val) {
16037  if (!this.$vScrollBarAlwaysVisible || !this.$vScroll)
16038  this.$loop.schedule(this.CHANGE_SCROLL);
16039  },
16040  initialValue: false
16041  },
16042  fontSize: {
16043  set: function(size) {
16044  if (typeof size == "number")
16045  size = size + "px";
16046  this.container.style.fontSize = size;
16047  this.updateFontSize();
16048  },
16049  initialValue: 12
16050  },
16051  fontFamily: {
16052  set: function(name) {
16053  this.container.style.fontFamily = name;
16054  this.updateFontSize();
16055  }
16056  },
16057  maxLines: {
16058  set: function(val) {
16059  this.updateFull();
16060  }
16061  },
16062  minLines: {
16063  set: function(val) {
16064  this.updateFull();
16065  }
16066  },
16067  scrollPastEnd: {
16068  set: function(val) {
16069  val = +val || 0;
16070  if (this.$scrollPastEnd == val)
16071  return;
16072  this.$scrollPastEnd = val;
16073  this.$loop.schedule(this.CHANGE_SCROLL);
16074  },
16075  initialValue: 0,
16076  handlesSet: true
16077  },
16078  fixedWidthGutter: {
16079  set: function(val) {
16080  this.$gutterLayer.$fixedWidth = !!val;
16081  this.$loop.schedule(this.CHANGE_GUTTER);
16082  }
16083  },
16084  theme: {
16085  set: function(val) { this.setTheme(val) },
16086  get: function() { return this.$themeId || this.theme; },
16087  initialValue: "./theme/textmate",
16088  handlesSet: true
16089  }
16090 });
16091 
16092 exports.VirtualRenderer = VirtualRenderer;
16093 });
16094 
16095 define("ace/worker/worker_client",["require","exports","module","ace/lib/oop","ace/lib/net","ace/lib/event_emitter","ace/config"], function(require, exports, module) {
16096 "use strict";
16097 
16098 var oop = require("../lib/oop");
16099 var net = require("../lib/net");
16100 var EventEmitter = require("../lib/event_emitter").EventEmitter;
16101 var config = require("../config");
16102 
16103 var WorkerClient = function(topLevelNamespaces, mod, classname, workerUrl) {
16104  this.$sendDeltaQueue = this.$sendDeltaQueue.bind(this);
