16105  this.changeListener = this.changeListener.bind(this);
16106  this.onMessage = this.onMessage.bind(this);
16107  if (require.nameToUrl && !require.toUrl)
16108  require.toUrl = require.nameToUrl;
16109 
16110  if (config.get("packaged") || !require.toUrl) {
16111  workerUrl = workerUrl || config.moduleUrl(mod, "worker");
16112  } else {
16113  var normalizePath = this.$normalizePath;
16114  workerUrl = workerUrl || normalizePath(require.toUrl("ace/worker/worker.js", null, "_"));
16115 
16116  var tlns = {};
16117  topLevelNamespaces.forEach(function(ns) {
16118  tlns[ns] = normalizePath(require.toUrl(ns, null, "_").replace(/(\.js)?(\?.*)?$/, ""));
16119  });
16120  }
16121 
16122  try {
16123  this.$worker = new Worker(workerUrl);
16124  } catch(e) {
16125  if (e instanceof window.DOMException) {
16126  var blob = this.$workerBlob(workerUrl);
16127  var URL = window.URL || window.webkitURL;
16128  var blobURL = URL.createObjectURL(blob);
16129 
16130  this.$worker = new Worker(blobURL);
16131  URL.revokeObjectURL(blobURL);
16132  } else {
16133  throw e;
16134  }
16135  }
16136  this.$worker.postMessage({
16137  init : true,
16138  tlns : tlns,
16139  module : mod,
16140  classname : classname
16141  });
16142 
16143  this.callbackId = 1;
16144  this.callbacks = {};
16145 
16146  this.$worker.onmessage = this.onMessage;
16147 };
16148 
16149 (function(){
16150 
16151  oop.implement(this, EventEmitter);
16152 
16153  this.onMessage = function(e) {
16154  var msg = e.data;
16155  switch(msg.type) {
16156  case "event":
16157  this._signal(msg.name, {data: msg.data});
16158  break;
16159  case "call":
16160  var callback = this.callbacks[msg.id];
16161  if (callback) {
16162  callback(msg.data);
16163  delete this.callbacks[msg.id];
16164  }
16165  break;
16166  case "error":
16167  this.reportError(msg.data);
16168  break;
16169  case "log":
16170  window.console && console.log && console.log.apply(console, msg.data);
16171  break;
16172  }
16173  };
16174 
16175  this.reportError = function(err) {
16176  window.console && console.error && console.error(err);
16177  };
16178 
16179  this.$normalizePath = function(path) {
16180  return net.qualifyURL(path);
16181  };
16182 
16183  this.terminate = function() {
16184  this._signal("terminate", {});
16185  this.deltaQueue = null;
16186  this.$worker.terminate();
16187  this.$worker = null;
16188  if (this.$doc)
16189  this.$doc.off("change", this.changeListener);
16190  this.$doc = null;
16191  };
16192 
16193  this.send = function(cmd, args) {
16194  this.$worker.postMessage({command: cmd, args: args});
16195  };
16196 
16197  this.call = function(cmd, args, callback) {
16198  if (callback) {
16199  var id = this.callbackId++;
16200  this.callbacks[id] = callback;
16201  args.push(id);
16202  }
16203  this.send(cmd, args);
16204  };
16205 
16206  this.emit = function(event, data) {
16207  try {
16208  this.$worker.postMessage({event: event, data: {data: data.data}});
16209  }
16210  catch(ex) {
16211  console.error(ex.stack);
16212  }
16213  };
16214 
16215  this.attachToDocument = function(doc) {
16216  if(this.$doc)
16217  this.terminate();
16218 
16219  this.$doc = doc;
16220  this.call("setValue", [doc.getValue()]);
16221  doc.on("change", this.changeListener);
16222  };
16223 
16224  this.changeListener = function(e) {
16225  if (!this.deltaQueue) {
16226  this.deltaQueue = [e.data];
16227  setTimeout(this.$sendDeltaQueue, 0);
16228  } else
16229  this.deltaQueue.push(e.data);
16230  };
16231 
16232  this.$sendDeltaQueue = function() {
16233  var q = this.deltaQueue;
16234  if (!q) return;
16235  this.deltaQueue = null;
16236  if (q.length > 20 && q.length > this.$doc.getLength() >> 1) {
16237  this.call("setValue", [this.$doc.getValue()]);
16238  } else
16239  this.emit("change", {data: q});
16240  };
16241 
16242  this.$workerBlob = function(workerUrl) {
16243  var script = "importScripts('" + net.qualifyURL(workerUrl) + "');";
16244  try {
16245  return new Blob([script], {"type": "application/javascript"});
16246  } catch (e) { // Backwards-compatibility
16247  var BlobBuilder = window.BlobBuilder || window.WebKitBlobBuilder || window.MozBlobBuilder;
16248  var blobBuilder = new BlobBuilder();
16249  blobBuilder.append(script);
16250  return blobBuilder.getBlob("application/javascript");
16251  }
16252  };
16253 
16254 }).call(WorkerClient.prototype);
16255 
16256 
16257 var UIWorkerClient = function(topLevelNamespaces, mod, classname) {
16258  this.$sendDeltaQueue = this.$sendDeltaQueue.bind(this);
16259  this.changeListener = this.changeListener.bind(this);
16260  this.callbackId = 1;
16261  this.callbacks = {};
16262  this.messageBuffer = [];
16263 
16264  var main = null;
16265  var emitSync = false;
16266  var sender = Object.create(EventEmitter);
16267  var _self = this;
16268 
16269  this.$worker = {};
16270  this.$worker.terminate = function() {};
16271  this.$worker.postMessage = function(e) {
16272  _self.messageBuffer.push(e);
16273  if (main) {
16274  if (emitSync)
16275  setTimeout(processNext);
16276  else
16277  processNext();
16278  }
16279  };
16280  this.setEmitSync = function(val) { emitSync = val };
16281 
16282  var processNext = function() {
16283  var msg = _self.messageBuffer.shift();
16284  if (msg.command)
16285  main[msg.command].apply(main, msg.args);
16286  else if (msg.event)
16287  sender._signal(msg.event, msg.data);
16288  };
16289 
16290  sender.postMessage = function(msg) {
16291  _self.onMessage({data: msg});
16292  };
16293  sender.callback = function(data, callbackId) {
16294  this.postMessage({type: "call", id: callbackId, data: data});
16295  };
16296  sender.emit = function(name, data) {
16297  this.postMessage({type: "event", name: name, data: data});
16298  };
16299 
16300  config.loadModule(["worker", mod], function(Main) {
16301  main = new Main[classname](sender);
16302  while (_self.messageBuffer.length)
16303  processNext();
16304  });
16305 };
16306 
16307 UIWorkerClient.prototype = WorkerClient.prototype;
16308 
16309 exports.UIWorkerClient = UIWorkerClient;
16310 exports.WorkerClient = WorkerClient;
16311 
16312 });
16313 
16314 define("ace/placeholder",["require","exports","module","ace/range","ace/lib/event_emitter","ace/lib/oop"], function(require, exports, module) {
16315 "use strict";
16316 
16317 var Range = require("./range").Range;
16318 var EventEmitter = require("./lib/event_emitter").EventEmitter;
16319 var oop = require("./lib/oop");
16320 
16321 var PlaceHolder = function(session, length, pos, others, mainClass, othersClass) {
16322  var _self = this;
16323  this.length = length;
16324  this.session = session;
16325  this.doc = session.getDocument();
16326  this.mainClass = mainClass;
16327  this.othersClass = othersClass;
16328  this.$onUpdate = this.onUpdate.bind(this);
16329  this.doc.on("change", this.$onUpdate);
16330  this.$others = others;
16331 
16332  this.$onCursorChange = function() {
16333  setTimeout(function() {
16334  _self.onCursorChange();
16335  });
16336  };
16337 
16338  this.$pos = pos;
16339  var undoStack = session.getUndoManager().$undoStack || session.getUndoManager().$undostack || {length: -1};
16340  this.$undoStackDepth = undoStack.length;
16341  this.setup();
16342 
16343  session.selection.on("changeCursor", this.$onCursorChange);
16344 };
16345 
16346 (function() {
16347 
16348  oop.implement(this, EventEmitter);
16349  this.setup = function() {
16350  var _self = this;
16351  var doc = this.doc;
16352  var session = this.session;
16353  var pos = this.$pos;
16354 
16355  this.selectionBefore = session.selection.toJSON();
16356  if (session.selection.inMultiSelectMode)
16357  session.selection.toSingleRange();
16358 
16359  this.pos = doc.createAnchor(pos.row, pos.column);
16360  this.markerId = session.addMarker(new Range(pos.row, pos.column, pos.row, pos.column + this.length), this.mainClass, null, false);
16361  this.pos.on("change", function(event) {
16362  session.removeMarker(_self.markerId);
16363  _self.markerId = session.addMarker(new Range(event.value.row, event.value.column, event.value.row, event.value.column+_self.length), _self.mainClass, null, false);
16364  });
16365  this.others = [];
16366  this.$others.forEach(function(other) {
16367  var anchor = doc.createAnchor(other.row, other.column);
16368  _self.others.push(anchor);
16369  });
16370  session.setUndoSelect(false);
16371  };
16372  this.showOtherMarkers = function() {
16373  if(this.othersActive) return;
16374  var session = this.session;
16375  var _self = this;
16376  this.othersActive = true;
16377  this.others.forEach(function(anchor) {
16378  anchor.markerId = session.addMarker(new Range(anchor.row, anchor.column, anchor.row, anchor.column+_self.length), _self.othersClass, null, false);
16379  anchor.on("change", function(event) {
16380  session.removeMarker(anchor.markerId);
16381  anchor.markerId = session.addMarker(new Range(event.value.row, event.value.column, event.value.row, event.value.column+_self.length), _self.othersClass, null, false);
16382  });
16383  });
16384  };
16385  this.hideOtherMarkers = function() {
16386  if(!this.othersActive) return;
16387  this.othersActive = false;
16388  for (var i = 0; i < this.others.length; i++) {
16389  this.session.removeMarker(this.others[i].markerId);
16390  }
16391  };
16392  this.onUpdate = function(event) {
16393  var delta = event.data;
16394  var range = delta.range;
16395  if(range.start.row !== range.end.row) return;
16396  if(range.start.row !== this.pos.row) return;
16397  if (this.$updating) return;
16398  this.$updating = true;
16399  var lengthDiff = delta.action === "insertText" ? range.end.column - range.start.column : range.start.column - range.end.column;
16400 
16401  if(range.start.column >= this.pos.column && range.start.column <= this.pos.column + this.length + 1) {
16402  var distanceFromStart = range.start.column - this.pos.column;
16403  this.length += lengthDiff;
16404  if(!this.session.$fromUndo) {
16405  if(delta.action === "insertText") {
16406  for (var i = this.others.length - 1; i >= 0; i--) {
16407  var otherPos = this.others[i];
16408  var newPos = {row: otherPos.row, column: otherPos.column + distanceFromStart};
16409  if(otherPos.row === range.start.row && range.start.column < otherPos.column)
16410  newPos.column += lengthDiff;
16411  this.doc.insert(newPos, delta.text);
16412  }
16413  } else if(delta.action === "removeText") {
16414  for (var i = this.others.length - 1; i >= 0; i--) {
16415  var otherPos = this.others[i];
16416  var newPos = {row: otherPos.row, column: otherPos.column + distanceFromStart};
16417  if(otherPos.row === range.start.row && range.start.column < otherPos.column)
16418  newPos.column += lengthDiff;
16419  this.doc.remove(new Range(newPos.row, newPos.column, newPos.row, newPos.column - lengthDiff));
16420  }
16421  }
16422  if(range.start.column === this.pos.column && delta.action === "insertText") {
16423  setTimeout(function() {
16424  this.pos.setPosition(this.pos.row, this.pos.column - lengthDiff);
16425  for (var i = 0; i < this.others.length; i++) {
16426  var other = this.others[i];
16427  var newPos = {row: other.row, column: other.column - lengthDiff};
16428  if(other.row === range.start.row && range.start.column < other.column)
16429  newPos.column += lengthDiff;
16430  other.setPosition(newPos.row, newPos.column);
16431  }
16432  }.bind(this), 0);
16433  }
16434  else if(range.start.column === this.pos.column && delta.action === "removeText") {
16435  setTimeout(function() {
16436  for (var i = 0; i < this.others.length; i++) {
16437  var other = this.others[i];
16438  if(other.row === range.start.row && range.start.column < other.column) {
16439  other.setPosition(other.row, other.column - lengthDiff);
16440  }
16441  }
16442  }.bind(this), 0);
16443  }
16444  }
16445  this.pos._emit("change", {value: this.pos});
16446  for (var i = 0; i < this.others.length; i++) {
16447  this.others[i]._emit("change", {value: this.others[i]});
16448  }
16449  }
16450  this.$updating = false;
16451  };
16452 
16453  this.onCursorChange = function(event) {
16454  if (this.$updating || !this.session) return;
16455  var pos = this.session.selection.getCursor();
16456  if (pos.row === this.pos.row && pos.column >= this.pos.column && pos.column <= this.pos.column + this.length) {
16457  this.showOtherMarkers();
16458  this._emit("cursorEnter", event);
16459  } else {
16460  this.hideOtherMarkers();
16461  this._emit("cursorLeave", event);
16462  }
16463  };
16464  this.detach = function() {
16465  this.session.removeMarker(this.markerId);
16466  this.hideOtherMarkers();
16467  this.doc.removeEventListener("change", this.$onUpdate);
16468  this.session.selection.removeEventListener("changeCursor", this.$onCursorChange);
16469  this.pos.detach();
16470  for (var i = 0; i < this.others.length; i++) {
16471  this.others[i].detach();
16472  }
16473  this.session.setUndoSelect(true);
16474  this.session = null;
16475  };
16476  this.cancel = function() {
16477  if(this.$undoStackDepth === -1)
16478  throw Error("Canceling placeholders only supported with undo manager attached to session.");
16479  var undoManager = this.session.getUndoManager();
16480  var undosRequired = (undoManager.$undoStack || undoManager.$undostack).length - this.$undoStackDepth;
16481  for (var i = 0; i < undosRequired; i++) {
16482  undoManager.undo(true);
16483  }
16484  if (this.selectionBefore)
16485  this.session.selection.fromJSON(this.selectionBefore);
16486  };
16487 }).call(PlaceHolder.prototype);
16488 
16489 
16490 exports.PlaceHolder = PlaceHolder;
16491 });
16492 
16493 define("ace/mouse/multi_select_handler",["require","exports","module","ace/lib/event","ace/lib/useragent"], function(require, exports, module) {
16494 
16495 var event = require("../lib/event");
16496 var useragent = require("../lib/useragent");
16497 function isSamePoint(p1, p2) {
16498  return p1.row == p2.row && p1.column == p2.column;
16499 }
16500 
16501 function onMouseDown(e) {
16502  var ev = e.domEvent;
16503  var alt = ev.altKey;
16504  var shift = ev.shiftKey;
16505  var ctrl = ev.ctrlKey;
16506  var accel = e.getAccelKey();
16507  var button = e.getButton();
16508 
16509  if (ctrl && useragent.isMac)
16510  button = ev.button;
16511 
16512  if (e.editor.inMultiSelectMode && button == 2) {
16513  e.editor.textInput.onContextMenu(e.domEvent);
16514  return;
16515  }
16516 
16517  if (!ctrl && !alt && !accel) {
16518  if (button === 0 && e.editor.inMultiSelectMode)
16519  e.editor.exitMultiSelectMode();
16520  return;
16521  }
16522 
16523  if (button !== 0)
16524  return;
16525 
16526  var editor = e.editor;
16527  var selection = editor.selection;
16528  var isMultiSelect = editor.inMultiSelectMode;
16529  var pos = e.getDocumentPosition();
16530  var cursor = selection.getCursor();
16531  var inSelection = e.inSelection() || (selection.isEmpty() && isSamePoint(pos, cursor));
16532 
16533  var mouseX = e.x, mouseY = e.y;
16534  var onMouseSelection = function(e) {
16535  mouseX = e.clientX;
16536  mouseY = e.clientY;
16537  };
16538 
16539  var session = editor.session;
16540  var screenAnchor = editor.renderer.pixelToScreenCoordinates(mouseX, mouseY);
16541  var screenCursor = screenAnchor;
16542 
16543  var selectionMode;
16544  if (editor.$mouseHandler.$enableJumpToDef) {
16545  if (ctrl && alt || accel && alt)
16546  selectionMode = "add";
16547  else if (alt)
16548  selectionMode = "block";
16549  } else {
16550  if (accel && !alt) {
16551  selectionMode = "add";
16552  if (!isMultiSelect && shift)
16553  return;
16554  } else if (alt) {
16555  selectionMode = "block";
16556  }
16557  }
16558 
16559  if (selectionMode && useragent.isMac && ev.ctrlKey) {
16560  editor.$mouseHandler.cancelContextMenu();
16561  }
16562 
16563  if (selectionMode == "add") {
16564  if (!isMultiSelect && inSelection)
16565  return; // dragging
16566 
16567  if (!isMultiSelect) {
16568  var range = selection.toOrientedRange();
16569  editor.addSelectionMarker(range);
16570  }
16571 
16572  var oldRange = selection.rangeList.rangeAtPoint(pos);
16573 
16574 
16575  editor.$blockScrolling++;
16576  editor.inVirtualSelectionMode = true;
16577 
16578  if (shift) {
16579  oldRange = null;
16580  range = selection.ranges[0];
16581  editor.removeSelectionMarker(range);
16582  }
16583  editor.once("mouseup", function() {
16584  var tmpSel = selection.toOrientedRange();
16585 
16586  if (oldRange && tmpSel.isEmpty() && isSamePoint(oldRange.cursor, tmpSel.cursor))
16587  selection.substractPoint(tmpSel.cursor);
16588  else {
16589  if (shift) {
16590  selection.substractPoint(range.cursor);
16591  } else if (range) {
16592  editor.removeSelectionMarker(range);
16593  selection.addRange(range);
16594  }
16595  selection.addRange(tmpSel);
16596  }
16597  editor.$blockScrolling--;
16598  editor.inVirtualSelectionMode = false;
16599  });
16600 
16601  } else if (selectionMode == "block") {
16602  e.stop();
16603  editor.inVirtualSelectionMode = true;
16604  var initialRange;
16605  var rectSel = [];
16606  var blockSelect = function() {
16607  var newCursor = editor.renderer.pixelToScreenCoordinates(mouseX, mouseY);
16608  var cursor = session.screenToDocumentPosition(newCursor.row, newCursor.column);
16609 
16610  if (isSamePoint(screenCursor, newCursor) && isSamePoint(cursor, selection.lead))
16611  return;
16612  screenCursor = newCursor;
16613 
16614  editor.$blockScrolling++;
16615  editor.selection.moveToPosition(cursor);
16616  editor.renderer.scrollCursorIntoView();
16617 
16618  editor.removeSelectionMarkers(rectSel);
16619  rectSel = selection.rectangularRangeBlock(screenCursor, screenAnchor);
16620  if (editor.$mouseHandler.$clickSelection && rectSel.length == 1 && rectSel[0].isEmpty())
16621  rectSel[0] = editor.$mouseHandler.$clickSelection.clone();
16622  rectSel.forEach(editor.addSelectionMarker, editor);
16623  editor.updateSelectionMarkers();
16624  editor.$blockScrolling--;
16625  };
16626  editor.$blockScrolling++;
16627  if (isMultiSelect && !accel) {
16628  selection.toSingleRange();
16629  } else if (!isMultiSelect && accel) {
16630  initialRange = selection.toOrientedRange();
16631  editor.addSelectionMarker(initialRange);
16632  }
16633 
16634  if (shift)
16635  screenAnchor = session.documentToScreenPosition(selection.lead);
16636  else
16637  selection.moveToPosition(pos);
16638  editor.$blockScrolling--;
16639 
16640  screenCursor = {row: -1, column: -1};
16641 
16642  var onMouseSelectionEnd = function(e) {
16643  clearInterval(timerId);
16644  editor.removeSelectionMarkers(rectSel);
16645  if (!rectSel.length)
16646  rectSel = [selection.toOrientedRange()];
16647  editor.$blockScrolling++;
16648  if (initialRange) {
16649  editor.removeSelectionMarker(initialRange);
16650  selection.toSingleRange(initialRange);
16651  }
16652  for (var i = 0; i < rectSel.length; i++)
16653  selection.addRange(rectSel[i]);
16654  editor.inVirtualSelectionMode = false;
16655  editor.$mouseHandler.$clickSelection = null;
16656  editor.$blockScrolling--;
16657  };
16658 
16659  var onSelectionInterval = blockSelect;
16660 
16661  event.capture(editor.container, onMouseSelection, onMouseSelectionEnd);
16662  var timerId = setInterval(function() {onSelectionInterval();}, 20);
16663 
16664  return e.preventDefault();
16665  }
16666 }
16667 
16668 
16669 exports.onMouseDown = onMouseDown;
16670 
16671 });
16672 
16673 define("ace/commands/multi_select_commands",["require","exports","module","ace/keyboard/hash_handler"], function(require, exports, module) {
16674 exports.defaultCommands = [{
16675  name: "addCursorAbove",
16676  exec: function(editor) { editor.selectMoreLines(-1); },
16677  bindKey: {win: "Ctrl-Alt-Up", mac: "Ctrl-Alt-Up"},
16678  scrollIntoView: "cursor",
16679  readonly: true
16680 }, {
16681  name: "addCursorBelow",
16682  exec: function(editor) { editor.selectMoreLines(1); },
16683  bindKey: {win: "Ctrl-Alt-Down", mac: "Ctrl-Alt-Down"},
16684  scrollIntoView: "cursor",
16685  readonly: true
16686 }, {
16687  name: "addCursorAboveSkipCurrent",
16688  exec: function(editor) { editor.selectMoreLines(-1, true); },
16689  bindKey: {win: "Ctrl-Alt-Shift-Up", mac: "Ctrl-Alt-Shift-Up"},
16690  scrollIntoView: "cursor",
16691  readonly: true
16692 }, {
16693  name: "addCursorBelowSkipCurrent",
16694  exec: function(editor) { editor.selectMoreLines(1, true); },
16695  bindKey: {win: "Ctrl-Alt-Shift-Down", mac: "Ctrl-Alt-Shift-Down"},
16696  scrollIntoView: "cursor",
16697  readonly: true
16698 }, {
16699  name: "selectMoreBefore",
16700  exec: function(editor) { editor.selectMore(-1); },
16701  bindKey: {win: "Ctrl-Alt-Left", mac: "Ctrl-Alt-Left"},
16702  scrollIntoView: "cursor",
16703  readonly: true
16704 }, {
16705  name: "selectMoreAfter",
16706  exec: function(editor) { editor.selectMore(1); },
16707  bindKey: {win: "Ctrl-Alt-Right", mac: "Ctrl-Alt-Right"},
16708  scrollIntoView: "cursor",
16709  readonly: true
16710 }, {
16711  name: "selectNextBefore",
16712  exec: function(editor) { editor.selectMore(-1, true); },
16713  bindKey: {win: "Ctrl-Alt-Shift-Left", mac: "Ctrl-Alt-Shift-Left"},
16714  scrollIntoView: "cursor",
16715  readonly: true
16716 }, {
16717  name: "selectNextAfter",
16718  exec: function(editor) { editor.selectMore(1, true); },
16719  bindKey: {win: "Ctrl-Alt-Shift-Right", mac: "Ctrl-Alt-Shift-Right"},
16720  scrollIntoView: "cursor",
16721  readonly: true
16722 }, {
16723  name: "splitIntoLines",
16724  exec: function(editor) { editor.multiSelect.splitIntoLines(); },
16725  bindKey: {win: "Ctrl-Alt-L", mac: "Ctrl-Alt-L"},
16726  readonly: true
16727 }, {
16728  name: "alignCursors",
16729  exec: function(editor) { editor.alignCursors(); },
16730  bindKey: {win: "Ctrl-Alt-A", mac: "Ctrl-Alt-A"},
16731  scrollIntoView: "cursor"
16732 }, {
16733  name: "findAll",
16734  exec: function(editor) { editor.findAll(); },
16735  bindKey: {win: "Ctrl-Alt-K", mac: "Ctrl-Alt-G"},
16736  scrollIntoView: "cursor",
16737  readonly: true
16738 }];
16739 exports.multiSelectCommands = [{
16740  name: "singleSelection",
16741  bindKey: "esc",
16742  exec: function(editor) { editor.exitMultiSelectMode(); },
16743  scrollIntoView: "cursor",
16744  readonly: true,
16745  isAvailable: function(editor) {return editor && editor.inMultiSelectMode}
16746 }];
16747 
16748 var HashHandler = require("../keyboard/hash_handler").HashHandler;
16749 exports.keyboardHandler = new HashHandler(exports.multiSelectCommands);
16750 
16751 });
16752 
16753 define("ace/multi_select",["require","exports","module","ace/range_list","ace/range","ace/selection","ace/mouse/multi_select_handler","ace/lib/event","ace/lib/lang","ace/commands/multi_select_commands","ace/search","ace/edit_session","ace/editor","ace/config"], function(require, exports, module) {
16754 
16755 var RangeList = require("./range_list").RangeList;
16756 var Range = require("./range").Range;
16757 var Selection = require("./selection").Selection;
16758 var onMouseDown = require("./mouse/multi_select_handler").onMouseDown;
16759 var event = require("./lib/event");
16760 var lang = require("./lib/lang");
16761 var commands = require("./commands/multi_select_commands");
16762 exports.commands = commands.defaultCommands.concat(commands.multiSelectCommands);
16763 var Search = require("./search").Search;
16764 var search = new Search();
16765 
16766 function find(session, needle, dir) {
16767  search.$options.wrap = true;
16768  search.$options.needle = needle;
16769  search.$options.backwards = dir == -1;
16770  return search.find(session);
16771 }
16772 var EditSession = require("./edit_session").EditSession;
16773 (function() {
16774  this.getSelectionMarkers = function() {
16775  return this.$selectionMarkers;
16776  };
16777 }).call(EditSession.prototype);
16778 (function() {
16779  this.ranges = null;
16780  this.rangeList = null;
16781  this.addRange = function(range, $blockChangeEvents) {
16782  if (!range)
16783  return;
16784 
16785  if (!this.inMultiSelectMode && this.rangeCount === 0) {
16786  var oldRange = this.toOrientedRange();
16787  this.rangeList.add(oldRange);
16788  this.rangeList.add(range);
16789  if (this.rangeList.ranges.length != 2) {
16790  this.rangeList.removeAll();
16791  return $blockChangeEvents || this.fromOrientedRange(range);
16792  }
16793  this.rangeList.removeAll();
16794  this.rangeList.add(oldRange);
16795  this.$onAddRange(oldRange);
16796  }
16797 
16798  if (!range.cursor)
16799  range.cursor = range.end;
16800 
16801  var removed = this.rangeList.add(range);
16802 
16803  this.$onAddRange(range);
16804 
16805  if (removed.length)
16806  this.$onRemoveRange(removed);
16807 
16808  if (this.rangeCount > 1 && !this.inMultiSelectMode) {
16809  this._signal("multiSelect");
16810  this.inMultiSelectMode = true;
16811  this.session.$undoSelect = false;
16812  this.rangeList.attach(this.session);
16813  }
16814 
16815  return $blockChangeEvents || this.fromOrientedRange(range);
16816  };
16817 
16818  this.toSingleRange = function(range) {
16819  range = range || this.ranges[0];
16820  var removed = this.rangeList.removeAll();
16821  if (removed.length)
16822  this.$onRemoveRange(removed);
16823 
16824  range && this.fromOrientedRange(range);
16825  };
16826  this.substractPoint = function(pos) {
16827  var removed = this.rangeList.substractPoint(pos);
16828  if (removed) {
16829  this.$onRemoveRange(removed);
16830  return removed[0];
16831  }
16832  };
16833  this.mergeOverlappingRanges = function() {
16834  var removed = this.rangeList.merge();
16835  if (removed.length)
16836  this.$onRemoveRange(removed);
16837  else if(this.ranges[0])
16838  this.fromOrientedRange(this.ranges[0]);
16839  };
16840 
16841  this.$onAddRange = function(range) {
16842  this.rangeCount = this.rangeList.ranges.length;
16843  this.ranges.unshift(range);
16844  this._signal("addRange", {range: range});
16845  };
16846 
16847  this.$onRemoveRange = function(removed) {
16848  this.rangeCount = this.rangeList.ranges.length;
16849  if (this.rangeCount == 1 && this.inMultiSelectMode) {
16850  var lastRange = this.rangeList.ranges.pop();
16851  removed.push(lastRange);
16852  this.rangeCount = 0;
16853  }
16854 
16855  for (var i = removed.length; i--; ) {
16856  var index = this.ranges.indexOf(removed[i]);
16857  this.ranges.splice(index, 1);
16858  }
16859 
16860  this._signal("removeRange", {ranges: removed});
16861 
16862  if (this.rangeCount === 0 && this.inMultiSelectMode) {
16863  this.inMultiSelectMode = false;
16864  this._signal("singleSelect");
16865  this.session.$undoSelect = true;
16866  this.rangeList.detach(this.session);
16867  }
16868 
16869  lastRange = lastRange || this.ranges[0];
16870  if (lastRange && !lastRange.isEqual(this.getRange()))
16871  this.fromOrientedRange(lastRange);
16872  };
16873  this.$initRangeList = function() {
16874  if (this.rangeList)
16875  return;
16876 
16877  this.rangeList = new RangeList();
16878  this.ranges = [];
16879  this.rangeCount = 0;
16880  };
16881  this.getAllRanges = function() {
16882  return this.rangeCount ? this.rangeList.ranges.concat() : [this.getRange()];
16883  };
16884 
16885  this.splitIntoLines = function () {
16886  if (this.rangeCount > 1) {
16887  var ranges = this.rangeList.ranges;
16888  var lastRange = ranges[ranges.length - 1];
16889  var range = Range.fromPoints(ranges[0].start, lastRange.end);
16890 
16891  this.toSingleRange();
16892  this.setSelectionRange(range, lastRange.cursor == lastRange.start);
16893  } else {
16894  var range = this.getRange();
16895  var isBackwards = this.isBackwards();
16896  var startRow = range.start.row;
16897  var endRow = range.end.row;
16898  if (startRow == endRow) {
16899  if (isBackwards)
16900  var start = range.end, end = range.start;
16901  else
16902  var start = range.start, end = range.end;
16903 
16904  this.addRange(Range.fromPoints(end, end));
16905  this.addRange(Range.fromPoints(start, start));
16906  return;
16907  }
16908 
16909  var rectSel = [];
16910  var r = this.getLineRange(startRow, true);
16911  r.start.column = range.start.column;
16912  rectSel.push(r);
16913 
16914  for (var i = startRow + 1; i < endRow; i++)
16915  rectSel.push(this.getLineRange(i, true));
16916 
16917  r = this.getLineRange(endRow, true);
16918  r.end.column = range.end.column;
16919  rectSel.push(r);
16920 
16921  rectSel.forEach(this.addRange, this);
16922  }
16923  };
16924  this.toggleBlockSelection = function () {
16925  if (this.rangeCount > 1) {
16926  var ranges = this.rangeList.ranges;
16927  var lastRange = ranges[ranges.length - 1];
16928  var range = Range.fromPoints(ranges[0].start, lastRange.end);
16929 
16930  this.toSingleRange();
16931  this.setSelectionRange(range, lastRange.cursor == lastRange.start);
16932  } else {
16933  var cursor = this.session.documentToScreenPosition(this.selectionLead);
16934  var anchor = this.session.documentToScreenPosition(this.selectionAnchor);
16935 
16936  var rectSel = this.rectangularRangeBlock(cursor, anchor);
16937  rectSel.forEach(this.addRange, this);
16938  }
16939  };
16940  this.rectangularRangeBlock = function(screenCursor, screenAnchor, includeEmptyLines) {
16941  var rectSel = [];
16942 
16943  var xBackwards = screenCursor.column < screenAnchor.column;
16944  if (xBackwards) {
16945  var startColumn = screenCursor.column;
16946  var endColumn = screenAnchor.column;
16947  } else {
16948  var startColumn = screenAnchor.column;
16949  var endColumn = screenCursor.column;
16950  }
16951 
16952  var yBackwards = screenCursor.row < screenAnchor.row;
16953  if (yBackwards) {
16954  var startRow = screenCursor.row;
16955  var endRow = screenAnchor.row;
16956  } else {
16957  var startRow = screenAnchor.row;
16958  var endRow = screenCursor.row;
16959  }
16960 
16961  if (startColumn < 0)
16962  startColumn = 0;
16963  if (startRow < 0)
16964  startRow = 0;
16965 
16966  if (startRow == endRow)
16967  includeEmptyLines = true;
16968 
16969  for (var row = startRow; row <= endRow; row++) {
16970  var range = Range.fromPoints(
16971  this.session.screenToDocumentPosition(row, startColumn),
16972  this.session.screenToDocumentPosition(row, endColumn)
16973  );
16974  if (range.isEmpty()) {
16975  if (docEnd && isSamePoint(range.end, docEnd))
16976  break;
16977  var docEnd = range.end;
16978  }
16979  range.cursor = xBackwards ? range.start : range.end;
16980  rectSel.push(range);
16981  }
16982 
16983  if (yBackwards)
16984  rectSel.reverse();
16985 
16986  if (!includeEmptyLines) {
16987  var end = rectSel.length - 1;
16988  while (rectSel[end].isEmpty() && end > 0)
16989  end--;
16990  if (end > 0) {
16991  var start = 0;
16992  while (rectSel[start].isEmpty())
16993  start++;
16994  }
16995  for (var i = end; i >= start; i--) {
16996  if (rectSel[i].isEmpty())
16997  rectSel.splice(i, 1);
16998  }
16999  }
17000 
17001  return rectSel;
17002  };
17003 }).call(Selection.prototype);
17004 var Editor = require("./editor").Editor;
17005 (function() {
17006  this.updateSelectionMarkers = function() {
17007  this.renderer.updateCursor();
17008  this.renderer.updateBackMarkers();
17009  };
17010  this.addSelectionMarker = function(orientedRange) {
17011  if (!orientedRange.cursor)
17012  orientedRange.cursor = orientedRange.end;
17013 
17014  var style = this.getSelectionStyle();
17015  orientedRange.marker = this.session.addMarker(orientedRange, "ace_selection", style);
17016 
17017  this.session.$selectionMarkers.push(orientedRange);
17018  this.session.selectionMarkerCount = this.session.$selectionMarkers.length;
17019  return orientedRange;
17020  };
17021  this.removeSelectionMarker = function(range) {
17022  if (!range.marker)
17023  return;
17024  this.session.removeMarker(range.marker);
17025  var index = this.session.$selectionMarkers.indexOf(range);
17026  if (index != -1)
17027  this.session.$selectionMarkers.splice(index, 1);
17028  this.session.selectionMarkerCount = this.session.$selectionMarkers.length;
17029  };
17030 
17031  this.removeSelectionMarkers = function(ranges) {
17032  var markerList = this.session.$selectionMarkers;
17033  for (var i = ranges.length; i--; ) {
17034  var range = ranges[i];
17035  if (!range.marker)
17036  continue;
17037  this.session.removeMarker(range.marker);
17038  var index = markerList.indexOf(range);
17039  if (index != -1)
17040  markerList.splice(index, 1);
17041  }
17042  this.session.selectionMarkerCount = markerList.length;
17043  };
17044 
17045  this.$onAddRange = function(e) {
17046  this.addSelectionMarker(e.range);
17047  this.renderer.updateCursor();
17048  this.renderer.updateBackMarkers();
17049  };
17050 
17051  this.$onRemoveRange = function(e) {
17052  this.removeSelectionMarkers(e.ranges);
17053  this.renderer.updateCursor();
17054  this.renderer.updateBackMarkers();
17055  };
17056 
17057  this.$onMultiSelect = function(e) {
17058  if (this.inMultiSelectMode)
17059  return;
17060  this.inMultiSelectMode = true;
17061 
17062  this.setStyle("ace_multiselect");
17063  this.keyBinding.addKeyboardHandler(commands.keyboardHandler);
17064  this.commands.setDefaultHandler("exec", this.$onMultiSelectExec);
17065 
17066  this.renderer.updateCursor();
17067  this.renderer.updateBackMarkers();
17068  };
17069 
17070  this.$onSingleSelect = function(e) {
17071  if (this.session.multiSelect.inVirtualMode)
17072  return;
17073  this.inMultiSelectMode = false;
17074 
17075  this.unsetStyle("ace_multiselect");
17076  this.keyBinding.removeKeyboardHandler(commands.keyboardHandler);
17077 
17078  this.commands.removeDefaultHandler("exec", this.$onMultiSelectExec);
17079  this.renderer.updateCursor();
17080  this.renderer.updateBackMarkers();
17081  this._emit("changeSelection");
17082  };
17083 
17084  this.$onMultiSelectExec = function(e) {
17085  var command = e.command;
17086  var editor = e.editor;
17087  if (!editor.multiSelect)
17088  return;
17089  if (!command.multiSelectAction) {
17090  var result = command.exec(editor, e.args || {});
17091  editor.multiSelect.addRange(editor.multiSelect.toOrientedRange());
17092  editor.multiSelect.mergeOverlappingRanges();
17093  } else if (command.multiSelectAction == "forEach") {
17094  result = editor.forEachSelection(command, e.args);
17095  } else if (command.multiSelectAction == "forEachLine") {
17096  result = editor.forEachSelection(command, e.args, true);
17097  } else if (command.multiSelectAction == "single") {
17098  editor.exitMultiSelectMode();
17099  result = command.exec(editor, e.args || {});
17100  } else {
17101  result = command.multiSelectAction(editor, e.args || {});
17102  }
17103  return result;
17104  };
17105  this.forEachSelection = function(cmd, args, options) {
17106  if (this.inVirtualSelectionMode)
17107  return;
17108  var keepOrder = options && options.keepOrder;
17109  var $byLines = options == true || options && options.$byLines
17110  var session = this.session;
17111  var selection = this.selection;
17112  var rangeList = selection.rangeList;
17113  var ranges = (keepOrder ? selection : rangeList).ranges;
17114  var result;
17115 
17116  if (!ranges.length)
17117  return cmd.exec ? cmd.exec(this, args || {}) : cmd(this, args || {});
17118 
17119  var reg = selection._eventRegistry;
17120  selection._eventRegistry = {};
17121 
17122  var tmpSel = new Selection(session);
17123  this.inVirtualSelectionMode = true;
17124  for (var i = ranges.length; i--;) {
17125  if ($byLines) {
17126  while (i > 0 && ranges[i].start.row == ranges[i - 1].end.row)
17127  i--;
17128  }
17129  tmpSel.fromOrientedRange(ranges[i]);
17130  tmpSel.index = i;
17131  this.selection = session.selection = tmpSel;
17132  var cmdResult = cmd.exec ? cmd.exec(this, args || {}) : cmd(this, args || {});
17133  if (!result && cmdResult !== undefined)
17134  result = cmdResult;
17135  tmpSel.toOrientedRange(ranges[i]);
17136  }
17137  tmpSel.detach();
17138 
17139  this.selection = session.selection = selection;
17140  this.inVirtualSelectionMode = false;
17141  selection._eventRegistry = reg;
17142  selection.mergeOverlappingRanges();
17143 
17144  var anim = this.renderer.$scrollAnimation;
17145  this.onCursorChange();
17146  this.onSelectionChange();
17147  if (anim && anim.from == anim.to)
17148  this.renderer.animateScrolling(anim.from);
17149 
17150  return result;
17151  };
17152  this.exitMultiSelectMode = function() {
17153  if (!this.inMultiSelectMode || this.inVirtualSelectionMode)
17154  return;
17155  this.multiSelect.toSingleRange();
17156  };
17157 
17158  this.getSelectedText = function() {
17159  var text = "";
17160  if (this.inMultiSelectMode && !this.inVirtualSelectionMode) {
17161  var ranges = this.multiSelect.rangeList.ranges;
17162  var buf = [];
17163  for (var i = 0; i < ranges.length; i++) {
17164  buf.push(this.session.getTextRange(ranges[i]));
17165  }
17166  var nl = this.session.getDocument().getNewLineCharacter();
17167  text = buf.join(nl);
17168  if (text.length == (buf.length - 1) * nl.length)
17169  text = "";
17170  } else if (!this.selection.isEmpty()) {
17171  text = this.session.getTextRange(this.getSelectionRange());
17172  }
17173  return text;
17174  };
17175 
17176  this.$checkMultiselectChange = function(e, anchor) {
17177  if (this.inMultiSelectMode && !this.inVirtualSelectionMode) {
17178  var range = this.multiSelect.ranges[0];
17179  if (this.multiSelect.isEmpty() && anchor == this.multiSelect.anchor)
17180  return;
17181  var pos = anchor == this.multiSelect.anchor
17182  ? range.cursor == range.start ? range.end : range.start
17183  : range.cursor;
17184  if (pos.row != anchor.row
17185  || this.session.$clipPositionToDocument(pos.row, pos.column).column != anchor.column)
17186  this.multiSelect.toSingleRange(this.multiSelect.toOrientedRange());
17187  }
17188  };
17189  this.findAll = function(needle, options, additive) {
17190  options = options || {};
17191  options.needle = needle || options.needle;
17192  if (options.needle == undefined) {
17193  var range = this.selection.isEmpty()
17194  ? this.selection.getWordRange()
17195  : this.selection.getRange();
17196  options.needle = this.session.getTextRange(range);
17197  }
17198  this.$search.set(options);
17199 
17200  var ranges = this.$search.findAll(this.session);
17201  if (!ranges.length)
17202  return 0;
17203 
17204  this.$blockScrolling += 1;
17205  var selection = this.multiSelect;
17206 
17207  if (!additive)
17208  selection.toSingleRange(ranges[0]);
17209 
17210  for (var i = ranges.length; i--; )
17211  selection.addRange(ranges[i], true);
17212  if (range && selection.rangeList.rangeAtPoint(range.start))
17213  selection.addRange(range, true);
17214 
17215  this.$blockScrolling -= 1;
17216 
17217  return ranges.length;
17218  };
17219  this.selectMoreLines = function(dir, skip) {
17220  var range = this.selection.toOrientedRange();
17221  var isBackwards = range.cursor == range.end;
17222 
17223  var screenLead = this.session.documentToScreenPosition(range.cursor);
17224  if (this.selection.$desiredColumn)
17225  screenLead.column = this.selection.$desiredColumn;
17226 
17227  var lead = this.session.screenToDocumentPosition(screenLead.row + dir, screenLead.column);
17228 
17229  if (!range.isEmpty()) {
17230  var screenAnchor = this.session.documentToScreenPosition(isBackwards ? range.end : range.start);
17231  var anchor = this.session.screenToDocumentPosition(screenAnchor.row + dir, screenAnchor.column);
17232  } else {
17233  var anchor = lead;
17234  }
17235 
17236  if (isBackwards) {
17237  var newRange = Range.fromPoints(lead, anchor);
17238  newRange.cursor = newRange.start;
17239  } else {
17240  var newRange = Range.fromPoints(anchor, lead);
17241  newRange.cursor = newRange.end;
17242  }
17243 
17244  newRange.desiredColumn = screenLead.column;
17245  if (!this.selection.inMultiSelectMode) {
17246  this.selection.addRange(range);
17247  } else {
17248  if (skip)
17249  var toRemove = range.cursor;
17250  }
17251 
17252  this.selection.addRange(newRange);
17253  if (toRemove)
17254  this.selection.substractPoint(toRemove);
17255  };
17256  this.transposeSelections = function(dir) {
17257  var session = this.session;
17258  var sel = session.multiSelect;
17259  var all = sel.ranges;
17260 
17261  for (var i = all.length; i--; ) {
17262  var range = all[i];
17263  if (range.isEmpty()) {
17264  var tmp = session.getWordRange(range.start.row, range.start.column);
17265  range.start.row = tmp.start.row;
17266  range.start.column = tmp.start.column;
17267  range.end.row = tmp.end.row;
17268  range.end.column = tmp.end.column;
17269  }
17270  }
17271  sel.mergeOverlappingRanges();
17272 
17273  var words = [];
17274  for (var i = all.length; i--; ) {
17275  var range = all[i];
17276  words.unshift(session.getTextRange(range));
17277  }
17278 
17279  if (dir < 0)
17280  words.unshift(words.pop());
17281  else
17282  words.push(words.shift());
17283 
17284  for (var i = all.length; i--; ) {
17285  var range = all[i];
17286  var tmp = range.clone();
17287  session.replace(range, words[i]);
17288  range.start.row = tmp.start.row;
17289  range.start.column = tmp.start.column;
17290  }
17291  };
17292  this.selectMore = function(dir, skip, stopAtFirst) {
17293  var session = this.session;
17294  var sel = session.multiSelect;
17295 
17296  var range = sel.toOrientedRange();
17297  if (range.isEmpty()) {
17298  range = session.getWordRange(range.start.row, range.start.column);
17299  range.cursor = dir == -1 ? range.start : range.end;
17300  this.multiSelect.addRange(range);
17301  if (stopAtFirst)
17302  return;
17303  }
17304  var needle = session.getTextRange(range);
17305 
17306  var newRange = find(session, needle, dir);
17307  if (newRange) {
17308  newRange.cursor = dir == -1 ? newRange.start : newRange.end;
17309  this.$blockScrolling += 1;
17310  this.session.unfold(newRange);
17311  this.multiSelect.addRange(newRange);
17312  this.$blockScrolling -= 1;
17313  this.renderer.scrollCursorIntoView(null, 0.5);
17314  }
17315  if (skip)
17316  this.multiSelect.substractPoint(range.cursor);
17317  };
17318  this.alignCursors = function() {
17319  var session = this.session;
17320  var sel = session.multiSelect;
17321  var ranges = sel.ranges;
17322  var row = -1;
17323  var sameRowRanges = ranges.filter(function(r) {
17324  if (r.cursor.row == row)
17325  return true;
17326  row = r.cursor.row;
17327  });
17328 
17329  if (!ranges.length || sameRowRanges.length == ranges.length - 1) {
17330  var range = this.selection.getRange();
17331  var fr = range.start.row, lr = range.end.row;
17332  var guessRange = fr == lr;
17333  if (guessRange) {
17334  var max = this.session.getLength();
17335  var line;
17336  do {
17337  line = this.session.getLine(lr);
17338  } while (/[=:]/.test(line) && ++lr < max);
17339  do {
17340  line = this.session.getLine(fr);
17341  } while (/[=:]/.test(line) && --fr > 0);
17342 
17343  if (fr < 0) fr = 0;
17344  if (lr >= max) lr = max - 1;
17345  }
17346  var lines = this.session.doc.removeLines(fr, lr);
17347  lines = this.$reAlignText(lines, guessRange);
17348  this.session.doc.insert({row: fr, column: 0}, lines.join("\n") + "\n");
17349  if (!guessRange) {
17350  range.start.column = 0;
17351  range.end.column = lines[lines.length - 1].length;
17352  }
17353  this.selection.setRange(range);
17354  } else {
17355  sameRowRanges.forEach(function(r) {
17356  sel.substractPoint(r.cursor);
17357  });
17358 
17359  var maxCol = 0;
17360  var minSpace = Infinity;
17361  var spaceOffsets = ranges.map(function(r) {
17362  var p = r.cursor;
17363  var line = session.getLine(p.row);
17364  var spaceOffset = line.substr(p.column).search(/\S/g);
17365  if (spaceOffset == -1)
17366  spaceOffset = 0;
17367 
17368  if (p.column > maxCol)
17369  maxCol = p.column;
17370  if (spaceOffset < minSpace)
17371  minSpace = spaceOffset;
17372  return spaceOffset;
17373  });
17374  ranges.forEach(function(r, i) {
17375  var p = r.cursor;
17376  var l = maxCol - p.column;
17377  var d = spaceOffsets[i] - minSpace;
17378  if (l > d)
17379  session.insert(p, lang.stringRepeat(" ", l - d));
17380  else
17381  session.remove(new Range(p.row, p.column, p.row, p.column - l + d));
17382 
17383  r.start.column = r.end.column = maxCol;
17384  r.start.row = r.end.row = p.row;
17385  r.cursor = r.end;
17386  });
17387  sel.fromOrientedRange(ranges[0]);
17388  this.renderer.updateCursor();
17389  this.renderer.updateBackMarkers();
17390  }
17391  };
17392 
17393  this.$reAlignText = function(lines, forceLeft) {
17394  var isLeftAligned = true, isRightAligned = true;
17395  var startW, textW, endW;
17396 
17397  return lines.map(function(line) {
17398  var m = line.match(/(\s*)(.*?)(\s*)([=:].*)/);
17399  if (!m)
17400  return [line];
17401 
17402  if (startW == null) {
17403  startW = m[1].length;
17404  textW = m[2].length;
17405  endW = m[3].length;
17406  return m;
17407  }
17408 
17409  if (startW + textW + endW != m[1].length + m[2].length + m[3].length)
17410  isRightAligned = false;
17411  if (startW != m[1].length)
17412  isLeftAligned = false;
17413 
17414  if (startW > m[1].length)
17415  startW = m[1].length;
17416  if (textW < m[2].length)
17417  textW = m[2].length;
17418  if (endW > m[3].length)
17419  endW = m[3].length;
17420 
17421  return m;
17422  }).map(forceLeft ? alignLeft :
17423  isLeftAligned ? isRightAligned ? alignRight : alignLeft : unAlign);
17424 
17425  function spaces(n) {
17426  return lang.stringRepeat(" ", n);
17427  }
17428 
17429  function alignLeft(m) {
17430  return !m[2] ? m[0] : spaces(startW) + m[2]
17431  + spaces(textW - m[2].length + endW)
17432  + m[4].replace(/^([=:])\s+/, "$1 ");
17433  }
17434  function alignRight(m) {
17435  return !m[2] ? m[0] : spaces(startW + textW - m[2].length) + m[2]
17436  + spaces(endW, " ")
17437  + m[4].replace(/^([=:])\s+/, "$1 ");
17438  }
17439  function unAlign(m) {
17440  return !m[2] ? m[0] : spaces(startW) + m[2]
17441  + spaces(endW)
17442  + m[4].replace(/^([=:])\s+/, "$1 ");
17443  }
17444  };
17445 }).call(Editor.prototype);
17446 
17447 
17448 function isSamePoint(p1, p2) {
17449  return p1.row == p2.row && p1.column == p2.column;
17450 }
17451 exports.onSessionChange = function(e) {
17452  var session = e.session;
17453  if (session && !session.multiSelect) {
17454  session.$selectionMarkers = [];
17455  session.selection.$initRangeList();
17456  session.multiSelect = session.selection;
17457  }
17458  this.multiSelect = session && session.multiSelect;
17459 
17460  var oldSession = e.oldSession;
17461  if (oldSession) {
17462  oldSession.multiSelect.off("addRange", this.$onAddRange);
17463  oldSession.multiSelect.off("removeRange", this.$onRemoveRange);
17464  oldSession.multiSelect.off("multiSelect", this.$onMultiSelect);
17465  oldSession.multiSelect.off("singleSelect", this.$onSingleSelect);
17466  oldSession.multiSelect.lead.off("change", this.$checkMultiselectChange);
17467  oldSession.multiSelect.anchor.off("change", this.$checkMultiselectChange);
17468  }
17469 
17470  if (session) {
17471  session.multiSelect.on("addRange", this.$onAddRange);
17472  session.multiSelect.on("removeRange", this.$onRemoveRange);
17473  session.multiSelect.on("multiSelect", this.$onMultiSelect);
17474  session.multiSelect.on("singleSelect", this.$onSingleSelect);
17475  session.multiSelect.lead.on("change", this.$checkMultiselectChange);
17476  session.multiSelect.anchor.on("change", this.$checkMultiselectChange);
17477  }
17478 
17479  if (session && this.inMultiSelectMode != session.selection.inMultiSelectMode) {
17480  if (session.selection.inMultiSelectMode)
17481  this.$onMultiSelect();
17482  else
17483  this.$onSingleSelect();
17484  }
17485 };
17486 function MultiSelect(editor) {
17487  if (editor.$multiselectOnSessionChange)
17488  return;
17489  editor.$onAddRange = editor.$onAddRange.bind(editor);
17490  editor.$onRemoveRange = editor.$onRemoveRange.bind(editor);
17491  editor.$onMultiSelect = editor.$onMultiSelect.bind(editor);
17492  editor.$onSingleSelect = editor.$onSingleSelect.bind(editor);
17493  editor.$multiselectOnSessionChange = exports.onSessionChange.bind(editor);
17494  editor.$checkMultiselectChange = editor.$checkMultiselectChange.bind(editor);
17495 
17496  editor.$multiselectOnSessionChange(editor);
17497  editor.on("changeSession", editor.$multiselectOnSessionChange);
17498 
17499  editor.on("mousedown", onMouseDown);
17500  editor.commands.addCommands(commands.defaultCommands);
17501 
17502  addAltCursorListeners(editor);
17503 }
17504 
17505 function addAltCursorListeners(editor){
17506  var el = editor.textInput.getElement();
17507  var altCursor = false;
17508  event.addListener(el, "keydown", function(e) {
17509  if (e.keyCode == 18 && !(e.ctrlKey || e.shiftKey || e.metaKey)) {
17510  if (!altCursor) {
17511  editor.renderer.setMouseCursor("crosshair");
17512  altCursor = true;
17513  }
17514  } else if (altCursor) {
17515  reset();
17516  }
17517  });
17518 
17519  event.addListener(el, "keyup", reset);
17520  event.addListener(el, "blur", reset);
17521  function reset(e) {
17522  if (altCursor) {
17523  editor.renderer.setMouseCursor("");
17524  altCursor = false;
17525  }
17526  }
17527 }
17528 
17529 exports.MultiSelect = MultiSelect;
17530 
17531 
17532 require("./config").defineOptions(Editor.prototype, "editor", {
17533  enableMultiselect: {
17534  set: function(val) {
17535  MultiSelect(this);
17536  if (val) {
17537  this.on("changeSession", this.$multiselectOnSessionChange);
17538  this.on("mousedown", onMouseDown);
17539  } else {
17540  this.off("changeSession", this.$multiselectOnSessionChange);
17541  this.off("mousedown", onMouseDown);
17542  }
17543  },
17544  value: true
17545  }
17546 });
17547 
17548 
17549 
17550 });
17551 
17552 define("ace/mode/folding/fold_mode",["require","exports","module","ace/range"], function(require, exports, module) {
17553 "use strict";
17554 
17555 var Range = require("../../range").Range;
17556 
17557 var FoldMode = exports.FoldMode = function() {};
17558 
17559 (function() {
17560 
17561  this.foldingStartMarker = null;
17562  this.foldingStopMarker = null;
17563  this.getFoldWidget = function(session, foldStyle, row) {
17564  var line = session.getLine(row);
17565  if (this.foldingStartMarker.test(line))
17566  return "start";
17567  if (foldStyle == "markbeginend"
17568  && this.foldingStopMarker
17569  && this.foldingStopMarker.test(line))
17570  return "end";
17571  return "";
17572  };
17573 
17574  this.getFoldWidgetRange = function(session, foldStyle, row) {
17575  return null;
17576  };
17577 
17578  this.indentationBlock = function(session, row, column) {
17579  var re = /\S/;
17580  var line = session.getLine(row);
17581  var startLevel = line.search(re);
17582  if (startLevel == -1)
17583  return;
17584 
17585  var startColumn = column || line.length;
17586  var maxRow = session.getLength();
17587  var startRow = row;
17588  var endRow = row;
17589 
17590  while (++row < maxRow) {
17591  var level = session.getLine(row).search(re);
17592 
17593  if (level == -1)
17594  continue;
17595 
17596  if (level <= startLevel)
17597  break;
17598 
17599  endRow = row;
17600  }
17601 
17602  if (endRow > startRow) {
17603  var endColumn = session.getLine(endRow).length;
17604  return new Range(startRow, startColumn, endRow, endColumn);
17605  }
17606  };
17607 
17608  this.openingBracketBlock = function(session, bracket, row, column, typeRe) {
17609  var start = {row: row, column: column + 1};
17610  var end = session.$findClosingBracket(bracket, start, typeRe);
17611  if (!end)
17612  return;
17613 
17614  var fw = session.foldWidgets[end.row];
17615  if (fw == null)
17616  fw = session.getFoldWidget(end.row);
17617 
17618  if (fw == "start" && end.row > start.row) {
17619  end.row --;
17620  end.column = session.getLine(end.row).length;
17621  }
17622  return Range.fromPoints(start, end);
17623  };
17624 
17625  this.closingBracketBlock = function(session, bracket, row, column, typeRe) {
17626  var end = {row: row, column: column};
17627  var start = session.$findOpeningBracket(bracket, end);
17628 
17629  if (!start)
17630  return;
17631 
17632  start.column++;
17633  end.column--;
17634 
17635  return Range.fromPoints(start, end);
17636  };
17637 }).call(FoldMode.prototype);
17638 
17639 });
17640 
17641 define("ace/theme/textmate",["require","exports","module","ace/lib/dom"], function(require, exports, module) {
17642 "use strict";

17771 
17772 define("ace/line_widgets",["require","exports","module","ace/lib/oop","ace/lib/dom","ace/range"], function(require, exports, module) {
17773 "use strict";
17774 
17775 var oop = require("./lib/oop");
17776 var dom = require("./lib/dom");
17777 var Range = require("./range").Range;
17778 
17779 
17780 function LineWidgets(session) {
17781  this.session = session;
17782  this.session.widgetManager = this;
17783  this.session.getRowLength = this.getRowLength;
17784  this.session.$getWidgetScreenLength = this.$getWidgetScreenLength;
17785  this.updateOnChange = this.updateOnChange.bind(this);
17786  this.renderWidgets = this.renderWidgets.bind(this);
17787  this.measureWidgets = this.measureWidgets.bind(this);
17788  this.session._changedWidgets = [];
17789  this.$onChangeEditor = this.$onChangeEditor.bind(this);
17790 
17791  this.session.on("change", this.updateOnChange);
17792  this.session.on("changeEditor", this.$onChangeEditor);
17793 }
17794 
17795 (function() {
17796  this.getRowLength = function(row) {
17797  var h;
17798  if (this.lineWidgets)
17799  h = this.lineWidgets[row] && this.lineWidgets[row].rowCount || 0;
17800  else
17801  h = 0;
17802  if (!this.$useWrapMode || !this.$wrapData[row]) {
17803  return 1 + h;
17804  } else {
17805  return this.$wrapData[row].length + 1 + h;
17806  }
17807  };
17808 
17809  this.$getWidgetScreenLength = function() {
17810  var screenRows = 0;
17811  this.lineWidgets.forEach(function(w){
17812  if (w && w.rowCount)
17813  screenRows +=w.rowCount;
17814  });
17815  return screenRows;
17816  };
17817 
17818  this.$onChangeEditor = function(e) {
17819  this.attach(e.editor);
17820  };
17821 
17822  this.attach = function(editor) {
17823  if (editor && editor.widgetManager && editor.widgetManager != this)
17824  editor.widgetManager.detach();
17825 
17826  if (this.editor == editor)
17827  return;
17828 
17829  this.detach();
17830  this.editor = editor;
17831 
17832  if (editor) {
17833  editor.widgetManager = this;
17834  editor.renderer.on("beforeRender", this.measureWidgets);
17835  editor.renderer.on("afterRender", this.renderWidgets);
17836  }
17837  };
17838  this.detach = function(e) {
17839  var editor = this.editor;
17840  if (!editor)
17841  return;
17842 
17843  this.editor = null;
17844  editor.widgetManager = null;
17845 
17846  editor.renderer.off("beforeRender", this.measureWidgets);
17847  editor.renderer.off("afterRender", this.renderWidgets);
17848  var lineWidgets = this.session.lineWidgets;
17849  lineWidgets && lineWidgets.forEach(function(w) {
17850  if (w && w.el && w.el.parentNode) {
17851  w._inDocument = false;
17852  w.el.parentNode.removeChild(w.el);
17853  }
17854  });
17855  };
17856 
17857  this.updateOnChange = function(e) {
17858  var lineWidgets = this.session.lineWidgets;
17859  if (!lineWidgets) return;
17860 
17861  var delta = e.data;
17862  var range = delta.range;
17863  var startRow = range.start.row;
17864  var len = range.end.row - startRow;
17865 
17866  if (len === 0) {
17867  } else if (delta.action == "removeText" || delta.action == "removeLines") {
17868  var removed = lineWidgets.splice(startRow + 1, len);
17869  removed.forEach(function(w) {
17870  w && this.removeLineWidget(w);
17871  }, this);
17872  this.$updateRows();
17873  } else {
17874  var args = new Array(len);
17875  args.unshift(startRow, 0);
17876  lineWidgets.splice.apply(lineWidgets, args);
17877  this.$updateRows();
17878  }
17879  };
17880 
17881  this.$updateRows = function() {
17882  var lineWidgets = this.session.lineWidgets;
17883  if (!lineWidgets) return;
17884  var noWidgets = true;
17885  lineWidgets.forEach(function(w, i) {
17886  if (w) {
17887  noWidgets = false;
17888  w.row = i;
17889  }
17890  });
17891  if (noWidgets)
17892  this.session.lineWidgets = null;
17893  };
17894 
17895  this.addLineWidget = function(w) {
17896  if (!this.session.lineWidgets)
17897  this.session.lineWidgets = new Array(this.session.getLength());
17898 
17899  this.session.lineWidgets[w.row] = w;
17900 
17901  var renderer = this.editor.renderer;
17902  if (w.html && !w.el) {
17903  w.el = dom.createElement("div");
17904  w.el.innerHTML = w.html;
17905  }
17906  if (w.el) {
17907  dom.addCssClass(w.el, "ace_lineWidgetContainer");
17908  w.el.style.position = "absolute";
17909  w.el.style.zIndex = 5;
17910  renderer.container.appendChild(w.el);
17911  w._inDocument = true;
17912  }
17913 
17914  if (!w.coverGutter) {
17915  w.el.style.zIndex = 3;
17916  }
17917  if (!w.pixelHeight) {
17918  w.pixelHeight = w.el.offsetHeight;
17919  }
17920  if (w.rowCount == null)
17921  w.rowCount = w.pixelHeight / renderer.layerConfig.lineHeight;
17922 
17923  this.session._emit("changeFold", {data:{start:{row: w.row}}});
17924 
17925  this.$updateRows();
17926  this.renderWidgets(null, renderer);
17927  return w;
17928  };
17929 
17930  this.removeLineWidget = function(w) {
17931  w._inDocument = false;
17932  if (w.el && w.el.parentNode)
17933  w.el.parentNode.removeChild(w.el);
17934  if (w.editor && w.editor.destroy) try {
17935  w.editor.destroy();
17936  } catch(e){}
17937  if (this.session.lineWidgets)
17938  this.session.lineWidgets[w.row] = undefined;
17939  this.session._emit("changeFold", {data:{start:{row: w.row}}});
17940  this.$updateRows();
17941  };
17942 
17943  this.onWidgetChanged = function(w) {
17944  this.session._changedWidgets.push(w);
17945  this.editor && this.editor.renderer.updateFull();
17946  };
17947 
17948  this.measureWidgets = function(e, renderer) {
17949  var changedWidgets = this.session._changedWidgets;
17950  var config = renderer.layerConfig;
17951 
17952  if (!changedWidgets || !changedWidgets.length) return;
17953  var min = Infinity;
17954  for (var i = 0; i < changedWidgets.length; i++) {
17955  var w = changedWidgets[i];
17956  if (!w._inDocument) {
17957  w._inDocument = true;
17958  renderer.container.appendChild(w.el);
17959  }
17960 
17961  w.h = w.el.offsetHeight;
17962 
17963  if (!w.fixedWidth) {
17964  w.w = w.el.offsetWidth;
17965  w.screenWidth = Math.ceil(w.w / config.characterWidth);
17966  }
17967 
17968  var rowCount = w.h / config.lineHeight;
17969  if (w.coverLine) {
17970  rowCount -= this.session.getRowLineCount(w.row);
17971  if (rowCount < 0)
17972  rowCount = 0;
17973  }
17974  if (w.rowCount != rowCount) {
17975  w.rowCount = rowCount;
17976  if (w.row < min)
17977  min = w.row;
17978  }
17979  }
17980  if (min != Infinity) {
17981  this.session._emit("changeFold", {data:{start:{row: min}}});
17982  this.session.lineWidgetWidth = null;
17983  }
17984  this.session._changedWidgets = [];
17985  };
17986 
17987  this.renderWidgets = function(e, renderer) {
17988  var config = renderer.layerConfig;
17989  var lineWidgets = this.session.lineWidgets;
17990  if (!lineWidgets)
17991  return;
17992  var first = Math.min(this.firstRow, config.firstRow);
17993  var last = Math.max(this.lastRow, config.lastRow, lineWidgets.length);
17994 
17995  while (first > 0 && !lineWidgets[first])
17996  first--;
17997 
17998  this.firstRow = config.firstRow;
17999  this.lastRow = config.lastRow;
18000 
18001  renderer.$cursorLayer.config = config;
18002  for (var i = first; i <= last; i++) {
18003  var w = lineWidgets[i];
18004  if (!w || !w.el) continue;
18005 
18006  if (!w._inDocument) {
18007  w._inDocument = true;
18008  renderer.container.appendChild(w.el);
18009  }
18010  var top = renderer.$cursorLayer.getPixelPosition({row: i, column:0}, true).top;
18011  if (!w.coverLine)
18012  top += config.lineHeight * this.session.getRowLineCount(w.row);
18013  w.el.style.top = top - config.offset + "px";
18014 
18015  var left = w.coverGutter ? 0 : renderer.gutterWidth;
18016  if (!w.fixedWidth)
18017  left -= renderer.scrollLeft;
18018  w.el.style.left = left + "px";
18019 
18020  if (w.fixedWidth) {
18021  w.el.style.right = renderer.scrollBar.getWidth() + "px";
18022  } else {
18023  w.el.style.right = "";
18024  }
18025  }
18026  };
18027 
18028 }).call(LineWidgets.prototype);
18029 
18030 
18031 exports.LineWidgets = LineWidgets;
18032 
18033 });
18034 
18035 define("ace/ext/error_marker",["require","exports","module","ace/line_widgets","ace/lib/dom","ace/range"], function(require, exports, module) {
18036 "use strict";
18037 var LineWidgets = require("../line_widgets").LineWidgets;
18038 var dom = require("../lib/dom");
18039 var Range = require("../range").Range;
18040 
18041 function binarySearch(array, needle, comparator) {
18042  var first = 0;
18043  var last = array.length - 1;
18044 
18045  while (first <= last) {
18046  var mid = (first + last) >> 1;
18047  var c = comparator(needle, array[mid]);
18048  if (c > 0)
18049  first = mid + 1;
18050  else if (c < 0)
18051  last = mid - 1;
18052  else
18053  return mid;
18054  }
18055  return -(first + 1);
18056 }
18057 
18058 function findAnnotations(session, row, dir) {
18059  var annotations = session.getAnnotations().sort(Range.comparePoints);
18060  if (!annotations.length)
18061  return;
18062 
18063  var i = binarySearch(annotations, {row: row, column: -1}, Range.comparePoints);
18064  if (i < 0)
18065  i = -i - 1;
18066 
18067  if (i >= annotations.length - 1)
18068  i = dir > 0 ? 0 : annotations.length - 1;
18069  else if (i === 0 && dir < 0)
18070  i = annotations.length - 1;
18071 
18072  var annotation = annotations[i];
18073  if (!annotation || !dir)
18074  return;
18075 
18076  if (annotation.row === row) {
18077  do {
18078  annotation = annotations[i += dir];
18079  } while (annotation && annotation.row === row);
18080  if (!annotation)
18081  return annotations.slice();
18082  }
18083 
18084 
18085  var matched = [];
18086  row = annotation.row;
18087  do {
18088  matched[dir < 0 ? "unshift" : "push"](annotation);
18089  annotation = annotations[i += dir];
18090  } while (annotation && annotation.row == row);
18091  return matched.length && matched;
18092 }
18093 
18094 exports.showErrorMarker = function(editor, dir) {
18095  var session = editor.session;
18096  if (!session.widgetManager) {
18097  session.widgetManager = new LineWidgets(session);
18098  session.widgetManager.attach(editor);
18099  }
18100 
18101  var pos = editor.getCursorPosition();
18102  var row = pos.row;
18103  var oldWidget = session.lineWidgets && session.lineWidgets[row];
18104  if (oldWidget) {
18105  oldWidget.destroy();
18106  } else {
18107  row -= dir;
18108  }
18109  var annotations = findAnnotations(session, row, dir);
18110  var gutterAnno;
18111  if (annotations) {
18112  var annotation = annotations[0];
18113  pos.column = (annotation.pos && typeof annotation.column != "number"
18114  ? annotation.pos.sc
18115  : annotation.column) || 0;
18116  pos.row = annotation.row;
18117  gutterAnno = editor.renderer.$gutterLayer.$annotations[pos.row];
18118  } else if (oldWidget) {
18119  return;
18120  } else {
18121  gutterAnno = {
18122  text: ["Looks good!"],
18123  className: "ace_ok"
18124  };
18125  }
18126  editor.session.unfold(pos.row);
18127  editor.selection.moveToPosition(pos);
18128 
18129  var w = {
18130  row: pos.row,
18131  fixedWidth: true,
18132  coverGutter: true,
18133  el: dom.createElement("div")
18134  };
18135  var el = w.el.appendChild(dom.createElement("div"));
18136  var arrow = w.el.appendChild(dom.createElement("div"));
18137  arrow.className = "error_widget_arrow " + gutterAnno.className;
18138 
18139  var left = editor.renderer.$cursorLayer
18140  .getPixelPosition(pos).left;
18141  arrow.style.left = left + editor.renderer.gutterWidth - 5 + "px";
18142 
18143  w.el.className = "error_widget_wrapper";
18144  el.className = "error_widget " + gutterAnno.className;
18145  el.innerHTML = gutterAnno.text.join("<br>");
18146 
18147  el.appendChild(dom.createElement("div"));
18148 
18149  var kb = function(_, hashId, keyString) {
18150  if (hashId === 0 && (keyString === "esc" || keyString === "return")) {
18151  w.destroy();
18152  return {command: "null"};
18153  }
18154  };
18155 
18156  w.destroy = function() {
18157  if (editor.$mouseHandler.isMousePressed)
18158  return;
18159  editor.keyBinding.removeKeyboardHandler(kb);
18160  session.widgetManager.removeLineWidget(w);
18161  editor.off("changeSelection", w.destroy);
18162  editor.off("changeSession", w.destroy);
18163  editor.off("mouseup", w.destroy);
18164  editor.off("change", w.destroy);
18165  };
18166 
18167  editor.keyBinding.addKeyboardHandler(kb);
18168  editor.on("changeSelection", w.destroy);
18169  editor.on("changeSession", w.destroy);
18170  editor.on("mouseup", w.destroy);
18171  editor.on("change", w.destroy);
18172 
18173  editor.session.widgetManager.addLineWidget(w);
18174 
18175  w.el.onmousedown = editor.focus.bind(editor);
18176 
18177  editor.renderer.scrollCursorIntoView(null, 0.5, {bottom: w.el.offsetHeight});
18178 };
18179 
18180 
18181 dom.importCssString("\
18182  .error_widget_wrapper {\
18183  background: inherit;\
18184  color: inherit;\
18185  border:none\
18186  }\
18187  .error_widget {\
18188  border-top: solid 2px;\
18189  border-bottom: solid 2px;\
18190  margin: 5px 0;\
18191  padding: 10px 40px;\
18192  white-space: pre-wrap;\
18193  }\
18194  .error_widget.ace_error, .error_widget_arrow.ace_error{\
18195  border-color: #ff5a5a\
18196  }\
18197  .error_widget.ace_warning, .error_widget_arrow.ace_warning{\
18198  border-color: #F1D817\
18199  }\
18200  .error_widget.ace_info, .error_widget_arrow.ace_info{\
18201  border-color: #5a5a5a\
18202  }\
18203  .error_widget.ace_ok, .error_widget_arrow.ace_ok{\
18204  border-color: #5aaa5a\
18205  }\
18206  .error_widget_arrow {\
18207  position: absolute;\
18208  border: solid 5px;\
18209  border-top-color: transparent!important;\
18210  border-right-color: transparent!important;\
18211  border-left-color: transparent!important;\
18212  top: -5px;\
18213  }\
18214 ", "");
18215 
18216 });
18217 
18218 define("ace/ace",["require","exports","module","ace/lib/fixoldbrowsers","ace/lib/dom","ace/lib/event","ace/editor","ace/edit_session","ace/undomanager","ace/virtual_renderer","ace/worker/worker_client","ace/keyboard/hash_handler","ace/placeholder","ace/multi_select","ace/mode/folding/fold_mode","ace/theme/textmate","ace/ext/error_marker","ace/config"], function(require, exports, module) {
18219 "use strict";
18220 
18221 require("./lib/fixoldbrowsers");
18222 
18223 var dom = require("./lib/dom");
18224 var event = require("./lib/event");
18225 
18226 var Editor = require("./editor").Editor;
18227 var EditSession = require("./edit_session").EditSession;
18228 var UndoManager = require("./undomanager").UndoManager;
18229 var Renderer = require("./virtual_renderer").VirtualRenderer;
18230 require("./worker/worker_client");
18231 require("./keyboard/hash_handler");
18232 require("./placeholder");
18233 require("./multi_select");
18234 require("./mode/folding/fold_mode");
18235 require("./theme/textmate");
18236 require("./ext/error_marker");
18237 
18238 exports.config = require("./config");
18239 exports.require = require;
18240 exports.edit = function(el) {
18241  if (typeof(el) == "string") {
18242  var _id = el;
18243  el = document.getElementById(_id);
18244  if (!el)
18245  throw new Error("ace.edit can't find div #" + _id);
18246  }
18247 
18248  if (el && el.env && el.env.editor instanceof Editor)
18249  return el.env.editor;
18250 
18251  var value = "";
18252  if (el && /input|textarea/i.test(el.tagName)) {
18253  var oldNode = el;
18254  value = oldNode.value;
18255  el = dom.createElement("pre");
18256  oldNode.parentNode.replaceChild(el, oldNode);
18257  } else {
18258  value = dom.getInnerText(el);
18259  el.innerHTML = '';
18260  }
18261 
18262  var doc = exports.createEditSession(value);
18263 
18264  var editor = new Editor(new Renderer(el));
18265  editor.setSession(doc);
18266 
18267  var env = {
18268  document: doc,
18269  editor: editor,
18270  onResize: editor.resize.bind(editor, null)
18271  };
18272  if (oldNode) env.textarea = oldNode;
18273  event.addListener(window, "resize", env.onResize);
18274  editor.on("destroy", function() {
18275  event.removeListener(window, "resize", env.onResize);
18276  env.editor.container.env = null; // prevent memory leak on old ie
18277  });
18278  editor.container.env = editor.env = env;
18279  return editor;
18280 };
18281 exports.createEditSession = function(text, mode) {
18282  var doc = new EditSession(text, mode);
18283  doc.setUndoManager(new UndoManager());
18284  return doc;
18285 }
18286 exports.EditSession = EditSession;
18287 exports.UndoManager = UndoManager;
18288 });
18289  (function() {
18290  window.require(["ace/ace"], function(a) {
18291  a && a.config.init(true);
18292  if (!window.ace)
18293  window.ace = a;
18294  for (var key in a) if (a.hasOwnProperty(key))
18295  window.ace[key] = a[key];
18296  });
18297  })();
Generated by   1.8.13
